Overall a great experience and Room amenities was all one could ask for (Modern Kitchen with all the utensils/crockery). Layout was excellent. The only "extremely minor" complaint was that the rooms were a bit dark, however, this did not detract from the overall experience. Will definitely stay again if ever we are back in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: thekups
Reviews.Content: Close to everything, a little tough to find at first. A few minor problems in the room, but were fixed quickly and easily. Very clean. One mattress was saggy.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxation at it BEST”
Reviews.Author: Tikysha
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine was excited & bragging about staying at another Resort in Orlando based off of pictures she had viewed online & had been described to her by a sales representative. She was taken back when she stepped into my suite!! We are currently planning a trip to return to Orlando for some business & she is requesting to stay at Floridays Resorts this time!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Huge Rooms, Good Location - Great for extended stays”
Reviews.Author: Jeff_Cantrell
Reviews.Content: Our last visit in November 2011 was our 5th stay at Floridays. A friend of ours turned us on to them due to the size of the rooms. They sleep around 10 people, but for us it's a great way to seperate the kids for sleeping. The rooms are great. They've always been clean and unless you have housekeeping service it's your job to keep it that way. All the supplies you could possibly need are at your fingertips. Every piece of kitchen stuff, washer & dryer...you name it. I think of it as renting a condo rather than a hotel room. Rooms are basically the same for 2 & 3 bedrooms. They literally pop a 3rd bedroom on the larger unit....aside from that they are exact same in size. Location is great on South International Drive. Getting in the place can be a little challenging the first time, after that you've got it no problem. There is a Publix grocery store a few blocks away. Driving would be easier, but you could walk it. I don't think it has a sidewalk all the way. Also in the area: a walgreens, domino's pizza, Bennihana and a ton of stuff. Plus the Premier Outlet Mall is less than a mile away, so shop till you drop. We love bringing our kids here. They have space to move around while we're not at the parks. We save big money by eating in & having snacks available. The pool is nice. Not a whole lot of the kids, but it's a very nice resort style pool. The condo is great overall...for the money, you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: “wow what a property”
Reviews.Author: Aussiekisser
Reviews.Content: This property has it all we where a family of 4 from West Australia. This property its very clean ,open spaces and the staff are very friendly. We had a two bed room and wow there was a lot of room both bed rooms are very large and the lounge room was very big and the kitchen is fantastic. If you need a family Resort in Orlando then this is it you have everything here and its only 10 mins drive to Disney parks.

Reviews.Title: “Our second visit was even better than the first”
Reviews.Author: rengel00
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price for the location and quality at Floridays. Our first time there we rented a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom suite with full kitchen, living room and washer/dryer. This time we had a 2 bedroom, 2 bath with the kitchen, laundry etc. The suites are clean and fully stocked with plates, glassware, silverware and cooking equipment. There is a HUGE Publix grocery store around the corner with everything you need. The complex is located ten minutes from all the Disney parks, three minutes from SeaWorld and Aquatica, and ten minutes from Universal Studios. Also just a few minutes from downtown Orlando where the malls and convention centers are. They also have a beautiful heated pool big enough for people with kids to be on one end where the kids play area is and people with no kids to be on the opposite side where it is more quiet. Finally, the staff is extremely courteous and professional and they will go out oftheir way to help you get what you need.

Reviews.Title: “Great getaway in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: David R
Reviews.Content: great place to stay, very accomodating. In beyween Disney and Universal. Publix and outlet stores are within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “girls weekend”
Reviews.Author: jmjd4304
Reviews.Content: everything was great!! the location was perfect! i will stay here again. my family was very inpressed with the rooms, they just loved it!! it was close to all the parks.

Reviews.Title: “Nice facility, but lacking in quality”
Reviews.Author: KukanaTN
Reviews.Content: This is a large, family resort. The facility itself was nice. It had really nice pools (great for families), small but efficient workout room (although it didn't open until 6am...would have preferred 5am since we were there on business), and lots of parking. Negatives would be no free breakfast in the morning (and the "grill" didn't even offer bagels), expensive cocktails and disappointing quality in rooms. The apartment type of rooms were nice, good size kitchen, large master bath and rooms, but not great. After the first night, I noticed that my king bed was short sheeted. They used a queen sheet on the king bed, so the bottom foot of the bed had nothing on it! Would you believe that they even made the bed the second day that way too? REALLY? It was my fault for not looking under the sheets and notice it until late night on the second day, but since we were leaving I didn't say anything. Why bother? They obviously did it on purpose. I also found hair in the shower (but no mold, which was a plus). It's the little things that really do matter. I wish these places took more pride in what they are doing, but maybe they don't have to. Who knows. Would I stay there again? Maybe. The price was right (about $179 a night for a two bedroom). Next time, I'd look around better when I arrived and make sure everything was right when I got there. Since I didn't give the management the opportunity to make any corrections, I can't comment on whether or not they'd care. But, seeing how many options there are to choose from on International Drive, it would be in their best interest to do a better job.

Reviews.Title: “perfect sister get-away”
Reviews.Author: jicobrje
Reviews.Content: This hotel suite was perfect for a Five sister get away when we wanted to just lounge in the morning or evening and catch up while sipping coffee or wine! Location was great and amenities, cleanliness and service more than exceeded our expectations!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Melandbel
Reviews.Content: I Love this hotel in Florida It is a great time for a famliy holiday but could be cleaned more often. Me and My family came back from pool our room was very dusty in the corners of the room. Great service and pool was great.

Reviews.Title: “Vacations Orlando”
Reviews.Author: bruno101970
Reviews.Content: I recommend the hotel, excelent help from front desk, large room, good location, veryggod choice for family

Reviews.Title: “Great family hotel”
Reviews.Author: NYYanks1974
Reviews.Content: Traveled with family, two young kids. Rooms were clean and spacious. We were in a building in the back of the resort which was a short walk to pool but it stayed very quiet. Very convenient location to parks and outlets. Onsite grill/food spot nice for lunch while at pool. Great value. Highly recommend for families planning on returning.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for a perfect holiday”
Reviews.Author: T1bot
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Floridays resort for 10 night in January 2012. We picked it because of its location close to parks and international drive and the fact we have 2 kids under 4 we needed a good base we could return to quickly. When we arrived we were greeted pleasantly and unbelievably effeciently we got our key and were crashed out within 5 minutes!! Rooms have everything we needed. When we arrived there was a small leak under the kitchen sink. I phoned reception and it was repaired instantly. Rooms were well serviced and overall it was a cry peaceful and pleasant place to rest your head Would definately stay there again without a second thought

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean upmarket hotel apartment in a child friendly environment , would not call it a resort as such but there was a kids po”
Reviews.Author: tausif
Reviews.Content: Spacious 2 bedroom apartment with a family bathroom and en-suite bathroom with jacuzzi. Well equipped kitchen with washing machine, tumble drier , and dishwasher. Comfortable sitting area with 3 flatscreen TVs in total in the apartment. Oh, and there was free Wifi. Similar feel to the Hilton Grand Vacation Club Arrezo Way, also close to it. Given the two , I would rather stay at the HGVC but the Floridays was better value for money when we booked it although we also preferred the HGVC apartment design. Floridays and HGVC Arrezo Way are also close to a Walgreens, McDonalds and to Premium Outlet Mall where there were designer factory outlets Polo, Guess, Banana Republic, Tag Heuer etc.

Reviews.Title: “Great place.”
Reviews.Author: Advsr
Reviews.Content: Good. Clean. Nice people. Kitchen made it easy for family. Kids could eat in morning before we headed out for the theme parks. Pools are well maintained. Kid area is attached to main pool with no rope off. Need to watch little non swimmers that they don't end up in water over their heads while playing in kiddy area!! Rooms are NOT cleaned daily without additional charge. You get ran towels and trash removed though. That worked fine for a short stay.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic pre-cruise stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: THEGOW
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in Jan 2012 before sailing out of port Canaverial for a cruise. When my wife and I walked in we were pleasently surprised on how clean, well lit,, and the whole layout was of the room for the price. we had a wonderful stay the location was great very close to all the fun parks. We did not use the pool, but it was open and in very nice condition. the pool side bar was great. I also mistakenly double booked my room (totaly my fault) went on my cruise and 11 days later when I found out I was charged on my credit card for a "first day no show charge" I called them and explained what happened and they removed the charge, no problem at all. I will stay ther again next time I am in orlando. I give them 5 out of 5 stars!!

Reviews.Title: “Very good service at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: HampshireJudy
Reviews.Content: Spent 3 days her before driving to Fort Lauderdale for a cruise. Unfortunately the weather was cold, but this didn't stop us from noticing the excellent service this hotel provides. Loved it, didn't notice any of the slight negatives from any previous posts. As for the bathroom being a poor design, that must be a joke, it is huge the size of most UK houses second bedroom. There are shutters to the bedroom, but it's great, get in the big bath with your bubbles, turn on the jacuzzi and get the other half to bring you your favourite tipple, relax and enjoy. The beds are very comfortable, and there is everything you need. One and only gripe was that the tv in the bedromm was a bit fuzzy, but I am sure if we had phoned reception they would have sorted it. They phone to check if you are Ok on arrival, and again on departure to see if they can help with anything, I would return here. I Trolley stops outside if you do not want to use the car $4 for a ticket for the day, use it as many times as you like.

Reviews.Title: “Floriday's Resort Review”
Reviews.Author: Shillee S
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Floriday's resort for 2 weeks in November of 2011. We got a great price on a 2-bedroom unit and were excited to stay based on the wonderful feedback we had heard. Our stay there was great - until the last day. I would have given it a 4-5 star until our last encounter. Some things to note for people who do stay there: * if you need items for cooking, we found many were missing from our unit. We had to call the front desk for our items and they did arrive quickly. * on our first night there, we arrived a bit late (after 8PM). We needed a playpen and it took 1-1.5 hours to get one to our room which was rather inconvenient. * We had no issues with the towel/trash service during our stay. We also had a full cleaning while there. * If you have small children, be aware that the toilets are more oval like in their shape. Our portable potty seat just fit over it but really slid around. * We did not use the pool during our visit so I can't comment on it but it did look nice. Issues we had with our room: * no batteries in the TV remotes (we bought our own) * master bedroom phone did not work * main bathroom toilet wasn't sealed properly so if an adult sat on it, it would leak. As a result, only our children used it Unfortunately on our last day there as we were getting ready to leave, a cockroach was found in our kitchen and went under the cabinets. We grabbed our stuff and finished packing in the hall! No idea if it was there earlier, if it came in when we opened the door and we somehow didn't see it or what. But having been to Florida every year for at least 2 weeks since 1999, this was the first one we had encountered. I had booked our upcoming stay for there but have canceled our reservation. And to top it off, there is a cancellation charge of about $4 that will appear on our credit card (NICE!) I did fill in a survey from our stay and Kevin Ryan did attempt to contact me but it was our cell number/home number and we were not there when he called. I then responded back with that information and also my work number but have not heard back. I know he was on Christmas holidays and have pretty much now given up on hearing back. Kevin 'corrected' me on the bug that I called a cockroach but saying it was a Palmetto bug. I googled that and found out that we are both right (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/American_cockroach).

Reviews.Title: “Very good for the price”
Reviews.Author: fabiobrsp
Reviews.Content: Our family of seven stayed in a 3 bedroom unit during holidays. Room is very spacious, exactly like an apartment, with full kitchen (including a full size refrigerator) - which is great not only to save some money avoiding restaurants everyday, but also because, at a given point, it is good to have a homemade meal. The hotel was very busy, especially on weekends, but the only drawback was the loud music and noise from the activities in the swimming pool area on weekends (they start such activities not so early, though). I thought that the level of services in this hotel is very good, but would rate cleaning services as average (actually, it is not a full serviced hotel, so they will only change bed linen and towels daily, and a full clean-up will occur only once a week). Also, although clean and spacious, rooms could be better illuminated (light bulbs are weak, possibly to save energy, but this also could be reached by changing to economic bulbs). Overall, considering location and price, it is a very good to excellent hotel, and it is a place we will consider for our next visits. Additionally, in regular hotels we would need two separate rooms, what would increase the total cost of the trip.

Reviews.Title: “Family stay in 3 bedroom apartment”
Reviews.Author: wladfb
Reviews.Content: The hotel is well maintained and clean and the staff all very friendly and attentive, always with a smile. We stayed for 6 days in a spacious apartment with 3 bedrooms, a full kitchen and washer and dryer. It´s located in the most quiet area of International Dr, near SeaWorld and Orlando Premium Outlet, and not far from Disney parks. The location is great, close to supermarkets and pharmacies and has a great steak house Hibashi at the entrance. We love it!

Reviews.Title: “floridays orlando”
Reviews.Author: Colm M
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 days and this is a quiet serene development, we had a good 3 b/r apartment with washer/dryer, fridge, cooker, and diswasher. Mod cons made life easy and publix supermarket 10 minute walk. Pools good, staff good, decor good, location on south idrive excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it, wish I could have stayed for longer.”
Reviews.Author: DebbieSteph
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights and wish we could have stayed for longer to enjoy the resort better. Instead we were out most days, visiting theme parks or shopping at the nearby outlet mall. It was spacious, clean and comfortable. The concierge and reception staff are exceptionally helpful and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Service makes all the difference”
Reviews.Author: claring
Reviews.Content: Every interaction we had with the front desk staff was above and beyond our expectations. We were led to this resort through the Surf Expo travel planners. Although the location is not as close to the Convention Center as other hotels in their program, this was the perfect choice for us. No shuttle was sent although it was promised. After waiting out front with us, Brett put us in his own car and drove us - how often does something like that happen? We hope to have a reason to return.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: amannamedjim
Reviews.Content: We met several other couples here for an extended weekend, booking a couple of suites. The rooms are very spacious and comfortable, and the bathrooms are huge and well-done. All in all, we had no complaints about the rooms. The kitchen was well-appointed and had everything we needed to cook in the room. Unfortunately, the weather did not permit us to use the pool, but it looked really nice. The front desk staff was friendly, efficient, and top-notch. An adjoining cafe sold Starbucks coffee for those of us who needed more than the in-room brew. Regarding location, this was a real plus. We were within 1/2 mile of Walgreens, Publix, Dunkin Donuts, and one of the huge Outlet Malls. This is in addition to the proximity of SeaWorld & Disney. There were a couple of maintenance issues during our stay, but they were resolved fairly quickly. Overall this is a great place and value, especially for larger groups.

Reviews.Title: “this place was wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: malathi e
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in June of 2011 for a 8 night Disney vacation. As a family of five, we found this place to be perfect. True, it isn't onsite Disney, but it is a 5 minute car drive away and the cost for the rental car was peanuts compared to the cost of staying onsite. Plus, the room included two bedrooms, a full kitchen, and a washer and dryer. So we saved money by eating breakfast in the room every day and often eating lunch or dinner in as well. What we saved on meals allowed us to have one fabulous dining out experience every day. Plus we didn't have to pack for 8 days, only 4 days and then we washed clothes there. The maid service was very good. There was a Publix grocery store around the corner and an outlet mall too for any shopping needs. My only complaint is that the few pizza delivery companies that deliver to the facility are horrible and one company never showed after 45 minutes of calling them over and over. But, of course, that has nothing to do with the hotel. We were busy at the parks and we never availed ourselves of the pools but they looked very nice. We would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “It´s the best value for Orlando”
Reviews.Author: robertomn
Reviews.Content: I´ve been to Orlando many times and if you have kids and want to have a big apartment with kitchen, this is the place.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: MichaelHamilton_73
Reviews.Content: We were quit nervous booking accommodation over the internet however Floridays exceeded every expectation we had. First of all the accommodation was simply amazing. We booked the three bedroom suite and it was almost bigger than our own house. The only problem with it was it was that good the kids did not want to leave the room!! The staff were very friendly and helpful. They really went above and beyond to ensure that we had a fantastic time. I would definitely recommend the resort.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed in Jan 2012 Disney Visit”
Reviews.Author: RSFD205
Reviews.Content: Went in January so it was a bit cold but the pool was heated and was comfortable. That was huge with the kids. Very satisfied with our stay. Clean place and only 10 minutes to Disney.

Reviews.Title: “Wow! beautiful grounds with spacious condos.”
Reviews.Author: Barmalken
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at Floridays for our 7 days Christmas vacation. This was our second time visiting the resort and the experience was just as wonderful as the first. My daughter just got her service dog and he accompanied her on this trip. The staff was very respectful in acknowledging him as a working dog. We stayed in the three bedroom wheelchair assessible condo for the second time and that was more than enough room for my family of 4. The teens loved that they had their own space and I loved my master suite. My only suggestion for the resort is to provide a two bedroom wheelchair assessible condo. The three bedroom(sleeps 10-12) is very pricey especially when a two bedroom would provide adequate space for a family of 4.

Reviews.Title: “No Peace and Quiet After A Day At A Noisy Theme Park”
Reviews.Author: anonymous p
Reviews.Content: The bad: The Orlando theme parks subject visitors to loud music and noise all day long. After spending a day touring a theme park, it would be nice to return to a nice quiet hotel room. You can't do that if you stay in the wrong building at Floridays Resort Orlando. We made the mistake of agreeing to a top floor suite abutting the pool area. Even though we were six floors up, we could hear music in our bedrooms throughout our entire one week stay. Management keeps loud music blaring around the pool area, usually until the pool closes around 11 pm. We called the front desk to complain on several occassions but only noticed a decrease in volume once. There is no escape. The average: The accomodations are large but average with basic older white appliances in the kitchen. Basic utensils are provided that should meet most of your cooking needs. The laundry is a small combination upright washer dryer unit requiring multiple loads if you have more than two people. The good: Staff is very helpful and friendly. The concierge is a great resource for information and assistance. If you want to stay in a quiet place, don't stay in buildings A or B. The price is reasonable. Although not as nice as other condo resorts that we've stayed in the past, it is a good place for a family to spread out and save some money (after being cleaned out at the theme parks) by cooking your own meals.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel”
Reviews.Author: mendlar
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here twice in the last six months and have nothing but absolute high commendation for this resort. Accommodation is excellent and of an extremely high standard. Staff very polite facilities excellent too. Would definitely go back!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Jozek444
Reviews.Content: We just returned from 10 days in Orlando. Christmas is not the time to try and be at the parks. This being said, after long days waiting in lines, we were always relieved to come back to our nice spacious 3-bedroom apartment. Having a full kitchen, and full laundry facilities in the room really made things easy. The bar food was more than adequate, the pool areas clean and safe with abundant towels and loungers. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. We had a family reunion setup there, and they managed to get all four of our rooms on the same floor. The location is very convenient to most parks (free park shuttles offered for Epcot and Universal, iRide to SeaWorld just up the street) and grocery shopping at the Publix around the corner.

Reviews.Title: “big and conveniently located”
Reviews.Author: jane s
Reviews.Content: We stayed here as a family of four. My husband and I and two daughters aged 20 & 17. We all loved it here and would most certainly choose this place again. It was very impressive and excellent value for money. It had a large clean kitchen with all the essential utensils, pots, pans and even tupperware type containers. There was lots of space to spread out. The rooms were very clean and well maintained. The staff were very helpful and friendly. There was no need for a car as the free shuttle went to all the theme parks and as a bonus there were supermarkets and a major outlet shopping centre all within walking distance ( about 15 min) A bus is right out the front if we didn't want to walk. Highly recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “Great Apartment”
Reviews.Author: pabsSydney
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for two weeks after spending one week inside Disneyworld. The apartment was just what we were looking for. Adequate kitchen, laundry and all the things you would expect in an apartment. We stayed in building B facing the lake which was perfect, as it is close to everything without being noisy. The main pool is large and never felt crowded. We had hired car, so never used any of the public transport. We were a short drive from everything. Location was fantastic. My only concern with the property was the security. Although we didn't have any problems it did concern me that anyone could be walking around the complex. We received at least one pizza brochure under the room every night we stayed. The staff were very courteous and helpful. We were never approached to consider a time share (a big problem with other places) at any time. The property was always spotlessly clean and the rubbish in our room always removed including the pile of 15 shoe boxes I left one day. The cafe had a limited menu and the food was ordinary. Unless you wanted to cook you needed to drive to a nearby restaurant. There was a Japanese restaurant next door which I would recommend however it was very expensive. We used the kitchen which was well stocked with most things you would need and the supermarket was very close.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Place”
Reviews.Author: Lisa S
Reviews.Content: Love this place, the bedrooms are large, and the master bathroom awesome. The kitchen is well stocked with all necessary items to cook a full meal. Grocery store around the corner made it a great weekend with the family.

Reviews.Title: “great for many reasons”
Reviews.Author: Taiwan2001
Reviews.Content: great hotel that is a great choice for all sorts of Orlando visitors. I went with my wife and two kids, we had a business/pleasure trip of 5 days. The hotel was great for both needs. There's a free International drive shuttle, a shuttle to Disney, and a Publix grocery store in decent walking distance (15 mins?).

Reviews.Title: “nice property with good facilities”
Reviews.Author: sharaf2
Reviews.Content: Me and my family really enjoyed staying on this property. we were pleased with services provided on this property and the rate was reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, spacious, pleasant surroundings, some nice amenities”
Reviews.Author: skeeziks
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 3 bedroom unit in building C. The condo was clean and spacious with updated amenities including flat screen TVs in the family room and bedrooms. The main pool area was nicely landscaped and included a sand area. We didn't try the on site restaruant/bar. However, the small cafe that is also a mini Starbucks was convenient. There is a Publix, McDonalds, large shopping outlet, and restaurants very nearby. However, I think saying that the shopping outlet is walking distance is a bit of a stretch. Yes, you could walk to them...but it is a somewhat of a hike...particularly if you intend to be carrying purchases back with you. Every staff member we encountered was exceedingly friendly and helpful. Check in was quick and easy. Yes, there is a resort fee and cleaning schedules are not the same as you would get at a hotel. But, this is all very typical for condo based properties and is easliy found on the website. I did find the rooms to be too dark. Again, this is very typical of condo properties as there aren't many places to put windows. But, the room decor contributes to the problem. Also, the entrance to the resort is a bit tricky. It is a little hidden compared to others. And, you have to make a U-turn to get in when approaching from one side as the road in front is diviided. Overall, this is a very nice property and we had a comfortable and pleasant stay. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good, but not as great as the ratings”
Reviews.Author: Kathy44141
Reviews.Content: Location is great. Floor plan of suites is very good, we had a 3 bedroom suite with plenty of room. Kitchen is well equipped. There is a weird feature in the master bathroom, whichbajoins the master bedroom....there is an opening in the wall over the jacuzzi tun and into the master bed room....maybe so you can watch TV while in the tub? But whatbis weird about it is that you have to close thin shutters ifnyou want tomgo in there tonuse the toilet and also close the door from the living room to the master bedroom so that those in the main living area aren't exposed to your toileting activities. It is just odd that they spent money to create this feature with little benefit. Anyway, my big complaint here was the service and housekeeping. Upon checkin, we found long hairs on my sons pillowcase and stuck to the shower wall, plus a bathroom towel smeared with blood, clearly left from prior guests. Yuck. We tried three times to find the concierge to helpnwith Sea World tickets, and she was NEVER THERE. The other three people working in the lobby, despite there being no other guests in the lobby all three times, could not help with the tickets. First I was told she would be right back, then after standing and waiting for the conceirge for 15 minutes, was told she was out on a shuttle, and then on break. You would think they would be cross trained, or would radio her, or something. Later she was 'on break' and Nother time 8 called and the phone rang and rang with no answer, ever. This was during normal hours. i finally gAve up, angry I had wasted so much time on my vacation. Anyway, the place has a great location and nice sized rooms. The staff is not very swift, so Injust don't think this should be called the number one place in Orlando. it worked for what we needed, but I probably would go elsewhere next time. The services are far more limited than they lead you to believe.

Reviews.Title: “Not the best...”
Reviews.Author: Mary A
Reviews.Content: We stayed here because of the great reviews only to be very disappointed. We were in building E, second floor. The room looked nice, but the areas were cramped due to large furniture. Our children slept in the front bedroom and were frequently disturbed by noisy guests and hotel staff. We could also hear children in the room above us running around and couldn't wait till their bedtime! The bed in the master bedroom was uncomfortable because it sloped on one side. We also heard a lot of noise outside our window in the mornings due to maintenance staff activity. The positives were the nice master bathroom and the pool and spa near our bldg.

Reviews.Title: “What a GREAT place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Mike S
Reviews.Content: We were taking our son and his family (wife & 4 grandkids) to Universal for their Christmas present this year (2 years worth of Christmas Club). We booked the Floridays with a package deal through the Universal site along with Park tickets, etc. Next time, if there is one, I'd book directly through Floridays. A couple months after booking this package deal, I contacted Universal to add an extra Night to our stay. After a lifetime on the phone they said they couldn't accomodate this request for the extra night. So when we checked in at Floridays I asked if we could extend our stay for an extra night (which happened to be New Years Eve). They were extremely accomodating but said their rate wouldn't be the same as through Universal. Believe it or not, their rate was nearly $100 less than what I had paid through Universal! And what about the accomodations? Superb! Since there were 8 of us, we stayed in a 3 bedroom suite. It had 2 bathrooms, Kitchen, Dining, Living room areas, plus a balcony where we could watch fireworks from one of the theme parks at night. We've traveled with my daughter to many convention sites that always provide very upscale accomodations. Floridays matches or exceeds anything we've stayed at with her. If you are planning a vacation to Orlando; I don't think you can go wrong by choosing Floridays Resort. I just wouldn't recommend going between Christmas & New Years; Universal was packed, we were told they had to turn people away by 11 a.m. because it was getting too crowded. As for the staff at Floridays, I doubt you can find better people anywhere in Orlando. They were extremely helpful and accomodating. On one day, I couldn't get my door key to work (guess your not supposed to keep the key in the same pocket as your cell phone), sure we had to wait a few minutes, but housekeeping came to let us back into our apt. and other staff later brought us a new key. The Stevens family Coldwater, MI

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Aimee L
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience at the Floridays. Rooms are very spacious and nicely decorated. We had a 2 bedroom suite so we had 1 room, the kids had a room and then there is a nice living room & balcony and kitchen. The pool is wonderful, we loved the "zero entry" pool with small children. I also swam laps in the pool which was great. The kids also liked the large sand area by the pool, it was like a mini beach for them. We cooked a LOT since we were coming from another leg of vacation and were already done with eating out. The publix grocery store is just up the street so that worked out great. We had all of our breakfasts and about half our dinners at home. We had decent cookwear and full size appliances. We spent 2 days at Sea World (if you buy one day online or at the resort you get a second day free) and my kids LOVED sea world. They are 2 and 4 and it was a perfect way to spend a few days. Sea world is only about 5 minutes from the resort and once you pay for parking for the day you can leave and come back, which we did so the kids could nap. We would definitely return to Floridays, lovely grounds, rooms and service. They even let us checkout late!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is everything I expected and more!”
Reviews.Author: Michele B
Reviews.Content: This was a 25th anniversary/family vacation trip - the staff at the Floridays went out of their way to make our visit special. We stayed in Building B with view of the pond - it was glorious - an added bonus was that we were able to watch the fireworks at Disney each evening! We will definitely recommend the Floridays to our friends and family. The shuttle service to and from the Disney parks was excellent and always on time. The pool was wonderful - and our 2 bedroom suite was spotless. All in all - a fantastic place to stay and relax!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for golf getaway”
Reviews.Author: bluewatergolf
Reviews.Content: Our group has stayed at the Floridays Resort twice while in Orlando for four days each time to do nothing but eat, golf, drink, golf, sleep, and then play golf. The 3 bed room condos make it very affordable for our group of 8. The kitchen is well equipped and there is plenty of space to have the evening card games. Being centrally located, it is very convenient to the Disney courses, Orange County National and Grand Cypress. We have never had a single issue with the condos here and are planning our next trip already

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: HermesToronto
Reviews.Content: Great units. Very Spacious. Staff helpful and friendly. We were in Bldg. F which is a long way from the main pool. Families with small children may want to be closer. A little more attention to detail in terms of maintenance is needed - just small annoyances like missing knob in a lamp or a hair dryer coming away from the wall. Appliances and some kitchen items are done the cheap - pint-sized dishwasher means you are constantly running loads. Also, they only give you a Keurig coffee maker which means once you use up the starter pack, you have to buy more of those expensive pods. Would consider staying again although Sheraton Vistana across the street edges out this place.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for families”
Reviews.Author: voyageur-familial
Reviews.Content: You're in the Orlando area and you're looking for a spacious room for a group of 2 families ? We had the 3 bedrooms and had small children and we must say that this is the place to be if you don't mind travelling a couple of minutes off the beaten path. Although close to everything you need, you may need your GPS to find it the first time as we did ! Still, this is a clean place with a wonderful pool that is trying to "challenge" the timesharing offers in the area. My only concern : how crowded is the pool in the summer ??? Otherwise, you have everything you need in this place and it is OK for young kids ... you won't feel alone !

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again”
Reviews.Author: Disney1999
Reviews.Content: Bit late with my review we stayed late sept! Loved floridays we stayed in building b nice & quiet tv broke in master suite I informed them on the morning by the time we arrived bac @ 5ish tv was fixed n message asking if everything was ok,we have been to Florida 4 times before staying in villas & different hotels, I would always go bac to floridays now.only one small downside is the cleaning the fact they only made beds & removed rubbish wasn't a problem just the time I no it's a big hotel but sometimes we would return bac @ 4/5 & still not done.having said that had a great time & loved Harry potter in universal

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, huge pool and well located”
Reviews.Author: bryhof
Reviews.Content: Rooms were huge, clean and very comfortable. With a family of five I was looking at $450+ a night to stay at Disney. Paid $200 at floridays with all the tax and resort fees for a two Bedroom with kitchen , dining and living room. Free shuttles to the parks and easy drive to anywhere. The kitchen was great we stocked the fridge with drinks, snacks and breakfast food for some extra savings. We stayed late at universal one night and can fare back, for five, was only $25. Very friendly when we checked in and were accommodating with regard to room location. You will not regret staying at this resort!

Reviews.Title: “A Bloody Mess...”
Reviews.Author: reneestevenson
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at Floridays during the Christmas holiday. We had a 3 bedroom and it was very spacious. They could use an upgrade on some of the furnishings (the beds were quite old and uncomfortable. We awoke to neck and back stiffness several mornings) my mom and I chose Floridays due to the trip advisor rating. I am sad to report that we were not pleased. My mother has severe asthma; therefore we requested a suite that had not previously had pets in it. We were given a suite in building D. The room was not clean. We found pet hairs behind the door in the bathroom as well as the main entry door. We called the front desk and they moved us to another suite in building A. The suite appeared to be cleaner and it was closer to the game room and the pool. (We were sadly mistaken) The carpet had stains. The vent in the hallway was FULL of dust and VERY dirty. My brother and his wife pulled the sheets back in the master bedroom to find that the blanket had blood on it. About an hour later I pulled my sheets back and the comforter on my bed had blood on it. I called the front desk and let them know. I told them that I pulled it off of the bed and put it in the hallway with the dirty towels and that they could get it in the morning. After a long tiring day at Universal Studios, I came home to the SAME comforter folded up in the corner of the room. I called the front desk again, this time they came right away to pick up the soiled comforter and offered another one. I declined… The next evening, after a long day at Islands of Adventure I came home to another bloody comforter on my bed. I was NOT happy… I called the front and they removed it again. The next couple of days went by blood free!!! On our last night my mom woke up due the pillow being so uncomfortable; when she switched the pillow to the other side she saw 3 little dots of blood. She could not go back to sleep. We reported this when we checked out. I think that Floridays should review their cleaning policy. The housekeeping staff and the maintenance staff should be more closely monitored so that Floridays can maintain its #1 spot on trip advisor. I am glad to know that other guests did not experience what my family and I have experienced. Maybe Floridays just had a bad moment. We did receive an apology once we got home. The customer service was great!!! I also appreciate the fact that they called to apologize to us for our experiences.

Reviews.Title: “What a GREAT hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Susan M
Reviews.Content: Floridays is just wonderful. I recommend it to anyone visiting Orlando. The staff is very friendly and helpful; the rooms are lovely and so clean; the whole resort is beautiful. Floridays has so many amenities, like the incredible pool, a fun, poolside bar and cafe, wifi in the rooms. All four of us just had a great stay there!

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay for families”
Reviews.Author: KMichigan
Reviews.Content: Very nice place for families. Convenient to all the parks. They were very attentive to all our requests. Beds were comfortable and the room was very clean when we checked in. The only negative is that the daily maid service only included changing the bedding and fresh towels. We had 2 small children in the room that made quite a mess and it would have been nice if they would have vacuumed/cleaned counters/tables. We had a short stay (4 nights) so not sure if that is the reason why they didn't do more cleaning. But overall we were very happy with our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Floriday's Resort stay”
Reviews.Author: DonnaKronmiller
Reviews.Content: We had a 3 bedroom and it was very spacious. We stayed through the Christmas Holiday and had plenty of room for our holiday dinner. Everyone is very helpful and you can get discounts on attractions from the front desk. They also had the resort decorated very nicely for the holiday's. The pool has a play place for small children and deeper end for older children and adults. The hot tub is very nice to sit in after a long day at the parks. They have a bar for the guys to watch sports and a market to get little things you forgot to bring.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: DoctorAnne
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed for 4 days and three nights during Christmas week. Our group of 5 had a two bedroom suite in A building, right across from the lobby building and the pool. We were delighted with our stay. Our suite was absolutely clean and well-maintained. The beds were quite comfortable. Out teens had the sofa bed and had no complaints. The jacuzzi tub in the master bath was nice. We had no view to speak of but we did not care; we were out and about with our son who is in school nearby, or at the local parks. The housekeeping was as promised: beds made and fresh towels daily. Nothing more. That was okay with us. We had a quiet suite, no noise at all. The only less than excellent thing was the outdoor hot tub by the pool. We went at around 4 and found the water was actually cool. Other guests had notified staff and maintenance was to fix it, but it was not much warmer when we got out close to an hour later. There were also 7 little boys in the hot tub with us, some of whom were splashing and throwing a ball around. Hmmm. All in all, we had a very pleasant stay. We would definitely book at Floridays again.

Reviews.Title: “No mistake staying here!”
Reviews.Author: meb40
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay here! As many reported you definitely want to be in building B. We requested building B, 5th floor but wound up with the beautiful pond view in 508 (5th floor of B-which also allows you a partial view of the pool too-the best of both worlds), so glad we didn't get pool side-very loud at night. TAKE YOUR OWN COFFEE POT & COFFEE! The coffee maker is a Keurig 1 cup coffee pot which takes 3 minutes to brew. Be warned you will only get coffee the 1st day, after that you must buy your own. So if you're like us and have 3 people all clamoring for the first cup you will be frustrated. We went to Wal-Mart, spent $14.99 for a 12 cup coffee pot and were all happy after that. We were very impressed with all the dishes, pots, pans, glasses & extras in the kitchen, the best we have seen for any condo we've ever stayed in, they really had it all (electric mixer, blender, mixing bowls, measuring cups & spoons, strainer, etc.). Housekeeping is very limited (bed making & towels), they do not clean! We didn't mind this at all, however sometimes lots of towels were left for us and other times just enough. We did not have a problem with this as we always had what we needed, but found this lack of consistency a bit odd. There is usually a different housekeeper each day. We also found the beds & pillows very comfortable. You can walk to the outlet malls-only 1/2 -1mile away, as well a, the Publix grocery store, this property is also ideally located for accessing all the parks. Check your bill before you leave, glad I did. The cafe accidentally charged a purchase to my room 508B instead of 508D, I let the receptionist know we did not charge anything to our room and within minutes she resolved the issue with the cafe and the charges were removed. All in all we loved our stay here and while seeing all the other resorts around, we would stay here all over again. Be sure to eat at Bahama Breezes on international drive (Oscar was an awesome waiter) and you will not be disappointed! Great food & service, but I suppose this is a review for another site.

Reviews.Title: “Lot of space, cleanliness and gentleness”
Reviews.Author: Dugaspar
Reviews.Content: My expectations were high. They were fulfilled. Everything was perfect, and the room very big. Amazing staff and location.

Reviews.Title: “Satisfied”
Reviews.Author: jdnyc_10
Reviews.Content: Good value. Great staff. Large rooms. Main Pool is smaller than expected.

Reviews.Title: “Christmas in florida”
Reviews.Author: nkparmar
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 6 nights in a 2 bed suite over christmas in C block sixth floor, nice view of lake and pool.Excellent space and decor. Conveniently placed near publix supermarket, walgreen pharmacy and premier retail outlets for bargains. Goog hotel shuttle service and i trolley otherwise upto 2230hrs each day.Nice to have takeaways over directly to hotel room delivered through doorstepdelivery.com for a fee. Very helpful reception and especially concierge staff, in particular Wildo and Nilda who went out of their way to help out party of four to make it comfortable and easy. Nice fitness centre and arcade proximity.Would definitely stay here again. Only downside is that the cleaners would empty the rubbish and change towels + make beds up but not hoover the carpets or wash sinks and bath tubs.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: Simbet
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays over the Christmas break for three nights. We stayed in one of the two-bedroom units, which was nicely furnished, clean and reasonably quiet. The master bedroom was totally quiet, while the front bedroom, which was by the front door, did get a bit of noise in the morning from housekeeping and other guests. Our room, in building C, overlooked the pond and so was away from the noise around the pool area - a definite plus. The kitchen was well-stocked with plenty of dishes and things for cooking, and there's a nice little patio off the living room to drink your morning coffee before heading out to the onslaught of Orlando theme parks. The service was great - our bartender Brittany was fun to chat with as we had cocktails and waited for our meals in the cafe, and the front desk was cordial and professional. We called up for an extra blanket one night which was delivered in about five minutes. The cafe is lovely with plenty of Starbucks options and also has a number of groceries available including a freezer full of Ben and Jerry's. Floridays is in a great location that is close to all the parks but not so close you are trapped in theme park craziness. Don't make the same mistake we did and take the "scenic" route on International Drive, which was a ninety minute expedition to Universal Studios (we took nearby I-4 the next day which took all of 15 minutes). There were two things that made our review a four star vs a five star: one, we were in a room right outside a housekeeping station, and the noise level in the mornings was enough to wake our two boys. Second, they could use an upgrade on some of the furnishings (the beds were quite old and tables had some loose legs and were a bit scratched up). Overall, we would highly recommend Floridays for an Orlando vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for family vacation”
Reviews.Author: VacaGirl14
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Floridays December 26th thru the 30th. Great place for a family vacation. Pros: Two bedrooms, two full baths, washer/dryer, kitchen, living room, jacuzzi tub in the master bathroom. 3 pools, main pool open until 11:00 p.m. Heated. Pleasant staff, fixed our balcony door within 5 minutes of calling (it was off the track). Honored our request to be in building A and next door to our other family members. Close to Sea World and outlet mall. Dish washer. Very clean Cons: Master bed dipped a bit in the middle but we were so tired from being at the parks we fell asleep regardless. Air conditioning didn't go below 70 degrees, I prefer it a bit cooler. Also noise from air conditioning somewhat loud but again, we were too tired to let it bother us. I would highly recommend the resort, perfect for families, a lot of space and very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Not sure what all the fuss is about!”
Reviews.Author: Smf0
Reviews.Content: I won't re-tell the same things that are in all the other Floridays reviews. I'm confused what all the 5 star reviews are for. Yes, the pool is nice, very fair price, etc., but I could never rate this hotel a five, since the mattresses and pillows are terrible! A large part of a rating of a hotel is the sleeping experience. The mattresses were so soft and saggy (cheap?) that it was hard for my husband and myself to sleep (two different mattresses, as I slept with our young son in the other bedroom). The pillows were comparable to something I would expect at a low end hotel (some type of foam). We actually had neck aches when we awoke (and back aches from the mattress!). I'm not saying that Floridays doesn't have many positive qualities, but I don't think it deserves all the "excellent" reviews.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent Orlando Condo”
Reviews.Author: Peter J
Reviews.Content: We werea party of 8 and space/privacy were our main concerns. The rooms here are very spacious, quite well appointed, very well laid out and clean. Amenities were good if not all state of the art. Location woorked well for us with good access to the parks but also to the better restaurant areas outside the parks. All of the staff we encountered staff were very attentive and helpful. Overall, our experience more than met our expectations and price was good value in our experience. With a similar party, we would definitely return to Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful 2/3 bedroom suite hotel centrally located near parks, shopping and restaurants”
Reviews.Author: AnnieMacChicago
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful resort. The 2 bedroom suite/condo is spacious with a full kitchen, 2 bathrooms, three TVs and washer/dryer. The pool is heated and has zero depth entry for little ones and a hot tub. There is a small arcade and the restaurant/store offers Starbucks coffee, and good quick meals (we had breakfast one morning and dinner late one evening), plus basic sundries. The service was excellent. Check in was a breeze and they honored a request for a specific building. Staff printed some documents for me, and gave us a late check-out. this is a very comfortable hotel, beds, lots of pillows, large soaking tub and easy to control thermostat. Also a nice balcony. Floridays is centrally located to all parks, and I-drive restaurants and shopping. It is also near grocery-Publix and Walgreens so we stock up on breakfast items and snacks. Under $200/night we think this is a great resort at a great price!

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: Maria L
Reviews.Content: We went to FL this year over the Christmas holidays. We decided to stay in Orlando where the weather was perfect (between 72 and 80 degrees), with lots of activities for kids and grownups (Universal Studios, Disney World and more). After reading such good reviews, we decided to stay at the Floridays resort: pretty, clean, and spacious; it offered an enjoyable and restful stay.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time”
Reviews.Author: Sunseekers44
Reviews.Content: We had a party of 8 (4 adults & 4 kids) when we stayed here Dec 17 to Dec 23 and had a great time. Stayed in Building B on the second floor. We asked for a regular coffee pot and had it delivered in minutes. We went down the street to the Publix and Walgreens for breakfast and snack food as well as beverages. We did eat twice at the Cafe and it was good. The only problem we had at Floridays was a shortage of towels. One very good tip I read on Trip Advisor was to rent a stroller from Orlando Stroller and it was delivered to Floridays and was waiting for us on arrival. It worked out to be very handy for going to all the Attractions as our little guy got tired from all the walking from the shuttles to the gates and it was great to have it in advance. Our group all loved Universal Studios & Islands of Adventure the most of the attractions we went to. The line ups were very long at Disney and we didn't get as much done each day as we had hoped. We did see most of the animals on the safari at Animal Kingdom and it was awesome to be so close to the animals.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: jjjsfish
Reviews.Content: Stayed here four nights. Great place to stay to head to all the parks. So nice to come back in the evening to relax in the hot tub.having a Keuig coffee maker was a nice touch.We brought some k pacs from home and the resort had some for us. very spacious rooms. Great with young adults and teens.Near good restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Vegaschick11
Reviews.Content: Wow, what a great place to stay. Especially with two college students. We had plenty of room and lots of privacy! We have been to Orlando 6 times and have always stayed at Disney Resorts. The last being the Contemporary Resort but we will never stay on-site again now that we discovered Floridays. The location can not be beat, half way between Disney and Universal.... right next door to SeaWorld and great shopping. The condo was beautiful with granite counters and lovely furniture. A nice sized balcony was a real plus... The unit was spotless... clean, clean, clean.... even the elevators! We had one tiny issue with maid service, my husband made a complaint and the manager himself contacted my husband apologized and resolved the issue... talk about customer service.... truly appreciated!

Reviews.Title: “NEVER AGAIN”
Reviews.Author: kyle s
Reviews.Content: I have decided to title my review "never again" because after staying at Floridays Orlando Resort, I will never spend a single minute of my time searching for a clean, comfortable hotel room in the Orlando area ever again. This hotel was clean, clean, clean, as well as quiet, close to Orlando theme parks, and very spacious. I did extensive research while planning our vacation and this hotel absolutely exceeded all of our expectations. I have read several of the negative reviews regarding this property and it is my opinion that the people who wrote these reviews either own a roach infested motor lodge down the street and are jealous or these are actual travelers who could stay in the west wing of the White House and still write a 3 page review of how filthy the room was and how horrible the service was. After my stay at Floridays, I give their elementary and poorly written reviews no credence and quite frankly, I hope they don't stay at Floridays again so as not to ruin my next vacation to Orlando with their constant complaining and unending dissatisfaction. On second thought, I think I will complain about something... Is there a more awful name for a hotel than "Floridays"?

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for families”
Reviews.Author: Holmby
Reviews.Content: Nice big apartments with all necessary utilities to house a whole family. Several pools and shuttlebuses to the themeparks as well as short distance to shopping makes this a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great for extended family.”
Reviews.Author: Alisa H
Reviews.Content: Great if you have your own car and want to stay with multiple families in a shared kitchen/living room. Pool was wonderful for the kids, but we only had time to use it once. Bring your own K-cup coffee inserts if you love coffee. The bed had a weird spring sound twice and was kind of bouncy in the double bed room.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Nancy O
Reviews.Content: Convenient to parks. Have to walk a little ways to pool so ask for building A or B. Great pool for kids as well as adults. Was clean and well taken care of.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays- good hotel but must know tips before”
Reviews.Author: Winnie G
Reviews.Content: My family of 5 are average customers and we are definitely not the type that are picky about hotels. We chose floridays because of the great reviews. Reading reviews helped but if we had known more about the hotel beforehand it would have been very helpful. Check in was quick since we booked it beforehand. The hotel was definitely worth it for the price. It's in a great location near almost all theme parks- we went to Universal and Disney. It is very important that you get either and A or B building. If you get E or F you will really regret it because the hike is really long. We thankfully got in the B building but it was still a long walk for the young children. The pool is nice and has good spaces for exercising (swimming laps). It's not always crowded so its great. For younger children, there are sprinklers and fun play areas. There is a medium temp hot tub which is not too hot so its good for younger children. However, the main pool is very warm. This is not good because when you get out of the water, the air feels much colder than it would for a normal pool (b/c of air temp. difference).The five year old in our family wanted to leave after 10 minutes because the water, although warm at first, felt cold. The entire long walk back he was shivering like crazy. Make sure to bring extra towels- and have a dip in the hot tub before the walk home. Floridays has a shuttle service to disney, universal, seaworld, etc. we used it and it was very useful. Reserve it a day before or you may not get a seat, especially for universal.To disney there were two leaving times- 8:10 and 10:45. We tried both and the 8:10 is great for getting into short lines but is very hectic to wake up to and the 10:45 bus is super crowded. I would recommend the 10:45 so you don't feel rushed like we did in the morning. At night the returning times where 6:45, 8:30, and 9:45. Leave early from the park to the bus because they come right on time. Once we came 1 minute late and watched the bus leave. We missed it and had to wait until 9:45. We came home at 8:30 and ate dinner then (cooked it at home). Nearby the hotel is a Publix supermarket which we took a 10-minute walk to along the road. Going there for food is recommended so you can cook instead of buy dinner every day. Service is sometimes slow because there is only one person working at night. We waited 10 minutes just to ask a question once. Besides that the staff are very friendly. Family trips are recommended, pool hours are good, property is very big, location great. Make sure to get a close room and lock doors (security is not the best) and leave notes for extra towels. The view from the spacious balcony is pretty good but watch out for spiders. Cleaning people just change your bed, fix bathroom, and add new tolietries and towels, so dont expect them to pick up your trash. This was an exciting vacation and overall we would visit floridays again!

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location”
Reviews.Author: Grknyc
Reviews.Content: Clean, efficient, well appointed and a great Value ! Transportation available to shopping on International drive and Into Orlando. Keurig machine a real plus.

Reviews.Title: “So glad I chose Floridays”
Reviews.Author: rabbittattat
Reviews.Content: We spent 6 days at Floridays right before Christmas. The staff was attentive and professional. While there, the hairdryer , front lock, and toilet broke. Within minutes someone was up to fix the problems, and then the front desk called each time to make sure everything was OK. The housekeeping staff was efficient and polite. They do a mini cleaning each day, which was enough for us. There is a vacuum and a washer/dryer right in the suite. The only thing that was hard to keep clean was the glass dining table, as there was no Windex. We rented a car and drove to the grocery store, which is half a mile away. We fixed about half of our own meals in the kitchen, which had everything we needed. One tip: When you go grocery shopping, buy some of those K cups for the coffee maker, in coffee or tea or whatever you like. They give you a few, but the extras in the marketplace were kind of expensive. The pool toys were actually more reasonable in the marketplace at Floridays, and the bartender blew up our pool rings with a compressor for us. The pool is very nice--a spray area for kids, and it is pretty large. If I could offer one suggestion, it would be a slide of some sort. Kids love slides. The shuttle to Disney and Universal was very helpful. Just make sure you book a spot with the concierge a day ahead. They say sometimes the shuttles get full, but ours never did. We checked out Gatorland while down there, and ended up spending 7 hours there and having just as much fun as at the big theme parks, at a fraction of the cost. The zipline was awesome, and not too challenging for our kids. In general, we loved Floridays. It made our stay very much like having a home down there, but a home where the towels and sheets are washed for you and someone is always on standby for problems.

Reviews.Title: “Better Than Home”
Reviews.Author: Axelthewhale
Reviews.Content: On the road again to attend the Eukanuba National Championships Dog Show in Orlando, FL. We chose the Floridays Resort because we could get a 1300 sq ft unit for four nights for $145/night. The hotel is 4 miles from the Orange County Convention Center where the show was. The suite we had was spotless and had a master bedroom with ensuite on one end and two bedrooms with double beds in them on the other. The secondary bedrooms shared a bathroom with double sinks and high counters. Perfect if you're over six feet tall, older or had recent back surgery. All the surfaces were granite. The carpet was nicer than the carpet at our house with none of those embarrassing pet stains. There was a full kitchen complete with a Keurig machine. The towels were nice and heavy but the shower had no water pressure. The grounds were huge just like a condo complex. In fact it was like a rabbit warren. Every building looked just the same. I once spent an hour looking for a friends condo in the maze-like complex she lived in. This reminded me of the same thing. Nobody looking for you could come to your suite easily. There is plenty of lawn to walk dogs, and decent parking. If you're a big shopper you could nearly hit a large outlet mall with a rock from the front entrance. There are also a variety if eateries nearby. There were a lot of dogs here for the shows and everybody got a little bag of goodies upon checkin. With all the amenities, the great off season rates, service and comfort who wouldn't want to move here.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: sandgropers2
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at the Floridays. The kitchen was well equipped. The rooms were serviced daily and the unit is very well appointed. For just 2 people we has so much room it was very nice to spread out after some of the poky rooms we had had previously. Transport right out the door to International Drive shops and Convention Centres, and into Orlando city centre. The hotel has a free shuttle to the theme parks and can arrange tours. We had the most amazing day at Kennedy Space Centre. Just one problem, the front desk staff are not really interested in their jobs, as we discovered on a very rainy day the walkway outside our upper floor room flooded and I slipped and fell. We rang the front desk who advised they would mop the area but it didn't get done over the 5 day period. Luckily no permanent damage. We did mention it again but must have been too hard for them to action.

Reviews.Title: “The only place my family wants to stay in Orlando from now on!”
Reviews.Author: Ed M
Reviews.Content: Spacious, clean, comfortable rooms - better described as a fully furnished apartment since it includes a fully stocked kitchen, dining room, living room, and bedrooms/bathrooms. Absolutely the only place to stay, especially when travelling with the family. We are a family of 4 and stayed with my sister's family of four as well as our mother - so a total of 9 - in one of the three bedroom / two bath suites. So much better than getting two standard hotel rooms at another hotel (even if the rooms are connecting) and probably less expensive than renting two standard rooms at another hotel. Four kids loved staying together with all the different rooms to play in and watch TV in. Breakfast in the morning was great since we had our own kitchen to whip together whatever anyone wanted...just shopped at supermarket down the street for what we wanted and served it up in the morning. Location is also great, away from the craziness of I-Drive north of the convention center, but just minutes to Disney, Sea World, the convention center, and all the other things to do in the area. Highly recommend Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Weekend”
Reviews.Author: Carol V
Reviews.Content: Take the time to consider Floridays Resort for your stay in Orlando. It is beautifu,l and the staff is very helpful and friendly. We will return to Floridays for our next visit to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Wish we could have stayed longer...”
Reviews.Author: Amy S
Reviews.Content: From beginning to end, the experience at Floridays Resort Orlando couldn't have been better. Our suite was huge and spotlessly clean. Every detail has been well thought out (there was even a cheese grater and a whisk in the kitchen!), the grounds are gorgeous, and the activities you can do without ever leaving the resort are extensive. Staff was pleasant and helpful without being obsequious. I can't recommend this resort highly enough.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Stay!”
Reviews.Author: pibedeoro11
Reviews.Content: Hotel was conveniently located, grounds were clean, accommodations were comfortable and service was great. Highly recommended!!! Definitely going back.

Reviews.Title: “Quality Accommodations Overcome Silly Name”
Reviews.Author: boudecca
Reviews.Content: Orlando is home to over 40,000 hotel rooms so the visitor has a lot to choose from. We came to Orlando as part of an event and, as a result, we were able to view many properties surrounding the Convention Center. What makes Floridays Resort stand out from its competition is both the quality of the accommodation and the management. We stayed in a two bedroom condominium, our friends in a three bedroom. Our request to be located close to each other was happily accommodated by check in staff. Units are owned by private individuals/corporations and can be used for up to six months by the owner. For the other six months, they are placed in a vacation rental pool where the owner is allocated a share of the profits. The units are large, amazingly comfortable and well maintained. The Master bedroom in each style has a king size bed, lovely view, and Jacuzzi housed in a huge bathroom. The additional bedrooms have two double beds and share a second bathroom. Other amenities include large flat screen television, DVD/tape player in living room, balcony with chairs and a table, washer/dryer, dishwasher, coffee machine, and toaster. Elevators to the units are spacious. Between the A and B buildings is a terrific swimming pool with outdoor cafe and bar. The staff at the property is professional and friendly. Responses to problems (like losing your key) are practically instantaneous. Everyone from the gardener to the front desk staff has a smile and friendly word. And the friendliness is contagious. It is a tribute to the management that they are able to hire and train such an excellent staff in this very competitive marketplace. This property maintains the highest standards in every respect. Kudos to every single employee who work hard to make this a first rate property. The location is fabulous at the quiet end of International Drive, very close to Sea World. Benihana is almost in the parking lot for a convenient go to restaurant after a busy day of Orlando activities. A couple blocks away is a magnificent, well lit, cheery Publix supermarket as well as the Vineland Premium Outlet stores.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Sean M
Reviews.Content: My mum and I stayed at Floridays resort for 7 nights at the beginning of December - what a great hotel! The staff, location, rooms and all facilities were of a very high standard. There is a Publix supermarket, mc donalds, subway, and an outlet mall (vineland ave, premium outlets) all within walking distance of the premises. They also off a shuttle (with multiple departure/return times)to the major theme parks. If I ever get to return to florida, I'd definately stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Another Satisfied Customer”
Reviews.Author: DalyWaters
Reviews.Content: Good location with very comfortable rooms. It was so good to visit a hotel that had separate beds for my two children. It was so annoying to be given one bed to share for a 16 year old and 14 year old at other hotels. Staff at Floridays are keen to be of assistance.

Reviews.Title: “Splendid!”
Reviews.Author: MinnieMouse71
Reviews.Content: We stayed twelve nights December 3-15 and had a great time, what's not to like? A children's playground would be a good add, otherwise we had everything, a three bedroom suite, well heated pools, ,washer, dryer, dishwasher! We had read that the maid service was basic, but they replenished toilet stuff, made the beds, changed towels etc. All members of staff that we encountered were very friendly. Parking was easy outside our entrance. The apartment had everything we could ask for. Publix and outlet mall on walking distance! Free wifi for as many devices as you have, worked fine. Checking in and out was a breeze. We stayed in building F, farthest away, we had asked for a quiet location, not too far to walk and with a nice view and we got it! We took the car to the main pool, easy, but could walk there too. i thought that in America we should tip the maids, but they never took our money that we lay on the table. The apartment was huge and luxurious, the only thing we missed was a frying pan, perhaps you dont use it as much as we do in Sweden. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for going to the parks”
Reviews.Author: sucharj
Reviews.Content: Perfert for going to the parks, great location, big rooms....try to request the closer to the street buildings, ours was the last one and had to drive a little bit to exit the property.

Reviews.Title: “It's truly a "Home away from home"”
Reviews.Author: DanielOon
Reviews.Content: I like the positive, caring & prompt responds by the managers whenever I feedback on staff rotten services & faulty facilities in the room. Such management attitude ranks highest in my score preference because staff can change & things can get spoilt over time. The location is superb, close to shopping outlets, restaurants, petrol kiosk & theme parks yet away from the noise & traffic. The ambience, design & cleanliness of the rooms are pleasant. My family is so happy & choose Floridays again should we return to Orlando. Many thanks to manager Claudine, concierge Nilda & Wildo & Ryan the maintenance man. The front-desk receptionists need more trainings on how to handle phone calls with empathy & warmth then service would i ranked highest.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious, inexpensive.”
Reviews.Author: Dave N
Reviews.Content: We were in a two room suite, with a kitchenette, One room had a king sized bed, with a bathroom almost as big as the room which included a tub with jets. The other two full sized ones. Beds were on the saggy side. Called staff to come and "firm it up", which they did, promptly. We had a problem with the heating (yes, it was colder during our visit to Orlando). Maintenance came up and replaced the unit. In fact, staff called us to check to see how we liked the room and if they could be of any service to us. No breakfast options, but since we had a kitchen, no big deal.. we cooked there. Included a blender, which was nice, along with most other necessary utensils to prepare a good meal. Quiet area, away from the busy part of International drive. I carry a laptop on both business and pleasure trips. It unfortunately died on me during my stay here. Knowing they had "business center", made me think there were computers available to their guests at no additional charge. That was a wrong assumption. There's this little room with two desktop computers, and some sort of pay system card where you deposit money into.. It wasn't cheap... to the amount of .20 per MINUTE. Thankfully, I only had to do this nonsense twice. At least it's one way to spend little time on the computer, and much more time at the attractions around town. The back hot tubs "bubbles" were broken. Pool water was on the cold side. Couldn't get in and swim at all. Did the exercise room instead.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect retreat for family with young kids”
Reviews.Author: Cottagergirl
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 6 nights in Orlando with a 2 year old and 5 year old. Two bedroom condo was perfect. I usually find hotel beds uncomfortable but these ones were very comfy with lots of pillows of various softness/firmness. Full kitchen with all utensils, pots, etc. meant we could do simple breakfasts and dinners. Tip: we pre-ordered from Grocery Garden and our order was in the room/fridge upon arrival. Full laundry in suite meant we packed less and did one load of laundry there. The pool was great with a zero-entry for kids. Plenty of room in the suite. We've done the Disney resort before and found the small rooms too cramped for an extended stay with kids. This suite allowed us to put the kids to bed and watch tv on our own in the living room. Free parking with no gate, easy in and out. They pretty much left us alone which is the way we like it - daily towel change and bed making included, but daily maid cleaning is not. Quick drive to Disney parks and a minute drive to the Orlando outlet mall. We didn't use the shuttle which to my knowledge is free but you need to reserve in advance. The grounds were immaculate and nicely decorated for the holidays. I found this to be very good value. The staff were very friendly and check-in was a breeze. We rented a stroller from Orlando Stroller Rentals and it was at the bell desk waiting for us. Don't rent the Disney strollers - they are expensive, uncomfortable and you have to leave them at the gate and carry your tired kids to the car.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional stay, especially for the business rate”
Reviews.Author: twotat2
Reviews.Content: Spent two nights last week at the Floridays while on a business trip, with the meeting at the hotel. The two-bedroom suite was huge, especially for just me - since I was only there two mornings, I didn't run out of coffee, which was great, since I'd have to pay for more than the "starter pack" in the room. December isn't the busy season, obviously, so the hotel was nearly empty and very quiet. It was the most well-insulated hotel room I've ever stayed in, as the noise level from either traffic or other guests was virtually non-existent. Staff at the front desk was extremely pleasant and quick. My only complaint is that the whirlpool didn't whirl - I didn't report it because it just wasn't that big of a deal; I just soaked in the giant tub instead. The business rate I had was about a third of the regular price, so it was an especially good deal.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for families!”
Reviews.Author: DamamaBarbie
Reviews.Content: My husband & I brought our 4 youngest kids, ages 13, 10, 7 & 3 and got a 3 bedroom/2 bath unit. It was GORGEOUS! We all loved the pool area & Hubby & I really, really liked the pool bar. Great prices & super friendly staff. We stayed in unit 212-building c, so we didn't have any great views of anything, but we could see the Disney fireworks from our balcony each night which was fun! My suggestion is when you first check in, make sure you have enough cooking supplies if you plan to eat in--which we did almost nightly to save money. We didn't have a spatula, a frying pan or a baking sheet, but got them pronto as soon as we called guest services. Also, you may want to bring extra coffee--the coffee makers are those fancy Keurig things, so for us "common" folk, it was too pricey to buy it just for our vacation. They give you a starter kit of a few packs, & then you can buy more at their little on-site store. We just got instant at the publix next door. We got our Universal Studios tickets from the on site concierge & they were $50 cheaper than the Universal website! They print them out right there, so you don't have to wait in line at the theme parks. Housekeeping empties the trash, changes your towels & makes the beds everyday & that's pretty much it. Floor got a little dirty after 5 nights....Also, housekeeping didn't show up until around 4 p.m. each day. Overall--we just LOVED THIS PLACE! I do lots of research before booking our trips and expect the most for our hard earned $ & this place lived up to all of our expectations! Can't wait to go back next year!!

Reviews.Title: “Return visit was just as awesome”
Reviews.Author: Floridashirl
Reviews.Content: I have just returned home after a month in Florida, the first 8 nights were spent at the Floridays resort. We originally booked a 2 room suite, but after another person was added to our party, we requested a 3 room suite on arrival and were promptly upgraded to a bigger 3 room suite at no extra cost, also no extra cost for the third guest.
