Beautifully decorated and the multiple free shows throughout the day. Gospel singer, etc.. It has one main restaurant and a few stands: long hot dogs $4, turkey leg $5, ChicFilet meal $8, etc…. Excellent resort.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Resort”
Reviews.Author: CherPortsmouth
Reviews.Content: Floridays was perfect for our family vacation in Orlando. Our room was great, with all the amenities you require. The resort was clean and tidy and the pools are excellent. We used the resort transfer to the parks which were very good, if a little busy in the mornings. The IRide stop (40) was situated right outside of the resort and we purchased the 14 day pass for $17.00 each (12 and under are free) - excellent value for money. Best Park: Discovery Cove Best Ride: Harry Potter (Universal Islands of Adventure) and The Simpons (Universal) - Having said that the Price of the Tickets were not as good value as Seaworld! Best 3D - It's a Bug's Life - Disney's Animal Kingdom Best Place to Eat - Millers Ale House - Stop 23 North on the IRide - Excellent Value for money. Golden Corral was ok, but very very busy.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely place to stay-great alternative to a hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Brettsmith1970
Reviews.Content: Were just back from Orlando and without doubt stating at Floridays (apart from the cheesy name) was a fantastic move! We needed 3 rooms as took a 15 yr old boy and 17 yr old girl. Hotels were way too expensive,the apartment was just right. Clean,nice location about 3 mins from sea world and 2 mins from outlet shopping! Decor could do with a little update but not a big deal. Would have been nice to be able to walk to a bar or restaurant but never mind.....just a touch too far. Benihanas was a minuets walk and that was fab! Only used pool side bar once as found it a little "soul less" and cocktails not really their speciality. But clean and pleasant with helpful staff(accept one grumpy girl in the coffee shop on one occasion) Overall a great place to stay and really really good value!(even with the $30 a day extra for taxes etc etc)

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: DeltaRev
Reviews.Content: Pretty much everything positive that has been said is true. Is it a plush, luxury resort? No. Is it a fantastic, comfortable place with attentive service, wonderful and comfortable amenities? Yes. It is indeed very clean. Yes, there were a few minor chips in the furniture and the towels were a bit frayed, but everything was clean. I couldn't find a bit of dust. And even the balcony was as clean as an outdoor balcony can get. I will say, however, many people advised that Building B is the best. I need to add a disclaimer based on taste and needs. I requested a quiet room on a high floor with a lake view. I was given Building E on the 5th floor. Wonderful view of the man-made lake with a nice fountain lit at night and also a view of the smaller "adult" pool. I say "adult' because although smaller than the main pool with the bar, it does not have the sprinklers and games and thus not many kids. YAY for those of us who actually do NOT want to be near a pool with a lot of kids. (nothing against kids, however.......) Anyway, somebody mentioned the long walk from their parking area. Not sure what they mean as each building has parking near it and I was always able to park right near the entrance of Building E (the quiet building, near the quiet pool!!!) I would definitely go back again, given the chance.

Reviews.Title: “one simple word...GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: LplusN
Reviews.Content: We took a group of special needs youth to Florida for a dream holiday...the hotel was great and more than expected :o) The youth loved it so much...they didn't want to leave...we would definately go back! We would not hesitate to book again..a smooth stay from beginning to end... **The Concierge were fabulous...very helpful with all aspects of our trip from booking shuttles to helping us print boarding passes**

Reviews.Title: “Great for a Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Critic1000
Reviews.Content: Great place away not to far from Disney. Liked the pool and the grounds. Great location to the outlet and Publix Market. The outside bar however needed additional help. The lady was overwhelmed with everyones orders. Food at the grill was good. Liked the one man band. Awesome. Got the 3 bedroom. Enough space for 6-8 people. Liked the balcony and Starbucks coffee. The kids had a blast. Would recommend cleaning the elevators once in a while. Also, housekeeping needs work. Some were attentive. Others not so. Overall, enjoyed our stay. So the Pro's: Pool, location, ample room and parking. Con's: Bar staff-understaffed. Housekeeping needs help. Recommendation/Tips: I would recommend to ask for a building close to the main pool. Would recommend staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, spacious accommodation in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Glad_one
Reviews.Content: The apartment exceeded our expectations. It was spacious, clean and had everything we needed. The resort wi-fi was very useful. Free local calls made it easy to order in meals and arrange excursions without worrying about high call charges that hotels often impose. We did not make use of the shuttle bus service as we had a hire car. Everything was just a short drive away.

Reviews.Title: “You've exceeded my expectations!”
Reviews.Author: alan e
Reviews.Content: I found the Hotel to be exceptionally maintained and clean. The staff was courteous and extremely helpful. I found the water bottles left in my room to be a pleasure as I entered my room after midnight when the hotel shops were closed. The front desk staff was skillful at finding me a taxi to drive me to Tampa at 3am where I was able to board a direct flight back to Philadelphia just prior to the hurricane hitting in the north. I would eagerly return to stay on my next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “2nd time there and it was still extremely good!”
Reviews.Author: John L
Reviews.Content: This is a fantastic place to stay for families. The service is excellent and the rooms are huge and well equipped.

Reviews.Title: “Such a good experience”
Reviews.Author: Pookie188
Reviews.Content: Met up with family in Orlando since its a good middle point for all. Book Floridays based on website photos figuring how bad could it be. We were all pleasantly surprise. Rooms were clean and welcoming. Lots of room for all of us to fit and even a few who were too tired to drive home. We will be back for sure. Oh and staff was very nice and helpful too.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, and very easy on the wallet.”
Reviews.Author: ed s
Reviews.Content: I was very pleased with our stay. Very clean room. We loved the price and that every room has a washer and dryer, full kitchen, and two full bathrooms. Very close to disney, sea world, and universal parks. Right next to Publix and Premium Outlet. Easy checking in and the staff was very polite. I usually have something negative to say about everything, so i guess this is a first for me.

Reviews.Title: “Lived up to reviews”
Reviews.Author: latourdepeilz
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights. The staff is friendly and helpful. We had a 2 bdr on the 6th floor of buidling D, which we would highly recommend. It's away from the main pool and has nice views of the smaller pool and community pond. You can't beat the location and the prices. Gabriel at the front desk described the place very well over the phone prior to our arrival and was equally helpful once we got to the resort. We didn't eat on-site, so can't comment on the food options, but they appear limited at best. The exercise room was small but adequate, however was crowded each morning I tried to use it. If you're staying here, you can't go wrong. If you're looking for great food nearby, Thai Thani is outstanding. And Whole Foods is only 4 miles away for groceries. Publix is next door.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: Michelle E
Reviews.Content: It was our first family trip to Orlando... Floridays Resort made us feel very comfortable. The cleanliness of the rooms as well as the resort was impecable. The location was convient to area attractions as well as great resturaunts and shopping. I would definately stay again..

Reviews.Title: “Second visit. Still great value and service.”
Reviews.Author: MiltonKeynesSimon
Reviews.Content: Second visit in 2 years and still very happy with the value and service we were getting.

Reviews.Title: “A lovely stay again”
Reviews.Author: steven g
Reviews.Content: Second visit to Floridays and enjoyed just as much as last year. Rooms spacious and kept clean throughout stay. Beds made, clean towels daily. Pool area very nice and relaxed atmosphere. Good cafe for snacks/meals etc. Staff very friendly and helpful. Cannot fault it and would stay there again definately.

Reviews.Title: “SECOND STAY - JUST AS GOOD AS THE FIRST”
Reviews.Author: Unforgiven2
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay this year (was also there in February). Requested a high floor in building A, B, C or D and got floor 5 building D so top marks there. Check in was easy, quick and efficient. No problems with the apartment/suite whatsoever, has everything you need inc oven, microwave, washer/dryer, fridge/freezer, iron, hair dryer etc Pool area was great, has a bar and cafe right next to it and another smaller pool elsewhere in the resort. Pool temperature was spot-on, jacuzzi was way to hot to use though. Car parking is plentiful and close to buildings. Area is fairly quiet (South International Drive) but with a Publix, Walgreens and other shops within a walkable distance. Also very close by is a Benihanas restaurant as well as an Outback, Longhorn, Carrabas, McDonalds, Quiznos etc within a minute or so by car. Floridays is in a great location, easy to get to Premium Outlets, Lake Buena Vista, I4, International Drive etc. Floridays does charge $12 a day resort fee so do bear that in mind. Can't really thing of anything negative to say really. I have also stayed at Vista Cay which is a similar resort, I would say that Floridays just wins out due to it having a cafe/food/bar on site but the huge size of the apartments at Vista Cay compared to Floridays make it a close run thing.

Reviews.Title: “Fab Hotel we would go back tommorow !”
Reviews.Author: maccapakka
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful holiday at Floridays ! Everything was great except that we had to drive to alot of locations and the i rider was a bit much for too kids late on in the evening

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed ourselves very much even in building F”
Reviews.Author: AndyZ97
Reviews.Content: We ended up in building F (furthest away from the registration desk) for almost 2 weeks. The only feasible way you can stay there is if you rent a car to get around, which we did. Ample parking. Speed bumps get to be a pain at the end of week 2, but that's minor. I couldn't imagine walking to the shuttle service every day from Building F. Can't really say a bad thing about Floridays - generally it was very good. However, it was rather hard to find in the dark on that first day as their entrance is currently understated. As well, you'll find yourself dodging housekeeping carts on the way out each morning as there are no service elevators - again minor. Pillows were a bit too firm for my preference. We were fortunate enough to be overlooking the water/pond/lake in Buiding F. I can't imagine staying in the ground floor units, as some overlook the parking lots and look comparatively depressing. Our unit, our view was awesome! Other than that, pool was enjoyable. We only swam in the secondary pool and hot tub, never ate at their restaurant as there's plenty of choice with Outback, Fridays, etc only a short drive away. All in all - very nice. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “For the price and space you can't go wrong!”
Reviews.Author: Terric315
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for three nights in August as a place to relax before we headed over to a Disney resort. Pros: Kids LOVED the pool, clean rooms, washer and dryer, PRICE for what you get! We asked to be near the pool and stayed in building A. Perfect! There is also a Publix around the block. Cons: -My husband and I thought the beds were a little too hard. However, I must admit we have a Tempurpedic so we are a little spoiled. -There was only pool entertainment for kids on the weekend. This really isn't a con, but I think they plastic floral arrangements should be trashed. They were a little dusty and look as though they had better days. Overall, we would stay there again when visiting Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Second time I stay here...love it will definitely come back”
Reviews.Author: Jacqueline B
Reviews.Content: Close to most theme parks. Plenty of restaurants in the area. Orlando outlet malls are right around the corner. Pool was very clean. Personnel was very helpful and knowledgeable. Nice place to stay whether on vacation or on business. I have stayed here twice in the month of August. Will definitely go back when I am in the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays exceeded our expectations, we can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: LAURA C
Reviews.Content: I chose Floridays after much internet research. I trusted TripAdvisor and booked Floridays for one week in August 2011. My husband, 8 year old son and I drove from Texas and arrived late Sunday. Checkin went smoothly and the staff was friendly. We found our room easily (B Building) and everything was so nice inside and clean. It all looked new and smelled fresh. The beds were comfortable. We had a pretty view of the lake and fountain from our balcony. Which reminds me, there is one thing I would recommend to Floridays and advise guests about: the balcony railing is secured to the balcony only by bolts on the bottom of the railing. I think it would be wise to secure the railing to the sides of the balcony walls as well. My husband (an OSHA guy) noticed this quickly. That would be the only suggestion I can think of to improve the condo we stayed in. We had a wonderful time at nearby Disney and Universal. Thanks Floridays!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay, definitely will come back!”
Reviews.Author: ArfajH
Reviews.Content: Everything was excellent. Apartment is very comfortable and convenient for family. The shuttle service provided is very valuable, to the most important parks and attractions.. We would definitely come back when we visit Orlando again!

Reviews.Title: “We really enjoyed it and would go back again”
Reviews.Author: Susy F
Reviews.Content: Great for families, spacious rooms and very clean! Concierge was very knowledgable with the variety of attractions available. Kids loved the large pool! Condo was spacious and very clean. We would not hesitate to go back to Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Home from home”
Reviews.Author: Coachcarter
Reviews.Content: We have visited Orlando 8 times!.Floridays is by far the best. As we entered the room after a long journey our jaws collectively dropped. My wife was impressed with the huge fridge, washer dryer and kitchen area, My teenage sons were happy to have their own bedroom ,bathroom and a good internet connection. For me the large x factor was the large jaccuzi bath , 3 televisions and a comfortable lounge area which meant that i could relax with a cold beer after a busy day at Disney. Excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “Lived up to all expectations”
Reviews.Author: Alexbhf
Reviews.Content: Having been recommended to stay by a Friend, my family and I were not disappointed with Floridays. The staff were very gracious and happy to help, always with a smile. The rooms were very spacious (5 stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with plenty of room) and the jacuzzi in the main bedroom ensuite was a bonus! The hotel is very well positioned. All of the parks are within 10 minutes maximum. Shopping is just around the corner, and Point Orlando no more than a couple of miles. Could not have asked for more after a long day in the Theme parks, and then having the ability to get back for a dip in the pool which didn't close until 11pm. Very impressed all round, will definately be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant!”
Reviews.Author: Jacqui C
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on our 2nd time to Florida last year and loved it. We have 3 kid's and struggle at times to find a place big enough for us, this place was huge! Me and my husband and I had a queen bed and a jacuzzi on-suite, fantastic! Our 2 boys shared a room and my daughter had one to her self. They had their own bathroom which made showering a lot quicker. Rooms had cooker, large fridge, dish washer. washer and dryer which was good to have. All staff were very friendly and helpful. The place was very clean, and we all enjoyed the pool. We are going back to Florida next year but sadly Florida's and just gone over our price range :-( Jacqui.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accomodation, we enjoyed it a lot”
Reviews.Author: Mhfredo
Reviews.Content: Everything was perfect in this resort and all the family enjoyed the wondeful moments we spent there; I can only advice to go to Florida Resorts and you can not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!!!”
Reviews.Author: MArrington
Reviews.Content: When I was planning a trip to Orlando for my family, I came to the tripadvisor site and saw that Floridays was listed as the # 1 for hotels in Florida. Based on the reviews, I booked the trip. I must say, it exceeded my expectations! We have been to Florida countless times and this was the best resort we've stayed in! The staff was very friendly and accommodating the room was spacious and spotless, the pool was outstanding, the fitness center was great, the arcade was a ton of fun...I could go on and on. The best and most important part of the whole Floridays experience (drum roll please), IT WAS AFFORDABLE!!!!!!!! We could not believe that there was so much available to us for such a great price! We stayed at another resort last year and the rooms were signifcantly smaller, there was less to do, the pool was in poor shape and it cost about $700 more than Floridays. Another plus for Floridays is that they offer free Wi-Fi in the rooms. At the other resort, we had to pay $5.00 per hour to use the internet in the lobby and even more to utilize it in the room. Floridays has several buildings, but the closest ones to the main pool area are Buildings A and B. However, if one stays in the other buildings, they have a staff member that will pick you up in a shuttle and take you to and from the pool, lobby, fitness center, etc. How accommodating! The Disney parks and Sea World were right at our fingertips! Every place we were interested in was also close by and just a short drive away. The location of Floridays was perfect for us! My teenage daughter and her best friend loved Floridays as well and they had a blast! They were able to go places and do activities on their own, which allowed my husband and me to spend some time alone together. But we were able to do many family activities together, which was great fun. My husband and I have told all of our extended family members and friends about Floridays. We were planning to return this October, but because of work schedules, it looks like we'll have to wait until next year. I usually want time to move slowly, but I'm anxious for next summer to get here so we can go back to Floridays! Nevertheless, if you're looking for a great vacation spot in Orlando for your family, Floridays is the place to go!!!

Reviews.Title: “Beyond expectations.”
Reviews.Author: lior a
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a week stay at the Floridays. Hotel is fantastic and for a family with kids, the apartment like set-up is great. Location is good, 5 minutes drive from all attractions. The room has EVERYTHING that you will need in order to make your stay comfortable. There is a Publix store 1 minute drive from the hotel where you can get all that you need. Hotel seems well kept, all amenities are in good condition. Overall this place exceeded our expectations and we will definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't of asked for anymore, everything was Perfection..!!!”
Reviews.Author: Matthewwheatley
Reviews.Content: Lets start with the location which is perfect, 20 mins from Disney, Half hour from Universal and 10 mins from Seaworld, Aquatica.... If you got a Hotel next to Universal ud have to travel nearly an hour to disney and half hour to sea world.... vice versa if your at or next to Disney, it was right in the middle, You want to get the iTrolley ticket, $10 for the week, unlimited usage, buses every 20 mins from right outside the hotel takes u anywhere on International drive..... one stop North at 41 and you are at a Huge Publix supermarket and restaurants, if u get one south to 23/22 there is the nightlife high point, Millers ale house is $2.50 for a pint of Fosters and $3.95 for a pint of Peroni or Stella... great food also.... The Hotel itself is amazing, 6 huge apartment blocks, cheapest room is a 2 bedroomed Apartment with Fully fitted kitchen, washer, dryer, dishwasher, oven, microwave, fridge freezer,,, u name it,,, the Main bedroom has a HUGE bed and its own bathroom with hot tub.. all for $120 per night, there is an $11 charge that seems mandatory for use of the gym and wifi but its still soooo cheap, the rooms are Catered so your beds and towels will be replaced everyday and tidyed... But they wont wash your dishes and tidy up the rooms. but thats fine, they shouldnt do..... Its still amazing.... The manager is amazing he will not let any complaint or question go unsolved, he does everything to make your stay perfect.... I unfortunately lost my passport on the last day and had to stay an extra 2 days, they accomadated me and sympathised and gave me a 2 bedroomed apartment for 2/3 of the price as a great gesture.... and i wanted to stay there aswell because the staff are incredible... The staff are obviously pushed hard to achieve perfect customer service, and thats every staff member, Much to the comment left on the 15th August saying the bar staff where Ignoring him... Im sorry but thats just not trure, i met Carlo, Abby & Brittany and they were awesome, so friendly and smily and knew when u had nearly finished yer drink to ask you if ud like another.... The Guitar player on a saturday night by the pool bar is special aswell, a great guitarist and takes requests, i advice you to watch/listen to him, hes brilliant.... The pool is open till 11pm and they have kiddies activities during the day that was very liked.... They have a bell man whos at your beckon and call for if your in a far away apartment, just ring 0 on your phone and ask him to get you, he will drive over and drop you off at reception,,, we tipped him but he never asked and one timei dint have money, he dint expect it, he usually walked off and u had to chase after him to give a tip so its genuine and for your hospitality... dont be scared to ring him.... errrm i dunno what else to say really... its just brilliant, and from all the comments you see im obv not the first nor will i be the last ti give a 10/10 review fore this place... Id also like to put a special review out for Brittany, cos she worked 5 nights in a row doing silly hours and always had a cute smile on her face behind the bar and every1 loved her, shes great...... God on You Britta. xxxx

Reviews.Title: “Perfect base”
Reviews.Author: Turistjavisst
Reviews.Content: Spent ten days with my family at the Floridays and found it to be a great base for our holiday, right in between the Disney and Universal parks with quick access to malls and highways. Have nothing to compare with, but found the rooms large, clean and well appointed. We wanted a resort with large rooms so that the kids could have their own room and we definitively appreciated the spacious and well appointed suites at Foridays. The only thing I did not like were the soft beds. Would definitively consider returning though.

Reviews.Title: “loved it! 2nd visit better than first ! five stars !!!”
Reviews.Author: gregory l
Reviews.Content: great place for families ! roomy and elegant and felt like a 5 star hotel ! close to all and great value for the buck! Best deal I saw around !

Reviews.Title: “Way beyond our expectations!!!”
Reviews.Author: Yanibaby
Reviews.Content: As much as I love reading other people's reviews, I wish I hadn't read the negative reviews on this place because it made me nervous for the last two months about our trip here. However, I'm very happy to report that WE love it here! I really don't know what people had to complain about. The resort is beautiful, the condos are GINORMOUS, the staff is friendly, the place is spotless, and it provides us with everything we need to function in the kitchen (pots, bottle openers, cups, utensils, etc.) My fiancé's daughter is ecstatic that she has her own room with a big closet and tv and her own beautiful and spacious bathroom. She asked if we can move in here permanately! The master bedroom even has a jacuzzi! I am so happy that I decided to choose this place. It's definitely the best accommodation for the budget price that they charge. I really don't know how this place stays open when they charge so little! It's definitely a perfect choice for people with children because of the functionality of a multi-room and kitchen/dining room included condo.

Reviews.Title: “Value Added Resort”
Reviews.Author: GMKISOK
Reviews.Content: We would recommend Floridays to any family travelling to Orlando. The rooms are very spacious, offering amenities like you would have at home and the resort pool, fitness centre etc are great. Although we had a few minor issues with our room, John the manager of building C looked after them immediately and without question. They have a very nice marketplace cafe, however I'd say that it's more designed for takeout and not dine in. Bulidings B&C are closest to the main pool, but you can also use the other pool near buildings D-F which is much quieter. They offererd a shuttle to Universal but we found it quicker to drive there and park ($15) so we could and go as we please.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jackie W
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 3 weeks in July and we were very impressed with it! The rooms are very spacious, plenty of room for 6. Everything was very clean and modern and looks just like in the pics. The pool area is fantastic and a great place to relax at the end of a busy day. Would definately stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for the Family”
Reviews.Author: ob1dob
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 1 week in August 2011. We had a 2-bedroom suite which has a master bed and ensuite bath, a second bedroom with 2 doubles, a second bath and a family room, dining room and kitchen. Overall Floridays is an excellent value for the price. Last year we stayed in a 2-bedroom villa at the Saratoga Springs Hotel on Disney property so it was interesting to compare. Floridays'2-bedroom suite is a bit smaller than the 2-bed villa @ Saratoga but it was less than half the price. The kids thought the pool was nice with a small kiddie park on one end. Next time in Orlando, we'd stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and will be back”
Reviews.Author: Joanne R
Reviews.Content: We travelled here from Wales with our two boys aged 6 & 4. Location was marvellous. Accommodation was home from home, very clean & comfortable. Pool area was ideal, splash pool & a shady sandy area. Not always enough sunbeds. Overall it was a fantastic base for our most fantastic holiday to date ! :)

Reviews.Title: “Everybody loved it”
Reviews.Author: GerardPHiltonHead
Reviews.Content: Access to Building #7 would gain a lot if work area was somewhat screen. Otherwise you have the most confortable enjoyable little paradise. Thanks again.

Reviews.Title: “Just had our 8th Great stay and we are booked for Thanksiving”
Reviews.Author: JMacandFamily
Reviews.Content: We originally found Floridays through the process of redeeming some credit card points and have been extremely satisfied with the resort ever since. We seem to find ourselves in Orlando with the kids a couple of times each year(Springbreak and Thanksgiving -This year it will be 3 times since we elected to visit over the 4th of July). Long story short, Floridays is awesome. Staff goes above and beyond to make you feel welcome, from the front desk, through housekeeping, groundskeepers, cooks, bartenders etc. From what I have gathered from the staff, it all starts with Rob(i think it is Rob) the GM. I don't know Rob(although he has been pointed out to me as he out walking around checking up on guests and having casual conversations with the staff- no wonder they love him) so please don't think I am one of those folks who is helping out a friend. We are a family of 5 (3 kids ages 5,7& 10) from Iowa, occassionly we bring along my mother or mother in law. Each visit has been exactly what we expected; very clean, spacious( we usually book a 3 bedroom, but have also stayed in the two bedroom), well maintained, wonderful place. I travel extensively for work , therefore I am confident my opinion is a good one. By the way, I hate to say it, but we were drawn in to stay at the neighboring property(very colorful name) ealier this year and couldn't wait to get back to Floridays - we won't try that again. In addition to the outstanding accomodations and staff, the location of Floridays is perfect. We are annual passholders for Seaworld/Aquatica(make two seperate visits and you are money ahead with a annual pass) and also buy 10 day non-expiring Disney park hoppers(did i mention we love Orlando). Floridays' location allows us to be at either location in less than 10 minutes. Grocery store is close, drug store is closer. Great restuarants withing 5 minutes, although if you are arriving late(after 11:00PM) be prepared for pizza rolls from the nearby convenience store. Pizza places leaving coupons under the door are horrible. Cocoa Beach is 55 minutes to the public beach (our kids love it, be sure to stop at Ron Jon and the SandBar)and the gulf, if you are headed west, ) is a little more than an hour( I recommend Siesta Key). Anyway, I could go on and on about Floridays, but I wiil stop and hope what I have shared is enough info for you to take my word. One more disclaimer-- this is my first trip advisor review, although I use it extensively. I usually throw out the best and the worst reviews to hopefully get the truth, but I hope you dont though this one out. You will not regret it. Maybe I will see you over Thanksgiving; My wife and I will be sucking down a "Miami Vice' from the pool bar while the kids are laughing their way through the Hula Hoop contest before Thanksgiving dinner poolside in Aquatica.(dont think that doesn't upset the rest of our extended family who will be carving up the traditional turkey and fixins back in Iowa, while the snow flies). I am sure there are other great resorts, but Floridays is definately one of them. Have a great vacation!!

Reviews.Title: “Was Great!!!”
Reviews.Author: dmckoy
Reviews.Content: My family's experience at Floridays resort was wonderful. Located in a great area, next to everything. We stayed in a 3 bdrm suite and i must say that it was spacious and comfortable and I loved the view of the fountain pond The kids loved the pool and arcade and at night had a good time in the suite.. I would stay here again without a doubt and the staff was very helpful and friendly. Thanks Floridays for contributing to a wonderful vacation...

Reviews.Title: “Love it! Will definitely be back!”
Reviews.Author: ashley f
Reviews.Content: Awesome, clean, friendly. We all loved it and had 11 people confortably in a 3 bedroom condo.

Reviews.Title: “Had all we needed!”
Reviews.Author: AtlantaID
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with our daughter/husband and her children. Because her 2 kids are young, we opted to not to Disney on this trip; however, the kids had a great time in the game room, playing games in our room, smoothies at the outside bar next to the pool, and had an especially great time at the pool! The activities provided there by the DJ were wonderful, and she did a great job of including everyone of all ages. The pool area was amazing with the fountains and shallow part for the kids. Even tho the pool was busy, there was still plenty of room for grown-ups to swim around in the deeper parts. There's a "quiet" separate pool for others that would prefer a more subdued swim time. The grocery store is nearby and we picked up a few items so we could easily eat in our room for most meals. Laundry and dishwasher in the room is a great convenience. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: pioneer911
Reviews.Content: If we are looking for an average lodging, this would be our place.

Reviews.Title: “An amazing value for large families”
Reviews.Author: DJqc
Reviews.Content: Floridays completely overdelivered for our family. We rented a 3 bedroom suite, which essentially resembles a large delux condo. You would never think you were in a resort... Our suite came complete with laundry machines, full kitchen, and two full washrooms. Altogether, this place had 2 double beds, a king, and a fold out. Furthermore, nothing looked cheap... It was a classy place. Given that we are starwood platinum members and often find ourselves in executive rooms and junior presidential suites, we were surprised to be so blown away by this property. Especially given the price point. For large famillies this is THE place to go. Cheers

Reviews.Title: “Just what we needed !!”
Reviews.Author: debbatham
Reviews.Content: We loved our week at Floridays. It was just the sort of place we needed for our first week in Orlando (our second week was on a Cruise out of Port Canaveral) as we had our days pretty much mapped out before we arrived. Therefore, at the end of a busy day, it was a pleasure to get back to our suite to 'chill'. We booked a 2 bedroom suite and we have 3 children, so tow of the kids shared one of the double beds in the twin room. The suite was very spacious and had all mod cons. We did eat out most of the time but found the kitchen to be equipped with all that was needed for out stay. the huge fridge with ice maker was fab at keeping the bottled water and beer cold. Didn't think I'd use the washer/dryer as I wasn't planning on doing chores whilst on Holiday but it came in very useful towards the end of the week ready for our weeks cruise. The kids ate in the pool cafe a couple of times and the food seemed great, well the kids didn't complain. We stayed in block D which was a short walk from the main pool area and resort reception. Towels are provided at the pool, so need need to pack your own. This place is excellent value for money. Being a family of 5, we generally have to book interconnecting rooms at hotels unless we have the kids sleeping in our room which is not much of a holiday! this can also be pricey, so staying in a suite resort is a very good alternative and how else would you get a decent place to stay for around £95 per night for 5? We really enjoyed our stay, infact we enjoyed it that much that we booked a suite for the day we returned home. We had to be off ship for 9am and had already booked a private transfer from ship to Seaworld but changed this halfway through our first week. The days were really hot and we didn't fancy walking around Seaworld to then get on a long flight home! so I booked a suite to use for the day, we arrived at 11am, spent the day by the pool, showered, had our transfer company pick us up at 4.30pm and take us the the airport. A fab place to spend the day, the kids were happy, we were showered, job done! Would we return?..................... ABSOLUTELY.

Reviews.Title: “Great Resort and well worth the money”
Reviews.Author: JazzyP40
Reviews.Content: This resort is really good and would have got 5 stars. it is very family friendly and ideally located next to a supermarket and the largest premium outlet mall . There are great places to eat within minutes from the resort. The apartments are great as we had 2 bedrooms at less than a hotel room rate . We had an en-suite attached to the main bedroom and my 2 teenage daughters had a double bed each with tv and their own bathroom. Both pools are more than adequate and never get overly busy ..... There is always a lounger to be found. I would definitely go back without hesitation. The only down sides that we found were as follows....... 1. The beds are made up and towels changed daily but the room is not vacuumed and there is no vacuum cleaner so you could have crisps food etc on your carpet for 2 weeks. This can be easily sorted by the management within the service charge which i believe is excessive 2. The Bar Tenders are generally poor with Carolina being exceptional and very attentive and acknowledges your needs and gets into a conversation . Apart from her the others just make you wait and do not acknowledge you and in 2 cases even ignored me to my anger . They have no system of who was first to be served and just serve the first person they see . they also have their friends or colleagues around the bar which I find unprofessional and distractive. When it comes to settling the bill they become friendly and smile as they want their tip ............. They don't deserve one for the service they provide . If the management can sort out the 2 issues mentioned this a 5 star excellent place to stay but all in all you don't have to use their bar ....... I only used it 3 times because of the poor service .

Reviews.Title: “perfect for larger families”
Reviews.Author: Ireanna
Reviews.Content: I had a business conference to attend at the The disney swan hotel and decided to bring the family along (my kids, parents, and neice/nephew) We booked a 3 bedroom Suite and it was perfect for us. I loved the master bedroom and bath! The full kitchen was a bonus for having a quick breakfast. And, I LOVED that they had a washer/dryer in the room. It is a short drive to Disney and the place is very clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays - UNBEATABLE VALUE - HOME AWAY FROM HOME”
Reviews.Author: Jaime M
Reviews.Content: I stayed two nights on a weekend in August. TIP: BOOK DIRECTLY THROUGH FLORIDAYS WEBSITE. I seriously spent several hours going through every single third-party agent and Floridays gave the best rate using their Website options. Floridays’ customer service was great from the beginning. I had made a reservation online but forgot to put in my AAA number for the special rate. I made a phone call and had the rate changed by a pleasant customer-service agent in 10 minutes and had an electronic receipt within 20 minutes. When I arrived for check-in I was very impressed. The main lobby was ornately decorated and the guest service personnel were extremely friendly and helpful. I waited only 2-3 minutes in line before I was attended to for check-in. When I walked into the 3-bedroom suite, it was better looking than even the pictures had shown. The rooms were immaculate, the kitchens clean and the bathrooms sparkling. It was very spacious and the layout really adds to the spacious dynamic because the kitchen runs straight into the dining room and living room. The rooms are carpeted and the bathrooms and kitchen are tiled, which makes for a very modern look. The furniture wasn’t as modern looking, but was in pretty clean condition. The master bedroom was very open and the bathroom was only accessible from inside the master room. The other 2 bedrooms were on the other side of the suite, so there was lots of privacy. The master bedroom King was firm but comfortable and the pillows were soft. The guest bedrooms had two large twin beds in each. The Jacuzzi bathtub in the master was a lot of fun and the jets were very relaxing after a day of traveling. The walls were not terribly thick, but we didn’t have too much of a noise issue because there was no one staying in the neighboring suite and we were on the edge of the building. The guest rooms didn’t hear much noise because the central A/C unit was in their hallway, and the unit made a soft hum that helped dampen sounds. The kitchen was great because it was fully loaded. It had cooking pans, utensils, glass cups, wine glasses a blender and more. It really felt like being at home. The balcony was a fun treat. We faced another hotel and a grass field, but the view didn’t matter because we were looking for a more private scene which this location (building F) provided. It had two chairs and a table and could comfortably hold three people sitting out there. The supplies were sufficient for our 2-day stay. We were given the standard bath soaps and towels as well as dish detergent, dishwashing soap for the dishwasher, a paper towel roll, toilet paper, ice bucket, a new sink sponge, coffee kit, tea and Tide Laundry detergent for 1 load. (I hear you may want to bring some extra supplies if you stay for more than 3 days.) The washer and dryer worked great and we used it to clean our clothes which were wet from swimming. The Wi-Fi was decent. It would occasionally blip out, but no real connection problems. The only defect in the suite was that one of the kitchen lights was out, but the room has so many different lights that it didn’t make a difference. The Housekeeping included: Replacing our towels. Replenishing our bathroom amenities. Housekeeping made our beds like. Housekeeping took out the trash – including extra bags we ended up filling. Full Maid service costs another $40 (sheet change, cleaning), but we really didn’t need it for the weekend as cleaned up after ourselves. We brought some black trash bags, extra papers towels and extra toilet paper which ended up being handy. I figured spending a few dollars would be worth the time instead of having to request extra service. A Publix was 1/4 mile away as well as several restaurants. It was very convenient and we bought a pizza to cook in the oven – which came out great! Check-out was at 11 a.m. We were about 15 minutes late to it but they didn’t seem to care which was very considerate. Overall, I cannot imagine why anyone would want to stay anywhere else. For the price, you get the comfort of home and more space than you know what to do with. It is great for families or for a relaxing birthday weekend (which mine was). The only consideration someone may have is noise and traffic. If you want to be by the main pool and don’t mind kids everywhere and the traffic, take a building toward the front. If you want peace and quiet, take a building by the back. I would recommend this resort to anyone looking to have a full-featured hotel at a very inexpensive rate.

Reviews.Title: “Like flying a low cost airline”
Reviews.Author: maumac
Reviews.Content: I consider myself an eclectic traveler, having stayed in hostels to six star hotels. I have stayed in Floridays based on my wife experience and reviews on Tripadvisor. In my opinion, staying there is like flying a low cost airline, you know you are going to the get the basics, everything else is extra. The problem is they don't tell you in advance how much they are going to cost. Although the infrastructure is comfortable, it lacks in services and cleanliness. For instance, given we don't live in the US, we did some shopping on the internet, just to find out that the hotel has a $10 fee for handling each package that was delivered to a guest. In the end, they cancelled part of the fees, but it was very annoying that they even tried to charge it. I was at the front desk one day and overheard the front desk lady speaking to the bell boy receiving one package: "Is it heavy? Let me make sure I will double charge it." That made me believe that there is no criteria to charge it besides the frontdesk mood. I wouldn't have a problem with it if it was clearly described by the time I made our reservation. Not the case though. The daily maid service lacks in quality, and from what I witnessed not even wiping the bathroom floor was performed. Given that we stayed there for over a week, we decided to hire the full maid service one day for $40 (you have to reserve it one day ahead). Honestly, it felt that it was exactly like the "basic" service. One positive aspect of our stay: My pregnant wife needed to see a doctor while we were there. The concierge, Nilda, was very helpful and recommended a doctor that was very helpful. In conclusion, if you want to stay in a place where your room will be cleaned each day and there are packages you are going to have delivered, beware of the hidden fees. I am definitely taking my business somewhere else, there are plenty of hotels in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised that this resort is ranked #1”
Reviews.Author: SueATL
Reviews.Content: We stayed here Aug 7-13 in a 2 bedroom unit for an exceptionally low rate. This resort is close to the Premium Outlet Mall, Publix & lots of restaurants and it's easy to get to all theme parks. The facility was well-maintained & hotel staff was friendly and accommodating. The unit we stayed in was spacious but dated...appliances, furnishings & beds need to be upgraded. Rooms were "tidied" daily...fresh towels, beds made & trash removed. The pool, game room & fitness facilities were on the small side...too small for the number of guests at the resort. The best offering at this resort was their complimentary shuttle. We took advantage of this service each time we went to a theme park. The biggest disappointment at Floridays is that this resort doesn't offer anything besides the pool & game room to entertain the kids...there is no theater room, play room, mini golf, water sports, water slide, pirate ship or playground. Also, there is a lack of scheduled activities. At each of the other resorts we visited in Orlando, there have always been family/kids activities planned throughout the week (ice cream socials, stuff-a-buddy, arts & crafts, movie night, etc..) Floridays only offers weekend activities. The only other things worth mentioning was the number of palmetto bugs in the rooms...we killed 3 large roaches during our stay and the frogs in the pond make irritatingly loud noises well into the night. We had the windows closed & were on the highest floor of the building and still heard them. **** Great value, conveniently located, helpful staff, complimentary shuttle, but needs family activities, better amenities & updating!

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded Expectations!”
Reviews.Author: Karen L
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays Resort Orlando during a family vacation to visit Grandma and Grandpa. The 2-bedroom/2-bathroom suite was new, nicely decorated and exceptionally clean; quite comfortable and plenty of room for a multi-generational vacation. Grandma and Grandpa were able to relax on the deck, or retire early in their own bedroom in the evening, if they wanted to...and my son LOVED the warm swimming pools with water features. Meals and laundry were a snap with the amenities right in the room, as well. In addition, the staff was very pleasant and accommodating. We spent two days at Sea World and the Resort is very close to the park. It was within reasonable distance to Disney World, as well. . Overall, the Resort was very nice and definitely enhanced our family excursion to Florida. We would stay there again. Thank you Floridays!

Reviews.Title: “Why would anyone stay on the Disney campus when you could stay here?”
Reviews.Author: BigBundyTime
Reviews.Content: Our family has stayed here 4 times in the last 5 years and we love this resort. These are actually condos that people own, but they run the place like a hotel. Unlike most condo rentals, every unit is decorated and equipped exactly the same, so it is consistent. You can get 2 or 3 Bedroom units all including: granite counter tops, fully equipped kitchen, flat screen TV and DVD, awesome zero-depth entry pool with fountains for the kids and more. There is a Publix right next door and a pretty impressive outlet mall too if you are into that. All of the Disney parks are within 5-10 minute drive. There are also some great restaurants in the vicinity. At $129/night for the two bedroom with Facebook friend discount, I can't imagine why people pay $300/night to stay on the Disney campus in a mediocre 1 room hotel room. Rent a car on Hotwire for <$50/day…it is worth it. It is great being able to have breakfast in and have a separate room for the kids to go to nap or sleep, especially if you have young ones. We were the first people to stay in the room we got on out first stay 5 years ago. If I had to list one negative, the beds are not the most comfortable; however if you are used to sleeping on a Temperpedic, most aren't even at some pretty nice hotels. From a frequent traveler of 4+ star hotels, I would consider this just about as nice as any place I have stayed. Considering the price and amenities, it really can't be beat and I would highly recommend it especially for families.

Reviews.Title: “Roomy + Clean + Feels like Home=FLORIDAYS”
Reviews.Author: theCFamily
Reviews.Content: We had a 2 bedroom suite August 6 through August 9th at Building B. The suite was very well appointed. For a family of 4 it fit us perfectly. I did a lot of research and decided that this was the place for us. My teenagers loved the place as there was enough breathing room for all of us! We had a great view of the pool. Be aware that they play music during the day, so if you don't want to hear it, I suggest another room farther away. This did not bother us at all since we were out all day. *Friendly, Professional, Helpful Staff and easy check-in *Nice location-they are redoing the entrance so look for the temporary entrance near the Benihana Restaurant . *Nice clean, tastefully decorated, spacious rooms with 2 full bathrooms *Nice balcony with view of the pool-plenty of lounge chairs available. Towels readily available at pool area. *washer and dryer was a great convenience-bring or buy extra soap-they only give you one box. Don't forget to clean out the lint screen to get full drying heat. *kitchen was nice and clean stocked with dishes, pots, pans, toaster, microwave. Refrigerator came with ice maker! *Free WI-FI *Large whirlpool tub at master bathroom *King size comfy bed *Comfy living room with flat screen tv *Windows also have black out curtains *Room was replenished with clean towels every day. Full cleaning service is extra charge. *Rented a car to get around as we wanted to be able to come and go as we please. Lots of free parking. There was never a problem of looking for an empty spot. I like that the parking was close to the buildings. *Minimal food service on site however there are plenty of restaurants around. Its not walking distance. McDonald's and a large food store called PUBLIX, is located the next street over. I did notice that there are taxi cabs waiting if you don't want to walk back to the hotel. The premium outlets is very close too which has an affordable food court. Overall, it was an excellent place! Very close to all the parks! We will be back! Thanks for the great experience. My kids miss it already!

Reviews.Title: “Excellant facilities - would stay here again in a heartbeat”
Reviews.Author: Replicator
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with this Suite, the facilities provided and how quiet it was. It was excellent having a washer and clothes dryer and all kitchen amenities. Nice big bathrooms, plenty of complimentary shampoo/conditioner/body wash etc with towels being changed daily and bed being made. We stayed here for 5 nights and thought it was an excellent location for Orlando, situated at the end of International Drive just past Sea World and on the way to Disney World. You would need a car to get around but it was lovely and quiet in the evenings. We liked it so much that when we came back after two weeks of touring Florida we booked into here again. A note though, if booking via the internet there are additional charges by the hotel at the end of your stay.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays Holiday!!”
Reviews.Author: AntheaF
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for a period of 3 nights in the 3 bedroom suite. Check in was smooth... My brother regularly visited the gym which was not crowded. Ask for an apartment near the reception/entrance - else you will probably need a car to move about especially if you are lazy. You definitely do require a car to move out of the resort. However the resort provides transport to Disney - so book that if you have to. It is free of charge. The suite was well appointed. The master bedroom had a lovely en-suite bath with a jacuzzi. However the master bedroom had a bad odor and there was nothing much we could do except keep the windows open for a better part of the day. Housekeeping was not very efficient. We asked them to come clean up n try to remove the odor - however it took a while for them to come. I don't think that they are at the resort 24-7. But the odor apart- it is a lovely resort and yes if i have to visit Orlando in the near future I will definitely stay here again.............

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Angie A
Reviews.Content: Really enjoyed our stay at Floridays. Great value for what you get! So much better than being cramped in a small hotel room w/ only one bathroom. Bedrooms were spacious, as were bathrooms. We were greeted with friendliness when checking in and always received prompt service whenever we needed a cab/car service. Suite was clean and necessities were provided such as dish soap, dishwasher det, laundry det and usual toiletries. Be aware of the "light clean" service - only beds made and towels replaced. If you want bethrooms or kitchen cleaned, you will have to request it and pay for it. Also be aware of the $11/day charge for internet, etc. We did not have any luck getting on the shuttle for departures to Universal - they fill up quickly. We did take one of the shuttles back to the hotel one night - took about 45 minutes as you stop at other hotels on the way and we had to stand almost the entire time. Cab ride is $23 one way to Universal. Can take the IRide Trolley to Sea World for only $1.25 one way (kids under 12 are free!) and the stop is right in front of hotel on I Drive. We did not get to use the pool (busy at parks), but it was always clean and lots of lounge chairs available. There are not many dining options - no restaurants. Overall, very happy w/ accommodations and service. Remember this is not a luxury hotel, it is a resort w/ adequate amenities, but is very nice and would work for most families.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoy our stay at this hotel, I would recommend to anyone.”
Reviews.Author: zubok32
Reviews.Content: We really enjoy our stay at this hotel as a couple. The suite was superb and we have all the things we need inside. In the suite you have washer, dryer, 2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms, oven, microwave, dishwasher.... everything to feel at home! It was clean and so big! Free shuttle to the attractions :There was 2 departing time (one late) per day to DISNEY and 3 returning time. It bring your to EPCOT from there you can go at any disney park with buses or monorail. The only thing it's about transportation. No free shuttle from the airport it cost about 44$ for a cab or we pay 42$ for the MEARS shuttle. Nobody at the hotel inform us that we can take the LINX public transportation for the airport BUS # 42. From the hotel you can take the "I Ride Trolley" for 1.25$ to go to sea world, Wet N' Wild. There's not so much things around this part of international drive that you can walk to. A Publix, Walgreens, a couple of restaurants (including a McDo), 1 gift shop, a couple of other shop but that's all. If I do it again I will rent a car but beside this I was really enjoy my stay at this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “I would stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: Roderick701
Reviews.Content: Was there 7/27-8/1Stayed in a suite that had two bedrooms and a pullout couch. Included Kitchenette (5 sets of everything), table, dishwasher, washer/dryer. Two bathrooms total. The bathroom off the master bedroom had a jacuzzi bathtub with decent size. WiFi good. Five day stay, average of $175 per day, plus the resort fee. Fee was $11-$12 daily that was pretty lame for the list of items you receive for this. But I knew ahead of time from this site that this would be tacked on and the price was still right to what I was seeing out there. The washer/dryer is what makes this deal for me. Just easier to know you can pack half or less than what you will need as you will just wash your clothes at your convenience. There was a small pool closer to our building. The main pool, was not fancy either. Basically went up to 5' deep with a few spots where you could get water sprayed on you. Enough room to do laps if it wasn't that busy. Fitness center looked very complete.

Reviews.Title: “We will be back!”
Reviews.Author: BMDSpringfield_MA
Reviews.Content: We found Floridays to be a great family resort. The suite was spacious, clean and cool. We stayed in Building B which was conveniently located near the pool. The entire staff(front desk, housekeepers, bartenders, cook) were great and accommodating. The resort was close to the Disney parks and our kids had a blast in the pool. The low depths of pool made it easier to watch the kids. Rooms came completely supplied with all utensils/dishes/cookware as well as laundry and dish detergent.

Reviews.Title: “Been There Done That Would Absolutely Do It AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: jpere041
Reviews.Content: If you have a big family I HIGHLY recommend Floridays. A short drive away from all of Orlando's Theme Parks and very well priced!

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay but needs some upgrade”
Reviews.Author: JinLiAmsterdam
Reviews.Content: I booked this resort based on the very good reviews on tripadvisor. We booked a two bedroom apartment. Space is convenient and it was clean when we arrived. Be aware that the room service is very limited and more or less limited to making up the beds, change the towels and remove the garbage. the kids liked the swimming pool and indeed the location of the hotel close to the parks, shops etc is excellent. We stayed in Building B with a view on a small pond, which was to my judgement the best building and also the best location in that building. I would not recommend the pool side of the building if you want to enjoy a restful stay on your small balcony. Plenty parking space available, the entry to the building itself before entering the elevators do not really look very attractive. The management should do something about that because it is the first "contact" with the facility apart from the reception area. It is pretty much self service, you get the keys at the reception and that could be your only contact with the resort staff till checkout unless you have to report some problems with the room. The apartment has a lot of space and has a small balcony for two persons. Kitchen is ok with a dishwasher, a huge refrigerator and all the equipment you need for cooking your own meals. The furniture, lamps and carpet are close to their end of life time and probably need upgrade very soon. Beds were ok and also the bathrooms (2) were ok and equipped with the necessary things. The air-conditioning (a must during summer in Florida) worked well. The hotel has a free shuttle service to the main attractions which works well and was always on time. the gentleman at the tour desk reception was always helpful. All in all, we enjoyed our stay in this resort and we were not disappointed at all. We would certainly consider using this resort again.

Reviews.Title: “VERY good value for familiy”
Reviews.Author: medincmh
Reviews.Content: we looked at Disney, but with 3 kids the resorts would be tight. Floridays exceeded my expectations by far. Unit and amenities were fantastic. Staff was tremendous. Overall GREAT experience.

Reviews.Title: “Stay here, it is definitely worth it.”
Reviews.Author: djcam1439
Reviews.Content: Finding the resort was the only drawback. Actually I blame my co-pilot for GPS user error. If you find that anyone that has stayed here and had a problem, then they had a problem with themselves. This resort goes above and beyone making it comfortable as a home away from home. From the check in, food service, friendliness of staff, top shelf. We have stayed at a number of orlando/kississimee/lake buena vista resorts and this one by far was the best. Great resort to stay with family, very clean, roomy and just overall a blast.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: sacrey
Reviews.Content: We had a great time! The kids loved the pool! The accomodations were clean and the staff very friendly. The location was was very close to many of the attractions. We would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was essential to our enjoyment in Florday, took a lot of hassle out of the busy days. Nice to relax”
Reviews.Author: Richard R
Reviews.Content: Great to think we could relax back at Floridays after a busy day at theme parks and malls. Apartment was top class and air con was so cool. We asked for a pool view which was great to look out on; see people enjoying themselves. Glad we got the reqeusted pool view but Concierge rightly reminded us on check in that as the bar closed at 11.00 pm there may be some noise - hey we said "we're on holiday, we won't be in bed by 11.00 !)

Reviews.Title: “3rd time in 4 years and still great !”
Reviews.Author: veroluc2000
Reviews.Content: This was our 3rd time in 4 years and Floridays met again our expectations. Great price, nice big room, nice pools and perfectly located. The only negative thing that i can say is the noise... a couple times during the week, while sleeping, we got wokken up by a noisy neibourgh and some people partying outside.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Stay At Floridays”
Reviews.Author: Cassidy24_11
Reviews.Content: Originally booked Floridays Resort due to Tripadvisor reviews. It was a great decision! A fantastic resort with all that you need for a wonderful vacation. We stayed in building B overlooking the beautiful pool. The two bedroom unit was spotless with all the comforts of home. Just a quick walk up the road for groceries and you have all you need.The grounds are very well kept and staff can't do enough for you (especially Ray). I highly recommend Floridays resort if you are booking an Orlando vacation. The only word of caution is the third party shuttle companyto the parks that Floridays useis very unorganized and unreliable. If you have your own transportation than you have no worries at all.

Reviews.Title: “Comfort and convenience:great hotel for families!”
Reviews.Author: LRN-2011
Reviews.Content: Spacious and tasteful suites with everything you need for a comfortable family vacation: full kitchen, washer/dryer, two bathrooms TVs, internet, balcony...great pools that were loved by our kids--with clean and warm towels supplied directly on pool side. Quite yet convenient location--next door to supermarket and the Premium Outlets. Easy access (and free shuttle bus) to major attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Room was the best I've stayed in”
Reviews.Author: JimP51
Reviews.Content: We rented the 2 bedroom and were blown away at the size. It was clean, well equipped, had a nice view of the fountain and pool (near Bldg F). The resort is centrally located to everything. Would recommend this Resort to anyone. Keep an eye on the "specials" as they change often. I changed my reservation 3X due to better deals.

Reviews.Title: “Good self-catering unit, but shouldn't call it a hotel”
Reviews.Author: capetowndean
Reviews.Content: Stayed here because it was # 1 on tripadviser. Everything was nearly as expected as I had read lots of reviews on Floridays. Don't go here if your expecting to stay in a hotel because Floridays isn't one, it is a large self catering complex with little or no service that you would expect from a hotel. Never stayed in a hotel where they don't clean your room unless you pay extra and where there is no bell service. So when you arrive at 11 pm after a 30 hour journey you have to struggle with 4 large suitcases, 2 sleeping children, in the middle of a thunder storm and no parking within 100 yards of the building.There was no offer of help. Units are a very good size, comfortable and well equipt. Furniture needs updating and there was quit a bit of dust, even though I rang before I arrived to let them know I had a child with astham. We stayed here for 11 nights and the only contact we had with the front desk was to pick up a package I had ordered to be delivered , which was there for 3 days before I had to ask for it. This is the first place I have ever stayed at where they didn't call us to ask if everything was alright with the room and if there was anything we needed or if they could help us with anything. Pool area looked ok, didn't use the facilities much as we had to get in the car to get to main pool area and bar. If your looking for a self catering resort then Floridays is not a bad choice and I must say it's very well located for all the attractions. But if your looking for a hotel and all the thing you expect from one then you may be disappointed. Value for money? Not really, you get what you pay for. I had to laugh on checking out, there was a extra daily charge for service added to the bill. Our unit was only cleaned once in 11 days and we never had any contact with anyone from Floridays. What service? Very suprised this is #1 on tripadvicer.

Reviews.Title: “Exemplary Holiday getaway”
Reviews.Author: rainbowjubail
Reviews.Content: It was our first time in orlando and we were travelling with our 2 teenage daughters, I must say that we were impressed with the accommadation, we were in 2 bedroom apartment overlooking the swiming pool. The scenery was a breath taking, the apartment was an excellent and has a well equiped kitchen and emaculately clean. We will surely come back to it.

Reviews.Title: “the rooms are large, but that is about it”
Reviews.Author: ilasik
Reviews.Content: I guess I am in the minority here but I was disappointed after expecting something a little bit newer and nicer for a #1 hotel in Orlando. It was incredibly nice to have enough space for my teenage girls, my father as well as my husband and me. The pool was clean and pleasant enough with sufficient lounge chairs. But that is about it. Walking in the hallway to your room feels like Motel 6, one of those shabby places with rooms facing directly the outside, old orange cracked walls. We arrived late, at 10pm, and were told to deliver our own luggage. The room is large, as I said, but in pretty big need of renovation. The couch is dirty looking, the lamps in the master bedroom look like they were made in the 50s for that same motel 6, furniture is very very old. I have written close to 50 reviews and I have never complained of dirty or old furniture so it did strike me as unusual in its delapidation. And while I commend the management for having plenty of towels I am sorry, they do need to be bigger than a hand towel and thicker than a rag kitchen towel. The location is convenient, the rooms large but a facelift is desperately needed.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING hotel”
Reviews.Author: mariameli
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the 2 bedroom suite, the kitchen was fully equipped and the rooms were comfortable and beautiful. The suite has a washer and dryer, dishwasher, microwave, in short EVERITHING you need and more. The top was the jacuzzy bath in the master bathroom. Completely in love and recommending it!

Reviews.Title: “very happy with our choice”
Reviews.Author: mama5011
Reviews.Content: i chose floridays after extensive research on the internet,particularly from trip advisor. considering that we were a family of 9 ranging from toddlers to tweens and teens,i wanted something that would suit all our needs and this did. rooms very nice and comfortable beds and since i have a badback i should know. the 2 bedrooms are nicer i think as the other bathroom has a bath and shower while the 3 bedroom has a shower inthe 2nd bathroom, this was a challenge as my toddler likes to take baths. i stayed in block a as we didnt have a car and i had read on this site to request for that note that this isnt a hotel so if arriving late at night come with your own food or eat at the airport as everywhere is closed after 11pm. the shutlles are okay but you may want to use the ihop instead or taxi as its free for less than 13 and 1 .25$ for others. it is really easy to use and reliable on the whole i loved this place esp since the rooms all had cable tv so after a tiring day at the parks we could all chill out with our own programmes the staff are reeally nice esp the concierge

Reviews.Title: “Best Florida experience ever & we'd definitely go back to Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: Aurynaimeeleigh
Reviews.Content: Always done Villas & opted for Floridays as a trial & really exhausted every avenue to make sure it was going to be as good as a Villa, but with a better locality! We were not disappointed in any way. The Apt was lovely (not as beautiful as a Villa...but for us that was the down-fall, as no-one would want to leave indoors!), clean,spacious, tv's in every room, spa bath, showers, kitchen area etc... Pool area & staff were by far an unexpected bonus! Loungers at easy disposal, free towels from mini pool side beach huts & same for the soiled ones to be disposed of. Hassle free at the pool...no moaning at our kids (14,13 & 4yr old) for using & soaking the towels! Cannot some people have actually moaned about the Free towels at the pool being of 'thin' quality! Bizarre! Read a review that the pool water wasn't clean! Abs rubbish, could not have been at the Floridays Resort we were just back from yest! The pool was un-describable. We have never experienced a more adequate,temperature perfect, clean, happy pool & pool side Environment on any holiday we have ever been on! We would not accept or expect anything less than 100% & Floridays Resort definitely met all our requirements. We would never go anywhere else in Florida again, this was truly fantastic. The pool side food was abs beautiful, Caesar Salad,Wraps,Fajitas,Hotdog, Burgers & fries...exceptional value for money & extremely nice food. Above all the staff are sooooo pleasant & helpful. The Apt is not tidied up after you & your family, however, you're given fresh towels, beds made, kitchen& toilet roll provided...again a +++ as I expected it was not a Holiday but a self-catering resort (just like oyou do everything for yourself in a Villa!)...defo for the 1st time ever, it felt like a holiday for the parents too! Location A++++. Cannot understand some peoples reservations...must be that some peoples agendas are completely different! The 5 of us fell completely in love with Floridays & sooooo glad we made the jump to change as it could have been 'a Catastrophic' Decision for us to make the change from Villas to Resort...Well Worth it & beyond!!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome condo and pool, great price!”
Reviews.Author: mdgipsy
Reviews.Content: We got a fabulous deal on airfare, car and this condo. No early check in but we were able to change and hang out by the pool which my 3 year old loved! Food and drinks right at the pool, reasonable cost and good quality. Condo was excellent, clean, big and roomy. Woudl definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: BoracayUitgeest
Reviews.Content: Right in between the Universal and Disney parks a place that feel like home.

Reviews.Title: “Loved our stay & we'll be back very soon!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Nishea
Reviews.Content: I loved our stay at Floridays....it was a WONDERFUL escape ! I'm very glad I decided to stay here instead of with the rest of my family at a near by hotel for our family reunion. My kids loved the pool and I had a really hard time trying to make them leave it! My husband loved the gym because he was able to keep his workout schedule and I loved relaxing in the jacuzzi! I am already looking foward to our next vacation at Floridays and I am telling everyone I know about it!!!

Reviews.Title: “hotel was super for our needs , and it will be our first choice if we return to Florida”
Reviews.Author: calish_11
Reviews.Content: Rooms were spacious ,had all facilities required for a family holiday. pool was good size and surounding area allways clean . cafe very handy for the odd snack . staff were very helpful reasonable close to most of the attractions

Reviews.Title: “All the Comforts of Home...and MORE!”
Reviews.Author: patragnoni6
Reviews.Content: My family of two adults, four children - two boys, two girls ages 7, 9, 12 and 14 stayed at the Floridays from July 23rd-30th. We didn't want to leave! We have stayed at many Disney area hotels, including the Boardwalk in the park and when you look at what you're getting for the money, the Floridays ranks number one for value. We stayed in a three bedroom condo - the girls had one bedroom (with a double bed for each girl), and the boys had the other. They had a HUGE bathroom and a linen closet, all on their own "wing." The living quarters were a good size, with a full size, well stocked kitchen, dining area and living room with 37" plasma TV. My husband and I had wonderful privacy in our king bedroom suite off of the living room...and far enough away from the kids' wing for privacy. Our bathroom was very large and icluded a jacuzzi tub that my kids took advantage of often. The hotel staff was extremely friendly accomodating. Ray, our bell captain not only delivered our luggage but gave us a tour of the condo when we arrived so we wouldn't question where anything was or miss one of the many features! The main pool (we were lucky enough to stay in building A, closest to the action) was all the kids' needed an then some after a long day at the parks. Our bartender at the pool bar was extremely kind and friendly, and mentioned that sometimes the pool bar remained opened until 1am if the crowd was still there, enjoying the live entertainment that is there on the weekends. The Palm Cafe was a great resource the occasional breakfast sandwich or snack. My husband would make nightly treks to the nearby grocery store, Publix to fill up our frig with drinks to bring to the park the next day. There is also a Walgreens in that same shopping center, as well as a Chinese food restaurant and Subway. We also ate dinner one night at the Benihana in the parking lot of the hotel - walking distance. The food, and the show that the Hibachi chef put on, were fantastic! The daily shuttle service to and from the parks was reliable, on time and transported you in a plush, air conditioned bus. One HUGE bonus of this shuttles over some we've used from other hotel properties is that it went directly to and from Epcot, no picking up or dropping off other hotel guests on the way. This is a big bonus and meant that we were never on the bus for more than 15 minutes coming or going. My family and I can't say enough about the Floridays. It enabled us to have a wonderful, memorable vacation with virtually no glitches. We will definitely stay there next trip to Disney!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: mj_chan
Reviews.Content: Rented a two room condo, my thoughts: General: This is a rental condo, not a hotel. Generally, you are trading off space for hotel amenities like daily room cleaning (though this can be purchased). This is Orlando, you can expect a lot of kids running around, and it is true of this location Good: Very nicely decorated rooms and living area's Lots of room compared to a hotel Very good price compared to having to bunch up in hotel room(s) Master bath hot tub made me feel like I was staying in a $500 night suite Average: A very nice pool comparable to most hotels in the US, but average for an Orlando hotel pool (but average here is pretty good), has a poolside bar Not 'super close' to anything, but not far from everything (30 minutes and usually a lot less will get you anyplace you want to be) Except for the Benihana next door, you will have to get in your car to eat... unless you take advantage of the condo kitchen, of course Rooms are not brand new 'perfect', if you have an expectation of this you will need to find a newly built hotel. What this means is you will might the occasional bruised wall corner, nicked drawer, etc. Bad: Parking can be iffy, you can get lucky and a short walk to your room, or if you come home late you might be hiking a bit Figuring out the AC was a challenge. Previous reviewers had said it was locked, but there is an override feature, you just have to do it every night if you want a lower temperature.

Reviews.Title: “No complaints, Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: XanJes11
Reviews.Content: We arrived a few minutes before check in and had to wait until the exact check in time, but the staff was very nice and went ahead and got everything ready for us. They gave us a very detailed description of where our building and room was. The room was beautiful, the Jacuzzi tub was awesome, and the beds were very comfy! We did not stay long enough to go to the pool but it looked very nice. I am a pretty picky person and I would have to say I have no complaints at all and will stay here anytime i go back to Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “VERY NICE INDEED”
Reviews.Author: gr123travel
Reviews.Content: stayed july 16-30th had a 3 bed apartment which was bigger than my house. the rooms have everything you would need,washer dryer,dishwasher,waste disposal ,air con, televisions galore and the best fridge freezer ive ever used. it even has a compartment in the freezer for cooling cans quickly and ice maker. if any minus points (and its hard ) is you cant change english money to dollars there you have to go to the outlet but its not far. there is a publix supermarket in walking distance and i ride trolly stop just outside. all the staff i met were very friendly. my only bug bear is the additional charge for the services think its 12 bucks a day for wi fi and clean towels .i would just add it to the cost of the room so you know where you are with your finances. will recommend to all my friends and you wont be dissapointed. ps its only a 50 buck taxi from the airport too.

Reviews.Title: “Great condo, great location, helpfull staff”
Reviews.Author: i8work
Reviews.Content: Positives: Great place, decent sized condo, really close to a publix supermarket, pool open late - 10 pm plus. negatives: not many, but perhaps the pool has too much chlorine - so bring googles for the little ones.

Reviews.Title: “I trusted the reviews, please don't!”
Reviews.Author: PegasoMex
Reviews.Content: I am still at the property, but I am checking out tomorrow. I read some of the reviews and though that with so many good reviews it would be tough to be disappointed. Wrong! I have visited Orlando in several occasions and stayed at the vacation properties of the Marriot chain. Good experiences with my family. Some are newer and some outdated, but overall it has been ok. I thought I could improve my stay in the area and went through the different options on this site. First impression was as expected: multiple buildings, nothing fancy. The people at the front desk were ok, but the surprises started there. We would only have a tidy up service. If we wanted full housekeeping, we should add 40 dollars per day. I decided to pay for every other day, to make sure the room was clean. Second surprise: After a long day at the parks the kids wanted to refresh at the pool.
