We want to get the towels,( of course a self service). There is no way to call a drag of 2 feet by 2 feet and less thick than s kitchen’s cloth a towel! I wouldn’t use them to wipe my car’s tires! The pool's floor was covered with sand and you couldn’t see more than 10 feet underwater even with goggles. So much for the pool experience. The rooms are as described, but only in size. Even though I was told they are only 4 years old, I had to wrestle with the armoire’s drawers to get them closed. My kids expected to rent a movie, but there is none and no movie rentals in the property. We went to the grocery store for the minimum supplies, and asked for “room service”. What you get is a hamburger in a plastic box. I knew I was not staying at the Ritz Carlton, but I buy my dog's food at PetsMart and it's nicer. As for the air conditioning, it smells like a swamp or maybe there is a dead cat in the ducts. Terrible moist smell! But the worst thing is the noise, every time it turns on and off it sounds like somebody is opening a door. My little girl did not want to sleep in her room. Maybe they can use this sounds for the Tower of Terror at Disney. And finally as the jewel of the crown, regardless I asked for full clean up,we came in today, only to find out that someone was here, they kind of move the things around, and maybe pretend to say it was housekeeping. I am a single father and I have help at home, but not even me would have done this really nasty work, They just pulled the sheets and left a towel. Everything else remained the same. My bed was undone. I can’t figure this out, as the day before whomever came did an ok job. My little girl found a piece of an earring in the bathroom sink, so not even they didn't clean, but not even took away their own mess, Right now I really don’t think someone tried to clean up, it looks like someone pretended to clean, and now I am considering they came in just to check our stuff. By tomorrow I shall speak with the manager and try to figure out what happened. I usually think that the lousy reports are given by the Grinch and his relatives, but not this time. Do yourself a favour and stay at something that has some name in it, Sheraton Vistana, the Marriot Vacation properties or any Disney Vacation property, and avoid this place at all cost. Otherwise, stay at your own risk. I booked 8 nights, but staying 2 was 1 too much. Hopefully a Manager will stand up to this terrible experience. Otherwise I will keep all of you posted with any more nice experinces from this "cozy resort"

Reviews.Title: “3rd stay, and just as awesome!”
Reviews.Author: woffer73
Reviews.Content: I've never been one for staying at the same Resort, as there are plenty of choices, but for us, Floridays just ticks all the boxes. I had read many reviews about Floridays before we committed to the booking in 2009, and the words "Home from home" seemed to appear frequently. I would strongly agree with that sentiment. We arrived on June 14th, and as soon as we turned into Floridays Orlando Resort Drive, we knew we were home. The staff at check in were their usual, professional, courteous, selves, making us feel welcomed, almost missed since our last visit, which is always nice. We had kindly asked if we could possibly be allocated in a Suite on the ground floor, as this is the only floor that has a fully-screened patio, which we prefer, as our Son is Autistic, and it's reassuring to us that he can't get up to any mischief. We were duly allocated into Suite 105 in Building C, which was in a great location- not too far from the main Pool, but far enough away not to hear noise pollution. I had a package shipped from walmart.com, which was ready and waiting for me upon check in, so i was delighted that the process worked so smoothly. Obviously, being our 3rd stay, we were very familiar with the Suite layout, and availed ourselves of all of the creature comforts of home, like dishwasher, Fridge, Microwave, and Coffee Machine. The Washer and Dryer, which are situated in a recessed Cupboard adjacent to the dining room, is very useful for doing a quick wash, either during your stay or to wash all clothes before returning home. The level of housekeeping i think depends on whether you book direct with the Resort, or by a 3rd party. We booked direct with F.O.R, and received daily Housekeeping, with a full clean every 7th day. We found Housekeeping to be all very friendly, and were happy to give you extra Dishwasher tablets/Washing Powder, if required. We found the Beds to be very comfortable, but the Pillows lacked support, and tended to slide around on the Bed. I'm used to sleeping on memory foam, so perhaps i noticed it more, but it wasn't a major problem at all. We just bought a couple of memory foam Pillows from a Tuesday Morning Store nearby for about $15, and bought them back home with us. Everyone we encountered on our visit was so friendly, and i mean everyone, from Front Desk, Concierge, Bell Hops, Security, Bar/Cafe Staff. Absolutely everyone connected in anyway with this resort, whose eyes met ours, erupted into a friendly greeting, it really made us feel like royalty. We enjoyed our 3rd stay so much that we've already booked to stay again in 2012!

Reviews.Title: “What a great place”
Reviews.Author: horakw
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 nights - family of four - and enjoyed every minute. The apartments are large, clean and comfortable. We loved the 2 full bathrooms, the kitchen and dining and living area. All apartements have 2 or 3 bedrooms and a terrace. The hotel offers a large pool, a Starbucks and a little shop. Whenever we go to Orlando again we will select Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant value!!! Trip of a life time.”
Reviews.Author: tjcreofrockies
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay for the money. Room was well appointed and tastefully furnished. It is not top of the line elegance but honestly I don't know why anyone would complain about the furnishings, heads above standard hotel grade. Very nice area of town, quiter and more laid back than the disney madness but still an easy drive to the parks The pool is very nice, full kitchen a major plus and loved having separate bedrooms. The only thing that was wrong was just one jet worked in the jacuzzi. Nice court yards entrances, there is some noise from the front door area but I did not notice and slept well on a comfy bed. Maybe we got an updated room, not sure if all the rooms are as nice as the one we had. Completely satisfied. Perfect for a family trip. This is a time share property, it seems to be doing very well and we were not even asked about buying. Infact the sales office is a completely separate building from the hotel lobby. Not even an issue. You do have to clean your own room, and we vacuumed as soon as we got there but fresh towels are brought everyday, bed are made and trash taken out. It is different from a hotel in this way but so many more benefits to make your vacation a home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: dedjer
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love this hotel, and always stay here when we travel to Orlando. Very close to all the major attractions, nice pool area, workout facility, Starbucks, and the can't say enough about the Suites. 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, sofabed, etc. Awesome! Buy some groceries and stay here and you'll have a pleasant, inexpensive vacation. Consider bringing a wireless access point if you need wifi in your room.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Value”
Reviews.Author: coach_boom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here with our two kids and loved every part of the vacation. Stay near the front for the huge kid-friendly pool, or one of the rear units for some peace and quiet at the smaller pool. Its right in the middle of everything - close to every attraction, and has washer/dryer full fridge and kitchen. Cannot tell you how many constipating fast-food meals we successfully avoided. Place does not give you much in the way of help with dish-washer detergent, coffee or really housekeeping for that matter - seems a little cheap if you ask me, but the price and location was right. Plan on buying these basic supplies despite knowing there are plenty at the front desk and they are too cheap to let you have a few without paying 10x the price at the "hotel store" - you will do much better at the Publix which is walking distance away anyway. Stay away from the room service - way overpriced and much better is available for delivery anyway.

Reviews.Title: “Great base for a great vacation!”
Reviews.Author: ZippyPittsburgh
Reviews.Content: The hotel was exactly as advertised. We weren't surprised by anything. We stayed in Building E by the back pool. It was nice at times to have the quite, small pool, but it wasn't hard to get get to the big pool. Having a two bedroom suite was perfect for our family of five. Parents in the master, girls in one bedroom, and my son on the pull-out couch. No complaints about the hotel all week, can't beat that. Price is right and a very good value. Compared to the other expenses for an Orlando vacation, this was down-right reasonable. There is a Publix grocery-store just a very short drive away. If we were to go back again to Orlando, we would almost certainly stay here again. There were only minor maintenance issues, but nothing that wasn't either immediately remedied or really didn't effect our vacation. (Broken corksrew, toilet paper holder didn't fit properly.)

Reviews.Title: “stayed again for the 5th time”
Reviews.Author: krgl
Reviews.Content: just back from a two week stay at floridays. had a great time again. had one small problem, house keeping forgot to close my door and it was left open for over 12 hours, i was at magic kingdom that day. it would not put me off going back. had breakfast and lunch a few times at the hotel and found this very OK. the food could do with an upgrade. staff are all very nice and helpful. would have no problem staying again. great location and 15/20 minute to disney

Reviews.Title: “Great, but”
Reviews.Author: Abalabou
Reviews.Content: Our stay was great (3 kids). I would make my overall rating as excellent if they cleaned the room right. They make up beds and take out garbage daily, and go for a full cleaning weekly. The full cleaning is not to the minimum of expectation. Staff were great.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was a GREAT Stay RECOMMENDED!!!”
Reviews.Author: ellendejavu
Reviews.Content: We stayed July 20-25 2011. We had a 2 bedroom. It was clean and had many things we used like the washer and dryer in the condo was awesome for when we were sweaty at the parks. We did laundry daily. The pool was great for the kids with activities before noon, they got to play and see kids from other places. The cafe was good for the sandwiches we bought. They also sell things like snacks, bathroom stuff etc. We also walked to Benihana's for dinner one night. Right behind building A. We stayed in 608 Building A and it overlooked the parking and a pond with a fountain. It was VERY quiet. If you want to be close to the main pool ask for A,B, C. With A, we just walked 2 seconds to get there. B is right over the main pool. And C is a little further. WIth the amenities, a kitchen, 3 tvs and clean rooms, it was very much worth it. Not expensive at all when you have to pay SOOO much for disney property. Floridays is at the end of INTERNATIONAL drive. To get to Disney, it was soo easy--like 10 min! To universal, the same street but North around 15 min with traffic. Publix and Walgreens soo close to get stuff you need! We had a rental car. I would recommend this place! They charge a $11 a day room fee for incidentals--check your reservation and don't be surprised--free wifi though! One downsize--beds a little lumpy--BUT I was soo dead, didn't care!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but needs updating.”
Reviews.Author: AMC33
Reviews.Content: Just stayed at this location and the beds were so uncomfortable. Felt like the springs were directly into our backs. Very spacious. Asked for pool view and did not receive. Maid service was great. Furniture is getting worn out and needs to be renovated. If we had to compare this "condo" type experience to others we have stayed in, I would say that this was somewhat below my expectations due to others reviews.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and excellent facilities in the apartment”
Reviews.Author: HappyMummyBelgium
Reviews.Content: Floridays is a great place to stay as it is conveniently located to get to the theme parks and the trolley stops outside the building too, if you want to go to somewhere on I-drive without the car (like we did to avoid the $14 to park at Sea World which is on I-drive). Our 2 bed apartment/condo was great! It was exactly like the pictures on the website. It had every piece of kitchen equipment you might need and there's even some dishwasher tabs, kitchen roll, small washing up liquid and t-towels provided. The bathroom for the master bedroom was huge and the spa bath was greatly appreciated after a long day at a theme park. The washer and drier were also of great benefit and saved us coming home with mountains of laundry. The resort itself was very clean and towels were provided at the pool if you wanted them. There is a games room, gym, small shop and bar, but we didn't really use them. One important tip is that the water in Florida tastes disgusting - a combination of sulphur and chlorine, so we bought a filter at Wal-mart for $9, which saved us a fortune on buying bottled water all of the time. Overall, great place to stay and would definitely use Floridays again.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: StLow
Reviews.Content: Second stay in 3 years. Great resort. Everything that you need is there. Nice and big pool with small area for kids. Another pool for more relax afternoon.

Reviews.Title: “Great to have the space but too far from Disney”
Reviews.Author: Readey
Reviews.Content: We loved the hotel and the fact that we could cook our own meals and have two bedrooms, and a loung after staying in hotel rooms on our trip, the pool was amazing and our childrens favorite of our trip, it was really fun. But the only down side was we were too far from Disney World and the shuttle was badly timed. The hotel provides a shuttle to Epcot and then you can transfer to the other Disney Parks from Epcot. But this does all take time. And if you were going to a water park you would need to transfer to 2 buses to get there. Totalling 3 buses which takes just over and hour. Also the first bus to come back to the hotel at night leaves at 6.15 which was too late to come back for swims etc and the last bus at 9.15 which was too early for the Disney fire works. And the only two transfers the hotel provided in the mornings were at 8.15 or 10.45 which made a very early or very late start. We did end up getting taxis instead which averaged about $30 a trip so if you can factor in that expense then it would be good to stay here. Or of course had you own car in which case I would definately stay here. The hotel is also next to a large supermarket and the Orlando Outlet Malls which was great.And the room was only cleaned once a week or once during your stay.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent place to stay,we truly enjoyed ourselves!!!”
Reviews.Author: babygirl2011
Reviews.Content: This hotel was definitely a great choice to stay at. Myself and my family truly enjoyed ourselves. The pool was awesome and the staff was very nice . Also the conditions of the suites was outstanding!! When we return to Florida the next time,we will definitely be staying with Floridays again.

Reviews.Title: “Good but doesn't deserve no 1 placing on Tripadvisor”
Reviews.Author: LindsayPinz
Reviews.Content: Maybe it was our room- which was dark, dingy, on the ground floor and with an unattractive aspect over the car park, but this place does not live up to the hype. Yes, it was clean, spacious and well-positioned for Disney however 2 big down-sides for me- the on-site shop is appalling- poorly stocked and ridiculously expensive- $8 for a pint bottle of milk and 3/4 litre mineral water! You are having a laugh! Was annoyed I had to go out to the nearby Publix in search of very basic items- milk, cereal, water for our short stay. Also, poolside cafe is a disgrace- it's worse than a fast-food outlet. Burgers, chips, sandwiches that's your lot- served in a take-away box with plastic cutlery...and a 1/2 hour wait for it. Pathetic. No, if you want clean, spacious, better and cheaper accommodation, go to the Hilton at Seaworld. It is also better positioned for Seaworld and the Universal parks. Disney is not well-signposted from Floridays and trying to find your way back nigh-on impossible.

Reviews.Title: “A really nice resort located in a handy and less busy location.”
Reviews.Author: Sumthin2wait4
Reviews.Content: Floridays Resort was selected for our Bi-Triennial Family Reunion. The average stay was 5 nights for our group. Many of us (ages 5-90 years) wished we’d spent more daylight hours at the resort in the main pool area. Our days were filled with Orlando activities which certainly made Floridays a "hit" in the evenings as the place to crash, relax, socialize and swim until pools closed. Affordability, space, location and hotel ratings were key factors to our reunion destination selection. Rooms are spacious, very clean and we certainly did not need to dine out 2-3 times daily. Anyone would feel comfortable cooking in these full-size kitchens or eating at the restaurant/pool bar. I think Floridays served the best lunch we had in 10 days. In suite laundry facilities are a perfect daily perk. My best tips: • If travelling with someone with mobility issues request a room near the main pool in buildings A, B or D. We loved that accommodation. • Book very early for the best rates, at least 6-9 months out and watch for better deals to come along. Cancellation policies are very accommodating if you find a better deal at the resort or elsewhere so read your booking details. • Book extra nights if you secure a great nightly rate, and then cancel the additional nights as time approaches if they are not needed. A quaint resort, Floridays lies in a quieter and less busy section of International Drive just south of Sea World and Aquatica Water Park. We were located within walking distance (for walkers) to Premium Outlet South, and a useful plaza with all required necessities: pharmacy, grocery, liquor, a few fast food/restaurants and other conveniences. If you don't mind public transportation Floridays Resort is doable without a car; however I would recommend renting a vehicle if you do not like transportation schedules and want to be free to explore the area and all it has to offer in a timely manner or if travelling with someone with mobility issues. Airport taxi roundtrip is roughly $85 and a 10 day car rental deal booked late was $250-300. Plenty of restaurants are nearby within a 5-10 minute drive in any direction inclusive of the Pointe Orlando/I-Drive restaurant strip. Note: Dining at Downtown Disney is closer than you think! Small drawbacks: Not many restaurant or shopping perks or discounts handed out at check-in. Resort ATM dings you in service fees; get money elsewhere! Pool closes at 11pm, midnight or 1am would be nice for night owls. This resort lies next to Blue Green Resort, which is next to Lake Eve Resort and across from Sheraton Vistana Villages. Hilton Grand Vacations Club and the Marriott Grand Vista are 1/4 -1/2 mile away in opposite directions. Floridays sits in a condominium stretch on International Drive. With a total of 5 suite bookings, overall everyone enjoyed their stay. Visitors staying elsewhere also complimented the accommodations. We've experienced paying more and getting much less outside the state. Our families are pleased with our stay at Floridays Resort!

Reviews.Title: “Great value and the service was great! Perfect for families and extended stays!”
Reviews.Author: HoustonFam1
Reviews.Content: The resort really lived to our expectations, everything was clean and the employees were very helpful. I travel a lot so I am very demanding of my accommodations and I have to say that I was very happy! This is perfect for families looking for space as all of the rooms are at least two bedrooms with two full bathrooms. The kitchens also have everything you need to prepare meals in your hotel and save some money (dishes, pot, pans, silver wear..etc). The super market is within 5 minutes (walking distance) and the premier outlet mall is only 10 minutes away (walking). We did not rent a car so we used a cab everyday and it is about $18 from downtown Disney and cabs are onsite. Overall great stay! The pool area is great for all ages! See you next time!

Reviews.Title: “Great Reasonable Resort”
Reviews.Author: phinz
Reviews.Content: We rented a two bedroom condo off VRBO and were very pleased. The resort is beautiful and very clean. We rented a car, but the resort is in a very good location, you could actually walk to a Publix and small shopping center with WalGreens, Subway, McDonalds, and Outback. It is very close to the Outlet Mall. We did not use their Disney transportation, so cannot comment on that. Our room had daily housekeeping and we always had plenty of clean towels. They even had floating toys available at the pool to use at no cost. The pool was rather crowded on a few days and one afternoon we could not find any lounge chairs, but we ended up going to the smaller pool and found seats. We had requested a room on a high floor, and got a room on the 6th floor with a beautiful view of a lake. The employees were very helpful--they even ran our boarding passes for the airline. They always greeted you with a smile. Our experience with the snack bar was not good, everything we ordered they did not have--they finally said they were out of cheese. Just a small inconvenience. Cannot wait to go back to Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Property, Awesome Staff”
Reviews.Author: Rockshire
Reviews.Content: We rented a three bedroom, two bath unit which was nicely appointed and complete with washer and dryer. The kitchen was sufficently equipped for preparing and serving your own meals. The grounds were beautifully landscaped and well-maintained. The guest registration lobby was ornately decorated and welcoming. A maintenance staff member greeted us as we made our way to our unit. When he realized which suite we were headed to, he informed us that it was not ready and called someone to inform them. A supervisor met us and escorted us to another unit and had an employee bring us the key cards. It was handled very swiftly. One evening, the front desk called us when they were informed that we left the car door open. We appreciated the assistance and friendliness of all the staff members throughout our stay. The property is conveniently located to all the major attractions, including, Disney, SeaWorld, Discovery Cove, Wonder Works, etc. Also, Publix Supermarket and CVS are nearby. Next time, we will stay an extra day just to spend time at the resort.

Reviews.Title: “We loved the hotel”
Reviews.Author: Pamiller
Reviews.Content: this was my families first time staying at the Floridays Resorts, we really liked the Resort, pool area was clean and nice, rooms were very nice and clean. we like the fact we were just minutes away from the Disney Parks.

Reviews.Title: “Just Beautiful....”
Reviews.Author: kpgp1228
Reviews.Content: I must say I really enjoyed my stay... I was kind of skeptical from reading past reviews but I'm a person that tries to "read the book without judging the cover"... I booked the room sometime back in April and the price couldn't be beat.. especially for a resort!! The staff was friendly and VERY accommodating.. Whatever we called to the front desk for.. it was delivered very promptly!! With a resort of its size.. it was a plus to have the complimentary shuttle service.. We had a 3 bedroom Condo- nicely decorated.. very spacious.. Furnished Well.. A little dusty around the lamps but OVERALL.. Very nice.. The pools were another great addition as well.. One huge pool with many activities and people and the other smaller, peaceful, and relaxing-MY PREFERENCE.. The location was just right.. Be aware of the "slide under the door food service"... BAD IDEA!! The resort food was pretty good .. prices were steep.. But overall a very enjoyable stay:) My dogs even loved it....

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful”
Reviews.Author: fairytaleangels
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Floridays from 6th - 20th July. Loved everything about it, ROOMS; were amazing, especially with 2 teenagers, most of the time it felt like they weren't with us due to the vast space of the 2 bedroom suite. loved the washer dryer, we used to dry clothes when we came back from the pool, got caught in the rain and I washed clothes before we came home, so if you do not want to come home to lots of washing it is ideal. Kitchen had a large microwave oven, coffee maker, dishwasher, blender, electric can opener, lots of luxuries, soap powder and dishwasher powder was replaced when used, there was also a hoover, iron and ironing board and 2 hairdryers. DVD player and 3 televisions. Wifi was great as we had 2 laptops with us. Jacuzzi bath was a wonderful luxury to have. Rooms consisted of very comfortable King size bed and 2 double beds in the 2nd room. We did not use the varanda as we had a ground floor room, never saw any bugs at all. This is a first for us on International Drive. GROUNDS; were beautiful with lots of palm trees, lakes and fountains, I did request a pool view through my travel company, but got a lake view instead, but everything else made up for that. POOLS; We only used the main pool which had smaller childrens pool and jacuzzi and we always got a sunbed, Saturday, Sunday there was a dj playing music and games with the children. No need to take towels as there is an unlimited supply for guest use. SNACKS; we ate once at the hotel, our order was wrong but it was still very good. Cocktails were lovely. LOCATION; was great we did not have a car and used the Disney and Universal buses, also the iride which both the green and red bus stops at every 10 minutes. We also walked to Walgreen's chemist which sold bread, milk, wine and gifts. Publix supermarket had everything and subway was within walking distance. We also walked to the outlets which was fine even in the heat. STAFF; were all lovely, especially reception, concierge, bar staff and the lovely doorman Ray. Never had to wait for more than a minute to be seen. We stopped at the Nickelodian on the way back from Universal and I could not believe the que at reception. I am glad I had not booked there as I had considered it. NEGATIVES; the lighting in our room was not great, probably due to the large fans in the middle of the rooms or maybe it was because we had a ground floor room. My children said the only thing they would change was having a flume/slide at the pool. OVERALL; I do not think I could go to any other hotel in Orlando again.

Reviews.Title: “"Fabulous resort with spacious accomodations"!”
Reviews.Author: rxpbad
Reviews.Content: If you have a large family, you should stay at the Floriday Resort. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and it is like being at a home away from home. Also, very clean and the staff at pool bar and at check-in are exceptional. Your kids will love the pool, and the location with close proximity to Universal and Seaworld attractions is fantastic. You are also two minutes away from Walgreen, a Publix (shop there) and the Premium Outlet Mall (be sure to save time to shop there). Loved this resort and highly recommend it to families with children.

Reviews.Title: “We were very pleased and will definitely recommend!”
Reviews.Author: Irishstraw
Reviews.Content: Service was excellent! Accommodations lived up to our expectations! Friendly staff! Great location! Close to all parks, shopping and outlets!

Reviews.Title: “Happy Holiday”
Reviews.Author: LizWark
Reviews.Content: Our stay at Floridays was the 1st to 15th July. Our party of four found the resort to be friendly, clean and well run .Suites are a good size and well fitted out. Resort runs a free shuttle bus to most of the parks ,also the stop for the I trollie is just in front of resorts so easy to get about if you dont have a car. Both pools are well maintained Supermarket and small range of shops within walking distance. If you want a resort thats on International Drive but far enough away from the Blackpool vibe then this resort is for you.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely worth it!”
Reviews.Author: Cbento5
Reviews.Content: The rooms are extremely clean, smells like they clean w/ bleached which I love! Nice staff, clean rooms A+++. Definitely would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: jadine98
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at Floridays from July 2 to the 8th. Great place and will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Top value for your money”
Reviews.Author: cunindk
Reviews.Content: You get a lot for your money here. The price is about that of a regular double bed hotel room, but you get much more than that in this apartment/condo resort. The apartments are large upscale condos with twin bedrooms, twin bathroom, full kitchen, washer, dryer, a living room and a balcony. You can without trouble be a family or two couples in an apartment, and if that is not enough there is three bed room condos. The site itself is also well kept, service is friendly and cleaning is ok and daily. There is a decent pool area with a bar and a small fast food cafee. The location is excellent. Within 2-3 minutes of driving there is an Outlet Mall, a large and very nice Publix supermarket and a number of drugstores, resturants and gas stations. It takes about 5 minutes to Seaworld and 10 minutes to Disney. Universal studios is also very close by. Going to Downtown Disney at night is a breeze. I noticed a bit confusion about internet/wifi in some reviews. It is available and it is free (the resort fee you have to pay in any case covers it). So no issues there. Great place, huge value for your money, I'll be back once I get around to Florida again.

Reviews.Title: “Standards have dropped”
Reviews.Author: Julesnco
Reviews.Content: we Loved Floridays so much in 2010 we thought we had found the ideal place for our summer holidays for years to come, However this being our second trip left us a little disappointed. We requested many months before for the same block we were in the previous year or something of a similar outlook. we were told to call in advance which we did but they said it wasnt possible to pre book a room and to ask on arrival. When we arrived we were given a different block further away from where we wanted to be and it overlooked electricity cables and wasteland. we were told to check back after the weekend and they would change our room. When we asked again we were told we would have to check out of our current room before 11am and check back in at 5pm, as a family of 7 I didnt think that was appropriate. eventually when they could see I wasnt happy they managed to find me a room in a better position. 2 days later I realised we may have a nicer view but the ant problem in the master bedroom didnt seem to get addressed. what may have addressed the problem would be a deep clean on all room between guests. we found baby bottles and cups. plastic bags, toys, empty drink containers and cups without even trying to find them. the carpets need a good clean from edge to edge not just where the eyes meet. The cafe didnt always have the food advertised. I got charged 3 different prices for the same drink.The computers are 1 dollar for 5 minutes but are slow and freeze at times but still charge you. On a nicer note the Porters/bellboys go above and beyond to make sure you have a comfortable relaxing stay. concierge always happy to help. The pool area was lovely and the location ideal for All the parks.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: tonymm
Reviews.Content: Great place, great people, great service, great pool, great bar, great place for children and adults, centraly located, great staff and best of all, great price! You will love your stay with this resort. In a word, it was Fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is a great family resort!”
Reviews.Author: Jadyson
Reviews.Content: We vacationed at Floridays July 2th and 9th and our stay was truly awesome. Everything to the large two bedroom suites, the two pools and great staff made our stay enjoyable. The location is perfect and close to both Disney and Universal Studios parks. I would definitely recommend Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed here 30 times and would come back 30 more”
Reviews.Author: CataldoRiley
Reviews.Content: LOVE this hotel. It is convenient to All the theme parks with Sea World being the closest and Disney next. The staff if friendly. The rooms are always clean. Check in easy. The pool is heated with a cute kids area. The pool has a bar and the bartenders will call you by name. The Rooms are huge with at least 2 bedrooms and 2 baths. The master is a suite that you do not want to leave. All have balconies. IF you choose to bring your pet they are welcome too. The full kitchen is rarely used by us, but a very nice touch. A Dining room table. A living room with a pull out couch. A tv in every bedroom and the living room. A desk with FREE internet. Even a washer/dryer to go home with clean clothes. The grocery store (Publix) is within a mile if you want to stock the frig. with your own food/drink. Again I cannot say enough about this resort. I have NO negative experiences except for a few nasty Jersey girls one Thanksgiving. Every State has some nasty people. I just said Happy Thanksgiving and that I would pray for them. I hope that your stay is as wonderful as ALL of mine.

Reviews.Title: “Loved this resort!”
Reviews.Author: Ellis68
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in Orlando many times and usually in a villa. We thought we'd have a change this time and stayed at Floridays to be nearer to the parks - what a great decision. The apartment itself was great with all the amenities you need on vacation but the best thing for us was the pool area and facilities on site. My 7 year old was actually eager to get back from the parks so she could go to the pool each day and, although there isn't a restaurant on site, the small cafe which offers takeaway food at a very reasonable price is great. We'll definitely stay here on our next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for families with children. We loved it.”
Reviews.Author: Mjaanes
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly spacious rooms with everything needed (kitchen, washing machine, etc). Clean. Friendly staff. No noise. Clean pool open late. Starbucks on site. Internet available (both wireless and cabled). Geographically positioned mid-way between Disney's and Universal's parks. All in all, we had a very nice stay and highly recommend this place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “VERY NICE PLACE TO STAY”
Reviews.Author: jfchapman
Reviews.Content: Floridays is a very nice well kept place to stay with your family. I wished we would have stayed longer instead of wasting our money on gulf coast. Rooms where very large and clean with good service. We will be back as soon as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Experience”
Reviews.Author: Melissa12321
Reviews.Content: The rooms, pool, and extras were all awesome. Clean, comfortable, and more than I could have asked for. We put the full kitchen and whirlpool bathtub to use even though we spent most of our time at the theme parks. We also got to spend some time at the pool, which was great for adults and kids. We had a great experience overall.

Reviews.Title: “We loved our stay at the Floridays”
Reviews.Author: Busytb
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the resort from July 2 - 11. We had an awesome stay at the resort. I had requested a room in building B overlooking the pool and that's exactly what we got. We found all of the staff VERY friendly at the hotel. We got a great rate on our room, we got a 2 bedroom suite for $127.57 a night before taxes, so we were ok with paying the $11.00 a day resort fee. We loved the 2 bedroom suite, it was nice that our girls had their own room and it was also nice having the kitchen, we never cooked a meal for lunch or supper in the room but did make breakfast in there before we went off to go to the parks, etc. Our beds were made every day, our garbages taken out and the towels replaced. They even replenished all of the shampoos, etc in the bathrooms. I loved that there was a Starbucks on premises and we also liked the food that we ate at the palms cafe. We had one of their croissant breakfast sandwiches a few times and we also ate there for lunch one day - I had the chinese chicken salad which was really good. My girls (ages 13 and 10) loved the pool area, they went swimming there almost every day. The only thing they wished the pool area had was a waterslide. On the day before we left there was a lady at the pool area that played games with the kids for a few hours (hula hoop competition, water balloon toss) and they could win prizes. I thought that was really cool. It was also a short driving distance to all of the parks at Disneyworld and Seaworld. I think it took us around 15 minutes to drive to the disney parks and only about 5 minutes to Seaworld. We shopped at the Publix grocery store a few times around the corner from the resort and we loved the outdoor Premium Outlet Mall which was only a couple of minutes away from the resort. You could walk to the mall but we always just drove cause it was so hot when we were there. We also at at the Benihana restaurant at the entrance to the resort and we loved the food there! If you need a rental car I would recommend going through Thrifty. If you click on their link on the Floridays website you can get a great deal on a rental car. We paid $412.00 for a rental car for 10 days for a 4 door Ford Fusion. We could fit 4 large suitcases and 2 carry-ons in the trunk. I would recommend signing up to be a Blue Chip member. When we got to the airport we went to a different line up and we had our car within a few minutes and there was a huge line up of people at the booths who were not blue chip members. Overall, we had an awesome experience at the Floridays and would highly recommend it to anyone!!! We will definitely stay there again in the future!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice visit”
Reviews.Author: marydonato
Reviews.Content: Room was clean and modern. Loved having 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Flat screen TV and free wireless. Everything was nice and neat.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for families with young kids”
Reviews.Author: SeasonedTraveler2003
Reviews.Content: The keys to success were convenience to Disney, an in room washer & dryer, and bang for the buck. The zero foot walk in pool was fantastic. It had a huge area that was 3 1/2 feet deep or less. Lots of kids to play with at the pool and you can bring in inflatable toys. There was an Outback Restaurant, Publix supermarket, and Premium Outlet stores all close by. We loved it. We went to the parks that did not have magic hours on a particular day and it worked out very well.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect--exactly as advertised. We were thrilled!”
Reviews.Author: jdubspence
Reviews.Content: We are still at the Floridays as I write this review, using their included wi-fi. It is excellent! Just as it was advertised. We arrived in the evening and there was no wait. The front desk service was fantastic--very friendly. Our room was marvelous and clean. The maid service was efficient. A/C was perfect. Nice television. Two bathrooms. We had everything we needed. We stayed in the two-bedroom suite (my husband, I and our two children--5 and 8). We are in our thirties. We even had an adult niece come and visit and there was plenty of space for her to stay overnight. The bathroom was gorgeous--even has a spa tub. You have to clean it yourself, because though it is immaculate when you arrive, they won't clean it again until you leave. Fine with me. When we arrived, there were dishes, utensils, pots and pans, a toaster, everything we needed to cook. The shuttle to Disney was very convenient and always on time (coming and going). Do reserve it in advance, otherwise there might not be enough room for everyone. The pool was great--clean and fun. Friends came to visit and loved the grounds and pool. I cannot stop commenting to my husband how much I love the Floridays. The grocery store (Publix) is about five minutes walking distance, and is very convenient with reasonable prices. They even had great prices on Disney paraphanelia. I really feel blessed that we found the Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Great - Will definitely stay again!”
Reviews.Author: SophieNicole
Reviews.Content: I am very picky about where we stay and always read reviews and see pictures on Tripadvisor. This resort was No. 1 in Orlando and it did not disappoint. We reserved a 2 bedroom suite and even got upgraded to a 3 bedroom which was very nice. The condo was clean and very comfortable. They pool area was great especially if you have kids. The atmosphere around the pool was fun and truly made me feel like I was on vacation. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a great value for a great place.

Reviews.Title: “The Suites were large and well furnished”
Reviews.Author: dtramey1213
Reviews.Content: The Resort overall was well maintained and clean, but our personal Suite was lacking. We were not pleased with the services provided by the housekeeping staff. There is no free internet service available, even in the business center, you have to pay by the minute.

Reviews.Title: “superb!”
Reviews.Author: andyk1966
Reviews.Content: right next to premium outlets,supermarket and eateries.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and very clean!”
Reviews.Author: janine9499
Reviews.Content: We had a great 4 night stay at Floridays. Our priorities for choice of hotel was based on location, price, and cleanliness. This place fit the bill! Will definitely stay again. Had many luxuries for a bargain price. The whole family loved it.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient Apartment to explore Orlando parks”
Reviews.Author: lecitadin
Reviews.Content: We were there for a week... While going to Disney and Universal. Everything was great...location, rooms, tv, pool, everything exept the items to prepare a meal... No knives, pizza pan... The items that were supposed to be in the kitchen according to the list placed in one of the closet were not all there. So, I called front desk and I asked them to make sure... They said they did, but no, important items were still missing.... If you intend to cook, might want to make sure you have all you need before you start! Other than that,everything was great!

Reviews.Title: “Great base for a family staying in Orlano”
Reviews.Author: AndyT007
Reviews.Content: Loved the hotel, we had a two bedroom apartment with great kitchen, dinning and lounge area. The staff were very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place, Just like home”
Reviews.Author: MTMx2
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 3 nights, wish we were there longer. Beautiful, clean, modern, friendly employees, relaxing, And a great value in my opinion. Our place was huge, 3 bedrooms, 2 bath, balcony, full kitchen. laundry closet with washer and dryer, close to food and liquor store. We loved it. From there we drove to Ft. Lauderdale for a graduation....... back to reality..... a regular hotel room, almost a shock for us if we weren't beach front, that helped alot. You'll love Floriday's

Reviews.Title: “This was a perfect vacation”
Reviews.Author: rodi57
Reviews.Content: I found this resort on line, and the web site showed a beautiful setting, huge pool, and large suites. I had my fingers crossed since previous web sites promised things that they did not deliver. This web site was accurate.. We had a two room suite and it adequately housed two adult children, two grand children, and us. All of the theme parks were nearby and easy to get to. We were not near the large pool, but the resort had shuttles that would pick you up at the door and return you when you were finished swimming. There was a smaller pool nearby that we used as well. When our coffee pot stopped working, a new pot was delivered within the hour. All of the staff seemed genuinely interested in our having a great stay. I will be back again.

Reviews.Title: “I always love being at the Floridayseverything is so central located by Floridays and you will truly be happy when you s”
Reviews.Author: hawkins53
Reviews.Content: There is something for every one at Floridays; there are several large grocery stores, a mall with wonderful designer outlet stores, activities and wonderful cheap food buffets that is excellent for your money in the area. I feel you can’t go wrong staying at Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding value, luxury condo, space and all the amenities!”
Reviews.Author: Melisabeth1
Reviews.Content: I agree with all the other positive reviews, it is a fabulous place and as a plus, an amazing value. This is not a five star hotel, but only in the sense that you don't get that level of service. Its more like an upscale timeshare-type condo experience. We live in a large home and enjoy our space, so we didn't want to squish our family of four into a Disney shoebox. Plus, we were doing a lot of non Disney stuff over 8 days. If that's your plan, this is a great place! Pool is big, clean and fun, food and drinks at the poolside bar/grill reasonable and good quality!

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay at Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: bruiserjohnson
Reviews.Content: This resort is great. It was our 3rd time staying here. The pool was not too cold and not very crowded. Fabulous hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay at Floridays Resort”
Reviews.Author: Joey O
Reviews.Content: This is our third time staying at Floriday's Resort in Orlando, Fl. in just under a year. It was another fantastic stay. The suite was very clean and had a view of the small pond with ducks. Our kids loved it also and our youngest loved the pool. We went to Seaworld, Busch Gardens and Universal Citywalk to eat at Bubba Gumps Shrimp Factory. Seaworld is only 5 minutes away and Busch Gardens 1 hour away. We had a great time at both. I highly recommend Floriday's to anyone visiting Orlando area. Disney is only 10 to 15 minutes away and great dining areas all around. The staff was great. Chris checked us in and made a call a little later to us to make sure everything was to our satisfaction. We will be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice for Orlando sites”
Reviews.Author: andyman1970
Reviews.Content: Excellent accommodations for a family of 4 - has everything you need, clean and spacious.

Reviews.Title: “This place is awesome, and then some!”
Reviews.Author: EarsSayCheers
Reviews.Content: This was our 4th stay at Floridays Orlando Resort, and from the second we arrived, it was abundantly clear why we come back. The customer service and attention to detail is fantastic, even before we arrived, with several e-mails being replied to promptly, and courteously. ( Thank you so much Alejandra Martinez! ). There aren't many places that make an arrival so exciting, and give you that "Hey, we're Home" feeling, but Floridays manages to do just that. Our most recent visit 14/06 thru 01/07/2011 was no exception. From the moment we arrived, after such a long day of travelling, everything just seems to fall into place. Check-in was an absolute breeze, with the ever-friendly, courteous staff, immediately making us feel welcome, and at home. A package that we'd had shipped from wal-mart.com was there ready and waiting for us. We had requested a ground-floor Suite, which we knew wasn't guaranteed, but we were allocated a Suite in Block C on the ground floor, overlooking the Lake, between Blocks B and C, which was in a lovely position. Having stayed here 3 times before, we were fully up to speed with the Suite layout, and amenities. The Suite was impeccably clean on entering. Having a full Kitchen with washing facilities is something that we've grown used to over the years, and we simply wouldn't revert back to standard Hotel Rooms again. House keeping was daily, with a full clean every wednesday. The Housekeeping staff were very friendly, and seemed only too happy to replenish cleaning products, trash bags, or anything else that you asked for. We even arrived back after days out, to find that our dishes had been placed into the Dishwasher, and cleaned- a nice touch. There are 2 pools at the resort, the main sits right between blocks A and B, but is only a short distance from Blocks C and D. The smaller pool is around the back of Block D. We only used the main Pool, which has a zero entry at one end, and an assortment of water features, which are sure to keep any children, and adults for that matter, suitably amused. The wifi extension from the main Pool to the whole resort is a nice touch, and worked very well with my smartphone. There is an ethernet port situated near to the Air conditioner control unit, for those bringing laptops. Be wary of the Pizza flyers that will be posted under your door. This is actually mentioned in the welcome guide, which will be on the Coffee Table in the Lounge. They are all of the same type, with red and green print. They are most certainly a scam, as not one of them carries an address ( probably a someone's Garage). This is not a fault of Floridays, although, a security gate by the entrance would certainly help to illiminate this. Well, a fourth stay, and this place is as awesome as ever. We'll certainly be back.

Reviews.Title: “Loved our stay, but a couple of improvements needed”
Reviews.Author: SBKNH
Reviews.Content: My family and I just returned from our week long stay at the Floridays resort. We loved it! The front desk staff was very friendly, and graciously accomodated my request for building F as it is in the back of the resort and much quieter. The room was very spacious and clean. We all enjoyed both pools, both the main pool and the smaller one by our building. They were both clean and had plenty of chairs for everyone. We cooked all of our meals in our room, and the kitchen was very well equiped with everything we needed. We requested an extra packet of dish detergent from housekeeping since we already used the two we were given, and they brought it up immediately. We requested Building F as it is in the back of the resort. It is quiet and the view from our balcony was the lake and pool. However, it is a 2-3 minute walk to the main pool. If you want to be closer to the main pool, request Buildings A, B, or C. However, it is much busier and noiser there though. The resort is at an excellent location, we shopped for groceries at the Publix next store to the resort, and it is a very short drive to both Seaworld and Disney. My one issue is the lack of security at the resort. We had flyers under our door daily from pizza delivery places, which the hotel stated they would not recommend patronizing. Anyone could come in and walk around the hallways and use the pool, as evidenced by the pizza flyers. I wish there were a little better security, however, we were never concerned or anything, it just would be nice. To that same end, the room closest to the hallway was the one with the two smaller beds where my 4 year old son stayed. For safety reasons, I think the master bedroom should be closer to the door. I kept the deadbolt and security chain on at all time when we were in the room. I booked my trip through Expedia, and the resort fee was clearly documented on their website and was not a surprise. The cleaning service, which was changing towels, making the beds and emptying the trash, was also clearly disclosed on the hotel's website. As mentioned earlier, we cooked all of our meals in our room, so I can't comment on the resort's food quality or food service. We really enjoyed our stay and will stay here again in a few years when we come back.

Reviews.Title: “great way finish a great trip"”
Reviews.Author: moutainbum
Reviews.Content: I traveled with my wife and 2 boys through the southern islands and Orlando was our last stop. The Floridays was perfect! I was a great price and we loved the privacy the large floorplan offered us. the pools were beautiful and just a great trip

Reviews.Title: “Already booked to return”
Reviews.Author: Floridashirl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed for 14 nights in May. We originally asked for a room overlooking the main pool but on arrival we decided we'd prefer a room away from the noise which is always generated by people by the pool. We were moved without question to a room overlooking the wooded area with Disney in the distance, we only realized this when the fireworks started in the evening and we could watch them from our balcony. We found the room to be very comfortable with a large en-suite bathroom to the master bedroom, the second bedroom was of an ample size, as was the second bathroom. The beds were comfortable, the bedding and towels were clean and fresh. Housekeeping came in everyday to do a 'refresh', beds were made, towels replenished and trash taken out, it was enough for us, we kept everything else clean ourselves, they did a full clean on our 7th day. The kitchen is well fitted out with all the utensils you are likely to need if you are doing any cooking. They give you a starter pack of Coffee, Soap Powder and Dishwasher soap. We didn't need to put the dishwasher on everyday and really didn't want to buy a pack of dishwasher soap from the market so we asked housekeeping for another starter pack and they left it for us. Its very handy having the washing machine and dryer in your own suite rather than having to trail down long corridors looking for the laundry and then wondering if your things are going to get pinched. There is a safe in the suite for you to put your valuables, its large enough to get a laptop in, you might have to wiggle it a bit tho. We did go down to the main pool a couple of times but I must admit we preferred the smaller quieter pool, having no kids with us, we prefer not to have to listen to everyone elses. Bar service was a little slow but that was because there was only ever one person serving and he really was doing his best to cope. We had a pizza from the bar and it was very nice. We had a hire car so can't comment on the transport to the parks. The hotel is close to all the important parks and major shopping areas and there are plenty of restaurants within a few minutes drive. The staff were very helpful, from check-in to check-out. We did have a slight problem when we first arrived, the light in the shower wouldn't work so we rang the front desk and maintenance arrived with-in minutes and sorted it. Would we recommend this hotel to anyone??? If I say we have already booked to return, I think that will answer your question.

Reviews.Title: “Best place in Orlando to stay”
Reviews.Author: Luvbubba
Reviews.Content: We have been in Orlando about 20 times over the past 10 years. We have stayed at several of the nicer Disney Hotels for serious money, but nothing compares to Floridays Resort. We drove to the parks even though hotel offers a shuttle; driving was a breeze for hotel close to all parks. Rooms were nicely decorated, full kitchen, washer and dryer, balcony, quiet relaxing rooms. We had 4 adults and no children but hotel would be awesome for kids as well. Best place for the money!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best in Orlando? Really?”
Reviews.Author: jhethcox
Reviews.Content: First, the Floridays Resort is a very nice property. The staff was friendly and the rooms were clean. However, is this really the BEST property in all of Orlando? Isn't there a Ritz Carlton or some other high end hotel that would top the Floridays? Well, in any event, here are some nice things to say. The rooms were nicely decorated and clean. The kitchen and dining area was nice, but the dining table was too big for the space. Also, the second bedroom was tight on space. The pool area was a highlight with a nice area for the little kids. We didn't eat on property, so I can't speak to that. The value was excellent when considering we got a two bedroom with a kitchen for a very reasonable rate.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: lmontiel6
Reviews.Content: Very friendly staff. Our room was clean and comfortable. The location was great close to all major theme parks and tickets were available for most which saved time waiting in lines. Close to grocery store, outlet mall and discount stores. The only thing lacking was a full service resturant. The Marketplace there is mostly for drinks and snacks and is very expensive. The full kitchen was helpful even if we didnt prepare any meals there. The kids were able to have cereal, juice and fresh fruit. I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Brenda77_11
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Floridays Resort from June 18th to 24th and had an excellent experience. We had to wait a little longer for our room, but that was because when I checked in early (1:00) I requested a higher floor in a particular building (B) and they did say it may not be ready by the 4:00 check in time. I think we got in by 5:00 so that was certainly not a big deal since we spent our time at the pool. The room was clean and comfortable. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with 2 adults and 3 teenagers and had plenty of room. We are not picky so not having our sheets changed daily was no big deal to us. We got clean towels and garbage service and that is all we needed. The grounds were very well kept and the pools were clean and comfortable. They had some inflatable toys for everyone to use, so we had some fun playing monkey in the middle in the pool. We found there to be plenty of chairs and even got tables when we wanted. The service at the grill and bar was great and the food was great as well. I didn't feel the prices were out of the ordinary for the tropical drinks and food. The front desk people were friendly and helpful and even printed my boarding passes for us. We will definitely be staying here again when we vacation in the area. Well worth the money and such a nice place!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic for families and we would recommend it to anyone with kids”
Reviews.Author: MatthewG22
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our experience - my son, who is almost 2, loved the pool! The fountains, the ease of the walk-in pool and shallow water are outstanding. We would definitely stay there again. Recommend for anyone with young kids.

Reviews.Title: “keep looking”
Reviews.Author: Jeff60468
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in part of it's #1 rating. My advice is to keep looking. Orange Lake Resort is a much better choice. We will not return. Beware of the $12 per day hidden "resort fee" upon check out. Pool area small, but nice. Rooms and furnishings nice, but could use a good cleaning. Found a stuffed Christmas toy under our bed....in June! Parking lot narrow, dark and limited parking available. Non-gated security. For the price, my advice would be to consider other places to stay for your vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Resort”
Reviews.Author: CarelvanderMerwe
Reviews.Content: The resort is very well maintained and the rooms are both spacious and very tastefully decorated. We expected something nice, but got so much more! I will recomend this resort to all my friends. Just a wonderful resort.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel!”
Reviews.Author: jessica1234567890
Reviews.Content: Room was great-perfect space for my family. Bathrooms were GREAT size! A couple negatives: pool didn't have activities for children, only some water fountain type things. For the light clean daily we didn't get refills on dishwasher detergent, paper towels, and toilet paper-we had to write a note to housekeeping to have it refilled. We hung out at the bar Saturday night and watched Rick Allen play--AWESOME!! Bar tender Abby was also AWESOME!! Overall a great place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Excellant Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Rocheste1234
Reviews.Content: This Condo Hotel is the BEST place we've ever stayed! The room was spotless upon arrival. The housekeeping was refesh only (make beds, replace towels and take out trash). So you have to clean up after yourself! We stayed in Bldg B which is right next to the pool which we loved. If there is a down side it would be the transportation to parks. They have limited buses in the morining and evening. you need to tell them when you leave what time your coming back which is very hard to do. We ended up driving ourselves to the parks. Overall the Hotel is GREAT!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays Resort - Beautiful!”
Reviews.Author: VBMOM3215
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed a wonderful ten day stay at Floridays Resort. The rooms were impeccable! Service was outstanding and everyone at Floridays was very accommodating. A special thank you to the staff for helping us with our scavenger hunt for our volleyball team and to Gabriel for allowing the girls to "paint his nails" as part of the scavenger hunt. Everything from the room...to room service...to the pool was awesome. My only complaint about Floridays is that they do not have "pet free rooms." Floridays is indeed a pet friendly resort, however, I do feel that they should off "pet free room" for guests who have severe allergies and/or have asthma. We were given a room that had a very doggy odor, but they were very accommodating and moved us to a room that had just had a "deep cleaning." The room was indeed very clean and was odor free. I would hope they would consider in the future to indeed have rooms that are "pet free." Otherwise, we loved Floridays!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic family and group resort.”
Reviews.Author: pjhinojos
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a week at Floridays. We were in Orlando for a national volleyball tournament and two of our club teams stayed there. We had families with kids from about 3d grade through high school age. Everyone was very happy with the resort. I especially liked the amount of space in the rooms. The pool was nice and although there isn't a full restaurant, it was nice to see how many things were available through the cafe and pool bar. The resort is convenient to the convention center, the resorts, and an awesome high end outlet mall. I checked other reviews from Trip Advisor and I agree with the reasons why the resort is rated so high.

Reviews.Title: “We would definitely stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: moore007
Reviews.Content: Check-in very easy Staff very nice and pleasant.This was very pleasureable after 600 mile road trip.Room was nice.Stayed in Two bedroom.Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great stay, definitely will come back!”
Reviews.Author: Yvette84
Reviews.Content: The room was clean, ready, spacious and everything worked. The resort was so conviently located to Orlandos attractions. The staff was very friendlly and accomodating.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back.”
Reviews.Author: Hermesbf_01
Reviews.Content: Very good hotel and best located, near SeaWorld, on the way to Disney, close to outlets and supermarket. Could be better in room cleanliness, but it is fine anyway. Spacious 2 bedroom, large bathroom, three sets of tvs, good kitchen.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful resort where families can feel at home!”
Reviews.Author: KBisme
Reviews.Content: This resort was great! While my husband and I were there on our anniversary vacation and therefore without kids, we definitely plan to come back and we plan to stay with Floridays again. It was a nice resort; very clean and we liked the location since it was close enough to everything but not in a very busy area. Also, Walgreens and Publix were in walking distance. So is Benihanas! I would definitely recommend Floridays as a place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Great staff and big, comfortable room.”
Reviews.Author: capone70
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with our stay. The staff was very responsive, and helped out when we ran into some problems. The shuttle to the parks was instumental to having a good time. I only recommened to them they upgrade the showerheads in the room. They have blasting water pressure, but the showerheads are cheap and restict much of the flow. Would not hestitate to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “RESORT IS SWEET”
Reviews.Author: hwroy
Reviews.Content: the rooms are big,stayed in a 2 bedroom and it was sweet,bld F was all the way in the back so it was quite but alittle walk to the main pool.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay with family”
Reviews.Author: Mtownmac
Reviews.Content: Floridays Resort was great. Nice and spacious. Friendly staff. Would highly recommend. Close to restaurants and shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Here is the Truth about Floridays”
Reviews.Author: Cheers2u85
Reviews.Content: I researched online for about 4 months before our trip to Orlando. With the intention of going to Disney (Long lines that make you wonder, "Did I just spend thousands of dollars to stand in this line for 50 min to go on a ride that lasts 2 min?" Overall yes. My kids loved it, I endured it) Floridays looks great on line. I changed my mind 2 times before I committed to Floridays. I looked at the pictures carefully and thoughtfully considered that when those pictures were taken the place was brand new. What I wanted was a clean condo, to feel like I got a great deal for the price I paid, no bugs, and a bright airy space. Disney is already so expensive and I had stayed at the Disney Sports Resort about 6 yrs ago and Floridays beats that place badly. I got exactly what I wanted, The lowest price anywhere for the 3 bedroom condo. I booked early and used Triple A. Overall it is so worth the deal, you feel like you can afford Disney and not break the bank!

Reviews.Title: “Back Again by Popular Demand!”
Reviews.Author: KazandtheGang
Reviews.Content: We have just got back from a 2 week stay at Floridays, this has been about the 6th time we have stayed here and it was as good as ever. The location is great, slightly away from the hustle and bustle of I Drive which we prefer, but close to sea world with easy access to the I-4 (for Universal) and the entrance to Disney World is close by. Locally there is the famous Premium Outlets for all your designer bargains less than a mile away, which could mean many trips for the ladies. These reasons aside the actual accommodation is where Floridays beats the rest, the 2 or 3 bedroom apartments are perfectly designed with all your needs catered for with the handy washing/drying facilities in every room you can pack lighter than normal. With a full kitchen and dishwasher you can save on eating out every breakfast, lunch and dinner, by stocking up with all your favourite groceries from the local supermarket. It saves a fortune with kids needing a non stop supply of drinks and snacks etc. The wifi is free of charge in the room, bar and at the pool so you can access the internet easily at all times when your in the hotel. (as a previous review says otherwise I can assure you it is free unless you are using the business centre) The pool is great with a small kiddie area with water fountains and a sand play area which certainly kept our little ones busy. we are always so sad to leave Floridays as it feels like home once you have moved in filled up the fridge, and hung up your clothes you'll never want to come back. We have tried many different hotels in florida but this one just ticks all the boxes so its the firm family favourite, be sure to ask for your universal discount card on check in it will get you 15% off restaurants in city walk food and beverages we used it often it also works in sea world and on merchandise.I know just about everything you need to know on the location, hotel and surrounding facilities so welcome any questions as am happy to help everyone get the best out of their holiday at Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place to stay for a family”
Reviews.Author: travelingDany
Reviews.Content: The resort is very well situated and close to all attractions. The condo is beautiful, clean and spacious. Free parking and internet and Hotel staff is very friendly. Perfect for a family vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Didn't live up to expectations”
Reviews.Author: KMAST5
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 5 nights at the end of a 3 week trip to america. I found the satff at reception very indifferent & very busineess like in comparison to other hotels we had stayed at. The resort is huge & impersonal. Our block was a long way from the reception & we only used the smaller pool near our block. The apartment was huge & very well equipped .Basic room cleaning every day, but just trash removal & bathroom servicing - you could pay xtra for cleaning, but I reckon few people do & the rooms reflect this, as the look as if they need a good going over. Also,our apartment was on the 1st floor & the balcony had a concrete wall which restricted the light coming in. Car absolutely necessary & sat nav advisable for getting to attractions. Two good restaurants nearby, Benihanas at the entrance & The Outback Steakhouse around the corner near the Publix Shopping Centre.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient and Spacious”
Reviews.Author: PTO-Guy
Reviews.Content: I selected Floridays based on the reviews here on Tripadvisor, and my family was not disappointed. I did read about the gripes about spotty service and worn furniture, and some of that is absolutely true. However, the benefits of the resort greatly outweigh the negatives. My wife, our two kids, 10 and 8, and I stayed in a 2 bedroom suite for 7 nights. We were in building C so there is a short walk to the main pool, and we were far enough from the commotion of the pool area and shuttle buses. After a long day at an amusement park, we relaxed at the main pool. The main pool does get crowded on some days, but it was large enough where everyone can get their space. We never had a problem finding a chair/lounger to dump our towels and clothes. After the pool, since there are 2 bathrooms, an adult and a kid can shower in their own bathrooms at the same time. For those nights we didn't go out to eat, we were able to cook our dinner in the equipped kitchen. Here's a tip, Publix is 2 minutes away (BY CAR), but if you have the time to drive about 3 miles away (12 minutes) to the super Walmart, you will save a lot of money on food and souveniers. The sofa (both sides of the cushions - I checked) and sofa chairs were slightly worn but they were fine. The maids cleaned on an inconsistent times. Our king size bed was a little lumpy and probably should get thrown out soon, but we slept fine. One day before we were ready to go out, they came at 9:30 but I told them to come back. Another day, we came back at 4PM, and they didn't come yet. They eventually came at 5PM and apologized. Each night we were able to wind down by watching our own shows, since there are 3 TV's in the suite. The ceiling fans in the master BR and LR were great if you want to cool down right away. They have free wireless internet now at least in our building, so bring your laptop which you can store in the free safe in the master closet. (I have a 14" laptop, and it was kind of tricky making it fit in so a larger laptop like 17" may not fit, but I'm not sure). The resort grounds were clean and nice, and there were plenty of parking when we were there. We did take the free shuttle once to Epcot to save $14 on parking since the shuttle times fit our schedule. Shuttle times for the non-Disney parks weren't so great, so we drove the other times. I recommend that you rent a car, since walking to and waiting for the trolleys in 90 plus degrees is not enjoyable on your vacation. Overall, if you and your traveling companions want their space, and you want short drives to the amusement parks and supermarkets, this is the place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “PURRFECT”
Reviews.Author: C_Hubert215
Reviews.Content: Great place, great service, great amenities. Couldn't ask for anything more.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays ticks all the boxes!”
Reviews.Author: GottaLoveAReview
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here a few times now. Great location...10 minutes to Disney, 15 minutes to Universal, quite part of International Drive. There is a Publix supermarket 2 minutes away. Florida Mall and Mall at Millenia about 15 minutes away and right next to Orlando Premium Outlet. We have stayed in a 2 bed apartment...bedrooms spacious, jacuzzi bath in main bedroom, another bathroom, kitchen and living area make it feel like a home away from home. A great starter kit provided. All the staff are very friendly and helpful, you can buy some park tickets such as Universal from the Concierge. Great pool area, the kids love it. Would recommend staying in building A,B or C. We will definitely be staying at Floridays again!

Reviews.Title: “the perfect stay - almost”
Reviews.Author: grumpyolegit
Reviews.Content: Floridays has consistently good reviews & it's easy to see why. Fantastic pool area, very friendly & helpful staff, marvelous rooms & good location at south (quiet) end of International Drive. We stayed in a 2-bed apartment which was perfect for us as we had 2 adult daughters with us who needed their own space. I-Drive trolley stop right outside takes you to numerous restaurants & bars without driving if, like me, you want a few bevvies at the end of the day! You don't need a car as there are courtesy buses to all parks, including Busch Gardens in Tampa ($10 each way). We did hire one for a few days from Dollar Rentals & picked it up/returned it in I-Drive (used the trolley to get there). My tip - take out extra insurance for tyres/wheels. We put a wheel down a storm drain & damaged the tyre but a quick call & someone came & put the spare on for us. Then Dollar rang to say they would change the car over if we wanted to pop back to their depot as we now had no spare. Great service and at good rates. By the way, if you drive to the theme parks you will pay around $15 parking charge each time. No charge if you use the coutesy bus. Best restaurants we found in I-Drive were Bahama Breeze (stop 21) & Tony Roma's (stop 20 or 21). Best night out was undoubtedly "Howl at the Moon" at stop 21. A bar with non-stop music played by a live band with 2 great piano players doing customers requests right through to 2am. Great night out but for adults only & it's a bar only - no food so eat first then go about 9pm . What would have made the holiday absolutely perfect for us would have been an onsite, full service restaurant at Floridays. Don't get me wrong, the food at the pool bar/cafe is excellent but is served up in plastic containers & if you want a dining experience you need to jump on the I-drive trolley & after a day at the parks in 93 degree heat we didn't always have the energy to go out again (mind you, we are in our 60s). This is only a very small point, though. & we still give Floridays a definite 5 stars. Would we go back there? Very definitely YES!! We loved it.

Reviews.Title: “lots of room, pool was great, close to all the parks.”
Reviews.Author: jgbuff
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the three room suite, plenty of room for four kids ages 10,10,11 and 8. Kids loved the pool, stayed open until at least 1130 every night. The staff were courteous, and friendly. Also the location was excellent, easy and fast to get to all the disney parks, sea world and universal. Publix grocery store was just a couple minutes away. Much nicer and less congested area of International Drive. We will definately stay there again. We visited relatives staying at Disney's Carribean Resort, it made Floridays look like a 5 star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Thought I'd get more from the #1 resort in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: nixi815
Reviews.Content: When we arrived the room was ready before check -in. Room did not have a coffee maker but when we called down for one, they brought it right up. The room had nice space for our family. Cons: No luggage carrier, had to haul luggage for a family of five for a week to the elevators and through the hallway to our room. Went to the cafe in the evening for a piece of cheesecake or something sweet that was featured on their pamphlet. They did not have anything other than muffins, and when I asked if they had anything else sweet the guy told me no means I don't have any. When we arrived on the weekend the pool was very loud, a DJ or something was playing, but it did quiet down. Music continued to play, but at an acceptable level that allowed for some relaxation. The pool area wasn't very clean. It had food stains on the concrete and the pool itself appeared to have a coating of suntan oil on top of the water.

Reviews.Title: “Delightfully quiet and enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: countrycat
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays 6/11-12 and the only bad thing I can say is that the DVD player wasn't correctly connected to the TV (which was attached to the wall), so we had to call for help. After reading previous TripAdvisor reviews, we knew to request a room in Building 7, which overlooks a cow pasture (I'm not making this up). It was so quiet that we might as as well have been the only people in the building. Now, it is quite a hike from the main pool, but what you lose in convenience, you definitely gain in solitude. I was in Orlando for a conference, so we spent a few nights at Floridays before transferring to the conference "resort hotel," the Caribe Royale. Let me just say that the difference was night and day. One is a quiet family resort and the other has - LITERALLY - drunken convention goers beating on your door after midnight because they're too wasted to find their own rooms. Also teenagers yelling & carrying on in the parking lots late at night, car alarms going off, sirens, airplane noise, and room soundproofing more suited to a Motel 6 than an expensive resort. If you like that sort of thing, stay away from Floridays. but if you like great service and a good night's sleep, you can't go wrong here.

Reviews.Title: “Loved almost everything about the place.”
Reviews.Author: Jeff55667
Reviews.Content: If you are staying on the top floor the elevator is a little slow sometimes, at least for anxious children heading out to Disneyworld :). If you are going to run the dishwasher I suggest doing it while you are out as it is a little too loud for bed time or tv time. They call it free parking and free high speed internet but you pay a fee of $11 per day for this so it is truly not free.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly upscale”
Reviews.Author: bcf2011
Reviews.Content: Very nice upscale, well maintained, and clean condos. The unit we stayed in 408 F had a nice view of the lake and quiet pool.

Reviews.Title: “BEST HOLIDAY AND RESORT EVER!”
Reviews.Author: Kneesy-Does-It
Reviews.Content: I have just returned from Floridays Resort (two days ago) and I cannot fault this resort. I traveled to Floridays resort with my parents and friend, we had a lovely time. The people were so helpful and friendly, rooms were comfortable and very clean. The pool area was often busy however we always managed to fine some beds or a chair. Floridays resort is so close to all amenities and everything is easily accessible on the i-trolley (which stops right outside). I would recommend this place to anybody, any age, families or single. I had a fabulous time

Reviews.Title: “excellent definetely going back”
Reviews.Author: yogibabe
