Reviews.Content: this is a great hotel in prime location close to all theme parks rooms are clean and spacious staff where very friendly to nothings a problem especialy RAY the guy who drives the luggage wagon very nice man we would recommend this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and location”
Reviews.Author: edaba
Reviews.Content: First stay here and will be back. We stayed in building 5 Booked two 3 bedroom suites for 12 adults and all was very comfotable for our crowd rooms were very nice and kitchens were fully stocked with all needs Had a minor problem with drain clog in one master bedroom shower but one call and it was fixed in minutes. Beds were very comfortable and rooms were a good size Both pools and hot tubs were great. Pool bar/restaurant was good... drinks were reasonable and food was good All help and staff were very friendly... can't say anything bad about our stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent!”
Reviews.Author: Starchaser
Reviews.Content: Floridays is a perfect choice in Orlando. It is quiet, relaxing, clean and has the most helpful staff. The ideal place to withdraw after long, active days out. The apartments are spacious and nice, with all the amenities you need for a perfect holiday. The pools are clean, as the rest of the grounds. Lots of restaurants and shops nearby. Small coffee shop in the main building where you also can get burgers and salads.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: lesforehand
Reviews.Content: Rooms were very clean and spacious. Convenient location. Pool outlets provided nice options. Complimentary tshuttle service to parks. All staff were very attentive.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: BrownSugar74
Reviews.Content: Floridays was great. The chartered a bus which was able to park for free and the hotel allowed the bus to drop us off directly in front of our building. The rooms are spacious and fully equipped with all appliances. We saved money by grocery shopping at the local Publix which was in walking distance. Only downfall, the shuttle to the park picks up at 4 to 5 resorts and although you may have your name on the list well in advance you may find yourself standing on your trip to the parks. With that in mind, there is public transportation, the Trolley, that is quick and in expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient oasis”
Reviews.Author: homeykat
Reviews.Content: A friend booked this resort for a great price, I was wary because of the cost. I pulled in and went to check in and the lobby and desk staff were wonderful. The room was nice, my only complaint was that the view from our patio was of an empty, barren field. The unit itself was lovely, it was well decorated and clean. I loved having a washer and dryer in the unit. The pool was the best, when at the pool, I felt like I was at a tropical hideaway, not the middle of Orlando. Floridays is well located to all of the Orlando attractions, this will be our only choice of where to stay next time we travel to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Floridays Resort but beware”
Reviews.Author: SpecialM73
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from a fantastic stay at the Floridays Resort, can't fault the hotel it was a quiet location, clean and the pool was great for small children, never too busy. Close to disney but not much surrounding the hotel, you need to drive to find restaurants shops etc. Beware however that you will be charged $11 per night resort tax. Thomson did not make me aware of this, although they say it is in their brochure there was nothing to confirm this on any booking/invoice material and not mentioned at welcome meeting or by hotel reception on arrival. I did not notice this in the brochure so was unpleasantly surprised on check-out and it did spoil an otherwise great holiday. I think Thomson should make doubly sure guests are aware of this and should mention this at the welcome meeting instead of just trying to sell trips! Apart from this though I would recommend Floridays to families as a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “love the place”
Reviews.Author: micha828
Reviews.Content: perfect hotel for family, the bedrooms are big its like your own apartment, very clean and located in the center of everything

Reviews.Title: “Great value, staff, and loved the 3 bedroom condo option”
Reviews.Author: dwmjrjam
Reviews.Content: Floriday's was a great place to spend 6 days while enjoying a first trip to Disney for our 3.5 yr old granddaughter and her parents. The 3 bedroom condo option is rare in the Disney/Orlando area, or grossly out of our price range. We all wanted to love together in an apartment like setting, have a full kitchen and privacy. Floriday's offered all of the above including a fabulous pool area just right for the whole family (zero entry for the tots). My only concern/complaint is that the daily shulltle service should be expanded. We spent a great deal of money hiring local taxis to take us to and from for times that weren't offered by the resort. With a young child we were not able to stay at the Parks until 6, 8 or 9:45pm...quite frankly after walking around in the heat and crowds from 8:30-9:00am, neither were the grownups! We alll wanted to come back in the late afternoon to spend some down time around the pool and in order to get back we had to hire a cab. Pricey, but we had no other option....so, oh well. An expanded shuttle service would go a long way to satisfy all of the resort guests, and consider that all of the guests who return to the resort early will be buying snacks and drinks by the pool! It would more than pay for the expanded shuttle runs!

Reviews.Title: “Everything it Promised to be!”
Reviews.Author: BambiWolcott
Reviews.Content: I had a few concerns about the property because it was priced so reasonable...It was wonderful! As long as you keep in mind it is not a resort property like the JW Marriott or the Grand Cypress, you will be more than pleased! This was ideal for those who are going to the parks during the day and are looking for a clean, large comfortable place to sleep...there isn't any "real" room service, but we travel with three teens so that is not an issue.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic place will definitely return”
Reviews.Author: iknowoc
Reviews.Content: Excellent location, accessible to many orlando activities. Spacious condos allowing entire family to have much needed down time after theme parks. Great pool; grocery store and wonderful outlets right next door....would choose this place again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “A nice short stay”
Reviews.Author: michelle_wright3
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for two nights after returning from a cruise. The lobby and pools were very nice. I'm going to make this very short. This was a awesome place to stay. We were able to do all of our laundry after being on a cruise for a week and relax before coming back to the real world. We were in building E room 601. You may want a room in buildings A-C, these are closer to the main pool and lobby. Being in building E, and the Florida heat, will make you want to drive to the pool. There is a really cool area for younger kids. Our room was really nice we booked a two bedroom suite but when we checked in we were given a three bedroom. The only complaint I had with the room was the night stand in the master bedroom was broke so the drawer would slowly roll open. This could be really dangerous for a family with a crawling baby or a small baby that likes to pull up on things. A lamp shade also in the master bedroom was broken and there was a cigarette burn on one of the dinning room chairs (the room did not smell like cigarettes or smoke). Also one mornings we left all of the towels on the bathroom floor to be picked up and replinished and when we returned all of the towels were replinished but a few of the dirty towels were still on the floor in the bathroom. It was not that big of a deal for us. The resort is close to the Disney parks but off the main strip away from the traffic. So in the evenings we were able to see cows grazing from our patio and in the mornings birds would meet on the patio. My daughter loved it. Also the outlets are around the corner. About two years ago I stayed on Disney property and would much rather stay at Floriday's. We had a nice time and we will be staying at Floriday's next time we are in town.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, but not perfect. We weigh the good and bad honestly. Worth a stay.”
Reviews.Author: Marie_Jay3
Reviews.Content: Beautiful palm trees, small garden areas, and open balconies abound here. From the moderate but lovely lobby, to the inviting, fun pool area, we felt happy with our choice upon arrival. Depending on which building you stay in, there could be a bit of a walk outside in the heat to get from the lobby area to your room. The suites are nice and spacious, and the rooms are well situated- with plenty of storage. The decor was pleasant, but showing some wear, and a small bit of damage here and there (upon closer scrutiny)- we got a good deal so we didn't raise a big fuss. We loved that there was a good size kitchen with everything you could need to cook, and eat already there. We ate comfortably at the dining table, and sometimes on our balcony table. The bedrooms were very comfortable, and the bathrooms had plenty more than elbow room. It was very convenient to have our own washer and dryer in the room, and the iron and ironing board worked well. The Shuttle service wasn't as frequent as we would have liked, but it is good if you need it for the times they offer. I do also recommend that you bring your own hair dryer, as theirs was extremely weak, and it cut off frequently. While the concierge staff were always very helpful and pleasant, the front desk girls were not as friendly as we had expected- from other reviews. The maid service was also not top notch when they came in to clean, so we opted not to use them until we left and did our own sprucing up. We enjoyed the Benihanas restaurant within walking distance, and the grocery store is just down the street to stock up your kitchen, etc.. The kids enjoyed the game room near the lobby as a welcome way to relax, as well.Taking the good and the bad, and weighing it out, the positives do outweigh the negatives. Overall, it is like a little home away from home, and is easy to get comfortable in. If you find a good deal, it's worth a stay.

Reviews.Title: “Management does not care”
Reviews.Author: 34515Traveler
Reviews.Content: The advertising for this hotel is misleading. They give you the impression that the shuttle to the parks is continuous, but in reality, it only runs to Sea World (and some other parks) once a day and picks up in the middle of the afternoon to return. The hotel room we were given kept blowing fuses and the next room we had to move into had a tub that no one (including maintenance) could get the drain open. When we checked in the hotel room and credit card was in two different names. This caused us to not be allowed to use our room charge for hotel purchases. Ordering dinner was rather embaressing when they tell you your charge was not approved. It was only because they ran it under the wrong name. That took 45 minutes to straighten out. The management did not care because we made our reservation under the Sea World web site. They said we had to contact Sea World for any restitution. They did not care about changing rooms, problems with the tub, fuses.It was pretty much tough luck. Do not stay at this resort unless you want a lot of headaches.

Reviews.Title: “Fab stay even if for only 4 nights”
Reviews.Author: jubious
Reviews.Content: Arrived late on a Thursday eveing - room was fine large and clean - spa bath was an added bonus.. facilities were good. Has to request that the battery was replaced in the safe, which was not only done promptly but had a call from reception to make sure all was well too! Would stay here again

Reviews.Title: “See y'all next year.”
Reviews.Author: Olschool72
Reviews.Content: Great location, everything is minutes away. Will do it all over again, the same way..

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location and accommadation”
Reviews.Author: ShaunNeath
Reviews.Content: Lovely large apartment, 2 bedrooms. Could easily live in it full time. Full Kitchen, dining area, living area and balcony. Plenty of parking spaces and good landscaping. 2 miles from Seaworld, so easy to find and central to an Orlando holiday. Two goo sized pools, fantastic gym, small cafe and bar. Small shopping centre next door with a Publix, Walgreens, Subway, Liquor store and Chinese resturant.

Reviews.Title: “orlando family gathering”
Reviews.Author: rhoustonmd
Reviews.Content: Floridays is an excellent choice for staying in the Orlando area. We stayed in a very roomy 3 bedroom suite and did most of our cooking at the hotel property. We traveled in a minivan and had easy access to the parks, shopping and groceries. The pool was a definate plus and the staff were very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient oasis”
Reviews.Author: homeykat
Reviews.Content: A friend booked this resort for a great price, I was wary because of the cost. I pulled in and went to check in and the lobby and desk staff were wonderful. The room was nice, my only complaint was that the view from our patio was of an empty, barren field. The unit itself was lovely, it was well decorated and clean. I loved having a washer and dryer in the unit. The pool was the best, when at the pool, I felt like I was at a tropical hideaway, not the middle of Orlando. Floridays is well located to all of the Orlando attractions, this will be our only choice of where to stay next time we travel to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “we loved it would definitely go back”
Reviews.Author: 123helen65
Reviews.Content: apartements of a high standard very comfortable,think you definitely need a car if you stay there,kids loved the pool and never had to fight for a sun lounger

Reviews.Title: “The Best Place we have ever stayed definately will return!”
Reviews.Author: chief193
Reviews.Content: The resort was so comfortable and helpful it was like living in your own island condo.. I could have never experienced this anywhere else.Definately I will talk to all my friends and aquaintainces about staying here if they travel to Orlando. Florida.

Reviews.Title: “You pay for what you get”
Reviews.Author: Carameltwist
Reviews.Content: A party of three, building C, wearrived around 1000 a.m. room was ready. Hotel could use some polishing. I will tell you the bad side first.Toilet seat was nasty, had to go to the store buy some cleaning products. Dust here and there. T.V. making a sound in the master bedroom for about an hour. Patio area ok, no view. Good side-nice pools and bar area, washer and dryer, requested late check out and it was honored. Would stay again for good rate but we moved to the Parc Soleil by Hilton, a dream come true.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: macy12357
Reviews.Content: I loved this resort. The rooms were so nice and clean and hotel staff were friendly and helpful. They had an entertainer at the poolside bar named Rick Allen. He was very talented and put on an awesome show. He came around and visited with the guests and took requests for what we would like to hear. I cant wait to come back again!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place but not very convenient”
Reviews.Author: Cheerchickkara
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for the second half of our week long trip to Florida. The first half of the trip we stayed in Tampa in an Embassy Suites, so we were really looking forward to a more luxurious experience. We were happy to find that our room was available at 11am even though check in wasnt until 3. This allowed us to get to Seaworld sooner! The room was clean but you could tell that it wasn't in "new" condition. The shuttered window between the master bathroom and bedroom was broken and we couldn't get it shut, good thing it was only my husband and I using it because there was no privacy! We called the front office to get them to fix it but no one ever came and since we were only there for 3 days we didn't bother to call again.The second room has two double beds in it for the three children (who are actually all over 19) and it was very nice to have the second bath after being in the Embassy. We thought we would love having a kitchen, but found that we actually enjoyed the complimentary breakfast at the Embassy (obviously a cheaper hotel) much more. We thought about ordering room service for breakfast but it was literally $30 for a box of cereal, milk, and some oranges! We were in the back building and were pretty far away from the big pool which was also very crowded. There was a smaller pool much closer which was nice but it really wasn't any nicer than the Embassy suites. House keeping came in and made the beds, changed towels, and emptied trash, however I had to leave a note to ask for more coffee, shampoo, and dish soap. It was annoying having to drive all of the way to the back of the complex which was very large with a lot of speed bumps and our room had a view of a field that was under construction. The "free shuttle" only went to Seaworld at 9:30 and only returned at 3:45, The 9:30 would have been fine because that it when the park opened, but we knew we wouldnt want to leave that early so we opted to drive which cost $14 a day to park. On the hotel website it does not say that the shuttle is so limited, and you have to make reservations to use it the day before, the day we actually did want to use it it was already booked! Overall, the hotel itself was nice but we really enjoyed the $89 a night Embassy suites more. I really don't think it was worth the money.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of Complimentary Shuttle Service”
Reviews.Author: 40duncan
Reviews.Content: I just stayed with my family 05/30/2011 thru 06/04/2011. Spacious bathrooms and bedrooms. Disappointed that part of the pictures I viewed for making my decision to stay here at the resort had not been completed and upon checking in it shows coming soon on the map of the resort. Didn't like the decor. I felt it was too dark for Florida. Of course, rust is not my favorite color. Beware of complimentary shuttle service. Luckily we had no issues but they fail to tell you on their site that the shuttle bus services three hotels, and has a few seats and once full you have to stand on the bouncing bus. Also, the pickup schedule has three times and it is a first come first serve. This means if there isn't enough room and its the last pick up they will not come back for you. I preferred to drive after the first day to Universal. It's only $15 bucks and you can leave when you want. We had to take a taxi the one day it was lightening and raining for hours, but was too early for the shuttle. This cost us nearly $30 bucks. Overall this is a nice resort and my family and I felt safe here. It was clean and beds were comfortable. The employees were friendly and nice. Oh by the way, make sure to get a room that doesn't face the west sun, because the A/C is somewhat controlled by you. Our room would only go down to 72 degrees on the thermostat and we had moderate weather last week and had room facing east. Would I stay here again? Yes it was comfortable clean and nicely located. Best resort especially if wanting close to Sea World.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic-great location and beautiful apartments”
Reviews.Author: Cube123
Reviews.Content: Stayed here last year and was flown away. The apartment was beautiful,lovely and clean - felt like home. Food was delicious and staff great. The location couldn't of been better- near enough to everything. Much much nicer than a lot of other accommodations in florida.

Reviews.Title: “Nice but I have stayed in at places with better comforts”
Reviews.Author: FozzyFromNY
Reviews.Content: The place was nice, clean and big enough for us ( 4 adults and 1 child) but the Villa was narrow.. maybe 10 feet wide in the kitchen/dining/livingroom common areas. The masterbedroom was the size of my sons nursery and the masterbath only had one sink, no make-up mirror---a need for any contact wearer, and did not havve a private room (to do your business) like every other villa property I have ever stayed at. Room number 2 had a the tv armiore blocking half the window so it had very minimum lighting besides the one nightstand lamp. 3rd bedroom was very much lite with sunlight. the second bathroom was huge with a walk-in shower and 2 sink basin. i would not stay again, only because I have stayed in more Perfect for my needs villa properties. But it was clean, and beautiful property. We did not use the pool areas which we planned on doing but never got around to but I must concur that the beds are horrible... your legs were higher than your head! but after a long day of adventures, you'd sleep on the floor if you had to! We did order the room service and they missed half our order but at least we didnt get charged for it.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel to explore the area”
Reviews.Author: Premierotti
Reviews.Content: We loved to stay at Floridays. Centrally located, 20 min driving from the airport and 15 minutes to major Disney parks. Great 2-bedroom suite, friendly staff, nice pool, Starbucks coffee in the bar.

Reviews.Title: “A really nice stay”
Reviews.Author: gasie01
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for Memorial weekend. Check in was very easy. We were in building E which I think was the furthest away from the big pool. However, there was a smaller size pool right outside our building and seemed to be quieter. Bell services was fantastic. Very prompt and helpful. We rented a 3 bedroom condo that was lovely. We had plenty of space, however, it seemed that there was too much furniture or the existing furniture was too big for the living space. The kitchen was well appointed. Although, I would have like to see more kid friendly plates and cups (plastic rather than glass). I also would have liked to have a blender and wine bottle opener. We were on vacation!!! Housekeeping came daily, but will only empty the trash, make the beds and replace towels. We did need some products in the kitchen replaced and left a note. They were replaced without problem. I also thought it was a nice touch that we were contacted twice from management to make sure everything was ok. Overall, our stay was really nice. We've stayed in different Orlando resorts for vacation 12 times in the last 6 years and would recommend and stay at Floridays again.

Reviews.Title: “A step way above Disney”
Reviews.Author: Tanner24
Reviews.Content: We definitely enjoyed all the extra space! Way better than a Disney hotel for the money! Everyone had their own space to relax which was great. The carpets could use a deep cleaning, though everything else was very clean. The kids area at the main pool was great, but it did get a little crowded at times. Requests & maintenance issues were taken care of in a timely manner. The only serious issue that needs to be addressed is a secure entrance, anyone can enter the resort which I found a little unnerving. Overall, we had a great stay and we will definitely stay again when visiting Orlando again.

Reviews.Title: “awesome, home away from home”
Reviews.Author: nataliee123
Reviews.Content: FLORIDAYS RESORT it is a very well kept,room and bathroom veryspacious and clean. We stayed in a 3 bedroom suite..We tried to be fussy and could not find any thing to fuss about. we stayed in a building F which we thought was too far away from the lobby and the main pool . but eventually we concluded it was rather a cool spot. Great place to staywith nightclubs and sea world and other attractions veryconveniently located.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful pool and large room”
Reviews.Author: wendagchristie
Reviews.Content: the room was great. it had everything we needed. the pool was wonderful, we spent the whole day there.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: malibumom02
Reviews.Content: Floridays Resort is a great place to stay!! It is beautiful, clean, and family friendly. The staff is so nice and full of information and suggestions about the Orlando area. We had a wonderful time and would definitely go back again!

Reviews.Title: “Family with 2 and 4 years old - LOVED the Floridays!!!”
Reviews.Author: CarolandtheFamily
Reviews.Content: Suites - GREAT - Big, Clean, Everything there including towls, pots & Pans, dishes and much much more, beds are comfortable. Service - Great service (our toaster broke and they brought us a new one right away) Main pool - is great for kids, big, clean, pool side sand pit Amazing place to stay for the cost. We have a 2 and 4 year old and my 4 year old is still asking to go back to the hotel. We really enjoyed our stay at Floridays!!. The ONLY thing that may not be great is the fact that we were in Building F, which was a far walk to the main hall, games room and pool, we drove to the pool everyday, try to ask if you can stay in Building A, B, or C. BUT if you cant get into A,B or C they do have a car that seats up to 6 Adults that will come and pick you up to drive you to the pool, trolly stop etc. Concierge was very helpful and made good suggestions to places to go other than Disney. The Drive to Disney was about 7 to 10 minutes. OH and how could I forget the Outlet Mall literally around the corner (2min drive or 10 min. walk) AMAZING!! Right next door is a 24 hour Walgreens mini Grocery store and then right next door to that is a HUGE grocery store so you can pack light and get all you need at the Grocery store or Walgreens, they even have pool toys swim suites...you name it!! McDonalds and Subwary right next door..I could go on and on, the location is GREAT. This is a great place to stay for the cost it is really amazing. Highly recomended We loved the Floridays and will stay there again!!

Reviews.Title: “Great "Home away from Home"...”
Reviews.Author: DootsiePots
Reviews.Content: When traveling as a familly of 5 plus a grandmother - not enough can be said about having the comforts of home. Space for everyone to do their own thing to relax, a fullsize coffeepot (a full-size kitchen EVEN!), 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, a private balcony... a great pool complete with bar! Staff and service are great! The pool was clean and well tended to and towels provided pool side! There is a Walgreens, 7 Eleven (with Redbox Rental), and a Publix Grocery Store right around the corner. It is literally located minutes from Seaworld and Aquatica. The Resorts Location is OPTIMAL for a stay in Orlando! Prime Outlets, a gazillion restaurants, Disney, etc etc are all within minutes!

Reviews.Title: “Great Pool! Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: justiny1
Reviews.Content: We love this place. We have 2 young children and they have been there 4 times now and they get excited everytime they go. We have nothing bad to say about this place. If something needed fixed or replaced it was corrected very quickly. The swimming pool is perfect! The kids love it :) I love the fact that no one bothers us and we come and go as we please. The rooms are spacious and has everything we need! We will continue to stay at this hotel until we get tired of Disney...but that will never happen!

Reviews.Title: “Not without its flaws.”
Reviews.Author: ca702
Reviews.Content: First, this is a nice motel/resort conveniently located very near the Orlando Premium Outlets on International Drive. It has nice amenities, not the least of which is a roomy suite layout that provides traveling families plenty room to spread out. It has two nice pools, a nice pool bar, and well kept grounds. The value factor is high, given the favorable May pricing we got and the exceptional square footage of the rooms. But there are issues. First, if you are looking for luxury and exceptional cleanliness, this shouldn't be your first choice. Our room carpets were stained, the front door was in need of a paint job, and the ceiling fans were caked in dust. We also had an air conditioner that made a crashing noise when cutting off and a tub that took most of the day to drain. Know that the daily housekeeping only includes changing towels, taking out the trash, and making beds. Cleaning is an extra $30/day. After our second night of six, we realized that the housekeeper was not replacing towels, but putting our used, wet towels right back on the rack. So in reality, we weren't even getting the towel refresh. Also, there are no ice machines on the property. However, your in-suite refrigerator has an ice machine that you must turn on at the beginning of your stay to get any appreciable amount of ice in a day or two. We didn't find the staff all that friendly. Most didn't make eye contact or greet you, and no one offered to help with our bags. Thankfully, our suite was on the first floor and you can park close to the one of 6 buildings your suite is in. We never tried the bus service to the theme parks. They have only a couple pickups each day, so we drove. The pool was always crowded, and the one bartender at the pool bar couldn't keep up with the line that formed for drinks. The wireless internet in the room was nice; the connection speed is limited to 2 Mbps. Overall, we were a little underwhelmed by the stay, given Floridays' #1 ranking in the Orlando area. But I do repeat that the suites are nice (if a bit unmaintained) for the price and the location is great.

Reviews.Title: “room was great”
Reviews.Author: chrisjill80
Reviews.Content: The jaccuzzi tub was great, room was spacious and clean, beds were comfortable, very polite staff. will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We won't stay anywhere else in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: mariadnhm
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the Floridays since they opened. It has consistently delivered a wonderful experience during our multiple stays. It is convenient to all of the attractions, yet far enough away out of the busy city. There is something for everyone at the Floridays and we won't stay anywhere else when we visit Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Incredible value, great resort.”
Reviews.Author: MMelino
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a five night stay at Floridays May 20 -25th. The reviews are spot on - this hotel has exceptional staff and accomodations. We met one of the hotel management on our first evening - Kevin - he stopped by our table at the pool on the first evening and was exceptionally friendly and welcoming. We frequently saw him walking the property during our stay - no hiding in offices for management at this resort! Highly recommend and would absolutely stay there again and again.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for hard-earned money”
Reviews.Author: docnap
Reviews.Content: Superb location with very efficient services. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Should be Ranked #1 in Orlando!!”
Reviews.Author: jvolpe985
Reviews.Content: No Surprise that this property is ranked #1 in Orlando.. Room was clean, modern, and well appointed. We arrived in Orlando at 11:00 AM and gave an early check in a shot and they took care of us!! We are low maintenance but I must say this place was great in every way! We will be back without a doubt. I do not understand why anyone with children would stay on a Disney property when Floridays offers full 2 bedroom suites within 5 miles of the Magic Kingdom. With the size of our room we felt at home. The kids had their own room with TV and bathroom. We had a nice bedroom with updated bathroom... First floor room easy in an out. Hot Starbucks coffee.. This place rocks!!! Oh and if you have a car you need to take the short trip to 4 Rivers BBQ in Winter Park FL... Less than 20 miles away and a great place to escape the tourist eateries and enjoy an amazing BBQ meal while supporting what looked like a family establishment... I am not a big Disney fan but my kids had a blast so thats really all that matters. The boss (my wife) picked this hotel and she gets props.. This place was really good. Better than Sheraton Vistana where we stayed the last few years!

Reviews.Title: “What a pleasant suprise!!”
Reviews.Author: michelle33461
Reviews.Content: I was planning a suprise trip for my husband and small child to SeaWorld and, even though I live in Florida, I was not sure exactly where to stay. There are so many places to chose from, I was a bit lost. After looking for several days on the internet, I found Floridays. I read a ton of reviews on trip advisor and found only positive reviews so I booked the room. I was still really nervous since I had never been there. When we checked in and walked up the stairs, I told my husband to wait outside so I can see how horrible it was going to be. Much to my suprise, it was beautiful!! Much more than I had ever hoped for. The room was really clean and spacious. There were sooo many amenities/accomidations. Our favorite part was the hot tub in the master bedroom/bathroom. We were able to put our daughter down in the 2nd bedroom and completely relax in our our room. There was a washer and dryer, blender (which def came in handy), microwave, etc. The style of the room was updated and beautiful and our view was nice as well. We walked down to the pool but it was a little too cold out for us to enjoy. They have great pool area for the kids. I would and have recommended this resort to many friends. It was truly one of the best rooms we had stayed in and the rate was good.

Reviews.Title: “Best Resort Ever”
Reviews.Author: Larissa078
Reviews.Content: I got back from Floridays a bit over a week ago and I still talk about how much I miss it. The service was great, everyone was very friendly and the cleaning service did a great job. The kitchen has the cutlery there so it makes it a lot easier on the travellers and saves you a lot of money. The pool was a lot of fun and extremely big. We took the shuttle to Universal twice and Disney twice and it worked out great, they were on time each ride and very friendly. I went with my parents and my boyfriend and we all said we would come back and are planning a trip for the next year or two to be back!

Reviews.Title: “GORGEOUS Accomodations & Can't Wait to Return!”
Reviews.Author: tbarbieri
Reviews.Content: What a gorgeous, CLEAN and amazing hotel. I travelled with a friend and would definitely come back with more friends & recommend for my family to travel - in a large condo because of the amazing facilities available, the superb location both near Disney AND the Outlets, and just the entirely great experience I had overall. I travel A LOT, and I give this hotel ana amazing 5 star review for hitting the accommodations, clean sheets, ample towels, clean kitchen area, tons of space to be comfortable, and such a cozy feeling as a home away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Resort.”
Reviews.Author: DeeDeeDowningtownPA
Reviews.Content: Just got back from the Floridays Resort for a weeks stay with my husband, son, daughter-in-law and our 4 year-old grandson and we all had a wonderful time. We had a 2 bedroom condo in building B on the third floor over looking the main pool. The condo was very clean and very nice and had a full size kitchen 2 bathrooms a nice balcony and there was plenty of room for everyone. There was a nice pool bar and cafe, and food if you wanted to eat there. They also had a little sand area for the kids to play in and my grandson just loved it. The grounds were very clean with beautiful flowers everywhere. We all had a very nice time at the resort and wished we could stay longer, my grandson did not want to leave he said he wanted to stay there for ever and ever.(wish we could)

Reviews.Title: “best experience ever!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: ismailhk
Reviews.Content: we recently came to the disney area...we stayed at the floridays... first day visited disney it was so hot that we decided to go back to hotel and relax.. my 4 and 6yr old wanted to go to pool and we did. they had such a great time that they truly did not want to go back to the parks.. so my husband and i decided to stay another night and enjoy...it was way more relaxing.. nxt time ill see mickey when its cooler out..

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful resort.”
Reviews.Author: KJTravels_11
Reviews.Content: The suite was lovely. I have stayed at many 5 star resorts and the accommodations at Floriday exceeded some of them. Roomy, comfortable and just about everything we needed. Our room happened to be missing and iron and when we notified front desk it was replaced immediately...only problem that one didn't work... had another one within a very short time. Front desk was great. Concierage took care of our early bird checkin with Southwestern airlines while we were out touring the Holy Land Experience. Customer service was great. The housekeeper neglected to leave us wash cloths one night and we were to tired from Disney to really care. This was taken care of the following day as soon as we notified the front desk. Nice pool area, comfortable beds, publix grocery store close by. Convenient to all major attractions and the price we got on online was excellent. I would definitely return altho. I would probably not take a ground floor unit because of all those little lizards :-)

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: browntone
Reviews.Content: Good: Comfortable, Great location, Great price, Great service, Spacious, Every kitchen item you will need, Housekeeping(light) will come to your room later in the day if asked; there are so many to name Bad: Building F, 6th floor - Light in shower and bedroom not working, closet door handle and remote backs broken However, I would still highly recommend this hotel. Tip: For actual GPS location of the hotel use 12562 Floridays Resort Dr. Orlando, Fl 32821

Reviews.Title: “The perfect Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: lorzabobbles
Reviews.Content: What can we say about this resort that hasn't already been said? We read many reviews before booking and this place certainly deserves it's number 1 status. The staff were amazing from check in (we stayed for 15 nights) to check out and everyone was friendly and helpful. Special thanks to Lisa and Alejandra at reception and Nilda at concierge who went above and beyond to make our stay perfect. The suite was beautiful and spacious. We were also pleased to find a starter pack of coffee and detergent in the kitchen which we did not expect! Halfway through our stay we paid to have our room cleaned as we thought the price to do this was reasonable and saved us buying cleaning products to do it ourselves. The pool area is ideal for a relaxing day when you need a break from the parks with plenty of loungers and clean towels available. We have previously stayed in hotels and private villas in Orlando but now Floridays will always be our first choice. The location is perfect for Disney and Sea World, being only a ten minute drive, with Universal Studios being the furthest away, yet only a 20 minute drive. We would definitely recommend staying at this resort.

Reviews.Title: “My family and I would definately stay here again!!!”
Reviews.Author: sandrad10jen
Reviews.Content: Floridays for us was the best hotel/resort that we have used. We go on vacation every summer and we try different hotels, this was by far the best hotel we have used. The rooms were large and very accomodating. The staff were very knowledgeble and helpful. We would definately used this resort again. Floridays made our Orlando experience fulfilling and in this economy, the price we paid was well within our vacation budget. Thank you Floridays!!!

Reviews.Title: “Cleanest and Most Spacious Room EVER!”
Reviews.Author: weirdaze
Reviews.Content: My Wife and I brought our 3 year-old to Disney and Sea World. We followed the trip advisor reviews and the #1 ranking and we were NOT disappointed. This has to be the best room we've ever stayed at (and we've stayed at 4-diamond and 5-star resorts). It's close to sea world, disney, universal, outlet malls, supermarket, walgreens, redbox, mcdonalds, gas stations, and starbucks is IN the resort. The room looked like a luxury condo and had all the amenities. granite countertops, dishwasher, complete utensils, full fridge, new stove, 6-person dining room, 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, (master bedroom has Whirlpool in the bathroom), Living room with big screen (flat-screen) TV. Tv's in both bedrooms as well. There's a Dvd player in living room that we used to wind down after a long day at the parks. (redbox and blockbuster express kiosks are in walgreens and publix around the corner - 2 minute trip). The housekeeping staff was friendly and came every day with new towels, and to tidy up and take out the trash. There were luggage cards on the first floor of the building that came in very handy when unloading the car. Make up your own mind and read all the reviews. All my family has to say is that staying here was the best decision we could have made. it was a welcome sanctuary after a LONG, HOT day in the sun walking around Disney and Sea World ALL DAY. My wife is pregnant and she welcomed the comfort and cleanliness at the end of the day. 3-year-old loved it too!

Reviews.Title: “Four Rooms, All Flawless”
Reviews.Author: bizdoc328
Reviews.Content: Strongly recommend. Nice staff and great rooms for the price point. There is a Publix grocery within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “TripAdvisor's Reviews are Accurate!”
Reviews.Author: kenneth539
Reviews.Content: Great value. Great room. Pool is amazing, particularly for young children. Staff is all exceedingly warm and friendly. My only issue (and I really didn't care that much) was the beds were not particularly comfortable - need to update the mattresses and bedspreads. Otherwise, the place is spotless, modern, fun and close to all the attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Standard for star level”
Reviews.Author: cushionz
Reviews.Content: I and my 2 sisters (50ish) stayed at Floridays for 3 nights and overall enjoyed the stay. LIKED: both bedrooms were a good size, as were the bathrooms; lots of storage; balcony was sheltered from wind/rain and had an overhead fan and light; nice view of the pond and ducks; hotel supplied towels for the pool; nice 'welcome' package of tea/coffee; the towel and tissue art was really cute; staff were helpful and pleasant. DIDN'T LIKE: the hotel roadside entrance was poorly marked, as were the individual buildings; stacked washer and dryer had very small capacity; sofa and chairs were quite uncomfortable; guest services directory was outdated (room service prices were several dollars higher than listed, directory did not state minimum $25.00 order was required); hotel didn't have a luggage scale.

Reviews.Title: “It was a wonderful and clean resort”
Reviews.Author: giovanni28
Reviews.Content: My mother and I arrived on 5/6/11 thru 5/11/11. We stayed in Building A, room 108, in a 2 bredroom unit. It was on the ground floor. You could smell the freshness/cleanliness of the room upon entering Everything was more then we expected. It was very clean! The bed was very confortable. The patio faced a "lake". The gym was small but had everything you needed for a good workout. The lobby was very nice and pool area was great. The pool bar had all the ingredients for any kind of drink you wanted. There is a Publix , a chinese restaurant, spanish restaurant, liquor store 2-3 minutes away. There is a an outlet mall 3 minutes away as well. The ITrolley stop is located outside the hotel. We used it once to go see the Titanic show at stop 13. The only drawback with this is that it makes ALL Stops. It was a bit quicker on the way back as it skipped some stops. The resort does offer free shutle service to Universal Studios, although we didnt use it. the staff we came into contact were very pleasant. Parking is free, although some resorts do charge. Overall, I would recommend this resort. Its clean, close to everything and quiet. The pictures you've seen posted is exactly the way the resort is. I would and will come back again!!

Reviews.Title: “Nothing fancy”
Reviews.Author: hhefzy
Reviews.Content: Pros: The pool is by far the best part of the whole resort - there's also a large sandbox. It's well maintained. Free parking is a huge plus, as well as free wi-fi access in your room. In room washer and dryer is huge - we did laundry 3 times on vacation. Notably, they only provide one days worth of detergent, then you have to buy your own. Large fridge/freezer is nice - with 3 little kids, we needed milk, juice, ice cream, etc. Plus you have a place to put leftovers when you eat out. It's about a 10 minute drive to disney and downtown disney. Cons: they don't clean the room during the whole stay!! it's an extra $48/day if you want it cleaned!! 8 people in one suite for 1 week without any cleaning >> pee yoo!! They give you a vaccuum if you want to clean yourself, but who wants to work on vacation! It would be cheaper to rent a condo - the reason to stay at a hotel is for the daily extra services. balcony is NASTY - filled with bugs, not clean and not usable. If I could do it again, I probably would have stayed somewhere else, that also had a pool available. For $200/night, there's lots of options.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: cyoung131
Reviews.Content: Great location and great price for the size room. The suites make it convenient for breakfast everyday before hitting the park or for bringing in take-out, etc at night. Great location, just minutes to every park and courteous sstaff. Our 6 year-old loved the pool and it was very kid friendly. Highly recommended!!

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional Resort”
Reviews.Author: Ola76
Reviews.Content: My husband and 2 young children, ages 2 and 4, just came back from a 1 week trip to Orlando. It was our first trip to that area so we were not sure what to expect. We stayed in this Resort and it was perfect! Only 15 minutes by car to Magic Kingdom; rooms were very clean; has fully equiped kitchen; great pool for adults and special kids area. We wouldn't hasitate to go back there again. It is 3 min away from a grocery store and a huge outlet mall. We truely enjoyed our stay at this Resort and I would recommend it to everybody. You really can't ask for anything more at $140 per night.

Reviews.Title: “SPECTACULAR!!!”
Reviews.Author: SouthGAMama
Reviews.Content: Beyond words! We have a large family of 6 adults and 6 kids and love to travel on vacation together. Finding accomidations that fit all of us for this amazing qualtiy and price would be impossible! We had a condo with a Master Suite and 2 other bedrooms that each had 2 full sized beds. It appeared to be a brand new complex. It was exceptionally clean and nice! It was also in a quieter place than most of Orlando but not out of the way to the 3 parks we visited or the shopping either. The pools were great! The food there was good. The service was excellent! What else can I say except when can we come back?!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable, but not as clean as I like it.”
Reviews.Author: cms1976
Reviews.Content: I chose Floridays based on the excellent reviews on TripAdvisor, wanted more room for my family, and because I got a great rate. I also read the "not so excellent" reviews to keep it real. Upon arriving, the resort looked lovely and had beautiful landscaping. We arrived very early (around 12:30pm) and they had a room available and ready for us, which was nice. My husband checked us in and told me the lobby was beautiful. Upon entering our building, the elevators and outside walkway to our room did not appear clean and remained that way for the almost the entire length of our stay.The day before we left, it appeared houskeeping finally cleaned the elevator walls but the floors still had trash that never was removed. Our room was inviting and smelled fresh. We loved having the 2 bedrooms (especially the kids) and master bath with jetted tub. It was decorated very nicely. It was not meticulously cleaned, just okay in my opinion. As a previous reviewers have stated, the furnishings are showing wear from all the previous guests that obviously are not careful when staying here. It clearly is a very busy and popular resort as you can see from the number of reviews. We were missing an ironing board from our room and one was brought up to us promptly. I feel the floors and carpets should be cleaned more often as our socks were very dirty from walking on the floors. Our view from the balcony was of the parking lot, so we did not use it but would have it had a different view. We slept very well and felt the beds in our suite were comfortable. The pool was great and we enjoyed it. All in all it was a great vacation and we were comfortable here. However, I am the type of person who values the cleanliness of a hotel or resort one of the most important things and I was dissappointed that some of those not so excellent reveiws were spot on. I did not address these issues while at the resort because I wanted to start my vacation and not have the hassle of changing rooms or waiting for housekeeping to clean the room to my liking. I am sure that if I did address these things, they would have accommidated me. There is a daily resort fee and I was aware of it before going and still received a great deal compared to other similar resorts. They do have wireless internet in the rooms now. I feel that if you are not a clean freak like me, this is a nice place for your vacation in Orlando. Would I recommend it to a friend or stay here again? Maybe, if they stepped it up on cleaning.

Reviews.Title: “Lived up to expectations”
Reviews.Author: brixx33
Reviews.Content: Do not have to go into too great of details as other reviews have it right. Met our requirements nicely and location was ideal. Only con I can think of is for some reason they have a dark concrete pool deck and dark metal loungers. These may look nice but get extremely hot in the sun. Resort fee was sort of annoying too but I suppose others may just call it a parking fee.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: Mad7mak
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice place to stay. We only had one issue that was with the smell in the master bath shower but it was resolved quickly. (I am very picky about a clean bathroom) Loved having a washer/dryer in the room. Nice, fully equipped kitchen. Plenty of pillows but beds could have been more comfortable. We only used housekeeping service once during our week stay to make the beds and provided fresh towels but all staff we encountered we're friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful property, good value, great for families”
Reviews.Author: Swanny2011
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay here and thought the grounds and accommodations were well worth the price. The staff was always busy making sure everything was clean and ready for use. We actually broke our coffee pot, called the front desk, and had a new one within 10 minutes. Location was great for any of the parks, restaurants, and shopping. Huge outlet mall almost within walking distance. We stayed on the 5th floor in building D and had a great view from our balcony, and was quiet from any traffic or pools. The front desk staff and the concierge were very nice and welcoming. I would definitely book this place again if we return to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again”
Reviews.Author: stacemark
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week in April. Everyone was very friendly. The 2 bedroom suite was perfect for my family of 5. Floridays was a perfect location for us!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding for Families and Business close to Disney & Convention”
Reviews.Author: DMW71
Reviews.Content: Stayed here on multiple occasions and always a good location. Good prices and great for family vacation or business. Two or Three bedroom condos with all of the basic amenities including full kitchen, granite counters, full oven, fridge, microwave and cooking utensils and dishes. Flat panel TV in family room with a DVD player. Pool complex is great with lap pool, kids pool with water features and a sandy "beach" for the kids. Poolside bar and grill is nice as well.

Reviews.Title: “Always LOVE Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: pagrl17
Reviews.Content: Great stay as usual. We wouldn't stay anywhere else in Orlando! Everything is comfortable and "homey" feeling and you have everything you need to cook or eat in so that saves a ton of money. Also, you can't beat the close location to EVERYTHING in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “5 star service for 3 star price”
Reviews.Author: steve735762
Reviews.Content: only 2nd time in orlando after 10 year gap and what a nice surprise to find a condo with service to match the best and with a smile. nothing seemed to much trouble and all the staff were very friendly. the pool was great for the children and even though you dont spent much time in the rooms they were well equipped to cater for most needs.the condo being on the end of i drive makes it a lovely quiet location after a busy day at the parks with a bus stop right outside when needed. all the american people we met were really nice and it was easy to chat to them. thankyou floridays for a lovely holliday

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded our expectations---Great value for a really nice place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: mjlb65
Reviews.Content: We just completed our stay at Floridays Resort and couldn't be more pleased with the whole experience. The rooms were clean and spacious and up to date. The staff were very helpful with anything we needed/asked for. It's located in an area or high end resorts but the price was very very reasonable! The main pool area was clean and nice with an afternoon DJ (it was the weekend) playing family friendly music and leading games for the kids. We stayed there on the recommendation of a friend and will definitely recommend it to others!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for families!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Not giving this hotel high marks because it's 4 star like a Ritz. If you want something super plus, Floridays is not the match. BUT, if you're looking for a great place off Disney campus and perfect for a family, you found it. Very clean and spacious. Pool area perfect!! You can even bring down your own drinks and snacks and no one seems to mind. 10 mins to Disney parks, 5 to outlets and sea world. Decent grocery store maybe 1/2 mile away. Would absolutely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and spacious”
Reviews.Author: suburbanmom_2
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. Loved the granite everywhere. Pool was perfect for our 2 and 6 year olds. Loved that they had inflatables and sand toys available for use for free! Nice to have sep bedrooms. Very nice to have a washer & dryer with free sample of detergent. Our little one had a potty accident in the car and it was great to wash everything before heading out to our cruise. We were just one building away from the pool. Just a couple minute walk. We also were able to buy chocolate milk and fresh sliced fruit for both girls for snacks which was nice. Only 2 negatives. Dead batteries on one remote: switched w/another. There was an unusual noise every so often in one of the bedrooms that we never did figure out: sounded like something rattling in the vents or the air turning off & on? It was pretty loud/alarming; whatever it was.

Reviews.Title: “Had a Fabulous Time at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: Reene1956
Reviews.Content: Stayed from May 01 to May 07, 2011 and thoroughly enjoyed our time at Floridays. The rooms were perfect, clean and very comfortable. We stayed on the 5th floor bldg C and it was very quiet. The pools were great, and loved the Palms Cafe. The shuttle service to Disney was excellent. Location of the resort is great - far end of International Dr. and away from the main hustle and bustle, but with lots of good shopping very close by and not far from the airport. The I-Drive shuttle stops right out front of the resort so you can get to places farther away easily if you don't have a car. My only complaint - the first day our beds were not made and I think the resort fee is a little too high for what you get.

Reviews.Title: “..great stay..”
Reviews.Author: kingrox
Reviews.Content: Lets face it... florida attracts millions of tourists a year... and rightly so.. the weather here is amazing !! All 6 of us (myself, the wife and 4 teenagers) stayed at floridays resort in april in a 3 bedroom suite. these rooms are awesome. the fact that 1 room can handle 6 people with comfort is verrrry rare these days inseed !! The floridays resort is located at the south end of international drive so its just a ways out of the 'hub' or middle of the action... im not sure if thats a good or bad thing tho` coz being just out of the way makes floridays a little more peacefull I think.. Please note that their is a trolley/bus that runs up and down international drive all day up to 10pm ... and for a small charge you can get to just about anywhere you want to go along international drive. all the resorts and theme parks are on I.D except for disney which has their own shuttle anyway that comes into the hotel. The rooms here are great... u can tell that families have been staying here with the wear and tear that families generally give to a hotel...but thats fine.. its a family resort ! When we checked into the first room we were given it was not cleaned properly, so down i went to reception and i was quickly given another..this room was fine - good aircond in every room (and fans) big bathrooms, good size full kitchen and a lounge area.. (like a small home really!!) the central pool is huge and there were kids in the pool from open to close. The bar is just next to the pool and this is probably the only area on concern i had on our stay.. at night when its beer o`clock and people are looking for a cool beverage, the hotel only had 1 staff member on !!?? - this was insane and most people just walked away after getting frustrataed with the 15min wait time just to get a beer. !! this occurred evernight during our stay and was exasserbated by a wedding on the final night of our stay... it was a circus !! my wife ended up going to the general manager to complain.. THE CONCIERGE STAFF HERE ARE FANTASTIC they all know their stuff and go out of their way to help booking park tix, retal cars etc.. everything can be booked right at their desk..no need to be trying to deal with it from home just to save 20 bux !! ... they also had some great tips on the parks !! **One thing that i should note is the hype over the harry potter experience... I was prapared for anything after reading all the reviews and comments about HP here in T.A... Here we go.. we arrived early at universal as everyone had suggested... we stood at the gate and watched them slide open... then the rush began... almost everyone who was waiting at the gate made a dash for hogwarts !! some people were running !! i just took my time to get to the otherside of the park and when i arrived i had a 15 min wait for the HP experience... after doing the ride (trust me its not all that) we had a 10 min wait for the HP rollercoaster (which is just average as far as rollercoasters go, but im not a kid) My kids decided they wanted to do both rides again and they had that done in about 30 mins.. We then went into hogwarts village and tried to look in a couple of shops all selling the same thing... this area was fairly packed, but still ok to get around... The girl on the door of one of the shops did tell me that it was a little 'quiet' and that the general hype for HP was just starting to level off...!! We tried the obligitory butter beer (bout a 10 min wait) and my kids loved it. All in all i would recommend floridays because their intent is to make sure you have a good stay... the room rate is terriffic... and the location is good... Oh, parents if you get on the trolley and travel up to the centre of International drive there are some incredible resturants to try... most of them with outdoor seating, warm evening breezes and margheritas on tap !! ENJOY !!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful, new found vacation resort with the comforts of home”
Reviews.Author: MsDeebs_02
Reviews.Content: This resort was phenonominal with the convience of everything and everywhere located on the strip of International Drive. The supermarket up the road is a bit pricey, so I recommend bringing your coupons from home before going grocery shopping. The I-ride trolley that runs on Internantion Drive is amazing and very, very convient. The free shared shuttles to and from theme parks is Great. I could not have been a bit more satisfied with my stay at Floridays. I highly recommend this resort to anyone traveling with teenagers and young adults, because of the activities(game room and pools) and convience of transportation various places to visit including musuems, movie theater and shopping outlets.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: msgo09
Reviews.Content: Booked Floridays based on reviews from tripadvisor. Great place, close and easy to everything in Orlando area. The resort was wonderful, we stayed in building F witch was the back of the resort. The view was great, pools are close,it really is just a short walk to main pool the building was very quiet. We had a two bedroom unit, plenty of space. We look forward to returning!

Reviews.Title: “An amazing family vacation at the Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: Nigrello
Reviews.Content: My family and I just returned yesterday from the Floridays resort and we had an amazing time! The hotel was immaculate and the staff very friendly and helpful. The pool area was perfect for the kids and I can't say thank you enough to the Floridays Resort for such a memorable family vacation. Our visits to Seaworld and Disney were spectacular, as was the weather!! We are already planning our stay again this time next year!!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Room and Wonderful Staff”
Reviews.Author: Charifitz
Reviews.Content: Went to Florida to see Universal's Harry Potter. Stayed at Floridays Suite. The Suite was large and comfortable and sumptuous. The staff was wonderful and helpful. We stayed for 5 days and enjoyed it all. The food was good and the rooms were clean and well cared for. The room rates were well worth the price. The bus service was good and got us back and forth with ease. The concierge was very helpful. Take the trolly to get around locally- ask about a day pass or more.

Reviews.Title: “A +++++ One of the best hotels in the area”
Reviews.Author: Tjames8732
Reviews.Content: This is my second time at this hotel and will not me my last. I love that the rooms have a full kitchen even though we never use it like that. I also like that my daughter can have her own room and tv and don't have to sleep with us. I love the whirlpool in main bedroom and the window so you can also watch tv. The bed is so comfortably you never will want to get out of bed. For the price any person should try this place at least once. you get a room that sleeps at least 6 to 8,two bedrooms,two bathroom,full kitchen,washer and dryer in room,three tv's.(two bedroom villa)

Reviews.Title: “The best suite ever!!”
Reviews.Author: TheBigelows
Reviews.Content: I felt like I was staying in a high end condo. It looked like it was decorated by Tommy Bahama......I want to decorate my beach house that way! Everything you would need in an apt suite and more. Oh and the pool is amazing!! Just be prepared....there is no restaurant on the property so go to the grocery store to stock up on food for your full kitchen.......also your own washer and dryer! Adjacent to Sea World too!

Reviews.Title: “really great hotel room”
Reviews.Author: Booski155019
Reviews.Content: kind of out of the way on International drive, but once you've found it, a fairly short drive to the theme parks. Great value for the money- almost brand new, large suites, spotlessly clean. Great to have kitchen and laundry when with family. Pools always close by. Lunch is a little slow, but tasty.

Reviews.Title: “Not quite as good as I'd hoped”
Reviews.Author: euanhusarmi
Reviews.Content: This is a tricky review to write....I have given the Hotel 3 stars but would have given 3.5 had I had the choice. I'll start with location. I have been to Orlando 12 times over a 25 year period, and I have to say that this is my preferred location of all the places I have stayed. It literally is right in the middle of all the Parks and the shopping and cannot be faulted. I travelled with my wife and 2 sons (aged 11 and 14) and we stayed in a 3 bedroom suite. We had to switch rooms on arrival as the 2nd bathroom only had a shower, and my boys prefer to take a bath, and were moved to another (corner ) suite in building A. The suite did have a certain smell that my wife thought may have been from a smoker, but when I checked it was a non-smoking room. The kitchen itself was functional if not a little tired, and the two single bedrooms were very good. The master suite itself was small, with a very nice en-suite bathroom, complete with whirlpool bath. One of the main issues I had with the resort was that the curtains were poor quality so that the light came in at sunrise, and also, because I was overlooking the lake onto International Drive, the noise of the buses and cars (and sirens from Emergency vehicles) was particularly frustrating for me, being a very light sleeper. The swimming pool, which was in the adjacent building, was very nice looking, but there were nowhere near enough beds around to satisfy the number of guests. I believe there is another pool at one of the other buildings but I did not check it out. In conclusion, I really am tempted to change my review back to a 4 but I just can't bring myself to do this....it is very good, but in my humble opinion, is not quite good enough

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful and sunny time!!!”
Reviews.Author: tmadison45
Reviews.Content: The resort was the best place I've ever stayed on vacation.

Reviews.Title: “We had a wonderful vacation at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: GrandmomJudy
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Floridays with our daughter and son-in-law and two grandchildren. We arrived on a very hot day and our room was nice and cool and clean and ready for us to move in. It was great having three bedrooms. We used the kitchen every day for breakfast and a couple of nights for dinner and had everything we needed. Publix is so close for shopping and they stock small sizes so you don't have a lot of leftovers. We were out at the theme parks most days, but came home to a clean room, nice and cool, beds made and fresh towels. Our last day we chilled at the resort, spent the day at the pool, and the grandkids loved it! Pina coladas at the pool bar were fabulous.

Reviews.Title: “Wow, Great Condo, Great Price”
Reviews.Author: BUNHTRAVELER
Reviews.Content: This resort is fantastic. I never thought we could get such a large condo at a reasonable price. The beds were super comfortable and all of the staff members couldn't have been nicer. The pool was perfect for smaller children and the pool area was spotless. The proximity to all the parks & Orlando restaurants was great while being far enough away from the center that we had quite nights to sleep. I never heard any noice from surrounding condos. The only issue we had was with the guest bath tub but maintanence came quickly to resolve the issue. I expect we will choose this resort for future trips to Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable stay but some cleanliness issues”
Reviews.Author: wjgoodman
Reviews.Content: Good location, close to all attractions and Orlando outlets. Had a 3 bedroom unit. # of towels changed each day. 2 days room was missed by cleaning staff and had to complain more than once. Main cleanliness issue was common walkways where old broken glass, a shrimp tail and other items were never cleaned or picked -up!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay...it was wonderful and can't wait to go back!”
Reviews.Author: BusyBusyMom2
Reviews.Content: I have this hotel a 5 star not because it's a "Five Star" stay like the Ritz or a high end place...I gave it a 5 for a family stay in Disney. When you go to Disney with kids it's EXPENSIVE to stay on property and the only real thing you get is ease to the Park. We drove from Richmond VA. I wanted to do it the way we did when we were young and it was a great experience. I was able to bring food because of the great kitchen each unit has and other things for my son. We did not do the food plan because I did not want to gain 15 pounds on the trip :) so easy to do with park food. They also have a great little place at Floridays you can get breakfast sandwiches. The pool is big....my son wanted to be there instead of Disney. Again, this is not some high end resort...it's family friendly and very close to the beach. When my husband and I travel we go high end but that's without the children. When we have the kids we just want to be down to earth and have fun with them. There are also some GREAT eating around the resort.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Resort!”
Reviews.Author: DawuanM
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel if you are traveling with your family. It was close to all of the main attractions. The room had a full kitchen, which is great when you are traveling with 6 kids. I was able to save a ton of money on food by going grocery shopping at the supermarket, which was right next door from the hotel. Overall experience was great! I would definitely stay here again!!!!

Reviews.Title: “All you could possibly want in one location”
Reviews.Author: SunSandSea319
Reviews.Content: Luxurious without the price. Lots of room to spread out. Two beautiful pools and amenities to match. Personnel courteous, helpful and unobtrusive. Concierge knowledgeable and able to acquire tickets for attractions. Truly top notch. Will be coming back again. I have recommended to several friends already. Trolley and bus service in front of hotel. Hotel shuttle runs from hotel to major attractions. We rented a car which made shopping for our older travelers nicer. Ages 8 to 62 all had a great time. Landscaping beautiful and tropical. Kudos to Floriday's. Can't wait to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: linda34618
Reviews.Content: My daughter, grandson, and I had a wonderful experience at Floriday's Resort in Orlando. We were greeted by wonderful and friendly reception staff that actually cared when our room was ready, we were free to go to the parks and were notified by cell phone when our room was ready. It was a warm, beautiful, fully equipped two bedroom suite. My grandson found a vacuum in one of the closets at got so excited, his mother had to explain that it was not " a parting gift" for us to take home. For people traveling with children, the pool makes it a relaxing marvel. The pool area for the children is fully equipped to hold their attention while the adults soak up the sun, use the great relaxing spa, or grab a cool drink from the poolside Bar/Cafe. The resort is located just a short distance from all the parks and even provides shuttle service. We had a WONDERFUL STAY. The staff was helpful and friendly and the room so comfortable I wanted to stay longer. When you go, you will will have a great experience. Linda Lindsay

Reviews.Title: “Best Place for families with kids”
Reviews.Author: Neharshil
Reviews.Content: Excellent staff and 2 bedrooms suite. Very affordable and very clean. No need to rent a car since Trolley service is available and theme park transportation.

Reviews.Title: “Just like the website”
Reviews.Author: zanowski
Reviews.Content: My wife, mother, and two kids (ages 7 & 9) stayed in the two bedroom unit. Rooms were spacious, clean, comfortable, and safe! A GREAT place to stay!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for a place that has large spacious units for multiple guests with great pool and other amenities this is you”
Reviews.Author: timoreno
Reviews.Content: We traveled to Disney for a week and needed 3 bedrooms. We looked at staying on Disney property, however, for the size and number of rooms we needed it would have cost 5 times as much as the Floridays. We had 3 large rooms, 1 with a king and own bathroom and other rooms had 2 twin beds in each which shared another bathroom. I had read some bad reviews on cleanliness but after staying here I have ascertained they must have been written by the competition as the maid service was as good as any Marriott I have stayed at. The hotel has a great location for the parks. Literally down the street from Seaworld and about a 15-20 minute drive to Disney properties. Staff was very courteous and friendly and place while a timeshare property has all the feel of a normal resort with the amneities of home (refrigerator, oven, washer/dryer). This property lived up and exceeded my expectations and I am so glad I did not take to heart the fee outlandish negative reviews.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous for families. Convenient and beautiful...what more could you ask?”
Reviews.Author: Travellots67
Reviews.Content: We were highly impressed with the atmosphere and friendly service at the resort and the 2 bedroom suite was fantastic for our family of 4. We loved making our breakfast before heading out for a long day at one of the parks and also appreciated having the laundry available in our suite. It's in a nice location: just a few miles from Disney for our younger daughter, and just around the corner from a great outlet mall for the older one. Having the supermarket practically next door is convenient. We also liked that the resort was in a quieter area of Orlando, but just a trolley ride from the busier shopping/restaurant sections. We would definitely stay at Floridays again and would recommend it to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for families”
Reviews.Author: arbulluss
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for 10 days with 2 children aged 12 and 13. The 2 Bedroom Apartments are spacious. Having a full kitchen and laundry facilities in the room was an added bonus. Spa in ensuite was also a nice touch. Wireless internet was including with daily resort fee and was a great addition. This was used every night and kids could connect with their iPod's PRO'S: Rooms are very spacious. We stayed in Building "F" which was at the very end of the resort and very peaceful. There is the main pool at front which we did not use as it always seemed full. The second pool closer to our building was great. Plenty of shelter, towels and also had a spa and not busy. Close to Publix supermarket and also near by take away if you do not want to cook. Literally around the corner at Vineland Rd (off memory) is a Premuim Outlet Centre which has great bargains and brand names shops. Housemaids cleaned apartments on a daily basis and were friendly on rare occasions we were there however we needed to leave notes to ask them to remove rubbish/trash and leave dishwashing powder as this was never replaced. CON'S Both toilets in ensuite and main bathroom hardly flushed. In the end we needed to contact reception to have issue rectified. The sliding door to the balcony had no lock so anyone if they were game enough to climb 5 stories could walk into room. Contacted reception and they had this rectified that day. The in house safe was locked and unable to open with code. 3 calls later a safe breaker came to fix it. Had to call reception to organise fresh towels as housekeeping replaced with only 2 and 4 people staying in apartment. The resort cafe is nothing to rave about. We had breakfast there and if you like food with around 4000 calories then this place is for you. The Starbucks coffee is very watery and for a country that prides themselves on coffee Aussie's definately are one up there!! I purchased an Italian Coffee maker from Publix for $12 and made my coffee in the apartment and it was much nicer. Coffee snob maybe... ;-) Overall, I would recommend family and friends to stay at Floridays and especially those with children as works well for young and teenagers. The cons were easily rectified and did not spoil our stay there. I would suggest however to hire a car. This was the way to go. If the hire car company want you to purchase an unlimited toll pass for $30 US do not bother unless you are travelling to Miami. If your intentions are to do the Theme Parks then you will not require this pass, this was an upsell at the airport. DISNEYWORLD You can do Disneyworld in 5 days with teenagers but if you have younger children I would suggest a 7 day pass. We had a 7 day pass and were rather bored by the end of it. Take plenty of money as there are some wonderful gifts to buy. Food was very reasonably priced at all lands. UNIVERSAL STUDIOS Was amazing and Island of Adventure with Harry Potter was the highlight of the trip. Any adult would have a blast and you can purchase a mug of "Butter Beer". Planet Hollywood in Downtown Disney was also very good. I would suggest to book before hand but well worth a look. The Secret Garden on International Drive was amazing. Pure Italian food and sensational service. Skip the appertizers as you will not get thru your main meal.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays Resort Orlando - Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: brent-gladstone
Reviews.Content: We loved everything about Floridays. We got a great rate direct from Floridays reservations. The rooms were spacious and very clean. The kids loved the pool and the adults loved sipping cocktails at the pool bar. All staff at Floridays were very friendly and courteous, especially the Concierge desk. We did not have a car, but found the shuttle service easy to use and it suited our needs. There are 2 shuttles to WDW daily (dropping off at Epcot) and I think a choice of 3 times returning from WDW(again from Epcot). The shuttles were always on time, which we really liked. We did not use the shuttle to Universal Studios. We ate at the Marketplace onsite a few times. The kids especially loved the pizza. We would definitely stay here again if we came to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was a plesant surprise”
Reviews.Author: inditymom
Reviews.Content: I selected Floridays Resort after reading many positive reveiws on Trip Advisor. Our visit was during spring break. Initially, I thought it was too good true and would not live up to the hype. This resort exceeded my expectations. After long, days in the parks, it was a pleasure to come back to the resorts. The condo was spacious and having 2 full baths was a major plus. The full sized kitchen was so convenient. We prepared breakfast and most of our evening meals there. There are plenty of dishes, pots and pans and silverware. The only thing that I did not find was pot holders. In addition to the well supplied kitchen, the condo is equipped with a washer and dryer. The main pool was busy but I never felt like it was overly crowded. There was always plenty of chairs and towels. I loved this place and will defianately recommend it to friends and family and stay again. Although, the resort provides transportation to and from the major parks, it is limited to 3 times in the morning and 3-4 times in the evening. I recommend renting a car so you can come and go at your leisure.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay, close to all attractions”
Reviews.Author: giacomellip
Reviews.Content: The Floridays Resort is a very nice resort. Rooms are very big and comfortable. Excellent price/quality ratio. The resort is very close to most attractions, with SeaWorld only a few blocks away. The main pool is large and nice. Concierge staff was very competent, friendly and helpful with tickets for theme parks and advice on attractions.

Reviews.Title: “best rooms ever”
Reviews.Author: roberta1808
