Reviews.Content: plenty room for your family, nice to be able to wash right in your room and cook if you want.

Reviews.Title: “It's not 5 star; get over it!”
Reviews.Author: geoffbadger
Reviews.Content: Have just spent a very pleasant and enjoyable week at Floridays resort and wanted to add some brief comments to the thousands which have gone before. I, too, read all the reviews before going to Florida, and can't say I was surprised or disappointed with anything. Floridays is ranked number 1 in the hotels in Florida because people enjoy the experience and the hotel in general, NOT because it is 5 star; it isn't, nor does it claim to be! It doesn't have views of mountains and lakes or beautiful scenery- I think that would be a little difficult to organise!- but it is clean, has large living areas, big baths and a nice pool. I like my cleanliness as much as the next woman, and whilst I didn't spend my holiday inspecting corners for cobwebs or moving furniture to check for dried up food, I certainly felt I was staying in a perfectly clean and hygienic place. There's way too much to be doing in Florida to worry about the state of the furniture and I was far too tired after a day in the parks to sweep for dust. Good hotel, can walk to several eateries, shopping nearby great, parks in easy reach, pool clean and plenty of space,(we were there during peak time at Easter), staff helpful but American television is truly awful! Be warned!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay - Clean, comfortable, great layout and location”
Reviews.Author: csfmom
Reviews.Content: Last year we stayed on Disney property, so this time time we decided to skip Disney and explore Universal Parks, SeaWorld & Aquatica. Floridays' is ideally located to these parks & International Drive, easily accessible to all major roads including I4. We had a 2 bedroom suite, located in Building B overlooking the pool, great location. It was very spacious, nicely decorated and clean. The daily refresh service was fine for us, we didn't need to have a full clean for the extra $30, I recommend trying to get a room in Building B because its closest to the main pool. The rooms had all the necessities including a washer & dryer. The night before we were leaving, we got a courtesy call from a manager asking us how our stay was. The resort staff that I dealt with were courteous and accommodating. Floridays was recommended to us by a friend who has stayed there twice - I booked it on Hotels.com and got a great deal! We will definitely go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfection!!!”
Reviews.Author: Familiy_Guy
Reviews.Content: This place is great for a family vacation. We stayed for an entire week and it was very relaxing and enjoyable. The suite was clean and very well decorated. The huge pool was a hit with the kids! We will be going back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Our Floridays experience was awesome!”
Reviews.Author: maricarsalva
Reviews.Content: We were six and we got the three bedroom suite. The place was nice and clean and beautifully decorated. It was very spacious. We got to entertain a group of friends on a Friday night. It was also near Aquatica where we spent our Saturday. To our amazement, It was very near to the outlet stores, the Mary, Queen of Universe Church, Seaworld and Discovery Cove. Yes, and there is Benihana just outside! The hotel staff were all courteous and accommodating. We all enjoyed our stay in Floridays. Thank You.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Holiday”
Reviews.Author: Tracey095
Reviews.Content: This holiday was our first flight so we were very unsure as what to expect. The flight was fine although very long and the staff at Floridays were extremely welcoming and friendly from the minute we arrived to the second we checked out. Nothing was too much trouble. The concierge staff were extremely helpful as were the front desk if we had a request after the concierge desk had closed. The hotel is situated in the quieter end of international drive but the I ride trolley stop is directly over the road for non drivers such as myself. I particularly picked Floridays as it had 3 separate beds which meant that neither myself or my teenage children were sharing a bed, this was the problem with most of the other accommodations that I looked in to. Having a washing machine and tumble dryer was a god send, it meant that we didn't need to travel with many clothes this helped with bringing souvenirs back home with the weight of the cases. Supermarket was 5 minutes down the road or the next I ride trolley stop if you are particularly loaded up. I can't praise this place enough it was exactly what I needeed.

Reviews.Title: “Best in Orlando for the best price.”
Reviews.Author: rpkrph87
Reviews.Content: I live in Florida and have stayed at many Orlando hotels and Disney hotels. Nothing even compares to the rooms and value of Floridays Resort.

Reviews.Title: “Exceptional value”
Reviews.Author: gregero
Reviews.Content: Huge suites for a great price. Everything needed for our week long stay was supplied. Pool was great after long days at the park. Located on international drive within easy distance of everything but not smack in the busiest section made it very easy to get around. This is the place to stay if you need space for family and don't care about staying at a park hotel.

Reviews.Title: “OK but not 5 stars”
Reviews.Author: DaveCamberley_UK
Reviews.Content: Having just spent 12 days at Floriday's I don't understand how everyone rates this hotel so high. We went there based on its rating and whilst it was ok and had some strong points (3 bed room layout is good and location is perfect) we've stayed at other better hotels on our previous trips to Orlando. Maybe too high an expectation but as its rated number one hotel in Orlando I expected something special. Some points the hotel should address: a) The condition of furniture, carpets etc. in our room was below our expectation. It needs refurbishing. Carpet had multiple marks, draws on units would not close and door handles loose and some hanging off. Small things like the TV control having black tape on it because someone had previously obviously lost the battery cover. Small stuff but in a top place they would just replace the handset rather than use black tape on the control. b) With the exception of the cleaning staff we never saw any managers or even had a courtesy call to check how our stay was. You expect a top hotel to be over flowing with staff. Even when we left and paid the bill the lady did not ask how was our stay etc. Very basic service stuff. c) Its noisy if you are anywhere near the pool even at 10pm as people are swimming late (we were in block B). Also the storm drains on the road are loose and make a big noise when cars drove over them. Drives you nuts after a while. d) You have to pay $30 to get a full clean of the room. Whilst you don't expect this every day - if you are staying 12 days you expect a full clean at least every 5-7 days like you get in all other places I've ever stayed. You can't do 12 days without having the floors cleaned etc. e) There is no security gate like you get in every other big hotel I've been to so anyone could drive into the complex and go to the pool for the day. No big deal but when you have young children I don't like the idea that people can just come into the complex. There is a sign saying temporary entrance but no-one explained why or if they intend to build a secure entrance. f) The areas outside the rooms - the floor and lifts etc. needed more cleaning and rubbish was often there for days without anyone picking them up. g) At our times sat around the pool there was no staff cleaning up and it needed it. Maybe I'm being harsh and obviously everyone else thinks its perfect - maybe its about expectation - I'm comparing to places like the Sheraton across the road where we've stayed before and Marriott's in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “excellent resort, great facilities, perfect location, heaven of peace”
Reviews.Author: frans26
Reviews.Content: We thourougly enjoyed this resort. The suite we stayed in (2 bed-rooms) with perfect for us and our 2 grandchildren (6 and 9 years). We enjoyed the pool very much and the whole resort was a haven to come back to after the sometimes craziness of the theme parks. Location is excellent, short drive to restaurants and more busy section of International drive. Next door to Sea World and Acquatica and the Outlet Mall. The daily service in the room concerns simply the picking-up of garbage and changing towels, there is no further cleaning service. Also at the end of the stay there is a 'resort fee' of over 11 US dollars to be paid per day, this is somewhat ridiculous as it concerns services which are either included in any standard hotel services or shoulld only be charged if really needed (WiFi, local calls).

Reviews.Title: “Not what it seems”
Reviews.Author: amywong77
Reviews.Content: I checked in with my family recently on the sixteenth of April. We arrived that night very late. Coming from a colder part of the states my entire family wore jackets. After arriving in the suite, I hung up everyone's jackets in the closets. On the twenty-first when I was getting ready to check out I noticed, I was missing my youngest son's fleece NorthFace jacket. I reported this to the front desk manager and she said she would investigate and call me back. The next day I call her back and she claimed to have checked in with the housekeeping department. They denied seeing the jacket and she said that it was only one jacket that was missing from the bunch and that I probably misplaced it myself. I told her in light of the Florida heat, none of our jackets left the suite considering we would not need to wear it in 90 degree weather, therefore it was left in the closet during our entire stay. The only other person aside from myself who has the key to our suite was the housekeeping and front desk. The manager that called me back said that anything missing was not their responsibility and that she could do nothing about it. As a result in my opinion, if the employees are stealing from the residents and getting away with it, then it is not worth it nor is it safe to stay with Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: MominMacomb
Reviews.Content: I do my research when it comes to places to stay for my family. I had read nothing but positive reviews from different websites about Floriday's but was skeptical since we had one place booked that we were familiar with but thought that we would "try" Floriday's based on the reviews. Boy were the reviews wrong! After driving 19 hours to get to the resort and not sleeping, I was extremely happy that we were able check in right away and the grounds were very well maintained! It all stopped there! Upon walking through the corridor to get to the room, I noticed all of the cob webs and dirt that could have easily been removed with a broom in a short amount of time. I thought, "Oh goodness, I hope this isn't a sign of what the room will look like". Well I was right. As soon as I walked in the door, I saw food all over the front of the stove and dirt all over the refrigerator. Dried food dripped down the cabinets and dirty floors. Then I saw the ripped up chair and popcorn all under the coach and dust everywhere in the living area. I then walked into the spacious, beautiful master bathroom and looked into the jetted tub and saw long dark hair and dirt in it! How disgusting! I immediately sent my husband out to get some cleaning supplies and cleaned! Nothing that you want to do after being up for more than 24 hours! When going to bed at night, there was blood on the sheets and sunflower seeds around the pedestal! Thank goodness there were extra sheets in the linen closet! I didn't dare use the blanket or bedspread to cover up with either! I washed the blanket in the washer/dryer the next day. Also, I washed all of the other bedding for my kids. However, the beds were extremely comfortable. My husband fell asleep on the couch one night and woke up with red marks all over his body and became ill. Bedbugs? The next day we headed down to the overcrowded main pool where chair were sparse and there were leaves all in the pool which we noticed everyday. All it takes is a little skimming on a regular basis! My kids loved the pool however. Our room was located near the smaller pool and people were in it well after closing hours. Thank goodness I brought along some sound machines to drain out the noise! Of the six days that we were at the resort, we only received maid service twice!!!!! One of the service men also almost hit us while driving through the parking lot! He was speeding and not even paying attention to his surroundings. Thank goodness no one was walking in the area at the time! The only positive thing about Floriday's for us was the nice view from our window, the nice decor (even though dirty) in our room, the fact that we booked a two bedroom and received a three bedroom which my kids loved. The comfortable beds and free WiFi. The spaciousness and the nice location. Really loved the outlet mall nearby that we could have walked to! I also thought that the service bags for disposal available to those with pets what a nice touch too. I haven't recommended Floriday's to any friends or family and probably would try staying elsewhere in the future before I would try Floriday's again. We didn't try any of the food offered at the poolside cafe or the game or fitness room due to time constraints but the aroma coming from he cafe sure did smell good! Despite not having a good experience at Floriday's, we had a fabulous family trip that we will never forget!

Reviews.Title: “OK - not great”
Reviews.Author: Traveler60814
Reviews.Content: I travel regularly and this is the first time that I have been truly disappointed with a trip advisor recommendation - and the first time that I have ever written a review. We went for a long weekend vacation and were really looking forward to having extra space and relaxing on the balcony. Basically, the room was in need of repairs/TLC - broken/damaged furniture, missing bathtub drain, missing coffee pot, dusty, very thin mattress. In addition, the balcony had a view of the parking lot and the vacant lot next door with pools of stagnant water and concrete slabs - not exactly relaxing. The management dusted, changed the bedding, provided a coffee pot and repaired the bathtub drain when requested; but I didn't really want to spend my vacation dealing with these issues. Overall, a rather disappointing trip.

Reviews.Title: “First Class Hotel”
Reviews.Author: JCA1967
Reviews.Content: The hotel accommodation is like an appartment with full open plan kitchen (dishwasher and washer/dryer), dining and living area and separate bedrooms each with TV and separate bathrooms (master en-suite with jacuzzi). The facilities and staff are excellent. Ideally located for all the theme parks, International Drive and the massive Premium Outlets discount shopping centre. Would definitely stay here again and recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing rooms !”
Reviews.Author: rhcpbritt
Reviews.Content: The rooms were so clean and spacious ! The room was ready right at check in and it was perfect. I recommend trying to get a room in building B because its closest to the main pool. Try and get a room on the left side if possible because it has the best view.The rooms had all the necessities even a dishwasher and clothes machine+dryer. The pool was great and I loved the sand element at the back, it made it feel more beachy ! The food was amazing and I would highly recommend eating at the resort at least once before you leave. The hotel was minutes away from seaworld/discovery cove/aquatica and universal was around 15/20 minutes away, really convenient ! The grocery store/drugstores were seconds away also. If you don't want to walk or drive, the trolley is also a great option which is just across the street from the resort. All in all, this is a great resort and an amazing value for your money, I myself plan on visiting again in the winter :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value-Top Quality Resort”
Reviews.Author: DfwDisneyFan
Reviews.Content: This resort is the best in Orlando!! I booked my reservation on Travelocity after reading many reviews on several different sites. I was cautiously optimistic about how the resort would actually be. My worries were dissolved as soon as we checked into our suite. The resort was easy to find from the airport, close to anything you could desire on an Orlando vacation, and exactly as advertised. The suites are thoughtfully designed to minimize noise and accomodate families. We were on the 2nd floor in a 2BR/2BA suite in building E and almost never heard those around us. My 3 year old loved the space and we were sad we didn't have more time to check out the pool and other activities on site. My husband noticed staff members at the pool doing special things with the kids. Our room was meticulously clean upon arrival and smelled clean and fresh each of our 7 days there. The housekeeping service was the best and the resort staff was attentive and friendly. This is where we plan to stay anytime we vacation in Orlando in the future. Kudos to the resort for the earth friendly recylcling program, too!

Reviews.Title: “What a great place to return to after a long day at the amusement parks”
Reviews.Author: RedSoxDiva
Reviews.Content: Thrilled with this place. Easy to find from the airport and close to all the Disney parks. My kids just loved the pool and game room. My husband and I loved the cleaniness and comfort of our room. The beds were truly comfortable and the rooms fairly quiet. I wasn't sure what to expect with booking online and was very happy with what we got. The rooms provided some detergent and dish soap for washing dishes in the sink and dishwasher and the washing machine -very nice bonus. Housekeeping was very good to us, we stayed in Building C and Karen was a gem! We will be sure to recommend this place and stay here on our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Second time here, still great.”
Reviews.Author: pwruser
Reviews.Content: This is my families second trip to Disney World where we stayed at Floridays Resort. The first time was 4 years ago with one child who was 3 and a half. This time was with both kids ages 3 and a half and 7 and a half. Both times we have stayed at Floridays it has been a good value, very clean, well run and maintained, with very friendly and accomodating staff. The two bedroom suites we rented are always perfect and spotless. The grounds are well cared for and any staff we meet in the halls, elevators, etc are quick with a smile and friendly. The pool is clean and lots of fun and the cafe bar has good food and is well priced. The pool can get a bit crowded on some days but when it's hot thats to be expected. Avoid the holidays and spring breaks if your looking for a less crowded stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, and great value”
Reviews.Author: lisaover
Reviews.Content: We just returned for a visit in Orlando, and this was such a nice place, and a great value for the money. Our condo was a 3 bedroom, with 2 bathrooms, a nice sized kitchen and eating area, and a den. The Master bedroom had a great bathroom! Very convenient to Seaworld and Universal. Publix was just right down the street, shopping and restaurants close by too. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay - comfortable, affordable, and nice”
Reviews.Author: FloridaFunJR
Reviews.Content: The Floridays Resort was a great place to stay. From the welcoming front desk clerks, to the housekeepers who did a wonderful job of cleaning and attending to our needs everything was wonderful. We stayed in the two bedroom suite which was roomy and comfortable. It was nice to have the option to make food in the kitchen when you didn't want to eat out. A short ride on the I-Trolly gets you to the grocery store and outlets. It also takes you to Sea World and Aquatica. Complimentary shuttles provided by the hotel took us to Disney World. The main pool area was great. The kids loved it. You get all this for an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Resort!”
Reviews.Author: blg2011
Reviews.Content: Our visit to the Floridays was excellent. We had the 2 room suite and the place was just spacious and very comfortable. We were able to eat our meals in or out, depending on our mood. The resort is very close to everything, including the outlet mall, disney world, universal, and the restaurant row on international drive. There is even a grocery store nearby as well. Concierge is helpful and can even print out the map you! Front desk staff are great. Will return again on our next visit to Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is a Wonderful Resort”
Reviews.Author: nancys2935
Reviews.Content: I booked this Resort on line and was a little leary that Floridays would live up to my expectations. I was wrong! Floridays is a wonderful resort. The rooms were comfortable, clean and had loads of space. Equiped with a TV in each bedroom, high speed wireless internet, comfortable surroundings and 20 minutes from the Gate of Disney World. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location to visit parks or shopping.”
Reviews.Author: CharlesE1957
Reviews.Content: Second time visiting Floridays. Perfect for families who wish easy access to grocery stores or shopping who don't have a car. Staff very friendly and helpful. Well worth the value. Our family will be coming back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: JoliJack
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in August 2010 it is a very nice hotel. It is very clean and tidy. The staff are always helpful Especially "Ray" . There is a small shop at the resort which to be honest I would not recommend as it is expensive. There is a Publix within 5 mins walk which we used. The publix has everything you need and if you are using travellers Cheques they will cash up to $200 per day. When we stayed at the hotel we had a room near the elevator, we found it a bit hard to get a full nights sleep due to the noise of the Elevator. The Housekeeping was also very good. The Resort overall is Very good.

Reviews.Title: “Not disappointed”
Reviews.Author: Globetrotter25
Reviews.Content: we stayed with a friend in a 2 bedroom. plenty of space, excellent housekeeping, everybody is extremely friendly and helpful. Location is unbeatable, disney, seaworld, outlets , restaurants and publix in WALKING DISTANCE. the appartment and the compound is EXTREMELY clean. My only complaint, the pool isn't. Because of the palmtrees and plants around it it is full of leaves and things and nobody takes them out. Besides that it is agreat pool 0 entry for little children and we would definitely return there anytime.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful resort- close to Seaworld and Universal Studios”
Reviews.Author: qtmama
Reviews.Content: I have recently stayed at Disney resorts when visiting Orlando. This time we decided to skip Disney and explore other activities in Orlando. Floridays is close to Seaworld and Universal Studios. We were close enough to the East Coast that we took a day trip to Cocoa Beach and visited Kennedy Space Center. Thanks for providing a relaxing condo to come back to at the end of the day. The pool area is also beautiful. And everyone at the hotel was kind and helpful. Thanks for a wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “As good as I'd hoped”
Reviews.Author: wasukasa
Reviews.Content: Well now I'm spoiled and won't ever want to stay at a hotel again. Having two bedrooms, and separate beds for the kids was great (so I didn't have to hear them complain about a fold-out couch). Having the kitchen so we could fix our own breakfasts was priceless-- it saved us a ton of money, made it easier to get ready earlier, and was wonderful for the fact that we have a daughter with a gluten allergy and didn't always want to eat out. Our room was in building E and very close to the back pool. It worried me that it would be loud since we're early-to-bed, but noise was never a problem. We loved the two families of ducks that were living in the pond right outside. The rooms were great, and I have to say the beds were the most comfortable hotel beds I've ever slept on. We would absolutely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Lives up to the high ratings!”
Reviews.Author: Ionaeus
Reviews.Content: My family arrived last Saturday. I was nervous as this was our first stay at Floridays. What a terrific place! Very nice grounds, lobby and well-manicured facilities. A short check-in and we were off to our 2-bedroom suite. Lovely rooms, very quiet and about everything that you could want. The Publix around the corner and the Wal-Greens are close enough that you could walk to them I suppose. Shopping at the outlet mall we shop at every year was probably a minute away from the hotel entrance. Parks are close as you are sort of in the middle being on International Drive. Sea World is very close. There is a reason this place ranks so highly. It really did live up to our expectations. It's a bargain compared to many places that we've stayed at in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Great times at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: JaguarJudy
Reviews.Content: Everything was exceptional. We felt very well taken care of . Grandkids especially loved the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Loved It!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: karenBoston
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a great trip in Florida. We were in Orlando for a total of 10 days. Our first 4 days were at Floridays then we had booked for the remaining of our trip at the Boardwalk Villas in Disney. Well after one day of staying in the Disney park we wished we could go back to Floridays. The rooms at Foridays were dynamite. I traveled with my husband and three kids and my father. we had a 3 bedroom condo and it was perfect. Everyone had their own space and it was so well designed for everyone to sleep in peace and quiet. At Disney we were cramped into a 1 bedroom room for 6 times the amount and everything was sooooo crowded. I loved the pool at Floridays and my kids loved the entertainment. At night it was fun to watch the kids swim in the pool while we sat at the poolside restaraunt and bar. I dont know what else to say but I will tell everyone how awesome Floridays was. Great Job to everyone that works there. Thanks for great stay....

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay very very close to everything!!!”
Reviews.Author: superstar811
Reviews.Content: My family and i stay in the 3 bedroom could'hv stayed in a 2 bedroom it was perfect we had more than enough room i will return with our family of 7 check in was very easy we stayed in room 412 very good choice close to the main pool also we had wi-fi

Reviews.Title: “Great resort, very clean and beautiful pool, very family friendly”
Reviews.Author: MLJ2011
Reviews.Content: My mom and I stayed here for a weekend getaway and it was beautiful. We had a two bedroom suite and it was very spacious, clean and comfortable. There were tons of young families and lots of kids there (not a singles scene) and the pool was big and had live music. About a 15 min drive to Universal and a 2 min drive to the outlet mall!

Reviews.Title: “Have stayed before and just love this area”
Reviews.Author: lillianbrush
Reviews.Content: Stayed with another family in a 3 bedroom condo. All of us (6) were comfortable and able to sit and visit. The girls could go to other friends rooms and visit as well as all adults could get together in one room.

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel close to Disney”
Reviews.Author: nadajoey
Reviews.Content: This condo complexe is just 5 years old. It is brand new! About 5km to a local Walmart and about 3 min to Seaworld. Disney parks are approx 10 minutes drive. This place is excellent for kids, they have a nice pool section just for kids. Service is impeccable and the rooms are furnished with oven, fridge, dishwasher, washer and dryer. I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this place, I was super satsified and so was my wife and 3 year old. FREE INTERNET!! Case in point: I forgot my ipod in my room and only realized it when I got back home. I figured, no chance in hell that lost and found would have picked it up.. well.. guess what... just got a call from housekeeping and they found it and will ship it back to my house.. That is real honestly.. not many places would have done this.. email me if you need any additional info, my pleasure to help, nadajoey@sympatico.ca A++++++

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was great value with many amenities”
Reviews.Author: j9dellagrotte
Reviews.Content: My good friend and I decided to go to Orlando but really wanted our own room and bath. Floridays worked out really well for us. We could watch TV in the living room together but could also watch TV alone in our own rooms. The Publix and Walgreens were a 5-10 minute walk away and the I-Trolley stopped in front of the Hotel. There was also a shuttle to the theme parks, so no car was needed.. The pool was warm and beautiful . We found that many parents watch their kids from their lounge chairs.So it did get a little crazy with balls being thrown and kids in the hot tub while their parents lounged and didn't really care what their kids were doing. Not the Hotel's fault but annoying just the same. The staff were very friendly and helpful especially Ray who showed us around our suite. The washer and dryer was a great plus. . It was a great place but probably too big if just my husband and I needed a hotel . I would recommend for families or singles traveling together who want their own space.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful rooms and pool all at a great value. Great for families traveling together.”
Reviews.Author: Cor1
Reviews.Content: Booked online and got a special rate. Great place to stay with family with full kitchen, dining area and living room. So much better than staying in a hotel. Grocery store around the corner as well as a pharmacy. The second bedroom had full size beds which were too small for 2 people to sleep in one bed. No mirrors in the bedrooms. Those were the only things I would say negative. The place was so nice and we really enjoyed our stay. Decor was beautiful and the staff was amazing. Very welcoming and willing to accomodate your requests. I would definitely recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing fancy but great value”
Reviews.Author: jacknmacksmom
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with our two kids (5 & 6) around spring break. The pool is really great with a splash park shallow area and deeper part for adults and older kids. The rooms are huge and well stocked with all the amenities a family would need. The rooms do not have full maid service unless you pay extra. They will take your garbage, change your towels and make your bed, but that's it. It shows a bit that the rooms are not being maintained. They are clean but a bit shabby. The bedspreads were also a bit questionable. One of them was so dirty we moved it to another room because of the smell. It is a minor oversight and I'm sure had we called the front desk they would have replaced it. They were very responsive to problems. All in all, for the relatively moderate rate we paid, this was an excellent value and great for families.

Reviews.Title: “I loved it....Like a home away from home”
Reviews.Author: mammafox
Reviews.Content: nice and clean and roomy would go back again I got to use the pool the family loved it and we got to stay a extra day will go back again and again

Reviews.Title: “A comfortable and convenient resort - perfect!”
Reviews.Author: SAM719
Reviews.Content: Our stay at Floridays was a very short 4 days, but quite comfortable and an extremely convenient location close to all the major theme parks. Regretably, we didn't have enough time to enjoy the pool, but our suite provided the restful atmosphere we needed at the end of our very long days at Disney World. Housekeeping was wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “WE ARE GOING BACK”
Reviews.Author: jeanneegirl
Reviews.Content: We found this property by accident! I booked not really knowing what we would get. I have read reviews in the past for other properties only to find we were disappointed when we got there. THIS IS NOT THE CASE AT FLORIDAYS!!! We could not believe how beautifully kept the grounds, pool area and condos were! I have NEVER stayed anywhere that provided better customer care. The friendly, attentive staff made it a real joy to be there - we enjoyed it so much we booked our next winter vacation the week we got back home. High praise for this resort and dedicated staff! It is our all time favorite.

Reviews.Title: “Wow!”
Reviews.Author: rrappstate
Reviews.Content: I can't think of where to start so I will just say that this was the perfect location for our Orlando vacation. It was an easy drive to Disney and Sea World. The condo had everything we could have needed. The master bath was outstanding. Our three year old loved the pool. Simply put, stay here!

Reviews.Title: “The suite was great, very homey”
Reviews.Author: AJSDco
Reviews.Content: Having a full kitchen and a washer dryer was great for having 4 kids traveling. Room was clean and quite spacious. We left a few electronics behind and the cleaning staff mailed them to us promptly, which was over and above and very much appreciated. My daughter was crushed that she left behind her ipod and was happy to get it back. Nice pool.

Reviews.Title: “Wow! Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: Goodwrj
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Floridays Resort Orlando surpassed all of our expectations. The grounds are immaculate. The condo was clean with everything in working order. The staff were friendly, polite, helpful and extremely knowledgeable about Orlando and the theme parks. We had a wonderful time and already planning our next visit to the Floridays Resort Orlando. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was great for our big family!”
Reviews.Author: jonomalley
Reviews.Content: We brought 6 of our kids and stayed in a 3 bedroom at Floridays. I thought the location was great and the cost (it ended up being $265/night after all the annoying hotel fees) was reasonable for such a large hotel. Great master bedroom and large additional bedrooms. Large living area. Great pool! Friendly staff. Well run establishment. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “SUPERB”
Reviews.Author: shawncarr08
Reviews.Content: One of the most important aspects of vacationing for me and my family is being treated well and having a clean well maintained enviroment. This hotel has it all. The staff is gracious, professional, patient and kind. The rooms are beautiful. Although I am not rich, it is well worth the price and I would save up just to vacation here every year.

Reviews.Title: “The Total Package”
Reviews.Author: Roadscholar2000
Reviews.Content: Floridays never disappoints. We have stayed with them on four different occasions and have always appreciated the clean rooms and pool area, as well as the safe atmosphere . Service at both the Marketplace grill and bar are friendly and efficient. Rooms are spacious and provide some "alone time" after busy days at the area attractions. Floridays is conveniently located to major attractions and eateries (both "fancy" and regular family-fare). I recommend it highly to couples, families and those "born-again couples" known as empty-nesters!

Reviews.Title: “Well used.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We liked the pool. Rooms and furniture are well used. The second bathroom was not clean when we checked in. There were hair on thefloor and furniture had stains. Staff is friendly, and try to resolve issues.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: jtech_us
Reviews.Content: This resort offered everything we were looking for. Conveniently located, enough space for our family of five, unbeatable value and wonderful pools. We will definitley stay at Floridays on our next trip to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic value for money...”
Reviews.Author: unh_acadia
Reviews.Content: Floridays easily met or exceeded our expectations across the board. The suites are large and comfortable, and very welcoming after a long, fun day at the parks. We stayed in Building E with a view of the water. Our room was nice and quiet at night, but still only a short walk to the hub of activity at the main building, which featured a large pool area and a family-friendly poolside bar with good sandwiches and Sam Adams on tap -- the poolside bar is a great place to chill out in the evening, strike up conversations with other guests, and share information and experiences about the many attractions in Orlando. Another plus is the quality of the Concierge service. They did a wonderful job of providing us with park information and scheduling our shuttle service (as well as a taxi on one occasion). Moreover, you can purchase a variety of park tickets right at the Concierge desk and, thus, avoid the ticket windows at the parks.

Reviews.Title: “Depends on what you compare it to”
Reviews.Author: TSmith167
Reviews.Content: Nice place when you compare to other hotels. We travel to Orlando, 2 or 3 weeks a year. We usually stay at Sheraton Vistana Resort or Orange Lake, however we had a couple of extra days on this trip and wanted to give Floriday's a shot to be added to our rotation based on the reviews here on trip advisor. Compared to the other 2 places we normally stay, I would rate this 3rd out of the 3. The living space is a little tighter here. One of the things that kind of bothered me the most was that you could not set the temperature below 71 in the room. I like it cooler than that when I sleep. It seemed very warm in here and I wondered if maybe it really was more like 75 or 76. It is obvious that they try to conserve energy ( which I am all for ) but it is to the detriment of the consumer. It is also pretty dark in the rooms. One thing that bothers me a little by all three places is that they flat screen tv's ( only one in the living room here) , but none of them provide HD tv. I am watching the final 4 tonight and it would be much better if it were in HD. Overall a nice place to stay when compared to hotels, but when compared to the other 2 resorts, I would choose either one of them first.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the Room and the Beds were very Comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: Chiln
Reviews.Content: We just left Floridays and could not be happier! The resort is so close to all the Disney parks and the airport. We had a room facing the pool and the view was awesome!! The rooms are big and comfortable. There was a place for everything including the snacks we bought. The washer/dryer in the room was perfect because it rained a few days and we needed to dry our clothes and shoes. The beds were so comfortable and the master bathroom was huge! We will definitely be back as long as the prices stay low. Check out Bennihana's next door, it had great food and a fun atmosphere. Floridays is on the quiet part of International drive which is nice because you do not run into all the traffic. There is a public and a Subway right next door which was very convenient. We will be back!!! Thanks Floridays for making our trip so special!

Reviews.Title: “Everything we needed plus free shuttles and a great pool!”
Reviews.Author: FunMom21
Reviews.Content: Pros: Friendly staff, really great heated pool for kids, room had everything you could need, free shuttles to Seaworld and Disney, pictures of room are accurate, parking included in resort fee not extra which was nice Area for improvement: Our room was not 100% as clean as I would've liked but it was nothing major - certainly didn't ruin the many other positives. Tips: The I-Ride Trolley was very helpful for us - we used the hotel shuttles but if we wanted to return at different times, the trolley was an option. Kids ride free. We used Garden Grocer and they were great! Hotel made sure our food was in our room when we arrived. There is a grocery store close by if you have a car and want to pick up a few things - also, we saw a liquor store in the same complex as the grocery store.

Reviews.Title: “This place is great”
Reviews.Author: tina12380
Reviews.Content: This is a great place for families. Good value and lots of space in the room. The pool for perfect for my kids (9,8 and 3) - they had it warmed up which was great. This is the second time we have stayed and I would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Minor flaws, but overall great stay!”
Reviews.Author: AV815
Reviews.Content: The master shower didn't drain properly and the trash room out in the hallway was overflowing for two days, and still hadn't been cleaned when we left. The condo itself was great! It had plenty of space, and was very clean and updated. My wife is clean-freak, and she was impressed with the condo. The location was pretty good as well. Only about 15 minutes or so to Disney (Depending on traffic), and only 5 minutes to SeaWorld. It is also very close to the Premium Outlet Malls and lots of restaurants. As far as ammenities, the pool and workout room weren't as large as other Orlando resorts that I've stayed in, but they were in good condition and very nice. Buildings A and B are right on the pool, and were pretty noisy, especially when there was live entertainment going on.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay with the family...dare I say TOO much room???”
Reviews.Author: sactosource
Reviews.Content: I recently extended a business trip in Orlando, FL to bring out the family and have fun at Disney World. We had a 3 bedroom suite at Floridays and the room was FANTASTIC. In all honesty there was almost too much room! With a kitchenette, living area, dining area, master suite and 2 bedrooms we had PLENTY of room for the family and we'd probably opt for the 2 bedroom suite next time around (the 3 bedroom would be great for 3 couples or a family of 6+). Our teenage daughters enjoyed the pool, the convenience center was nice for a quick breakfast/snacks, and the poolside restaurant offered a nice lunch. The ONLY real downside to the stay was the resort recommended transportation. The resort offers complimentary shuttles to Disney World but since I am disabled and in a wheelchair, we needed to opt for a taxi. Using the hotel recommended taxi service was quick (waiting on-site), but we had to pay an addition $14 for access to the park (the taxi we used the day before Mears Transportation did NOT require this charge). In addition to this extra charge they charged an additional $3.50 to use a debit card instead of cash. To sum it up, GREAT resort, beautiful pool and grounds, spacious rooms and friendly staff, but call Mears Transportation if you to save $ on a cab.

Reviews.Title: “Recommend it to all family with kids. It's right across Premium Outlet and right beside Publix supermarket and Walgreen.”
Reviews.Author: monkey_mouse11
Reviews.Content: The only complain was that the showerhead wasn't the greatest when taking a shower and it leaks when turnoff, leaving the washroom floor wet. The other washroom has a leak when the toilet was flushed. The toilet wasn't overflowing, but water can be seen on the floor around it. We didn't bother calling for a fix and good thing, we didn't slip. Well, we hope they will fix those minor things. We stayed in building "A" room 309. For your convenience and since you're paying $12 each day, rent a car. Renting a car comes handy and save you a lot of time when it comes to getting around even though some places are walking distance. There's no roadway for pedestrian to walk when going to Publix Supermarket, Walgreen, or any stores inside this plaza. It's a nice hotel and the staffs are nice. We would book Floridays for our next stay in the future.

Reviews.Title: “A great value for a family vacation with plenty of room to relax and spread out”
Reviews.Author: OhioDolFan
Reviews.Content: Hotel staff was extremely friendly, pleasant and helpful! At the end of every response or after a thank you, the response was ALWAYS "my pleasure". We truly felt like welcome guests and the staff's attitudes were always sincere and genuine. It is a large property with a number of buildings that can be a ways in terms of walking distance from the main pool. This could be an issue with small children. We opted to drive to/from the pool as opposed to walk or wait/rely on the bellman to shuttle us. The most annoying thing we experienced was the abundance of fresh speed bumps in the parking lots. Beware and slowdown or risk losing an axel <g> ...

Reviews.Title: “Extremely difficult to beat on value and location!”
Reviews.Author: 5hesk
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed here several times and have thoroughly enjoyed ourselves on each occassion. We have recommended this resort to family and friends and they have agreed with our assessment. On our first visit to Orlando we stayed in a hotel at the other end of I Drive (which is in desperate need of a face lift) and had to rent two rooms which wasn't ideal due to us having a young family. Security was a concern even though the rooms were adjacent to each other. However prior to our next visit we discovered Floridays, which offered 2 and 3 bedroom fully equipped condos at a rate less than our previous holiday. Incredible value considering you have a spacious apartment offering comfortable living, the option of dining in or out, child security whereby your kids are sleeping within the confines of your own area, oppossed to that of a hotel room off a communal corridor, and the majority of facilities you would expect to see in a Floridian Resort. Easy to find, easy on the pocket and easy to relax and enjoy your holiday!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, great family hotel for a great value”
Reviews.Author: gobearsgo5
Reviews.Content: Our week long stay at the Floridays Resort in Orlando was awesome. Since we have 5 children, ages 15 to 3, we stayed in a 3 bedroom. The suite was clean, roomy and comfortable. With the 5 kids, clean is the most important criteria for us. The kitchen had an easy & convenient set-up, and we ate several meals in house. The living room had a beautiful nice-size plasma tv, and we had several movie nights with the kids. Each bedroom also had tvs, so if the little ones didn't want to watch the chosen movie, they could go to their rooms and watch one of their favorite shows. The pool at Floridays is awesome...and one of the weekend days that we were there, they had a dj set-up poolside. She played fun music and invtied the kids to play different games (hoola-hoop contest, etc). The hotel is one block from a Walgreens with a Redbox, and also near a Wal-mart grocery store and several restaurants. It is an easy ten minute drive to Disney's theme parks as well. The Premiere Outlet Mall, which is literally just around the corner from the Floridays, is nice but doesn't have many stores that appeal to 13 and 9 year old girls. You may want to choose a different mall if you plan to shop for an afternoon with children.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent room design and good value”
Reviews.Author: PJZ1109
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay; room was quiet and comfortable. Kids loved the pool. Close to Orlando amenities.

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay”
Reviews.Author: Joey O
Reviews.Content: This was our second time staying at Floriday's Resort. We had another fantastic stay. The staff was great. We will be back and highly recommend Floriday's to anyone visiting Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “This was definitely the place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: marchbreak11
Reviews.Content: My stay was March 13- 17, 2011. Very easy to get to from airport. The staff was so pleasant and friendly upon arrival. Greeted us with smiles and friendliness. Right after I checked in I asked for the address to the closest Wal-Mart so I could enter it into our GPS and the gentleman behind the desk (Wilem) not only looked up the address for me but he was so kind that he printed the directions out for me. Room was clean. I was amazed when I first walked in. You read reviews all the time and didn't know what to expect. We walked in and wow, we had a full kitchen w fridge, stove, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, separate dining area, living room, nice size balcony and our bedroom had a king size bed-lots of pillows, an ensuite w a jacuzzi, separate shower while the kids room had two double beds and there was even another bathroom for them. Blow dryers in each bathroom and 3 tvs. Did I mention the washer and dryer? The five of us stayed very comfortable. It was a little condo! Staff is very friendly and always very helpful. I pay attention to small detail that when I called down to the concierge for wake up calls and they even addressed me by name at the end of our conversation when I simply only gave my room number. Very central to everything. All the parks are not even 10 driving minutes away. Close to premium outlet mall-literally around the corner. I will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Orlando. Loved it! Rm F611

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: KristiS98
Reviews.Content: My family has stayed here three times before, and will choose to stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Never want to stay anywhere else in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: SJudge
Reviews.Content: This resort was great. The suites - we had a 2 bedroom- are like having your own apartment. The full kitchen was great, and loved having two bathrooms- it makes getting out the door in the morning so much quicker. The beds were very comfortable, nice tvs in each bedroom and the living room. Nicely decorated, very clean. We spent a lot of time at the main pool area. My son also enjoyed playing in the 'beach' (sandbox) area. The food at the poolside restaraunt/grill was GREAT. We ate there almost every day. Try the blackened chicken quesedilla or chicken caesar wrap- they were delicious. The one thing I wish I had known before I went was that each room has a DVD player. So you could bring movies with you. We tried to borrow one from the lobby library one night, but the selection was not great and they were very expensive- I think $6. A tip, the Walgreens and 7-11 right around the corner both have a Redbox, so that would be a good place to rent. One downside, the bedroom facing the courtyard was a little noisy- you could hear people going to and from their suites at night. It was really only a problem one night, when there was a particularly loud group I think probably partying and yelling. The rest of the time, we didn't have any problems with noise. There is a Benihana right in the parking lot and International drive restaraunts just a short drive. Also close by is Sea World, DIscovery Cove, and Aquatica. Prime Outlets Vineland Ave is right around the corner, as is a Publix grocery store. Would highly recommend this resort to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded expectations, very clean, very nice, awesome pool”
Reviews.Author: angell7777
Reviews.Content: recommend this for large families. Very nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay at Floridays again!”
Reviews.Author: hirte38
Reviews.Content: Loved the "apartment" type room! Lots of space for our family of 5, and with the washer and dryer would could pack less and not have to check any bags on our flight. It was great to have the Publix grocery store right around the corner. Saved money by eating breakfast and dinner at "home" before and after our long park days. Pool area was so fun. There's even a large sand play area that our 6 year old enjoyed, right next to the pool. We would surely stay at Floridays again should we ever do a week of the parks again. We also loved the whirlpool bath that was in the master bathroom. A couple of nights it was too late (and we were too tired!) to head to the pool so the kids just put on their suits and enjoyed the whirpool tub together with bubbles. They thought it was great fun! I should mention that we stayed in building B and there was something going on with a gas pump leak on the roof. We never smelled a thing in our room, but we were on the top floor and the smell was very noticible in the open air hallway from our room to the elevator. One morning the fire dept was there and it was obvious there was not an immediate emergency. They were standing around talking and not seeming to be in a rush about anything. A housekeeper who happened to see me watching the situation from the window by the elevator said to me that it was something to do with the gas pump on roof but was fixed now. The rest of that day the smell was gone, but upon exiting our room the following morning, it was present again for sure. That was when we were checking out, so I don't know anything more. Might be worth checking out if you're wanting to stay in building B! I just feel pretty nervous if I smell natural gas!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this resort”
Reviews.Author: TinaI2011
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay at with family. The staff at Floridays always responded quickly to all of our needs with a smile. The unit was clean and had every thing we needed. WIFI is now available in all the rooms which we didn't expect. It's a 15 min drive to the parks and 2 min drive to Publix, Walgreens and 5 Min to a 24 hour Walmart. Loved out stay and would recommend this hotel to every one.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to return to the resort”
Reviews.Author: Tammyno
Reviews.Content: Our family had a wonderful stay at Floridays. Started with friendly front desk service. The suite was clean, spacious, and well equiped. Our family was very comfortable. The resort grounds are well kept and beautifully landscaped. Our favorite area is the pool by far. Our 6 year old granddaughter loved playing in the kids splash pool and our 14 year old son had a blast swimming in the spacious deeper end. Everything from the poolside bar to the arcade to the market cafe was excellent. We went to Disney several days but always looked forward to being in the resort. We will definetly visit this resort again. And can honestly say there is nothing negative about Floridays Resort.

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful time!”
Reviews.Author: radu14
Reviews.Content: Our family had a wonderful time at this hotel. The staff was extremely nice and polite. They went far beyond their duty to make us feel comfortable and special. The concierge was friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. When he heard that we were not going to use the shuttle of the hotel to visit the parks, he gave us written instructions to each park from the hotel and back. Later, we found out that without these instructions is very easy to get lost. The hotel is clean and the location is great, close to everything. There is a Walgreens very close to the hotel and also a large grocery store.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is incredible!”
Reviews.Author: maks728
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best hotels we have ever stayed in as a family. The rooms are huge which is a plus when you are traveling with 3 kids. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite that had 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, full kitchen, dining area, living area and washer and dryer! The pool area is great for kids of all ages. The hotel is close to all the parks and there is an amazing outlet mall just a few minutes away. Also, there is a Publix very close by for groceries, a Benihana in the hotel parking lot and a Panera hidden around the corner on Vineland (near Outlet mall). And, if you want pizza - Flippers and Giordanos (mmmm) are great dinner delivery options. Oh, and the housekeeping staff was awesome, especially Maricel, who gave us great tips on navigating Universal Studios. We loved our stay in Orlando and thank for Floridays for being a big part of our experience. We will definitely return soon!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Kmar48325
Reviews.Content: We are what you would consider 5 star stayers..we always stay at suite properties on site...we needed a 3 night stay in the Sea World/Universal area. We have 4 kids 13-10-8-7 and brought along my 13 y/o niece on this trip..so 7 travelers...we booked the 3 bedroom unit. The PRICE was sooo cheap that I figured the property was going to be too....Well the property was AWESOME!!! Washer and dryer were a great feature. I req a room near the main building we got building A. Very close with kids wanting the pool it was a must for us. The pool was awesome. Plenty of activities for the kids. The pool bar/rest was great and reasonably priced. The grocery store is CONVIENTLY located practically next door. Outlet shopping a stones throw away and if you are Catholic the church is about 1 mile! We will definatley be back if our timeshare at WDW doesn't have space for us or we run out of points which happens all the time cuz we HEART FLA!!! Ohh and the conceirge was sooo delightful. I wish I could remember the gentlemans name that helped me buy my Uni tix because he was a joy and sooo helpful and didn't stop smiling! Staff was a delight!!!! There was also a Japanese rest right out the front of the hotel we ate there and enjoyed it and found it reasonable. Just don't order a Manhattan Up cuz they had no clue how to make that!! LOL

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful resort in great location for a good price”
Reviews.Author: vicki2010
Reviews.Content: I booked the Floriday for our Spring Break trip to Disney World. I booked through Expedia and got a great deal. We weren't sure whether to stay onsite at Disney or outside. So glad we stayed at the Floriday - we had so much room (a 2 bedroom unit), and it was great to be able to buy a few groceries, and eat breakfast in our room, etc. It was very close to the Disney parks (10-15 minute drive), and close to lots of great restaurants. All of the hotel employees were extremely friendly. We were located in Building E, which was towards the back of the complex, which was fine with us, because we were right beside the smaller pool, which was much less busy than the big pool closer to the front of the complex. Everything was very clean and comfortable. We would definitely go back, and would recommend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “A TRIP TO REMEMBER”
Reviews.Author: sissonridge
Reviews.Content: housekeeping was slack..they never left enough towel sets, dishwasher detergent or toilet paper.... beautiful place..beautiful pool...close to trolley and shopping on international drive....very quiet at night....the bar and kitchen staff were excellent....the front desk staff were very helpful....made good recommendations about disney, universal and seaworld.....

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Value”
Reviews.Author: TWood32
Reviews.Content: Traveled to Disney with my family and extended family and this hotel was perfect. Suites were roomy and always had enough privacy. Suites had a full kitchen with all the needed appliances (toaster, coffee maker, blender, etc and plenty of dishes). The grocery store is in walking distance so i would recommend taking advantage of this versus eating at the hotel cafe which really was not that good. All in all this was a great find and would recommend to all travelers. Also an easy 15 min drive to Disney World.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Disney trip w fabulous accomodations!!!:)”
Reviews.Author: fitzus
Reviews.Content: Stayed 5 days at Floridays Resort w my husband and 3 teens from March 15-19, 2011..Stayed in the 3 bdrm suite at Floridays Resort and it felt like a home away from home.Very spacious, clean and comfortable.Had a beautiful pool view room with a balcony.Had Garden Grocer.com deliver all our ordered items prior to us checking in and everything was placed into our room and necessary items refrigerated.This resort could not have been any better or mor accomodating.It is within a 10-15 min drive of each park.We rented a vehicle and that gave us the freedom to come and go as we pleased without having to use the shuttle service, which is quite limited from what I heard and books up fast..so if no spots were available on the shuttle it did sound like you would be stuck for rides to the parks..We visited the Disney parks and also Universal and Islands Of Adventure..fantastic trip with spectacular weather the entire stay.We also dined out at local restaurants and had wonderful meals.The Tommy Bahama restaurant close by was delicious and very pretty.Would definitely go back again for another meal there..So, yes we loved it from start to finish.I HIGHLY reccom this resort and definitely will stay here again.The value and space in our suite compared to staying on site in Disney is far superior and away from the major crowds and traffic that surrounds the Disney parks.The pool was beautiful, clean and warm.Plenty of lounge chairs and tables with umbrellas too.Even the pool side bathrooms were kept extremely clean.Lots of pool towels always available..Never at a loss for smiling faces on guests and the hotel staff and most importantly, my family..We did not want to leave!!!!We have stayed at Disneys Polynesian Resort and also the Contemporary Resort, so I feel I can objectively compare the hotels, on site vs off site Disney.I was skeptical about staying off site and not having the monorail system at my door.It was not even an issue after all.I HIGHLY reccom also purchasing the EXPRESS PASS that is offered for Universal/IOA parks.It's quite an extra expense per tkt but is is sooo worth it.We went to the front of the wait lines on most rides in these two parks.What would have been hours of waiting in lines actually turned into minutes. Our time is so limited while here and to be able to save hours of waiting and getting frustrated ,hot and tired from waiting in lines was by far the best investment made while there! Believe me, some lines were 2-3 hour wait times.With EXPRESS PASS, only minutes for us! Express it ALWAYS from now on!You will NOT regret that extra expense, I promise!! :)

Reviews.Title: “Great location and accomodations for the price!!”
Reviews.Author: elizabethhermans
Reviews.Content: We always stay at Floridays because of the size of the rooms and the location to the Disney parks. Compared with other resorts, there is no question that the price is excellent. For a family of four with two young children, you can not beat the fully stocked kitchen and the size of the two bedrooms, living room and dining room. The rooms are getting a little used, but still great!

Reviews.Title: “Roomy and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: barbiegrl
Reviews.Content: I loved everything about our stay here. The location was easily accessible, but slightly out of the crazy traffic areas. Once you enter the resort, it is very quiet and relaxing. There are five or six separate units with six floors of rooms each. We were in a unit near the main pool, so going to the pool and cafe was convenient. Some of the units are further back on the property which requires more walking. Smaller pool is available at the back part of the property. We took advantage of the full kitchen and went to the Publix grocery which is conveniently out the main entrance and around the corner. The units are spacious and I loved having a balcony. Everything was quiet, I didn't hear any noise from neighboring units. Pool has a nice kiddie play area and had music and entertainment during the day on Saturday. Outlet mall is just around the corner and there is a trolley stop right at the main entrance that can take you to all attractions. We had a rental car and it was easy to access routes to everywhere we wanted to go, but we liked being slightly away from the touristy chaos. If I had to say anything negative, maybe parking is an issue depending on which unit you are staying in. We didn't have any issues. I would definitely return, and would probably request placement in the same building just to guarantee we didn't end up at the back end of the property.

Reviews.Title: “Totally exceeded our expectations.”
Reviews.Author: monkeywrench44
Reviews.Content: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The service was excellent. We had a 3 bedroom unit and it was amazing. It allowed us to still have some privacy when needed. Our children are 10 and 6 (b&g) and with them each having their own room allowed us to keep our sanity. The only complaint was the availability of pool chairs. I realize this is typical of any place with a pool or a beach, but it becomes rather frustrating when people "save" seats and they may not even be at the facility. Just a small issue in an otherwise awesome stay...

Reviews.Title: “WE got beyond what we paid for”
Reviews.Author: Littleone9655
Reviews.Content: We got such a great deal with expedia and we figured the resort was gonna be 2 star maybe 3. It was 5 star all the way!!! It was beautiful, very clean, very close to Disney and Universal. We are planning on taking another trip next year and we will definately stay at the Floridays again. The only thing that would of made it better is if they had a shuttle to and from the airport. Otherwise it was fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “Magic is not just at Disney”
Reviews.Author: Drakos
Reviews.Content: I just got back from a week vacation in Orlando and had an absolutely fabulous time. I normally don't write many reviews but I was so impressed with the Floridays that I thought I should take some time to share my experience. From arriving at the hotel, we were immediately greeted by smiling and friendly staff in the lobby and check-in was quick and efficient. We were shuttled to our suite and was assisted with the bags and luggage. Immediately entering, we were captivated by how warm and spacious the suite was. We ordered our groceries from gardengrocer.com. and everything was neatly put away. All the conveniences of home were evident from a fully equipped kitchen, washer/dryer and free wireless hi-speed internet. The suite was stylishly decored and included a full dining table and great room area with a large screen LCD TV. Temperature controls and functionality was superb and ensured a comfortable stay either morning or night. Other great amenities include a very quaint cafe for those not in the mood to cook. The pool was large with a large spouting fountain that the kids just loved. A spacious jaccuzi was also a great thing for those long and tiresome days at the theme parks. The hotel is conveniently located just a few miles from the major theme parks and walking distance to the Premium Mall Outlet. The shuttle service offered to the main theme parks was awesome. The scheduling was convenient and the drivers were very friendly and helpful. Just remember to tip them to show them how great they are. All in all, the Floridays Resort is a shining example of how a vacation resort should be. The whole experience was magical to say the least and a phenomenal value for those looking for a home away from home. I will deninately go back and would highly recommend it to all my family and friends. I want to give a special thanks to Ray, our shuttle driver at the Hotel. Your smile and helpfulness made our stay very special and my kids love you. Thanks again and kudos to the Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel of awesome”
Reviews.Author: GolfAllstarDK
Reviews.Content: I had a great time staying at Floridays. It was conveniently located near my points of interest and was very accessible coming from the interstate. The room was very comfortable and had a nice homely feel to it. The gym had good equipment and amply fit my needs. The staff was very forthcoming and helpful, seemed almost too good to be true :) Thanks for a great experience, Thomas

Reviews.Title: “Def coming back”
Reviews.Author: vacationchica77
Reviews.Content: Wonderful service. Super clean. Great pools all over the resort. Just an overall great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Lots of space for the money!”
Reviews.Author: msu_mom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a week while visiting Disney and Universal. We paid $167 per night including all taxes and fees for a 2 bedroom unit with tons of space, about $100 less a night than we've paid for a Disney moderate room at the same time of year. The place was very clean and was exactly as pictured on the website. The kitchen is well-equipped if you choose to cook (we didn't). The pool area was nice. The location is good. A few negatives: The mattresses are pretty hard. If you end up in building E or F, you are pretty out of the way. We were originally put in building F on the first floor. It had to be one of the worst units in the place! It was very far from everything and first floor units have a screened porch rather than a balcony. A quick trip back to the lobby got us re-assigned to a 4th floor unit in building C which was much better. Staff was very accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “Best value for family! Clean, spacious & fun.”
Reviews.Author: AT1123
Reviews.Content: I've already recommended this place to a few people. It's not just for families but also for anyone who wants to spread out a little. Fully equipped kitchens with granite counter tops, jacuzzi bathtubs in master bedroom, washer/dryer in unit, and service of any 4 star hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation!!”
Reviews.Author: travellingamig0s
Reviews.Content: We had a fantastic time! The resort was extremely clean and the staff was very helpful and friendly. The pool was wonderful especially since it had the kids section where they could wade and play in the various water activity areas. The room was a small apartment with your own washer and dryer. Also the kitchen was fully stocked with all the utensils and equipemnt required to make your own meals. Location was great to Disney, Epcot, Downtown Disney (10-15 minutes away) and the premium outlets and a grocery store were around the corner (less than 2 minutes). Seaworld was also within a five -ten minute drive. If you headed north on international drive within ten minutes you had an abundence of restaurants to choose from. My family really enjoyed our stay. We just wished we could have stayed longer. Only complaint we had is that we wished there would have been a nice sit down restaurant offered within the resort.

Reviews.Title: “It had everything we needed.”
Reviews.Author: VisitfromItaly
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 8 nights with a 6 year old and a 22 month old. The pool area was great--nothing like lounging on a beach chair in February while watching your toddler safely and happily splash in fountains and warm shallow water, jazz in the background...nice families all around. The room itself had everything--with the washer and dryer we were able to pack lightly. We took advantage of the fully-equipped kitchen, and there was a nice little screened in patio overlooking a pond and fountain which was great at breakfast (we were in building C). The apartment was very clean, but I would say all that carpet and heavy drapes might be problematic if you have bad allergies. On the plus side, the wooden blinds and heavy drapes really kept out the morning sunshine (even to Italian standards). This is no fault of the hotel, but this area of Orlando is being developed now, so it really has no soul or interesting things about it to recommend, other than it is convenient for the Disney parks, sea world, and outlet shopping. It's not a place where you can go out the door for a walk after dinner, people watching, or window shopping...there aren't even sidewalks outside of the hotel complex. I wish there had been free internet access in the hotel from hotel computers. We didn't bring laptops so couldn't access the wireless network. In general, for this type of accomodation, I think it offers everything you need.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time at Floridays... really very minor complaints!”
Reviews.Author: brightgirl1
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays in Orlando for three nights with our 18 month old son. The room layout is excellent because we had our own room and our son had his own room, just like at home. It was wonderful having a kitchen and there is a Publix right next door for convenient groceries and supplies. Kitchen had a stove, fridge, sink, d/w, m/w, and a small washer/dyer unit. Internet: there is free wi-fi in the pool/lobby/public areas AND free high speed internet in the rooms, but you will need an ethernet cable. The ones they provide are only about 6 feet long and there's only one jack (in the dining area), so if you want to be able to sit on the couch and use your laptop, you'll need to bring a much longer cable. The pool area is wonderful - fabulous warm water and a large shallow area with sprays/fountains/etc that our toddler LOVED. If you have a young child, be sure to specify pack and play vs. crib. We just said "crib" and they brought this rickety looking contraption that there's no way I'd put my child in! But they do have pack and plays and it was just fine (bring your own PNP sheet if you're not OK just wrapping a bed sheet around). Also, note that you can get a high chair in your unit - just ask and they'll bring it right up! It was a nice quality restaurant style (Rubbermaid commercial) high chair. The staff at this place is great! Everyone was super friendly and helpful. Note that you can get tickets to any of the major parks from the concierge desk. We bought Sea World tix for the same price as at the park, but then we did not have to wait in the long lines. Our ONLY complaints may have been unit specific: low water pressure in the master shower, uneven/uncomfortable mattress (sloped to one side), loud toilets, and dirty floors (they looked clean, but after walking around barefoot for a few minutes, our feet told a different story!).

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Sean182152
Reviews.Content: The room layout was great. The rooms were very clean and modern. The room had all the amenities our family could have expected. Our young daughters loved the pool. The staff were all very friendly, and one on occassion, went over and above what we would have expected. The location was central to the Orlando area's theme parks, shopping and restaurants. We had very high expectations after reading all the great reviews on this property, and the Floriday's resort fully met or exceeded those expectations.

Reviews.Title: “The most professional and first class operation I have seen in awhile.”
Reviews.Author: Thekycat
Reviews.Content: The staff were very attentive and professional, especially Brett the concierge who was most helpful. All the staff from wait staff, cooks, bellman, and maintence, were a joy to interact with. They think of everything to make your stay wonderful. Great location for attractions and business since that was my reason for staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, location and wonderful facilities”
Reviews.Author: tkbpsu1
Reviews.Content: Spent three nights here over spring break with my family and had a wonderful stay. Resort is conveniently located on I4 and centrally located. Room was very comfortable for the five of us. Very nice lodging

Reviews.Title: “Nice place for families.”
Reviews.Author: TheDuckDriver
Reviews.Content: Their suites had all we needed, and more: Pros: -clean suites with daily maid service -great pool that the kids enjoyed -convenient: right on International bus line, and 5 minutes from SeaWorld attractions -friendly staff Cons: -not for bargain lovers -no WiFi in rooms: only a cable. Not good for the 2010 WiFi generation. -no on-site restaurant: but dozens are 5-minutes drive away

Reviews.Title: “Perfect experience”
Reviews.Author: jwmiller64
Reviews.Content: Stayed the last week of February. Check in at 5:30 pm was smooth and quick. Room was just as pictured on the website. Clean and quiet. Service was quick and employees were very helpful. My wife went grocery shopping the evening we checked in (about a mile or less to the store) and when she came back an employee offered and helped her bring the groceries to our room. Disney is about 5 -10 minutes away by car. Cocoa beach is about a hour away. Airport about 20-30 minutes

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: LawofNY
Reviews.Content: Those commentators who suggested that this hotel/resort was anything less than perfect for the money, location, staff and amenities are simply impossible to please. This place is near everything...and I mean everything, from the airport to the Orlando attractions...and even closer to some of the best shopping in Orlando. We have stayed in some of the better resorts around the country...and while I wouldn't call Floridays plush, I would suggest that all things considered, "perfect" is most appropriate.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was very conveniently located to dining and fun activites”
Reviews.Author: Nivara
Reviews.Content: Everywhere we went, Floridays was conveniently located to local businesses and Disney. Since we were so close, we were able to discover the Downtown Disney area also which turned out to be the best experience of our trip. The hotel was very clean and well maintained, the pool was great, and the room was amazing. I would highly recommend staying there as we will again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Room was great, pool was great, service was ok”
Reviews.Author: auwareagel
Reviews.Content: We reserved after reading all the reviews on trip advisor, for the money this place seemed to good to be true. It actually was a very nice room, very large and we traveled with 3 adults and 4 kids so we needed the space. When we arrived the had "overbooked" so we had to stay in a 2 bedroom the first night, we could not un pack and because we wanted to be at our first park early in the am had to leave all of our bags out so the hotel staff could "move us", for this they gave us free breakfast coupons (the free breakfast ending up being a choice of a muffin, or cereal and milk).. anyway that was the only bad experience.. I guess that can happen - but it is aggravating when you make your reservations 4 months in advance and your room is not there.... Well again the rooms (both 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom) where very clean, they had plenty of dishes, towels etc for our entire party... We did go to grocery store (about 1/2 mile away) and stock up on snacks, soda and food for the week so that was great. The pool area (did not go to quiet pool) was very nice... The one day we did not parks the kids had a great time swimming at the pool... Housekeeping was very good they did a nice pick up service each day and we found that to be done well... Overall this resort is an excellent value and close enough to everything ( it took us 5 minutes to get to seaworld and aquatica - 20 minutes to get to downtown disney and 15 minutes to get to Universal - We also went to busch gardens which was about 50 minutes away) that you can drive where ever you need to.. Only negatives where the room not being ready on the first night and parking was horrible - probably only 1 parking spot for every 30 rooms or so.... Would rec to anyone traveling.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: easto80
Reviews.Content: Excellent atmosphere,close to all Disney attractions and eateries. The staff was excellent. The pool area was very clean and spacious. The place is not WIFI in the rooms only around pool and bar but ethernet cables were provided upon request. I would certainly go back

Reviews.Title: “Excellent by itself, Fantastic considering value for the money”
Reviews.Author: Ethender
Reviews.Content: Great rooms, spacious and well equiped to support all household activities. Great service at the front desk and from the concierge. The pool is nice. Convenient bus service to theme parks. Convenient I-Ride for close point of interest (Outlet shopping is a step away. However, I recommend renting a car if planning for activities outside the theme parks and for shopping outside the Outlets on Vineland ave. I recommend to all and would return!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for the price”
