Reviews.Author: Victor1217
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very nice. Easy to get to theme parks and resturants. Room could use some upgrading such as beds. No wireless in rooms, only wired internet in room. Pool was nice, but has limted seating.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic accommodation to stay in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Dusque0
Reviews.Content: The room, staff and ammenities were just perfect and made to feel very welcome with a really relaxed atmosphere. Nothing was too much trouble for the staff to do for you and really clean and well equipped rooms. I would recommed this place to anyone and everyone and will definitely try to stay here again if we go to Orlando. Although the location is south of most of the attractions it is a short bus trip using the "I Ride" (only $1.25) to go up International Drive or using the free shuttles to Universal Studios/Wet & Wild/Sea World attractions. Also local supermarkets, shops and take aways are near by and a short walk to the Premium Outlet Shopping Centre for clothes shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: ptizlle
Reviews.Content: My Aunt Mary and I loved this place, the location is perfect, right in the middle of everything. Downtown Disney, all the parks and the Florida Mall all 10-20 min drives. The Outlet Mall is right around the corner and Publix is a very short walk to get groceries for the fully equipped kitchen, I even baked cookies one night. The staff were very helpful and friendly, the cafe' had good food and by the second day, Yesenia the girl who worked there knew my coffee order. My aunt is a smoker and it was nice that she could smoke on the balcony. The furniture was a little dated and the washer/dryer was very small but what can you expect when it lives in a closet. I had to purchase a cable to use my laptop in the room but otherwise you have wireless at the pool area or in the lobby. Bring your own cable! Publix did not have them and the Sony store was over priced ($35). Floridays is a very nice quiet place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great resort”
Reviews.Author: stevpo
Reviews.Content: Its a nice place, clean, close to Disney and shopping and shopping. Its quiet, and well maintained. Kids loved the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: SmilingDuck
Reviews.Content: This resort is very nice. The staff is outstanding - so helpful and friendly - Floridays really shines in this area. Our room was very spacious and pleasant. The carpet in our room has seen better days and probably should be replaced soon, but other than that, the room was fine for our needs - some of the furniture is starting to show some wear, but nothing too major. The pool area is very nice. Lots of loungers, pool towels, and sand area (so you feel like you're at the beach!) and a hot tub. We enjoyed our time at Floridays and would not hesitate to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent , would recommend”
Reviews.Author: TomC001
Reviews.Content: A definite for anyone staying near Orlando. A bit noisy if you are close to the parking lot. Great for families. Lots of room, laundry facilities right in the room, and a full kitchen.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible”
Reviews.Author: ubonvacation
Reviews.Content: If staying at Floridays, you better call a week before, then a day before, then an hour before. I planned my trip and booked this hotel after careful consideration. I confirmed a week before, then a day before, only to be told after i landed in Orlando with my 3 young children that they were overbooked. i beleive they got a better rate from someone else as when i booked a month in advance I got a good rate. They bumped me to a place that I did not want to stay at. i was stuck at the airport for over 4 hours and missed a full vaction day.

Reviews.Title: “good location , 3 bedroom suites great value, quiet and clean”
Reviews.Author: LauraS46
Reviews.Content: We stayed during one of the busiest times of year, and were in the building farthest from everything. The buildings can be hard to identify in the dark since the outside letters are not lit up.This resort is large and depending you have to walk around the outside to get to the pool nearest you. 3 bedroom suite was perfect and clean for us. location to Universal was good we did not try to use the shuttle since we didn't think it would be wise with the place being so busy. Room service would be expensive, we had 7 in our group so picked up groceries at a nearby Publix and ordered Pizza a couple times. The nearby (walking distance) Benihana's restaurant was great. Views to the fountain/pond were nice, balcony could have been bigger . Our building(F) Internet but not wireless but the desk provided a cable- an issue if you have an ipad or tablet.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic resort for Orlando”
Reviews.Author: bogwoppit
Reviews.Content: Great service, clean rooms and very nice atmosphere. There were pools for young families and quieter pools for adults. It was a great resort and I recommend it to all travellers to the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: shaner996
Reviews.Content: We had originally booked at another resort but changed our reservations upon seeing the rating of Floridays. It was even more fabulous than we expected! The rooms were so spacious, clean, and modern. The staff were wonderful as was the pool area. We have stayed in over a dozen hotels in Orlando over the past 7 years and Floridays was definately our families favorite!

Reviews.Title: “home away from home with a few extras thrown in !!”
Reviews.Author: cathwall
Reviews.Content: Have to say it was the nicest accomadation I have ever stayed in!! The two bed suite was spacious, clean and very luxurious. The kids did'nt want to come home and either did I. It was very close to all theme parks and with the complimentary shuttle there was no hassle getting anywhere. All in all I wish I could return to the Floridays every year.

Reviews.Title: “Our Family Vacation in Paradise”
Reviews.Author: vinnjo
Reviews.Content: We just arrrived home from our family vacation in Orlando, Florida. The highlight of the stay was the peace and tranquility offered at the Floridays Resort. From the time we checked in to the day of our departure the property exceeded our expectations. The property rooms were clean, modern and the overall appearance of the property was stellar. I would compare hopspitality given from the staff, and the overall appearance of the property to any hotel/resort I have stayed in my many years of traveling. Thank you floridays Resort.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for $”
Reviews.Author: Marzocco
Reviews.Content: Great rooms, great location. Close to all parks and relevant amenities. You feel as though you are coming back to your apartment or condo rather than a hotel but with all the extras a hotel provides. The pool area is a wonderful place for the kids to play. Lots of dining selections within a few miles. Car recommended given the large size of the surrounding area. Stayed in building D with a view of a pond and secondary pool. Private balcony is a nice feature. Depending upon the time of year you travel rates can fluctuate substantially. Your value for dollar will depend upon the rate you select. There are many accommodation options all around this property but we selected it based on proximity to Disney and Sea World and it was a much better price than a Disney resort. Very clean room with kitchen and supplied plates etc. allowed for options of eating in or dining out. You can pay a lot more and get a lot less in Orlando, but not at Floridays. It was, in all honesty, excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent home away from home”
Reviews.Author: altatraveller_11
Reviews.Content: Wonderful room layout - we had the two bedroom suite. Nice because kids had a separate room with their own seperate beds. Our master suite was lovely with the large soaker tub. The kitchen was well stocked so we could easily cook meals in our suite. Maid service came daily to make beds and provide fresh towels. Internet was good but only available via an internet cable in the rooms which was provided - wireless internet provided around the pool area of the hotel. Note that there is an $11 resort fee charge per day for parking/internet use etc. Well located - within 6 miles or so of Walt Disney World, Universal Studios, Sea World & Aquatica etc. We rented a car so we don't know how the shuttle service was. Only issue was that the lock on our patio door was broken and we requested it to be fixed and they did not fix it during our stay. Would recommend this to any family that needs an apartment style space and a nice pool for their holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful resort experience!!”
Reviews.Author: Lisa47608
Reviews.Content: Great place for the money!! Wonderful accomodations and pool area!!

Reviews.Title: “Spacious and comfortable accommodations for a family”
Reviews.Author: brooklinefamily
Reviews.Content: At first I didn't even look at this place because it wasn't a "name brand". Then I read reviews for other places close to the top of the list and they all had mixed reviews. I decided to take a look at Floridays and was impressed by all the positive reviews. Floridays truly deserves all the praise it get! The 2 bedroom suite was very spacious and it was great to have two bathrooms, especially in the morning and after swimming. The pool is big enough to never feel very crowded and there is a shallow end for smaller kids as well as an area for lap swimming. There was a second pool we never even got to. The hotel is on the less congested end of International drive. Beware, if you try to drive to restaurants at the other end of International Drive, towards Universal and the convention center, it could take 30 minutes to drive 4 miles. Disney is in the other direction and there weren't any traffic problems heading that way.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, expansive comfortable rooms.”
Reviews.Author: JimS31
Reviews.Content: My three teens and I stayed two nights in a suite in mid February. While the resort was about 10 toll road miles from Orlando International Airport, we easily found it. The entrance is under construction and the speed bumps in the parking lot are a bit over the top but that was the worst of it. The rest of the resort was gorgeous, and the rooms were fantastic. We had a suite about 14x40 plus two huge bedrooms and two large baths. The master bath had a terrific jaccuzzi. There was a full kitchen with island counter. Shopping and restaurants were right around the corner. The hotel was centrally located to all the usual attractions and they had a free shuttle to them, though I think the schedule needed tweaking a bit. It only left at 8am....not rollercoaster time for moi, and 1145am, which is rather late since the parks close at 6pm most days this time of year. Since the resorts are so close I'd have thought they'd have more regular shuttles. The staff were all extremely friendly, well-informed and eager to make your stay a great experience. The pool was fantastic, though only 5 ft deep in the center, it had lots of waterplay areas for little ones. February isn't exactly sweltering in Orlando. The air is comfortable for swimming if there's no wind. Lying in the sun is acceptable this time of year. Due to the expense of the theme parks and our limited time frame we decided on visiting Kennedy Space Center instead. That was fantastic. I'd definitely stay here again. The next time we'll leave more time to see the theme parks. We were on our way to a Carnival cruise.

Reviews.Title: “Great Resort for Disney and Universal Trips”
Reviews.Author: goodstar40
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay in Orlando. Spacious layout -- great kitchen, dining/living room, bathrooms have plenty of counter space and good water pressure, bedrooms are comfortable, and the screened in patio was very nice. Beds could have been softer but were comfortable enough. Everything was very clean. Wish they would have had recycle bins in the rooms for plastic/cans/paper. Pool was excellent to swim in and the hot tub was great to relax in after being on feet all day. Pool was large enough for adults to swim around in peace while kids could play in the kid-friendly area. We rented a car while in Orlando so it was nice to have free parking and was very easy to get to Disney parks and Universal parks from this resort as well as lots of restuarants and grocery stores within 10 minutes from resort. Staff was very friendly and helpful with directions and coupons for restaurants. We enjoyed our stay at Floridays Resort Orlando and would highly recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “very nice place”
Reviews.Author: sheila1985
Reviews.Content: i love the suite it was very nice everything was close seaworld was literally 5 min away the grocey store i eat out alot because i really didn't feel like cooking but the kitchen was very nice and big i like being on the balcony at night it was very relaxing my kids age 10 and 3 loved the room they stayed in i like having a bathroom in are room it was very big with separte shower and tub i will defianitly stay again next year!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed in pool area.”
Reviews.Author: RestlessAlways
Reviews.Content: The main pool area is exactly as shown in the pictures on the website. It includes a water park which is a lot of fun for young children -- if you have young children. It is a small area and there are lots of kids and it's noisy. There is one other pool which is very small, about the size of a backyard pool, and it's busy too. So if you want to relax by the pool and read a book, you might want to consider another hotel. I was also a little concerned about the lack of security. There is no gate to the property so anyone can drive/walk around. In fact, they warn you not to order pizza from flyers that are placed under your room door daily. I've been to Orlando several times and have stayed at much, much nicer places. I booked this hotel (it's not a resort!) as part of a package, and the price was good, so I guess I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: “Nice..however I will not return”
Reviews.Author: stepshow1922
Reviews.Content: I was a guest at Floridays from Feb 19-23, with my husband and 2 children. The first night of our stay, I went into the master bathroom and there was a used cotton swab with hair on it on our sink! I complained about it and housekeeping left it there the entire time! This of course makes me question the cleanliness of the establishment. Another issue was that our room keys never worked every single night that we had been there. The staff kept saying that perhaps the cards were being "demagnetized" because they may have been touching other cards in my purse but that was not the case, I kept the cards in their folder in a separate pocket outside of my purse the entire time. It may have been the actual key panel that was malfunctioning. Needless to say, the staff was polite and when I shared my complaints and check out they gave me a credit for the dailly housekeeping fees. The hotel was nice and the staff was accommodating but I will not return because I question the cleanliness.

Reviews.Title: “An optional secure, clean and comfortable place to vacation in - outside of your home”
Reviews.Author: HBD021
Reviews.Content: The family felt safe and comfortable in a quiet and spacious suite with items such as dishwasher, washer/dryer, utensils/dishes/pots 'n pans. It is very close to a great Outlet Mall and major attractions such as Disney World (10 minute drive); Seaworld (5 minute drive) and others. Place has a great pool for all ages and large area for sunning/lounging. The layout is very good at a very affordable price.

Reviews.Title: “we hit the jackpot..said our 5 yr old!!”
Reviews.Author: lsearfoss
Reviews.Content: After a very long day at universal with 3 overwhelmed and completely exhausted boys. We ALL needed a great place to sleep..and some space to stretch out. A friend suggested that we stay at Floridays. We left the park at closing and made our way to the floridays lobby. it was late, but we were able to get into our 2 bed/2 bath place no problem. the boys went crazy!! they were so excited that each room had a TV. we had a full kitchen, LV, and a DR table. they couldn't believe it! our middle guy told us that he hit the jack pot! he asked, "mom, this is just great.. how can we can go to a park all day and come home to a place with all this stuff? mom, we even have 3 tv's and a huge tub!!" Though our trip to orlando was just a one day on our way back north, we certainly plan to look into this type of idea on our next trip to do all the parks. Floridays is refurbishing the pools. they will be amazing, i'm sure. it was soo comfortable to have all that space! we loved it!! oh, and for the shoppers..the outlets are around the corner. i also had to check that out!!

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL PLACE, DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME/MONEY AT A HOTEL”
Reviews.Author: HicksFamily2011
Reviews.Content: My family and I visited Orlando over the Valentines Day weekend. First let me say, we travel to Orlando frequently and I have read reviews for this resort several times, but I thought they were just to good to be true.. OMG! This place is absolutely wonderful. We arrived around 8pm Saturday night after unexpected delays during the day. We were literally checked in within 3 mins. It was almost as if they were waiting for us to arrive to give us our room keys. We arrived at the room very tired, but when we opened the door everyone was filled with a second wind. The kids were excited to have their own room space to play. The Master Suite is wonderful, the Master bath is perfect for a relaxing night especially with the windows open to hear the fountains outside. Room Service was great, food was good but you could probably eat out for the same price. The resort is near Publix, SeaWorld, Premium Outlet mall and tons of restaurants. This is really a great place to stay.. If you are vacationing in Orlando and want your moneys worth, plus a little more this is your place!

Reviews.Title: “Great base for your holiday in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: golferguy2727
Reviews.Content: Floridays was recommended to us by friends and they were right - it is fantastic! Great value, good proximity to attractions, excellent on-location facilities. We had a great stay. Beds/pillows were maybe a little worse than I expected and we could not figure out how to get hot tub working (despite call to front desk). But otherwise our stay was excellent. For a family I cannot recommend the Floridays highly enough. But since it was our first stay we have no direct experience to use for a comparison. All I can say is that our stay was great. Check in and check out was effortless, service was great, suite was all we could want or ask for.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Value... Amazing Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Br0wn33
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were looking for an inexpensive place to stay while visiting Orlando, Florida. After looking through all the different Disney Resorts and how expensive they are, we were so happy to come across Floridays in our search. Floridays is located near all the different Disney Resorts, Disney Boardwalk and an amazing Outlet Mall. We never had to drive longer than 10-15 minutes to get anywhere we wanted to be. One of the main reasons we picked this hotel was because all the rooms had full size kitchens. Having the option to make your own meals rather than go out all the time, really saved us some money. We were shocked when we arrived because we had been upgraded from a two bedroom suite to a three bedroom. Since it was just my husband and I the third bedroom was unnecessary, however we really felt like we were living in a huge condo. All the rooms had their own TV's, the kitchen was very spacious and had all the dishes we required, the sitting area was cozy and the bathrooms were impressive. The decor wasn't to our taste and our balcony looked out onto the parking lot, but we really didn't care. It was clean, cozy and you couldn't beat the price or location. If you have children, this is an amazing hotel to stay at. I remember going to Florida as a child and having to stay in a regular size hotel room with my parents and brother. We were always fighting over the bathroom and what was playing on the TV. It also sucked having to share a bed with my brother and have my parents a couple feet away. It would have been amazing to have my own room/space and a lot less fighting between my brother and I. Also I am sure my parents would have enjoyed some privacy too. We only went to the pool one day, mainly because the weather wasn't that warm. However there were tons of kids playing in the water and there were plenty of chairs to lounge in. I would certainly recommended staying at Floridays if you are looking for a quality hotel for less money. We are even thinking about going back with another couple next year because the rooms offered so much space and privacy and with these prices you can't afford not to.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome, large suites perfect for families in desirable location!”
Reviews.Author: BuffaloSnowBird
Reviews.Content: This resort was absolutely amazing! The suites are very roomy with full kitchens, washer/dryer, dining room, living room and 2 or 3 bedrooms depending on your choice. We had a 2 bedroom suite that was great. We enjoyed ourselves so much that we actually extended our trip 2 additional days. The staff was great and the resort was very comfortable throughout. Great location and convienent to all attractions. Sea World is literally a 5 minute drive and Magic Kingdom took about 10 minutes from parking lot to parking lot. This was our 1st trip with our 13 month old son and was alittle concerned about space for him to run around in the suite. As soon as we walked into our room all concerns disappeared. Our little boy had more then enough room and loved the space. It was also a huge plus that he had his own room so we had no issues with waking each other up. We highly recommend this resort and are already planning to go back next year if not sooner.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home and great location.”
Reviews.Author: PatriciaTraveller
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the "D" Building at the Floridays Resort Feb 6 to 12 2011. The price was amazing for the amenities that were offered. We stayed in a 2 bedroom 2 bath condo. It was a fairly quick 15 min drive from Orlando airport. When we arrived, everything was set up as requested (room by the small pool and with a crib). When we arrived we thought the room was very new, well maintained and clean. The amenities were very impressive for the price we paid ($140 something per night). Parking is easily accessible right in front of each building. Our only disappointment was that the large, beautiful pool area shown in all the pictures was under total renovation during our stay. Our 3 year old was very bummed out that he couldn't play in the splash pad area and shallow area. When I asked what type of compensation they were offering to full paying guests that were not going to be able to use the pool area, they offered to waive the $11.75 per day resort fee and place us near their secondary, smaller pool. The smaller pool worked out really well as they cranked up the heat and it was like bath water. Lots of people could be seen swimming in it - even though the outside temp was in the low 60's! So, despite the big pool not being available, we really enjoyed our stay. My recommendations for people staying here are...stop at the Publix grocery store right down the street to pick up some food and bottled water before you check in. The tap water in our room had a sulphur smell to it, so we made coffee and cooked with bottled water. The smell was most noticeable when taking a shower. Nothing terrible, but just not something we are used to. We also really enjoyed the HUGE jacuzzi tub in our room. The water pressure and amount of available hot water in our room was incredible and we could fill the entire tub in about 5 minutes - no kidding! So, that was nice, since some hotels the hot water runs out quickly and there is little to no water pressure. We mostly cooked our own meals in the fully equipped kitchen and ate out a bit, so we didn't try any of the food they offered - it was really expensive. There is a nice cafe/bar area that offers Starbucks and beer/drinks which we would have enjoyed if we didn't have a 3 year old and 7 month old with us at all times :-) We also LOVED having in-room laundry and a dishwasher! They were even kind enough to keep us stocked with laundry detergent (Tide) and dishwasher detergent daily. Overall, we would HIGHLY recommend this hotel for families with children. It was conveniently located to everything (Disney, outlets, Universal, etc.) and the staff and housekeeping was excellent. We would stay here again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels/resorts I've ever stayed at!!!”
Reviews.Author: pandora78
Reviews.Content: After a horrendous travel day, including a cancelled flight, a re-booking, a delayed flight, a mad sprint through Chicago airport to make a connection, it was an absolutely dream walking into Floridays resort!! The reception staff were so friendly and accomadating, and concierge staff were absolutely amazing!! They looked after every question and helped out in every way they could! Our luggage was delayed by a day, and they promptly delivered it to our room once it arrived, followed by a fruit platter saying how happy they were that we got our luggage! The rooms were beautiful!! and very clean, with everything that we could have wanted. There was a lovely little coffee shop that we had breakfast at, and it was quite delicious and reasonably priced. It was a little too chilly to enjoy the pool, but it sure did look inviting. All in all, I don't have a single complaint about the Floridays Resort, and I have been recommending it to anyone that will listen!!

Reviews.Title: “formidable”
Reviews.Author: MariaTeresinha
Reviews.Content: The hotel was above our expectations. The staff were awesome, they were great with us.

Reviews.Title: “good stay”
Reviews.Author: conwayt
Reviews.Content: Found all the staff extremely friendly and fun and all the amenities very good. The rooms were a very clean and refreshed daily all the cleaning staff were very professional. did however see one female memeber of staff in downtown orlando dressed in drag and an orange wig desperately talking to strangers, she did try to explain it was a second job but this seemed far fetched ( lets just hope she's getting the helped she so clearly needs). on an altogether more positive note i found the facebook page very informative with some good and very accurate history quotations on an almost daily basis. would like to thank all the hard working members of staff and also carolina for making it a memorable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful place.. some minor issues”
Reviews.Author: ptucker99
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful hotel that has a cozy feeling to it. We got into our rooms quickly with no problems. The staff were all very friendly no matter where we were. the property was well maintained and the rooms were clean. The front desk people such as Chris were very wonderful and friendly. Issues- toilets stopped up, dvd didnt work and thermostat was locked. PROS- the maintenance guy came right up in a timely manner and each time he was pleasant and was very friendly. He fixed the problems right away. We will definately be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Loved our stay!”
Reviews.Author: budah03
Reviews.Content: Clean, fabulous and roomy rooms. Customer service was excellent. We did not have a car. We had the 5 day unlimited pass for the I-Ride which was helpfull getting around but closes at 10:30 p.m. so make sure you have everything you need or you have to walk a distance to the 7/11 to get some things the store does not sell. Loved the resort and will stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is just a wonderful place to stay in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: srqsue
Reviews.Content: We just love staying at Floridays! From check-in to check-out, our experience is always delightful! The staff is so courteous, efficient, and ready to help. Our room felt so cozy and comfortable, and the view was terrific. The location of the resort makes it very convenient to the theme parks and a lot of other activities, such as shopping. We have stayed here many times and will continue to do so when we're in the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Wedding of my dreams”
Reviews.Author: cbgirllost
Reviews.Content: After months of research, we decided to have our wedding at Floridays resort on September 24, 2010. From the begining, all my interactions with all of the staff were absolutely amazing. I initially dealt with Michaela in sales and then with Jamie Cooper. Both of these women were so helpful. I could not have planned this destination wedding without them! We were a group of 38 people and there was not one unhappy person in the group. Everyone loved this hotel. It was the vacation of a lifetime. The hotel went above and beyond for our wedding ceremony and meal. The food was perfect, the atmosphere was magical and the extras were definitely appreciated. We are already planning for our return trip.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home! Awesome place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: TandCsMom
Reviews.Content: The rooms were very spacious and had all the amenities of home. The hotel is located in the middle of everything in Orlando. We will stay there again!!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT SUITES BESIDE OUTLETS AND MARKET”
Reviews.Author: dannyborja
Reviews.Content: Excellent location: 2 minute walk to Walgreens, 3 Minute Walk to Public Market for all of our needs in food, drinks etc...4 Minute walk to Orlando Premium Outlets...10 Minute drive to Disney Epcot where you may take disney transportation to other Parks... Hotel has big rooms, fully equipped kitchen, Gym, mini Soccer field...really awesome service.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: jenn83
Reviews.Content: Very nice place to stay - The rooms are very spacious and equipped with everything you need. Everyone is very helpful. My one complaint is that they use peanut oil in their restaurant.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, clean, private and serene.”
Reviews.Author: ManyMinds
Reviews.Content: The service was good. The food was tastey. The room was impeccable and had everything you could possibly need. The water fountains were nice to listen to from our balcony and with the windows open. Couldn't of asked for a better location, everything was in a ten mile radius. The pool was heated and very relaxing, so was the jacuzzi. Very quiet and serene surroundings. It was nice to have so much room, having a second bedroom & bathroom for our adult son kept things private and was very spacious. Really enjoyed the jacuzzi for two in the master suite. Would definately recommend to anyone especially to a family and if we're in that area again we would surely make reservations to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “If you're looking for a place to stay in Orlando, this is it.”
Reviews.Author: barnard33
Reviews.Content: We [3 adults, 1 child] stayed on Friday and Saturday nights in a 2 bedroom. Since we're Georgia residents we were offered a 15% discount. The total price for our stay was $299 including taxes, fees, etc. The greatest thing about our stay was that kitchen was cook and serve ready. We had 2 bedrooms, one TV in each and another in the living room. The only problem, and I think it's very very minor, was that there was no wireless Internet. There was instead 1 ethernet port on one of the walls. The hotel staff provided us a cable. We didn't care about the Internet so we just ignored this minor issue. After all we were on a vacation. The location is very close to DisneyWorld. It took us 10 minutes to get there by driving a car. Overall, we are very satisfied with Floridays and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel. Terrific value. Perfect for families with older children.”
Reviews.Author: DCrugger
Reviews.Content: Stayed with our two teenage daughters from Jan 28-31, 2011. We've been to Orlando many times and have stayed at Disney properties, high-end resorts, and budget hotels. What a pleasant surprise finding the Floridays resort, thanks in part to reviews posted on TripAdvisor! Rooms are spacious and clean. Absolutely loved the separate bedrooms and second bathroom. Each room has a full kitchen, so you can save money by buying groceries and cooking in your room. No free breakfast, and we weren't impressed by the on-site cafe, but many dining choices are a short drive away. There's a Publix supermarket next door, and a 7-Eleven just up the street (great for morning coffee!). Staff is top-notch and very attentive. No WiFi in rooms (only in lobby/cafe/bar/pool area), but you can get a DSL cable at the front desk for no charge. Located a short distance from Sea World and Universal Orlando, but you'd probably need a car to drive to the Disney parks. Pool is large and heated, with a shallow area for youngsters, a hot tub, and plenty of deck chairs. If Floridays adds a free continental breakfast and expands its WiFi network, this might be the only hotel we'll ever stay at while visiting Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “If your looking for value and elegance Floridays is the place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: maggie34468
Reviews.Content: The resort has it all, friendly staff, clean rooms and the only place we will stay when we go to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Central location; delightful resort; great staff”
Reviews.Author: islandgrrrrl
Reviews.Content: The staff at Floridays were great. From the front desk staff to housekeeping, every question or request was met with a friendly and helpful response. The master bath was dreamy and the jetted tub was fabulous. The two double beds in the second bedroom and the second bath together were about the size of a Disney resort room; the extra space staying with teenagers was invaluable for our sanity after long theme park days. The only fault here is the king size bed and some of the furniture seemed ready for replacement. Our mattress was hard and uncomfortable. The living room couch seemed ready for replacement. The rest of the accomodations and the staff tip the scale towards staying here again, though. I feel like I found a gem.

Reviews.Title: “Twice it's worth”
Reviews.Author: AllanJhag
Reviews.Content: Made me want to spend more time around the hotel. Food was spectacular and rooms astounding for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Vacation Hotel”
Reviews.Author: BusyBees04_2010
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 4 nights in this 2 bdrm apartment which had everything we needed, except Wifi. There is cable internet but that's not so useful for iphones and ipads. Nevertheless, our stay was great and everyone was very helpful and friendly. There's an extra $12 per night charged for all the extras like free wired internet, and car parking etc which seems a little steep if you don't have a car, I think this pricing could be reviewed. If I couldn't find an equivalent place with free wifi elsewhere I would probably stay here again. Kids loved the pool. Great vacation place for families and wish we'd stayed here longer and skipped Miami.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel great location great people”
Reviews.Author: gibo442
Reviews.Content: we stayed here back in May 2010. we absolutely loved it. the rooms are fantastic!!!!! we had a three bedroom apartment and there was that much room we could have lived there. Good facilities in the room if you want to stay in, and a big supermarket just 2 mins away (by car). You can also jump on the iride bus that runs up and down international drive if you want to go out at night. Most of the lifes around Ripleys upside down house. The foods no cheap out there (dollar was 1.46 then!) and did a few nice retaurants but to be honest the best service and family meals were at the tfi fridays or similar. Back to the hotel we loved it! i dont think you will get any better. If there was a fault it was there were not enough umbrella's around the pool !! my word does it get hot!!!!! and could do with a restaurant for family dining. there is a snack bar which is great for around the pool at dinner but could do with something a little for the evenings if you dont fancy going to far, believe me when you have been to those theme parks you are exhausted. On the whole the place is probably trhe best hotel/resort we have ever stayed in. took ages to get around to writing he review but you know how it is with kids!!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful resort, rooms very spacious, pool huge and very child friendly”
Reviews.Author: Schinlist
Reviews.Content: Very rare to find a 3 bedroom condo/hotel suite for such reasonable rates. The room was clean and had a large living area. Four televisions and one vcr/dvd player. The pool area was fantastic. Heated pool with large children's play area and a hot tub. Bar and marketplace right near the pool. Friendly attentive staff, what a great experience. We will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “great place when you need multiple bedrooms at a great price”
Reviews.Author: 856juliana
Reviews.Content: second time staying here, nice size 3 bedroom unit for the 6 of us, could have slept 12. It was a combination of business and leisure, so we were close to everything, parks, convention center, supermarket. The living area was great for office work and meals were easily made in the full kitchen. There is a close Outback Steakhouse that we did take out from because it was over an hour wait. Will stay there again next year for business trip if there is more than 2 of us.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for families”
Reviews.Author: islander8181
Reviews.Content: Our accomodations had three bedrooms and was more spacious than I expected. Everything was clean and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and value. Very clean!”
Reviews.Author: septemberbride18
Reviews.Content: We had a great stay! We felt as though we received a great deal for the spacious room full of useful items. I stayed with my husband but I can see how convenient this would be for a family or group of friends. Only thing we used were the wine glasses but you literally had everything you needed for a comfortable stay. Whatever was missing, I am sure could be accomodated. Great, quiet location next to Premium Outlets, a Publix, great restaurants. Minutes from Seaworld, Downtown Disney. We really couldnt have asked for more. Will DEFINITELY stay here next time. I only hope they keep up the attention to detail. They were paving the parking lot during our stay which I appreciated as it seems they really do try to maintain the property. Keep it up and I will definitely return! My husband and I travel to Orlando frequently from Miami and I am just sad we didn't find Floridays sooner :)

Reviews.Title: “Great location with a great price!”
Reviews.Author: KC11271
Reviews.Content: My family and I went for a week to Orlando and stayed at the Floridays. Upon our arrival, the hotel's staff were extremely helpful and polite. We ordered groceries from gardengrocer.com and they were delivered and even put away in our kitchen! We went to the Disney Parks every day that we were there and didn't leave too much time to really use all the amenities that Floridays had to offer. My boys did swim in the pool that was heated to 84 degrees which was great, considering it didn't get past 70 the whole week! The market cafe was great for coffee and sundries you might have forgotten at home. Our room was very spacious (overlooked a parking lot) and had a full sized refrigerator and oven. Pretty much everything you would need to cook with is there. My one and only complaint is they advertise full housekeeping services with each condo. However, they never cleaned our bathrooms or kitchen. They did tidy up our beds and empty our garbage, but I would have rather they cleaned the bathrooms! To their credit and not mine, I did not call to complain and I am sure they would have taken care of it if I had. The location is great you are minutes from restaurants and right around the corner from a grocery store. It took us about 15 minutes to get to Disney (we drove). Overall I would recommend this hotel, it was a great deal for the price we paid $125/night.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious, Clean, Huge Rooms, Great location”
Reviews.Author: willicarj
Reviews.Content: Im finishing a family/business trip at Floridays and the place is great. The 2br is 1070 sq. ft, full kicthen, dining, and living room. This is by far and away the best place for families to stay. With taxes and resort fee, it was a $118.00 a night---promotion going on now. Food is very reasonable, right next to the factory outlets, and only about 15 minutes from Disney World. The pool is very warm and great for kids. Im here for 3 4 days with the family and 3 for business. For families, friends, or couples---this is the best bang for the buck. Kitchen supplies are limited (no frying pan but there are pans) but enough to get you by.

Reviews.Title: “They Made Our Honeymoon Unforgettable Beautiful Place, Great Staff !!”
Reviews.Author: Maridianpr
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from a 2 week Honeymoon at the beautiful Floridays Resort Orlando. It was the best holiday we've ever had in our whole lives .. and a lot of that has to be contributed to the hotel we stayed in. Its located @ stop 40 on the I - Ride Trolley at a lovely quiet end of I - Drive and there is a Publix two minutes from the grounds. Floridays is a lovely, secure, Luxury complex with the best staff we've ever encountered working in a hotel, and were not just that ... there really are wonderful. We were greeted very nicely when we entered the building By Chris .. a Really Genuine nice guy who checked us in and got a very nice guy called Matthew to take us to the building were our room was. The complex itself is clean and well kept and the rooms .... THE ROOMS .... ARE AMAZING .... so clean, sleek, and flashy. Flat Screen, Jacuzzi Bath, Room service, Free Internet in the Room. The pools & Jacuzzi are clean and HEATED !!! WOO HOO and there is a bar, Comfy sun loungers and Complimentary pool towels for all the guests. When we got settled we went down to the Lobby to enquire about the parks and were directed to the Concierge desk ..where we meet the Wonderful Nildia .. who is so sweet and so kind ..she was like our mammy the whole time we were there .. she kept us on the Right Track .. Then There's Wildo ( The Wizard) .. he's the go to guy and has a Knack for helping with good places to eat & Such a Genuinely Nice Man to everyone he meets ... (Thanks For the Reservations Wizard!! LOL) . Nilda & Wildo and not to forget Brett are so helpful and lovely and have all the information you need and if they don't .. they will go to the ends to find it for you .. and not to Forget Tom on the Front Door (Thanks For The Dramamine LOL) He's a Real kind Straight Shooter. The guys at the Front Desk are Really Helpful and kind, Alejandra and Chris are guys we dealt with most and are full of info and laughter and make you feel right at home ..but to be honest the front desk people are all really nice and were all helpful and kind to us .. Overall Floridays for us was the perfect experience and especially for honeymoon .. were definitely going back ... No Shadow of a Doubt and to be honest ..the Minute you leave there .. your Gonna Miss it. Congratulations to Rod For Running such a Establishment, you have very Fine Staff Sir! There like a Big Family at Floridays and they take you in as one of there own !!

Reviews.Title: “I would definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: AEJOHNSON41
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at the Floridays Resort. The room was just as we expected, the beds were very comfortable, and it was so nice to have a full kitchen. The only thing that we thought could be improved was the hallways and trash chute areas could have been a bit cleaner. Other than that, it was a great stay and we will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice and clean!!!”
Reviews.Author: Landonsun
Reviews.Content: Never expected that much... excellent services, clean, big room for the children and master room for the parents. I would recommend to anyone. The kids loved the pool with the plays, water was 85F. Everything you need is there. Minutes from the theme parks.

Reviews.Title: “Family fun spot with a pleasent place to relax after a busy day at the parks.”
Reviews.Author: justin026
Reviews.Content: This is the second time we have stayed and will stay when we visit out daughter again in Orlando. The staff have always been most helpful, the rooms are very clean and plenty of room. We have already given your number to our friend who is planning a trip later this year with his family. You can't beat the value you get at Floridays. Ray Cutter

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't have chosen a more perfect place”
Reviews.Author: SML-Maine
Reviews.Content: The price was right, the location was perfect and the rooms were beautiful and comfortable. We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with our 5 year old. It was nice to have the kitchenette to keep snacks and food so we didn't need to go out each night. The staff was super friendly. The rooms were very clean - we were duly impressed. It was nice and quiet- on a great part of International Dr. Great location to get to the parks.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: psension
Reviews.Content: My experience at this hotel was great. I read peoples last reviews about not having good house keeping and I did not have this problem. I had fresh towels every day. They didn't clean the tables or the counters but I was reallyworried about that. Overall the hotel staff was great and the location was awesome for Disney and right around the corner from seaworld. I would highly recommend it to anyone and would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay for work or play!”
Reviews.Author: gmorganlcsw
Reviews.Content: The rooms were huge - two bedrooms, two full bathrooms, a full sized kitchen, living room and balcony with a view of a mini lake. Most importantly, it was silent at night - there was even a raging party a few doors down from us and we could not hear a thing through the concrete walls. It is located on the southern end of International Drive so it is close to Disney and traffic is minimal. The pool areas are great and the room service is served family style so it is great for those on a budget. Only downsides are $25 per hour for late check out (a tad extreme in this economy) and movable wall over jacuzzi tub in Master bedroom limits privacy. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “One Terrific Resort!”
Reviews.Author: btqco
Reviews.Content: Great room layout, perfect for families. Very comfortable, great value.

Reviews.Title: “Great choice”
Reviews.Author: Edwinwendy
Reviews.Content: Great choice if you want an apartment of a high quality. The only downside if any is that the Internet is wired and only on PC an connect. If they add Wifi then it would be perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Home from home”
Reviews.Author: realm
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with my husband our 2 children and my brother in a 3 bedroom apartment, they are well appointed, the kitchen is fully stocked (fridge-freezer, dishwasher,cooker and microwave) little extras like washer and dryer make life a lot easier they even supply the washing powder and dishwasher powder. The only word of caution i would have would be to anyone staying here with no car, the I-ride trolley stops right outside the hotel but, it's quite a few stops to International drive, we had a car so only used the i-ride once going out for dinner and drinks. The house keeping service is basic (bed dress and towel change daily)but you can pay for full clean $30 for two bed and $35 for three bed, the cleaners can arrive anytime of day some times 5pm which having been out all day long wasn't ideal so i wouldn't mark them well for this. Overall i really enjoyed my stay but location was a bit of an issue, as we normally stay more central to international drive but the home comforts make up for this.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Safe Accommodation in excellent Location”
Reviews.Author: suks
Reviews.Content: Myself and my family (45, 42, 11, 9 & 6 years of age) stayed in this suite hotel over the new year and loved it. It was a fantastic base for all the theme parks (15 mins to Disney or Universal). It has a Publix and a Walmart literally next door with the Premium Outlet Mall less than 500 meters away. It is situated on the nice end of International Drive (no hurdy gurdy, neon lights outside). We took a 2 bed suite which worked well for us a kids young enough to share 2 double beds in twin room between them. We had a huge king sized bed and en suite with both jacuzzi bath and double walk in shower. The kitchen was well equipped with huge fridge dishwasher oven etc., we also had a laundry cupboard with a washer and dryer. There were 3 TVs with plenty of news channels and Nick and Disney Channel for kids. The only negative about the accommodation was how dark the kitchen and living area was. We had to have full lights on no matter what time of day as no natural light in that area. The pool was lovely and pleasantly heated. There was plenty of sun loungers and a graded beach type pool at one side with water jets for kids in addition to a deeper side for adults. The pool side restaurant (called the Market place) was excellent for burgers, wraps etc., either to eat pool side or delivered to your room. We arrived down there for breakfast on our first morning but ended up going out to the local Golden Corral as there wasn't much so ace to sit in the cafe. They serve Starbucks Coffee. There is free wifi around the pool, reception, restaurant areas. There is also internet access in your room if you have a laptop (not much good for iPads tho!!). No specific parking but we always got a place just outside our apartment block. Staff really helpful and efficient. Would def recommend for any age really. Lots of older families there also in addition to retired couples and younger families. Book it - great value, great location, great holiday.

Reviews.Title: “My whole family loved Floridays.”
Reviews.Author: meeeee528
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly. The 3 bedroom suite was clean and perfect for my large family. The grounds were welcoming and the service was great. The shuttle service to and from the parks were very limited, but it worked out fine for us. I would recommend Floridays for anyone visiting the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “A really great family resort with all the comforts of home in a vacation atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: bcasper328
Reviews.Content: A really great family resort with all the comforts of home in a vacation atmosphere.. We had a 20 yr old, 13, and 9 year old with us. Everyone loved the pool. They have activities for the younger ones which my 9 year loved, and it kept him busy so we could enjoy some sun time by the pool. This resort is in a very good location for all the attractions. only minutes from disney, Seaword and Universal. Traffic can be a little tricky when you pull into the resort. You have to do a u turn into the entrance. We did not however, have any luck with checking in early. So i would not count on that at all. All in all, my family was very pleased!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: gtrgrl2k
Reviews.Content: I would definitely return to the Floridays Resort again! In fact, if I were traveling with friends or family to Orlando in the future, I think it would be foolish not to stay at the Floridays Resort! Our "room" was a full, 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment, which could easily and comfortably accommodate 2 couples or a family with one couple and 4 children. You couldn't ask for more room in the unit - with a full kitchen (with dish washer), washer and dryer, 2 double beds in one bedroom (with t.v.), king size bed in the master (with t.v.), a smaller, shared bathroom with a sink, toilet and shower/tub combo. The master bath was very nice, with a large whirlpool bath and separate shower. We were able to book 2 days in advance at a Florida residents' rate of only $125 per night. That was for 2 couples so we were paying only $62.50 per night per couple for a really nice hotel at a really nice location. You can't beat that price... especially for a clean, modern hotel. An important factor for us with booking at the Floridays was that there are free shuttles to/from the parks. Beware though - the times the shuttles come and go are EXACT. There is no room for error and the buses do not wait even one extra minute for stragglers so you may want to be where you are supposed to be for the shuttles a few minutes early because the driver will not be waiting for you, even if they are expecting you. That being said, the price of parking at Disney World is about $24 so we were very happy to save that money and have a free ride! Also, parking is free at the Floridays, which is unusual for an Orlando hotel. Note, however, there is an $11+ resort fee per unit per night, which really isn't bad when you consider the free parking and the free shuttle. We will definitely be staying at the Floridays next time we travel with friends or children!

Reviews.Title: “There is virtually no housekeeping”
Reviews.Author: legal1277
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip to Floridays - the 1st was about 2 years ago for 1 night. We remembered it because of the size of the units and the value. You really can't beat that. We came with my brother-in-law and his wife/my husband and myself to get out of New York for a quick 3 day New Year's trip. I didn't read any reviews before coming since I pretty much knew we'd be staying here. Like everyone else - we had virtually no housekeeping, although we did see plenty of housekeepers outside the units. They say they'll change your towels, make the beds and empty the garbage, but they pretty much didn't. If you asked for towels, you could get them. We're not too messy, so garbage wasn't a problem for us, but if this had been several years ago with our kids, it would have been a disaster. Internet -- are they kidding? They'll provide you an ethernet cable for the room; ours worked for one day and then stopped working. We were lucky because the weather got good when we got there, so we were able to spend all our time outside. I think the suites are a great size; the location is ok and the value is hard to beat. But forewarned is forearmed: be prepared for no housekeeping and bring your cellular modem.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant value and comfortable rooms.”
Reviews.Author: tripowl3
Reviews.Content: The staff was very friendly and tried to make our trip wonderful. I have already recomended it to other people and would go back.

Reviews.Title: “Average comfortable but housecleaning sucks”
Reviews.Author: JINGAPRAWN
Reviews.Content: Stayed over new year ,Hotel is well located and rooms are clean to start,But housecleaning only makes your bed and changes towels ,emties garbage during your stay no washroom cleaning or new soape shampoo etc.Internet -no WIFI onlt hard wire which did not work for two days.House keeping staff did not speak english until my wife tipped her and then we got fresh towels ,soaps shampoo etc. Front desk staff not to helpfull and were unaware of the special rate quoted on their website and I felt like they thought I was lying to them about the special rate only to find out I was correct when they went on the website. All in all its ok but they can do much better by just tweaking up their service.they have a great facility but no good srevice.

Reviews.Title: “I expected more.”
Reviews.Author: Athassrd
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews before we left, I was expecting more. We travel a great deal and some of our experiences at this property left us a bit cold. Positives: 1) It was nice having a two bedroom, two bath condo as we were traveling with two teenage girls. 2) They provided enough dish soap and laundry detergent for two loads of each. 3) Cafe served Starbucks. Negatives: 1) Two consecutive days we did not receive clean towels. I had to call the front desk late at night after we returned to the hotel. 2) The concierge was less than helpful. 3) The internet did not work in the room. 4) Shuttle service is VERY LIMITED and must be reserved IN ADVANCE 5) Too far away from anything if you don't rent a car

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: sjc96
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at Floridays very much. The room was large and well stocked. It was too cold to use the pool, but it looked clean and inviting. The location was close to shopping and the parks. It was a little hard to find the entrance due to construction. There were a couple of days that we didnt have enough towels delivered and had to call down, but other than that the service was great. The thermostat in the room was locked which proved to be a little uncomfortable at times and the buses could get very loud pulling in and out of the parking lot at early and late hours. We would definitely go back though!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to enjoy your vacation!!”
Reviews.Author: Jenny124
Reviews.Content: I enjoy this place so much. Whenever are head to Florida for vacation I look forward to returning here. The place is beautiful. The staff is super friendly and everything is within minutes! If you are heading to Florida...I would 100% recommend this place! Make sure to visit the bar when Jake is working. He is great!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay At Floridays”
Reviews.Author: Lawlersm
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a week stay at Floridays over Christmas visiting Disney and Universal. Our 2-bedroom suite was very nice, clean and I had absolutely no complaints. I have two teenage kids, 15 and 16, and they both had a great time in the hot tub and game room. Customer service was outstanding and the staff very accomodating. There is a Publix supermarket only a block away and very convienient for shopping for food/supplies. There is also a very nice shopping center down the street from Publix (Prime Outlets). Universal and Disney are a short drive away-- we rented a vehicle, so we had no problems driving the 10-15 minutes to the parks. During prime time, get to the parks early! We were at Universal and Disney parking lots early (one hour before the parks actually open) and on Christmas eve and Christmas day, we had a wonderful time before noon. After that, the park gets a little crowded and wait time for rides is longer. We're all early birds, so we had a great time before the parks got too crowded. Housekeeping was great and by the time we returned from the parks, our rooms had fresh towels/washcloths, beds were made and trash was removed. Not sure about a recent post where they had no washcloths-- we had fresh towels and washcloths every day. We had a wonderful time and I would recommend this resort to others.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: iameva
Reviews.Content: Thoroughly enjoyed Floridays! Such nice staff and really nice suites. I have no complaints. The only thing that I did not like was having to pay for internet access in the business center. I felt it was a little expensive and should have been complimentary. The cafe by the pool had great sandwiches especially the Cuban Panini! It was awesome!! Would highly recommend Floridays to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Loation, service and rooms excellent”
Reviews.Author: cookie99
Reviews.Content: Just stayed for a week in Floridays to visit Disney. Rooms were fantastic, loved the hot tub and used it every day. Nice little extras like washing up liquid dishwasher tabs, washing powder to get us started. Outdoor pool was too cold for the kids which was a pity but the outdoor hot tub they enjoyed. Restaurent fairly basic but adaquete, more of a cafe than restaurent. Reception staff could not have been more helpful, will definitely recommend to others.

Reviews.Title: “Once again an amazing stay. Best place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Fdufresne
Reviews.Content: This resort is a great value with a warm and caring staff. Close to the theme parks. I would not stay anywhere else when I'm in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “It was a very Merry Christmas for our family!!”
Reviews.Author: lanie5
Reviews.Content: Great location...had everything we needed! was clean and comfortable. Needed some help with the a/c and TV. They responded very quickly and were very helpful and profesonal. Front desk was great as well as the consierge service was very helpful with tickets to the parks

Reviews.Title: “great stay quiet and clean plus a great value”
Reviews.Author: bamatide12
Reviews.Content: very nice resort. great location and close to disney and sea world. rooms were very nice, clean, quiet and modern. really enjoyed the master bathroom tub. Need to make the room thermostat more user friendly would be my only complaint. the staff was one phone call away from anything you needed and very prompt as well in fufilling any requests. I will stay here again. easy access to disnyworld as well. dont waste your hard earned money on a disny hotel as they are a glorified days inn anyway. stay here for less money and enjoy a home away from home. great pool area as well although we didnt get to enjoy it as it was december when we went and cold

Reviews.Title: “fabulous value, clean, great staff!”
Reviews.Author: heartgirl99
Reviews.Content: we found the 2-br, 2-bath unit roomy, clean and well-supplied. the units all contain washer/dryer and full kitchen, including dishwasher. the front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. all the staff seemed happy to be there and always had a ready smile. the main pool was large and had lots of loungers around it. there was a bar and snack bar poolside. the second pool was smaller and quiet but equally well equipped with lots of loungers. towels were available poolside at both pools. it is close to all attractions - disney, universal and sea world. a short drive up international drive got you to more attractions - ripley's, wonderworks, and tons of restaurants. a nearby plaza, actually within walking distance, had a few restaurants, walgreen's and publix. all in all a very enjoyable stay. we will definitely be back! :o)

Reviews.Title: “Again... Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: rv10
Reviews.Content: I choose Floridays again for disney christmas events "mini vacation". Well this time was little bit cold but we loved it, we stay in a 3 bedroom unit and it was absolutly comfortable, I will definitely recommended. This time I wanted to say thank you to a nice gentlemen named Bora in the housekeeping section, he was extremely very helpful with few things that I was missing in my room... Thank you Bora and keep the good guest services... I'm planning to stay hopefully again at Floridays for Summer time. Acuatica water park is right next door.

Reviews.Title: “I would bring my family right back here---I loved it and so did the kids and grandkids.”
Reviews.Author: schniederjan
Reviews.Content: 19 Family members from 10 months to 57 years.Clean,friendly,affordable,tended to us very well! I had family wanting to know all about it because we enjoyed it so much.I plan on returning here in the future.The 3 bedroom suites have everything a family needs including a washer and dryer.The location is perfect for all the attractions.I was so impressed with the entire staff striving to make our stay what we hoped it to be.Any concerns were addressed immediately and then they folowed up by checking with me personally to make sure we were pleased.From a Grandfather that wanted to see his family have a nice Christmas Vacation I am beyond delighted to have stayed at Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “I am always extremely happy with my stay at Floridays Resort.”
Reviews.Author: MargueriteGirard_10
Reviews.Content: I try not to stay anywhere else because of the luxury, cleanliness, and friendliness. I am always satisfied and leave Floridays Resort happy and refreshed. The highlight of Floridays Resort is definately the jacuzzi in the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: “roomy.”
Reviews.Author: homebodyonvacay
Reviews.Content: Front desk staff was very nice and check-in and out were fast and friendly. Lots of space to spread out. The rooms looked clean, but one room had sunflower seeds between the bed and the wall that had not been vacuumed in weeks. Nice having free shuttles to Disney, but they were not very convenient. The first one was too early for us, and the second was very late. Also shuttles from Disney were hard to find in the dark. Having a sign that said "Floridays" would be very helpful. Hard to get a towel after hours, as housekeeping was closed, and always a busy signal from the front desk. Kids loved the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: laz007
Reviews.Content: We spent 7 nights at the Floridays on a recent trip to Orlando. The location was fantastic. It was next to a 24hr Walgreens and Publix supermarket that was open till 10pm each night which made it easy to buy food supplies. It was one block from the Premium outlets which open most nights till 11pm. There was a great Japanese Restaurant next door called Benihana. We hired a car for the 7 days and found it a short drive to Disneyworld and Universal Studio's from the hotel. The staff were very helpful and responded immediately if you called for extra towels or help working the air conditioning. The washing machine and dryer in the unit were very handy. The pool was very clean and inviting. I would definitely return to the Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Property Though The Location is Obscure!”
Reviews.Author: bigblueinflorida
Reviews.Content: I loved the Floridays property! Just stayed in a 2 bedroom unit with another couple and was thoroughly impressed with the interior finishes and layout. The unit was more than comfortable and we enjoyed the bedroom split plan. We live locally so we stayed for here during a Disney weekend event with friends. The pool wasn't spectacular but was functional and we loved the caliber of guests at the hotel. We were some of the only Americans out at the pool during the day but that was just fine. The bulk of the guests were from the UK and were very guarded so we just hung out with our friends around the pool. We brought our own beers down from the room and this was a great idea. I am not sure if t he other guests loved this but it was our choice! Good restaurants are a bit of a trek away so we took advantage of pizza delivery after too many drinks at the pool on Saturday. I would like to say thanks to my UK friends who decided to go topless discreetly at the pool. Risque!!!!!! I am sure management would not be pleased. Other than a remote location you won't find a more comfortable property in the vicinity of the attractions.

Reviews.Title: “FIRST CLASS”
Reviews.Author: gadzooks1066
Reviews.Content: This was our first visit to FLORIDAYS and we will definitely return here. From check-in to check-out, the service we received was 1st class. All the staff were super (a special mention to LISA and NILDA who were brilliant - thanks so much to both of you for your help). The hotel was ideally located with great amenities and the room was excellent, well appointed and, most importantly, clean. We have no hesitation in recommending FLORIDAYS so book with confidence. See you next year!

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: G8rsusie
Reviews.Content: We had 3 families... Inc 2 two-year olds. Perfect setup. I've told everyone about this place, and can't wait to go back for more than an overnight stay. Room service is priced more like catering, but we had our supplies laid in for snacking & breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great resort for families and groups”
Reviews.Author: Anisabellydance
Reviews.Content: My family and I always stay at Floridays Resort when we go to Orlando. We get the suite with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. There is a kitchen and a living area and a dining area that works great for everyone to hang out in. There is a great balcony as well. I like the jacuzzi tub and it comes in handy after walking around all day at the parks. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They offer a shuttle for the Disney parks at two times in the morning and then a pick-up time in the evening. If you do use a cab the average price is around $20-$25. We really like Floridays and will continue to stay there!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in the Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: psm1145
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfectly located amongst all the main attractions in Orlando. The room is perfect for families with children as the kitchen and the in-room washer/dryer were very helpful. We were unable to check out the pool/water park facilities at the resort due to the cold weather but they did look good. Ample free parking and free internet. Please note that in-room internet requires an ethernet cable but you get free wifi in the cafe (which is Starbucks) and at the reception lounge. You will need a car to get to places and this a much better option than using the bus service (iRide), which did not look that good. There is a big grocery store and an Outlet village around the corner and a Walmart superstore about 4 miles away, which is a great place to get park tickets that are slightly cheaper than gate prices. The hotel staff were very helpful and we will stay here again the next time we are in Orlando. Driving in Orlando is easy, all you need is a Sat-Nav. Please note that when renting cars in Orlando we found that the boot sizes in most cars could not handle anything more than 3/4 pieces of luggage, which is an issue when travelling with a family. We tried several cars to no avail so we decided to go for an SUV, which was by far the best decision we made, apart from staying at Floridays that is!! The SUV was easy to drive and as everyone in Orlando drive big SUV-like cars we found it better to sitting higher up like most other drivers there.

Reviews.Title: “BEST hotel experience in over 20 yrs!”
Reviews.Author: ngalbdvmEq
Reviews.Content: We have never been as pleased with any hotel experience as we have with this stay. It was above and beyond what we expected, especially for the value! We have already spoken highly of the experience and recommended this facility to more than seven people!! We have NEVER done that before! (my husband and I travel at least five times a year for over 20 years... I hope that last statement speaks volumes! I have also never answered a survey so readily and easily with so many 5/5)

Reviews.Title: “Floridays never dissappoints!”
Reviews.Author: manolo1963
Reviews.Content: Third time we've stayed at the Floridays Resort in Orlando, and I'm sure it won't be the last. While traveling with a small 5-year old, we really value the convenience and flexibility of having a full kitchen, washer/dryer, ample accommodations, and excellent location. The resort is very close by to the Orlando Premium Outlets, has a Walgreens and Publix basically within walking distance, friendly staff and relatively new facilities. You do pay a "resort fee" which, in our case doesn't really get used much (there's great pools but with the weather in the 50's (F) and low 60's it doesn't get visited at all. Same for the fitness center during our short stay this time around. The location is excellent; it's more or less in the middle between the Disney and Universal resort areas (very close to Sea World) but at the same time, and even being on International Drive, it's away from the hustle and bustle that ID can be most of the time. All in all, a very good experience. We're very likely to repeat. If you're traveling with a larger group they have 3-bedroom suites available (we stayed at a 2-bedroom). Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Fun at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: katibug407
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 3 bedroom condo which was definitely worth the price of weekend stay. We could not have been more pleased and our accommodations added to a great Disney Merry Christmas Party weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice rooms and a good value.”
Reviews.Author: mickeymouse98
Reviews.Content: The rooms are spacious and provide adequate sleeping arrangements for large families. The value is unbeatable in the area. It is very close to Disney World and easy to get to and from. The pool bar/marketplace provides nice meals and a good cost.

Reviews.Title: “great value for a disney vacation”
Reviews.Author: Judgedee2
Reviews.Content: Great location, excellent price and very close to outlet malls, restaurants and Disney parks. Highly recommend for families.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing Wrong With Floridays”
Reviews.Author: PaulG1966
Reviews.Content: A good place to stay. Nice pool for days when you're not doing much. Location's good. On Idrive, but the nice end!! Everywhere you want to go in Orlando is within 15 mins drive.

Reviews.Title: “Only OK”
Reviews.Author: ggobble
Reviews.Content: Its only OK at best. We have stayed here two times now and have done so b/c of its location. They have zero security at night which scares me as people are walking around passing things under your door and the rooms...well they could be cleaner. Its getting dates and we stayed in the new building that was new the last time we stayed there - it begs the question when something stops being new.

Reviews.Title: “This place must be on top of everybodys list when visiting Orlando.”
Reviews.Author: EastbourneMjw
Reviews.Content: Fantastic location, fantastic resort. Very friendly Team, very clean and tidy rooms, excellent pool area, very nice food and reasonably priced, and located right opposite the Tolley bus stop. We had a fantastic time and would thoroughly recommend the resort . We have stayed on Idrive before but this place is the business. Idrive is such a great place for a holiday and we are returning in 2011, maybe one week on the coast and then finishing with a week in Orlando. 2 weeks around shopping malls with my daughters is just too painful on the wallet. east sussex family

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Resort! Clean, great amenities, well appointed rooms.”
Reviews.Author: litko
Reviews.Content: We went with this resort after reading several online favorable reviews. Now we can offer a favorable review ourselves! We have 4 children - ages 4 to 15 yrs. We ALL enjoyed our stay. 2 bedroom room was spacious and comfortable for us all to enjoy and relax without tripping over one another. Washer and dryer in our room came in handy. Best of all - it was clean, clean, clean! Floridays was also very close to all the attractions we had traveled to Orlando to see. Pleasant, welcoming staff. Couldn't have been more pleased! Would highly recommend Floridays!

Reviews.Title: “Fix the pool.”
Reviews.Author: Spalms85
Reviews.Content: This hotel was great. My husband would rate floridays as a ten. The only issues I had with this place was I overbooked by one day and I tried to get my money back and the only thing was ionly got half back. I had to call the manager of orbitz like 3 times and the manager of floridays 3 times and then a confrence call and they would only give me half back. The whenn it came to get the rooms clean they charged me. It was outrageous.

Reviews.Title: “Thanksgiving 2010 New Tradition”
Reviews.Author: TravelLover60898
Reviews.Content: We loved "everything" about our Floridays Resort stay. We did not want to leave. We started a new tradition for our family this year for Thanksgiving. We always spend Spring Break in Orlando so we will now spend that at Floridays. The location was awesome and the suites are simply beautiful and so spacious. We have stayed at some 4 and 4.5, 5.0 resorts that do not even compare. The suite, our view, the location and staff were all exceptional. We highly recommend this resort! A tip,if you want to be where the action is try to stay around the grand pool area, if you want luxury and the romance stay in bldg D, but whereever you stay at this resort - you will LOVE it.

Reviews.Title: “great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: amoedom
Reviews.Content: We stayed over the thanksgiving weekend. the room was spacious, all brand new! i cooked our thanksgiving dinner in the kitchen. The kitchen was fully equipped with everything i needed. We had the two bedroom apartment and our 4 kids enjoyed the place. it was very close to disney and not too far from universal studios either. Our stay was great! Everyone was very friendly, and helpful. We did not use the pool area, weather was too cool for us at the time, but it was also very lovely.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous resort for the price”
Reviews.Author: mommydocpam
Reviews.Content: We visit Orlando 4- 5 times a year and have been doing so for 15 years. This was the best overall resort we have stayed in. When you consider location, ammenitites, service and price I give it a 5 star rating. We have 3 teens and we visit all the Disney parks when we come. We also utilize the pool and hot tub areas of the resorts we stay in.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Thanksgiving”
Reviews.Author: bjbw
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at Floridays on their Thanksgiving Special. The staff and 2-bedroom condo was excellent. They delivered our dinner, which included a whole turkey, for 4 to our room. Everything was delicious. I live in Kissimmee FL about 15 minutes away and I would go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient to shopping and Parks.”
Reviews.Author: beirish
Reviews.Content: This was my 5th time staying at Floridays and we will be back again. We love how close it is to Disney and SeaWorld. Aquatica was the best water park and my grandchildren couldn't get enough of it. Our 3 bedroom condo at Floridays was clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The pool and snackbar were great. We could just stay there for a few days and be very happy. Many restaurants close by and a Publix Grocery store where we purchased Turkey dinner this time. Everything you needed in a kitchen and a dinning room to accommodate a large group for dinner. Our grandchildren loved the large sand area as well. One suggestion would be ask to be away from the parking lot, it can get noisy at night. We like to overlook the pool so we got used to the noise after the first night. Using our AAA the price was quite reasonable for a week.

Reviews.Title: “Best value at an Orlando Resort we have ever found!”
Reviews.Author: VacationLovers05
Reviews.Content: Large room with two bathrooms and a TV in every bedroom. Amazed at the price. Great value and would definitely stay here the next time we are in Orlando. Only negatives- parking lot noisy after midnight on weekends, some black mold in showers, carpet worn and looked like it needed to be cleaned. Also beds were hard. Otherwise, great location between all of the major theme parks, parking nearby each building, full size appliances in a real kitchen. Close to a great Factory outlet mall, plus a pharmacy and grocery store. Already planning our next vacation there.

Reviews.Title: “Very Enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: dwkestner
Reviews.Content: Staff were very helpful and pleasant. Master bathroom was fantastic with a nice jacuzzi, good shower pressure. Pleasant grounds, nice pool area with bar - reasonable prices for drinks. Great location between Disney and Universal. Enough kitchenware for the basic, grocery store, liquor store chinese restauarant around the corner, Benihana next door. If you have 4 or more, this is definitely a great value and experience.
