Take a ethernet cable as there is free internet but no Wifi other than in the pool area.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful experience for our family and friends to spend a week together...”
Reviews.Author: grammyof25
Reviews.Content: We spent a wonderful week with family and friends and we found it to be very close to everything you want to do. The staff was helpful and the comfort was great. We had 5, 3bedroom condos and each one was wonderful. We all had a great experience. The children want to know when are we going to do it again!!!!

Reviews.Title: “3rd visit and still a charm!”
Reviews.Author: smiley1075
Reviews.Content: I love this place -- it's sparkling clean. We've stayed in many other condos where everything in the space was cheap -- cheap couch, cheap cabinets, cheap furniture. Floridays uses granite and everything is upgraded. amazing whirlpool bathtub. The only thing I wish they had were the luxiurious bedding and mattresses but that's really just wishful thinking and it's not bad what they have. We LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: “Week-long Getaway”
Reviews.Author: YoKalua
Reviews.Content: Pros: Daily shuttles to and back from Universal and Epcot, Huge units, nice tub, internet access, outlet nearby, grocery store nearby Cons: Thin walls, need a car to see other parts of Orlando

Reviews.Title: “Affordable Luxury”
Reviews.Author: blaumax
Reviews.Content: The most comfort you can get for the price. It would be difficult to beat Floridays on this. Comfort to me means a clean, quiet, safe, convenient and relaxing place that is aesthetically pleasing. Floridays was spot-on in all of these categories.

Reviews.Title: “Family trip at Floridays Resort”
Reviews.Author: xponetial
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very impressive when you drive up to it. The rooms are beautifully decorated, large and very accommodating. However the beds were absolutely horrible, mattresses need to be changed. They are very uncomfortable. Otherwise this hotel would of got my 5 star rating. Also the maid service is very poor, all they do is provide towels and change the beds. Would of been better if they actually vacuumed and swept the floors.

Reviews.Title: “Will always stay here.”
Reviews.Author: smotivated1
Reviews.Content: The room was great and I felt like I had my own provate suite when I retired to my bedroom even with 5 teenagers. Very convenent to everything and the staff was awesome. The price made me worry because it was so low but it was nicer than most 4 and 5 star hotels I have ever stayed at in the past. Loved it and I will be back.. Thank you, Greg Smith Charlotte, NC

Reviews.Title: “Did not want to leave”
Reviews.Author: laverocktraci
Reviews.Content: I stayed in room 505a which i thought was great for me for convenieces to lobby,pool,elecvator and the beautiful veiw looking at the fountain,also parking was great. The hospitality of the crew was suberb. i cannot wait to go back. I felt like iwas home away from home very very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Had a fantastic stay at Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: LauraLee101
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful find--our family of four was very comfortable in our two bedroom suite with two bathrooms. It was easy to relax and spread out in when we were not out visiting parks and beaches. The only thing that concerned me a little is that the suite doors open to the outside courtyard so security didn't appear to be great--however, we had no problems and it was far quieter than most hotels we have stayed at. We would visit again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Modern, Inviting, everything we needed”
Reviews.Author: JeanFruzzetti
Reviews.Content: We got a great price through Expedia. My husband & I were totally satisfied with our hotel. It is more like a condo. It felt truly like our own home, kitchen, dining room, living room, two bedrooms, two baths, washer, dryer. I could tell just by the thickness of the beautiful white towels that we had picked the right place to stay. So close to Disney, Sea World, etc. We highly recommend this location.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accommodations - would go again”
Reviews.Author: BJO_10
Reviews.Content: Our suite was described as a two-bedroom suite, with two baths, a kitchen, living area. Upon entering, it was really spacious, decorated nicely, with a large TV in each bedroom, plus an even larger TV in the living area. There was a spa tub in the master bedroom. Overall, this suite was an outstanding value for the price. There were no noises, from other rooms, or from the highway. All was very enjoyable. Others in our group remarked that this hotel was exceptionally nice for the price paid. There is a large outdoor pool area and nearby cafe. We saw several families were enjoying pool time with their children. There are many choices for hotels catering to families in the Orlando area, but I'm sure they aren't as nice as this one. This one is definitely a winner.

Reviews.Title: “Nice resort but not having a heated pool is a major downside especially if your stay is from Nov-Feb.”
Reviews.Author: mnm1401
Reviews.Content: Please get a heater for your pool. Too nice of a place to not have a heater for the main pool. The water is way to cold. We stayed end of Nov 2010 and the pool would benefit a heater installed for use from the beginning of Nov-Feb for all guests to enjoy. The spa (hot tub) is very nice but small for the size of the resort. I would add an additional one in the other corner of the pool deck. If you have a family with kids I would suggest staying in building A or B as these buildings are close to the main pool and the game room/work out room / food/bar area. I was orginally placed in building E and my kids would have a hike to get to the main pool. I would recommend this resort to friends and family during the summer months only due to the pool issues. If they get a heater, I would definately come back next Thanksgiving and for years to come. Too bad the pool which my kids were looking forward to using wasn't heated. They were heart broken!! Rooms were great size and very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: JP266
Reviews.Content: Great location for visiting the theme parks; clean; great rooms; excellent value. On the negative, we stayed in building F, which was the furthest from the main pool area and lobby - this made for a fairly long walk at times. Also, the pool could have been a ittle warmer. Overall, excellent place to stay in Orlando! Tip: If you want to get a cab to downtown it could get costly. We went to a basketball game and it cost about $40-45 each way.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT”
Reviews.Author: highlifavored
Reviews.Content: Floridays was above and beyond my expectations! I will stay again when I revisit Orlando. There were not enough towels in the condo to accommodate us, but when I called the front desk, towels were there in minutes. The hotel staff were very friendly and helpful, which is a must in my stay. I highly recommend Floridays!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: ZSassygirl
Reviews.Content: The resort was well maintained and has excellent decor. My girls (10 and 12) fell in love with the pool and hot tub. The staff is very friendly. We are in the process of planning our next long weekend at this resort. .

Reviews.Title: “Very nice family hotel”
Reviews.Author: diverphotog
Reviews.Content: I loved Floridays. We had a large 3 bedroom suite and it was bigger than my apartment. The pool was amazing ! The rooms were top notch with flat panel HD TV's full kitchen and dining room. It was close to all the disney parks but far enough out of the way from traffic and noise. I would stay again. Great rates too!

Reviews.Title: “Love this place!!!”
Reviews.Author: Mr_M1ster
Reviews.Content: Rooms are very large and inexpensive...very clean place. Central location to Discovery Cove, Disney and Universal...easy locations to drive to. Loved it here and look forward to coming back here soon!! BTW, the Chicken Quesidillas are very, very good.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT”
Reviews.Author: MOCHA62
Reviews.Content: I can't recall or add anything to the excellent service and installations. The only thing, but, not important was the housekeeping service was not available one day and we have to call the front desk to have cleaned the rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for family”
Reviews.Author: Pikutinho
Reviews.Content: Clean, half way for DIsney or Universal, excellent rooms. Next time in Orlando I will return to Floridays

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice”
Reviews.Author: Buffaloisunderrated
Reviews.Content: Hotel is newer, clean, well-appointed and situated close to Disney, restaurants, etc. Pool is not huge but good for kids with splash area. Only issue is a strange smell to the water in our room that persisted throughout our stay. Overall, however, a very nice stay and definitely recommend this resort. We would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Safe, clean, and comfortable :)”
Reviews.Author: PsycheGal
Reviews.Content: We stayed in their 3 bedroom suite. It was spacious and comfortable. I traveled with my children (ages 3 and 5) -- and they have a lot of food allergies. Their pots, pans, utensils, spatula's, and so on where all stainless steel (no cross contamination) so it was safe for us to cook for the girls and now I know I don't have to drag my own stuff with me! The staff is well educated, friendly, and helpful. Their game room/arcade was very clean and the coffee at the marketplace was delicious. We didn't get to try the food at the restaurant, only because we bring our own groceries (due to all the food allergies), but I'm sure it's great. If you prefer to cook for yourself there's a publix supermarket and a wal-mart within 5 minutes, and a whole foods within 10, as well as a pharmacy and even a walk in urgent care center. (LOL Always important when traveling with kids) . Disney is only a few minutes away and you can drive or make arrangements for transportation with the concierge. We had a great time and recommend this hotel to anyone. Everything was private and the pools are separated enough that I would also recommend it for couples that don't have kids or don't want to hear kids cause we didn't hear a thing.

Reviews.Title: “Great space for a crowd.”
Reviews.Author: jdtwhitney
Reviews.Content: Clean and well kept. All rooms with ceiling fans, spacious and comfortable. Appreciate the Starbucks coffee in the room and how well stocked it was. A wonderful place to relax after a day at Disney!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: nspivack
Reviews.Content: Couldn't have asked for a better hotel to help celebrate my daughters 1st trip to Disney World. We had a 3 bedroom that clean, well kept, and very close to anywhere you could want to go in Orlando. I would deifinately recommend and stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Experience”
Reviews.Author: ABlindSquirrel
Reviews.Content: Very clean, large rooms, and comfortable. New property with excellent service.

Reviews.Title: “Great facility for families, with excellent Orlando value.”
Reviews.Author: sk8on
Reviews.Content: I have read and used tripadvisor on a a number of occasions before planning holidays. I am very happy to contribute this very positive review "back to the ecosystem". Floridays is an exceptional facility with a great pool, large and functional rooms. We stayed with another family, in their own room, and we had great space for the kids and adults. The staff coordinating our check-in/out and concierge requests were filled promptly and accurately by very friendly people. The location is excellent to the access the theme parks and quite close to the convention centre for business travelers. The shuttle that they offer is very limited, however we rented cars to allow us more flexibility. We never used the Floridays shuttle. We will both choose and recommend the Floridays to other Orlando visitors.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely GORGEOUS!!!”
Reviews.Author: jmccants6
Reviews.Content: The resort superceeded my expectations. Beautiful and comfortable. Extremely close to all parks and in a fantastic location. I will definately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for families, close to the Disney parks and Sea World and shoping areas”
Reviews.Author: goranmvest
Reviews.Content: My kids (5 and 7 years old) would said - The best place in a World. We found it very convinient for everyday trip to Disney's park and other attractions. Free Internet and free locak calls are advantage.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely place to stay, shame about the location.”
Reviews.Author: Redgoblin83
Reviews.Content: I marked service at 3 as the bellman was excellent but I found the reception staff to be condescending and unhelpful.

Reviews.Title: “great for large families!”
Reviews.Author: AndreaD5967
Reviews.Content: Floridays Resort fit our needs! Floriday offered the 3 bedroom villa which was great for our family of 4 kids and grandma. Everyone had privacy & room. Close to every theme park! Kids loved the pool & game room. Can't beat the price and the place was beautiful! Great Trip!

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: mmekelbu
Reviews.Content: The staff is very very friendly and helpful. The concierges there do a great job. The rooms are very nice and spacious. The pool was great and enjoyed by our kids. Ray, the daytime bellman is fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and excellent location”
Reviews.Author: cptomlin
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a place to stay with a family or large group, this resort exceeded our expectations. Even though we only traveled with one child, the room was large enough that she could nap while the adults were in the living area without having to whisper. The beds were very comfortable and the kitchen had ALMOST everything you need. NOT stocked with a can opener, bottle opener or wine opener. The pool was great (if weather had cooperated we would have loved it) and the rooms were very clean. Close to Sea World and not very far from Disney. It was a terrific value and we will stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Trip - Very clean”
Reviews.Author: STLMV
Reviews.Content: Had a great trip. Would highly recommend for families with little kids. Love the zero entry pool and location to the parks.

Reviews.Title: “Great quality and space for a really good price”
Reviews.Author: The_Kraftys
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for the weekend with my wife, two young kids and my parents. We had a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment for the price of an equally high quality hotel room. The space was big, everything was clean and the staff was nice. Dollar for dollar, I don't think you could do much better. It's also 5-10 minutes from all the parks.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: FiveGoAway
Reviews.Content: We were really looking forward to staying at this Resort, but unfortunately when we arrived we found ourselves staying in a suite overlooking 'nothing', grass & dirt. The room smelt of cigarette smoke and it took about 4 days for the smell to ease up - we were offered another room but didn't shift as we were so locked in to booked activities and our family of 5 were too tired after all our previous traveling. We had a few glitches like a toilet that didn't flush, a toaster that didn't work, lots of annoying little things. We were on the 5th floor in a 6 floor complex and could hear the people above walking around, it did bother our sleep at times. For a family of 5 the sleeping requirements were super and the parents bedroom with spa bath in ensuite was a bonus. Now that the room issue has been discussed, in fairness to Floridays they did try very hard to make things right by providing us with 2 platters of food. They also allowed us a late checkout. The staff were very helpful on reception and it is a great family resort.

Reviews.Title: “Best place we have ever stayed on Orlando”
Reviews.Author: samlees21
Reviews.Content: I have been going to Orlando since I was young and this was my 9th time there. Floridays was recommended to me by a work colleague and it was excellent. we arrived late at night but the front desk is operated 24 hours, we were not in the same block as my family but the staff rectified this quickly. from the rooms, to the landings and pool area the place is spotless and any issues are resolved extremely quickly. all staff were very helpful and even sent a gift to our room as we were on honeymoon. great for couples and families. the bedrooms are a decent size although the beds in the second room are a bit small for 2 adults. there is a fully equipped kitchen with utensils and washing and dishwasher powder is provided daily. large kitchen, dinning table and seating area. 3 pools and free wifi internet. complementary transport is provided to ALL parks and there is sales desk in site. There are also trolley and bus stops right outside the resort and a supermarket and shopping outlet is 5 minutes walk away, although you do have to walk along the side of the road and there is no pavement. Drinks and food at the pool bar are an ok price but the shop is quite expensive. I cannot recommend this resort enough.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best trips I've ever had!”
Reviews.Author: amandasikes2010
Reviews.Content: I had a blast while staying at Floridays! This was the second time I stayed there, every year the ladies in our church stay there and do a lesson. The rooms were very large and the view of the lake was great! I recommend this resort to anyone who is planning to stay in central Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly, all the comforts of home.”
Reviews.Author: SwedeLisa23
Reviews.Content: We stayed here while attempting to attend a space shuttle launch, which was postponed repeatedly. Twice the hotel allowed us to shift our reservation a day without penalty, which was great. The staff were all very helpful and friendly, too. We had a 3 bedroom suite that was spacious, clean and gave the five of us lots of room to spread out. My only "dislike" was that with dark furniture and heavy drapes, the rooms felt dark to me and I had to constantly keep lights on... and for an energy-conscious person, this was a little frustrating. I would return here in a heartbeat - the price was very low and the property itself was more than we could have ever expected for the price.

Reviews.Title: “excellent”
Reviews.Author: ked1975
Reviews.Content: this place is great, its away from the center of international drive which i thought was ideal. the super market is 10min walk with a great steak house called the outback just a further 3min walk after the super market. the shuttle to and from the parks were great with the i ride stop at the hotel entrance. i would suggest that you get takeaway menus from dominos and the japaneses resturant near the hotel entrance. the rooms were amazing, loads of room and as for the whirlpool bath that was a god send after a full day of walking in the parks. havnt got a bad word to say about this place, i would highly reccomend it to anyone, great for childrenwith the 3 tv's in the rooms and the kids pool, also the master bed was huge.

Reviews.Title: “Not far from anything, close enough to everything!”
Reviews.Author: noyesno
Reviews.Content: Friendly, helpful staff seemingly genuine in their desire to be of assistance, and happy with their job. Location is a little away of "the center" of any action, so a car is good to have, but still close enough to everything, that it's nice for some peace and quiet. Clean, comfortable, and they didn't charge us for "extras"!

Reviews.Title: “Great place for the whole family.”
Reviews.Author: Cincireds30
Reviews.Content: The beds were a little firm for my taste. The room was beautiful.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for the family”
Reviews.Author: Jambo_Montreal
Reviews.Content: Pros: Great accommodation for a great price with everything that a family would need. Our 2 bedroom, 2 bath was spacious with very comfortable beds. It will be difficult to go back to a traditional hotel room. We loved the resort-like pool area... from the kids area and beach sand to the hot tub. Great location on International drive within minutes from Discovery Cove and SeaWorld. We would definitely go back to Floridays. Cons: If you plan to do some real cooking, the kitchen was limited in cookware.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing! The room was beautiful, the beds were super comfortable, and that huge tub fit all 5 of us!!!”
Reviews.Author: cande523
Reviews.Content: Amazing accomodations! Location was central to theme parks and shopping. Room was beautifully appointed and extremely comfortable. Wish they would have had kid-friendly dishes and glasses in the room, but everything else was great. Pool was a bit cooler than I like, but the kids didn't seem to mind. We requested and paid for a 2 bedroom suite, but when we got up to our room it was a 3 bedroom. Kids were able to pick a different bed to sleep in each night! Staff was gracious and when we requested help with a minor difficulty, they were quick to respond. Definitely a place that is worth a second visit!!!

Reviews.Title: “luxury rooms”
Reviews.Author: sharpieShrewsbury
Reviews.Content: i cannot fault this hotel the rooms were massive with all amenities you need including washer dryer ice maker coffee machine hoover iron well the lo basically also the rooms had a whirlpool bath (very nice). the pool was great with a kids splash area, swimming lengths, and a spa. towels were provided by the pool free everyday so no need to take yours down. the staff where so friendly and great to talk to there were two lads at the bar AJ and Jake who i like to talk to they were funny and helpful the reception staff where kind and helpful and so was the attractions desk (i cant spell the posh word they use) wifi is available for free in the hotel in the reception and pool area however if you ask you can get a data cable for free for your room as long as you return it at the end of your stay buses go regularly to and from the hotel (this includes lynx bus and the iride trolly and a free shuttle that takes you to all attractions and request for free) the hotel is located at the bottom of i-drive about 5min from seaworld and 15min from universal there are supermarkets 5min walk away and orlando premium outlets shopping mall is about 10 - 15 min walk away all in all i would strongly recommend floridays resort orlando the hotel is located at the bottom

Reviews.Title: “great place for a family visiting Disneyworld”
Reviews.Author: zingerinBonn
Reviews.Content: I have ALWAYS stayed on property at Disney, but this time on recommendation from friends, because we were going to need two hotel rooms, we booked a 2BR condo at Floridays for about the same price as ONE moderate or maybe even budget hotel room at Disney, AND we got a full kitchen, washer & dryer, and a living room to sit in after the children were asleep. We were there off-season, but the drive to the parks in the morning took only 15-20 min. Now that the Park Hopper option is no longer included in Disney properties, and with the parks closing at 7PM, staying on site is not as great a perk as it used to be. Our condo was very clean, well decorated, and convenient. They have a great pool with kid-friendly areas, and our kids loved the jacuzzi in the master bath.

Reviews.Title: “Cant wait to go back”
Reviews.Author: jlb5738
Reviews.Content: We had a great time even tough we stayed only a night. Well actually 14 hours. Checkin at 8pm was quick. Rooms were perfect. The pool in the morning was a little chilly but after 10 minutes you didnt notice. My toddlers loved the kiddy part of the pool. The beds weren't amazing but comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay with a family”
Reviews.Author: maui221
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel about 2 years ago and it was very nice. So, my expectations were very high. The young lady who checked me in was very polite. The furnishings and rooms are well appointed. The grounds are neat and clean. Plenty of space for our family to move around and have some privacy. However, the room we had this time had some very minor/fixable issues: blown light bulbs in the bathroom and bedrooms, drains were clogged in the tub and sink. My biggest complaint were the beds. They were very uncomfortable. A suggestion for the resort would be to invest into better mattresses. This is an excellent location if you don't want the hustle and bustle of I-Drive. Shopping and restuarants are close. The outlet is located a couple of blocks away. Finally, guests should be aware of the resort fee/hotel service fee ($11.25), resort tax and sales tax.

Reviews.Title: “Champagne stay at Budweiser prices”
Reviews.Author: samlydia
Reviews.Content: Loved our Floridays stay. We came with 3 teenagers (17,19,19). We had 2br/2ba and there was more than enough space for all of us. They really mean a full kitchen with island bar and full dinette table for 6 and master bath was awesome. If you are parents of teenagers and need space and privacy this place is perfect and the pools are awesome. We have stayed at Grand Hilton and Floridays rooms are more spacious but (Hilton grand pools are better). Screened in balcony is perfect for morning coffee or evening sipping. Overall we loved Floridays, the kids took pictures of room because they were so impressed with Floridays. Floridays is on the quiet end of International drive so you will need a car to get around, Floridays has shuttle but we prefer to drive but they are about 15minute walk to outlet mall and Floridays is closer to Lake Buena Vista than other end of International drive. Loved this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The Floridays Resort was the perfect place to stay for our family of 5.”
Reviews.Author: dtoutge
Reviews.Content: The Floridays Resort was great - just the right amount of space for our family of 5. The kids had their own space and we had ours! The resort was quiet and family friendly. Having a place to stay that felt like home was also important to us. The access to a washer/dryer was ideal for us. Also, having a full-sized kitchen complete with a dishwasher made for making meals slick! The pool area was easy to access and was appropriate for younger and older children. The location was also great - just a few miles from Disney, Sea World, Universal Studios and the airport. We will definitely stay here again the next time we go back to Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “Overall Pretty Good”
Reviews.Author: sellicks
Reviews.Content: Spent 10 days at Floridays Resort. We had a three bed apartment in Building A on the 2nd floor. Although the apartment was great with facilities, the building was next to the lobby and could be noisy with buses & people coming & going. So if you can avoid lower floors in building A you will be okay. The beds were a little hard but it depends what you like. It was very clean & the staff were polite & helpful. The shuttles to Disney & Universal were good. The i bus stop outside the resort. The pool area was nice with a bar for drinks & limited food. I think the resort could do with a few more shops and restaurants (there isnt really even one). having said that, there is a supermarket about 10 minute walk away. They had a singer at the weekends, who was very good. The entertainment is not great, but if you are tired from days in the park then you dont want much. We have stayed at several places in Orlando in the last few years and I would say it was the best one. Overall a good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays are excellent”
Reviews.Author: Vickyg69
Reviews.Content: Suites were very spacious, full size fridge & Ice maker, a real home away from home. Coffee, tea, washing powder, dishwashing powder, and toiletries were replaced each day if used. The washing machine and dryer was brill and easy to use. i was able to bring home mostly clean clothes. We were in C building, which although did not have views over the resort, we had fantastic views of Disneys firework display every night. The maid seemed to come every day to replace towels, and the suite was thoughly cleaned after one week. the pool area was always clean, with plently of towels available, and not crowded at all. this stayed open until 11pm each night, which was good for the kids, to have a play, after riding rollercoasters all day. There is a chemist and Publix supermarket only five minutes walk away, which was great for stocking up on drinks. We hired a car, but the hotel has a curtesy bus to the theme parks, we did not use this service because we wanted the freedom to come and go as we pleased so i cannot comment on this service. Also, the I trolley stop is directly outside the hotel, which will take you anywhere on I Drive, if you do not have a car. we would recommend this hotel to anyone, and would use it again if we holidayed in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “I was very satisfied!”
Reviews.Author: USMC1991
Reviews.Content: Centrally located to everything and it definitely exceeded my expectations. I will come back again..

Reviews.Title: “We will definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: kclery
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were attending a concert at the Hard Rock, but the Universal hotels were so expensive! I found the Floridays Resort through Trip Advisor and read the reviews prior to booking with them. We were traveling with two kids and a cousin so we needed a 3-bedroom suite. I got an excellent Florida resident rate. It was well worth the small inconvenience of being a distance from the Hard Rock venue. The rooms were clean, the bathrooms were large, and the suite had a fully stocked kitchen, dining room and comfortable living area. Our suite was in building E with a lake view and access to the second pool. I only wished we had been able to stay for more than one night! Next time we come to Orlando, we will definitely stay at Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, nice rooms, bad cafe/pool bar”
Reviews.Author: Mega-Max2
Reviews.Content: Generally a very good hotel that is nicely sitting in between the parks. We used a trip advisor special rate an got a two bedroom apt - and they are reaaaalllllyyy large. The only thing which was really below the general standard of the hotel was the food and service on the pool bar (only fast food available-served in plastic - probably the worst hotdog we ever had.the servise did not pay a lot of attencion - flatware missing, no high chair etc.) but the hotel itself is definetly worth a recommendation.

Reviews.Title: “Lots of space in the 'Home like' suites.”
Reviews.Author: jp333
Reviews.Content: Vacationing will never be same! The suites are very accomodating with two bedroom/two bath plans. There was plenty of room to relax and feel at home when we were in the room. The kitchen was modern and clean with lovely granite counters. All the ameneties of home were right there in the room. So we could cook a proper meal and eat together at the dining table. And wash clothes in a full size washer & dryer. But when we wanted to relax there was ample space to do so. In the living room. With the flat screen TV & DVD player we could enjoy some movies. With separate bedrooms we could easily rest. And of course the balcony was nice for relaxing and enjoying the peaceful surroundings. All and all we really enjoyed our stay and will return next time we are in town.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays - I love you!”
Reviews.Author: whoateallthepies?
Reviews.Content: Spent 14 days here last week in September and first week in October. Check in staff were lovely and we were directed to our 2 bedroomed apartment in Block B (4th Floor). The apartment was excellent, clean with two bathrooms (one ensuite) and a washer and drier as well as a very large fridge, cooker, microwave and dishwasher. Having stayed in several villa locations around Orlando as well as hotels I would rate Floridays as way up the top of the list. Excellent view of the main pool, which our grand daughter absolutely adored and enjoyed a few freshly prepared snacks at the pool side cafe as well as far too many long island iced teas at the bar. Only down side was the wifi reception was very poor and I had to buy an ethernet cable to link into the port in our apartment. Once I had done this internet access was fast! Beds were very soft but furnishings in main room were not really that comfortable, however I wasn't too put off by this (I could have stayed at home and watched TV!). Will definately return to Floridays and big it up to everyone I know. Had a hired tank (sorry GMC Arcadia) and not too happy about having to pay to park but I feel that as the resort is at the bottom end of I Drive its better to get around by car.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT HERE AS MUCH AS THE FIRST TIME!”
Reviews.Author: vanpete
Reviews.Content: I just returned from Floridays resort it was my 3rd visit and must say they are keeping it maintained very well, They looked after us with all our requests We had 2 rooms booked a 2 and 3 bedroom suite they put us side by side which was great and even gave us the Building my daughter liked (you can watch Disney fireworks from balcony) in Building D backside. THe staff looking after D was top notch..I went to the quite pool one day and they were out of towels I called front desk and they came in under 10 mins very impressed. WE ordered from the Bar couple times food was very good. THe only problem we had there was my Dad fell, watch the sidewalk does not line up with the drop in the curb but the Hotel looked after Him with respect. I read some of the last posts and the security issue I can see people complaining there was fliers under our door every day Although I seen staff chasing them away telling them not to return. My only complaint and it happens @ every Hotel is meeting a guy in the elevator that paid (or said He did ) $90 a night while I paid aprox $140 I think the price should be same for everyone. So watch the booking places for your best price. Which I thought we had from the manager Himself. Can't wait to go back!!!5 mins from downtown Disney great place!!

Reviews.Title: “Best Holiday in a Long Time”
Reviews.Author: wicksy11
Reviews.Content: I have just spent two weeks at the Floridays Resort in Orlando with my friend and 11 year old daughter. The place was immaculate, our apartment was more like a hotel with all the extras, the staff were really lovely, very helpful and friendly especially the concierge who I would like to name Nelda and Michelle and lovely Ray on the frontdoor. So helpful and everyone made us feel so welcome. The resort is right on I Drive and the I Trolley stops right outside taking you to Sea World, Aquatica and Wet n Wild. A free shuttle bus also taking you to these resorts plus Universal and Epcot which suited us as we were non drivers. Even the service from the bus drivers was brilliant. I have never been to America before and did not want to leave. I will definitely go back.

Reviews.Title: “Minor annoyances. Overall okay.”
Reviews.Author: obediah75
Reviews.Content: Ok, we arrived late to the hotel. Everything closed at 11, which is not that different than the average hotel. But, I soon learned there was only ONE SINGLE SODA vending machine on the entire resort site. The dollar slot was broken, but here was the real kicker: the front desk could NOT give me change! I found myself getting annoyed too quickly so I had to relax and give it another chance in the morning. After all, when you take a family to Orlando your hotel stay is the least of your endeavors. We spent the majority of our time at the Disney parks anyway. On our second night, the concierge was recommending pizza delivery places that didn't even deliver to our hotel, so that was laughable. On other nights the concierge was helpful and fine. The toilet in the master bathroom made weird gurgling noises all night long--that was kind of annoying. The hotel boasts a "complimentary Disney shuttle" but (unless I missed this somewhere on the website) beware that the "free shuttle" has limited availability and it only has two scheduled departure times. In other words, it's not like you can call on the shuttle to take you to Disney whenever you feel like it. You must either take the 8:10 AM shuttle or the 10:45 AM shuttle. Furthermore, you MUST sign up at least 24 hours in advance or you will not get on the shuttle. The concierge said there were only 28 spots but when we boarded the next morning there were far more than 28 spots on the bus. Still, the "free Disney shuttle" is indeed free but you MUST sign up early and you only have two departure times to choose from. On our final day the staff was very helpful with storing our luggage so we could hang out in the pool for a while. Overall, for the value of the resort if you're looking for a place to sleep at night it's not a bad buy. If you are looking for ease and convenience, I'd look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Great Resort for your buck!”
Reviews.Author: anabel1826
Reviews.Content: The room was spacious and clean. Extremely close distance to all major attractions such as Disney World and Sea World. Prime Outlet Mall is almost walking distance. The resort has a beautiful pool. I really recommend this hotel for anyone who is travelling with family. the rooms are fully equipped with a huge kitchen, dinning room and huge master bathroom.

Reviews.Title: “Much needed vacation!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sbrooks9
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel to stay at. The pictures and positive reviews does this hotel justice. I would definitely recommend the Floridays. A little pricey but definitely worth it. One suggestion would be to get a new bartender. Drinks are weak!! But otherwise great hotel for singles and families

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accommodation choice”
Reviews.Author: ChrisRTranent
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent quality apartment set up with everything you need in your room or on site. We had 24/7 wifi access from our room making checking weather, opening hours and other general information really easy. The cooking and washing/dryer facilities were also great and has resulted in no washing when I got home ! The pool facilities were excellent also. The quality of the rooms were to a very high standard with lots of space and storage. We had 2 families staying and we managed 2 weeks without anyone feeling they were on top of each other. Will definitely be back ......

Reviews.Title: “Not sure what all the fuss is about.”
Reviews.Author: DarceyJK
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays Orlando from October 17th to the 24th. I found this resort on a travel website and extensively researched and read reviews(which were all good) before we chose this one. I traveled with my husband, our daughter, 14 and 3 of her friends, all also 14. Check in was quick and easy with the staff being extrememly friendly and helpful. Concierge was also extremely helpful, altho some of the information they gave us was not completely accurate as we found out after the fact. We had a 3 bedroom apartment which was very comfortable for our group. It was quite clean and most furnishings looked to be in great shape altho several things did not work (shower light, microwave light, toaster, living room telephone, etc). Maintenance came to fix most of the things - the second day we requested to have the toaster fixed I had left a tip for housekeeping on the counter, when we returned about 5pm that day housekeeping had not been there yet but the tip money was missing. I spoke to our housekeeper when she came that evening and she said it's best to give the tips to the maids directly to avoid that. We made absolutely sure all of our valuables were locked in the safe after that. If you plan on doing any cooking be warned: the kitchen does not have much for pots/pans, etc! We had one small scratched up fry pan and a huge stock pot.. It is very basic!! Housekeeping, by the way, was sporadic. They didnt leave coffee, dish detergent, toiletries, etc every day - it was about every 2 or 3 days, so we would call the front desk to have anything we needed delivered. Clean towels are a must with 4 teen girls, so we were a bit disappointed not to have housekeeping come every day. The pool was cool, but we are from the upper midwest, so that didnt bother our girls much. My husband and I sat at the pool bar a few times while the girls were swimming - service is very slow. The staff seemed more interested in visiting amongst themselves about the parties they had attended then serving drinks. Several people around us were complaining about that, also. We ordered food from the Marketplace the first night and it was very good - especially the Cuban panini!! The location of the hotel is on the south side of International Drive - there is a Walgreens/Publix/Liquor Store (and more) within a short walk (to the south of the hotel) if you dont rent a car. There is a Benihana at the entrance of the hotel which is Fantastic! Also, there is an Outback (also Fantastic!) near the Walgreens you could walk to. We did not rent a car but relied on the hotel's bus system to get to the parks. We just taxi'd back to the hotel when we were done for the day. I would suggest taxi-ing to Sea World, tho because the bus doesnt leave till 9:20am (arriving about 9:45) and Sea World opens at 9am. (We booked a limo to get to/from the Sanford Airport and the hotel through Sanford Transportation Services for $200 - town cars and vans were even less expensive!) All in all we really enjoyed this resort, but some of the simple things that should have been less of a headache might deter us from coming back here agian. I guess we will decide when it's time to go again - LoL!

Reviews.Title: “Loved this resort!”
Reviews.Author: senie
Reviews.Content: The rooms were spacious and had all the dishes and appliances you could need. Plus there was a grocery store a block away which was very helpful when you get tired of eating out. Plus the shuttle to all the major theme parks was easy to book and as long as you gave 24 hours notice there was always room. Very practical if you don't want to rent a car. The I-trolley also stops outside the hotel making it very easy to travel to major shopping areas.

Reviews.Title: “Very spacious”
Reviews.Author: Mvt1992
Reviews.Content: Comfortable beds, clean bathrooms, everything in the kitchen you would need to make food except cookie sheets. We used the pool out couch and no blankets were in the closets for the bed ... Only sheets. Service was reliable . Overall great stay

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded our expectations!”
Reviews.Author: guyandmrsb
Reviews.Content: Floridays Resort had been recommended to us by some friends that had recently stayed there while visiting Disney. Yes, it looked nice on the website but we were very impressed with the facility! The staff was extremely friendly and courteous! This is a great resort for those travelers with little ones as the pool area is fantastic! The rooms are spacious and well decorated and provided comfortable lodging for the 7 of us. We would come back here again while visiting the many theme parks in the area or just to relax!

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what I was looking for.”
Reviews.Author: green1999
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite. Love the privacy. Love the kitchen. Love the bathrooms especially the master bedroom. Large whirlpool bath. Shower. 2 sink stone counter top. Felt like home. The only thing negative was the couch was smelly everything else was good.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place to stay...”
Reviews.Author: DezWhitby
Reviews.Content: I travelled with my husband and children, both 8, along with my mom & sister. Having 2 bedrooms and bathrooms was great. Enough room for everyone. Floridays is conveniently located close to Disney & Universal (within 20 minute drive) and close to the outlets, supermarket, restaurants. They have 2 pools, one with a waterpark. The staff is courteous and friendly. My only complaint was that the kitchen was a little bare on the essentials (coffee mugs, cutlery) but enough to get by on. Great place to stay; convenient & clean and friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “if you go to Orlando, stay in Floridays Resort Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Aurena
Reviews.Content: We liked so much to stay at the hotel., front desk people are very attentive and friendly..! Beds are very comfortable and the room very clean. The location is very good; there are a supermarket and a big Mall very close to the hotel where we can go even walking. Furnitures in great conditions.

Reviews.Title: “FLORIDAYS WAS GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: BOUNCYTIGGER1
Reviews.Content: Just returnedfrom a fabulous14 nightd in Orlando.We have been there twenty times and it just gets better.The weather was the best we have ever hadblue skies and no rain for the whole two weeks! 80-90 degrees. This condo was probably the best we have ever stayed at,we had a three bedroom type.The main bedroom was at the end of the lounge with an ensuit bathroom includig a jacuzzi bath which my daughter and her husband pinched! the safe was also in there.The other two bedrooms had two queen sized beds in each and the compulsory tv!.My only slight critizism was the balcony ,we were on the second floorand the balcony wall was solidso that when you sat down ypu couldn't see over it! Iideal if you have small children but if not opt for a higher room.The pool area was good always plenty of beds although it was a lot busier than a normal american pool perhaps because it was a bank holiday while we were there.the bar service was good and reasonably priced $3for a beer.All in all an excellent place and we would definately stay there again.There is a service charge when you leave it is about$11.25 per day.The maid service just consists of changing towels and emptying rubbish,if you want anything else done like cleaning or bedmaking it;s$35 per day! sheets are changed once weekly.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: grtlf82
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent hotel to stay. Great pool, spacious rooms, courteous staff, huge pool, never loaded down with people. This has been my 2nd time here and intend to stay here every time I visit Orlando. It is also great for a group of people.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, great accommodation, great resort”
Reviews.Author: ElaineCDublin
Reviews.Content: 3rd visit to Orlando and 1st time to stay at Floridays. Suites are fantastic and very well equiped. Was with my husband and we chose not to hire a car. Floridays is perfect for travelling on the I-Ride Trolley, with a stop directly outside the resort on I-Drive. The I-Ride also connected us with the Lynx which meant we could get the bus ourselves to Disney Parks without having to rely on the free shuttles. Premium outlets are about a 15 minute walk max, and the large supermarket is less than a ten minute walk. In all, we were very pleased with our stay in Floridays and if we go back a 4th time, this will be our resort of choice.

Reviews.Title: “This place is awesome”
Reviews.Author: Stupjansky
Reviews.Content: Our room was spacious (2 bedrooms, kitchen, living room) and had all the appliances and living items we needed. The building and grounds are elegant and well-manicured. The pool and pool area are huge. The cafe and bar are right next to the pool. They had limbo and hula contests right by the pool. It was a great time. The property is very close to all the attractions. We went to Epcot when we were there. It took 20 minutes from our room to the gate at Epcot.

Reviews.Title: “Overall a nice experience”
Reviews.Author: ana0911
Reviews.Content: Everything was excellent with the hotel, it's cleaniness, service, attention, etc. The only thing I found was that it was a bit far from Universal considering it is a Universal hotel. But other than that, everything was excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was Wonderful - extensive research paid off!”
Reviews.Author: Deanna444
Reviews.Content: Spent countless hours researching the perfect hotel for our family. Our main purpose was to visit the Disney, SeaWorld & Universal Parks, plus some relaxing by the pool. After booking with satisfaction & confidance, I bumped into this TripAdvisor site, read the negative comments (which were extremely minimal compared to the positive) but proceeded to panic. After assurance from AAA and travel agent friends, stuck to original plan. We are so happy to report our stay was next to perfect (which is scary!). The staff was friendly, the resort clean, suites felt like we were "coming home" instead of to a hotel room, food was good and reasonably priced. Although we'd have loved the pool/bar to be open later (than 11pm) it probably was a good thing they weren't!!! We were placed in the "B" building which was perfect in location to the pool/main lobby (further building might have been disappointing). The only downfall we can think of is that due to the resort being newer, there is not much real close for restaurants, convenience stations etc but would expect that it would grow when the economy gets better. Hotel shuttles to the major parks run at somewhat odd times and at times inconvenient, although the free service was truly appreciated! Highly recommend using the I-ride Trolley which runs up and down International Drive for service to SeaWorld, convenience stores, other resorts, restaurants, grocery, stores etc, unfortunately it does not service Disney or Universal - but very reasonably priced vs taxi. Overall, highly recommend Floridays and would definitely stay again if in the area!

Reviews.Title: “a perfect place at a perfect location”
Reviews.Author: robertomarcondes
Reviews.Content: next to all importants parks, big rooms, all facilities (wash, pool, internet etc.)

Reviews.Title: “Great stay with some minor issues”
Reviews.Author: MrsDellaway
Reviews.Content: Returned last week from a 15 night stay at Floridays Resort and overall had a great time. Check-in was easy and we were given a room in building A (407) on the 4th Floor overlooking the lake (and i-drive). I haven’t posted any pics as the rooms are exactly like all the ones already posted. I wouldn’t want to stay in this room again as one of the housekeepers store rooms was directly opposite and they were really noisy when using it (although we were rarely around when they did, just an observation). Rooms were large and spacious, we had a 2 bed, 2 bath, the bed was actually quite comfy, either that or I was just so tired from the parks, I fell asleep straight away without caring. The DVD player didn’t work and neither did the Jacuzzi (we figured this out though, the fuse had tripped – check the grey box on the wall in the living room out if you experience anything like this). We didn’t get the problem with the DVD player sorted while we were there as it didn’t bother us too much, but we did let them know there was an issue so hopefully they’ve sorted it out since. The pool and grounds were lovely, but there was a horrible smell around near the entrance and the water also smelt and tasted of this. We didn’t drink the water we got bottles from the Publix supermarket. The washer and dryer was a great addition to the room, for the first time we came home from a holiday with no dirty clothes! That was fab! Again we got some washing powder and fabric conditioner sheets, but then we made real use of them, others may not and will suffice with the tiny packs of washing powder they provide (no fabric conditioner though) for free. The palm café was ok, not a huge choice of food but it was good when you were starving and couldn’t be bothered to go out elsewhere. They provide ‘room service’ but at a major expense! For the sake of walking 2 mins to the café I would not have paid for them to deliver to our room. The also provide you with menus of nearby restaurants that deliver. We didn’t use any of these but I would use the ones they recommend rather than the pizza flyers you get under your door daily! Got a bit annoying but didn’t ruin our stay. Great location, literally a 5 minute walk to a Walgreen’s Pharmacy and Publix supermarket, the premium outlets were a 10 minute walk away and there was an outback steakhouse restaurant and a MacDonald’s just before you got there (neither of which we got around to using). My only real complaint with our stay was the housekeeping, they made the bed daily and replaced the towels but as far as I could tell that was it. They didn’t actually do any cleaning! Our bath tub wasn’t cleaned once during our stay and I don’t know about anyone else, but mine is cleaned all the time at home, I went and bought some cleaning products in the end. The shuttle service was great, we didn’t hire a car and we really didn’t need to. There was also an i-ride stop right outside the entrance (40 south) and we used this a few times to get to different restaurants along i-drive. You can get tickets from the concierge if you’ll be using it a lot. We also used taxis occasionally and if booked through concierge they weren’t too badly priced (they use sterling) mears really took the mick out of tourists! I wouldn’t use these taxis if I ever return to Orlando! Overall I would return to Floridays even with the few issues listed above. The customer service we received was wonderful from the front desk and concierge and the rooms were comfortable enough, we didn’t spend a great deal of time in it.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays Orlando is an excellent value and beautiful resort.”
Reviews.Author: sbennett30
Reviews.Content: The resort was beautiful and accomodating. Staff at every level were gracious and kind. Pool was awesome, the kids were in it every night. Rooms were spacious. Excellent value! I highly recommend this resort and we will be returning there on our next visit!

Reviews.Title: “Quality at a low price.”
Reviews.Author: Portia62
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed the stay at this resort. The only thing that was a pain is having to call front desk to adjust the air. This property is a "Green" resort. But in all I would stay again!!! Nice staff from check in to departure.

Reviews.Title: “They truly have thought of everything at this resort!”
Reviews.Author: kimbertay
Reviews.Content: Floridays felt like a really upscale hotel without the price. Upon our arrival I immediately felt like I was in an oasis and the staff was geniunely helpful and caring. They went out of their way to ensure that we were well taken care of. Floridays truly felt like a paradise and I cannot wait to go back.!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, very spacious, clean and well kept”
Reviews.Author: STNY36
Reviews.Content: Good hotel, was clean, spacious. It has a nice pool. If you are looking for a nice, cheaper suite type hotel for you and your family, I recommend this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value!”
Reviews.Author: Oddball32
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with the rooms, location, pools, service, patio grill/bar. We were very disappointed that there was no internet service in our room (cable did not work and engineer could not repair---and we did not want to take the time to move to another room. It would be great if the facility would get wireless interenet, and all our teens and adults each have their own computer and rely on these for staying connected to work, homework, etc.....

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the price!”
Reviews.Author: Dolyse
Reviews.Content: Just so so....rooms are very average! Nothing to write home about!

Reviews.Title: “We stayed in a three bedroom condo. There...”
Reviews.Author: Gertsen
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a three bedroom condo. There were free shuttles to Universal every day. Pool was great - lots of towels. Housekeeping was the only problem. They were pretty lax.

Reviews.Title: “Great accomodations”
Reviews.Author: Rosin314
Reviews.Content: Hotel is well maintained and clean. Great location. Suites were wonderful and comfortable. If you like cleanliness this is where you want to stay!

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT!LOVED IT!LOVED IT!”
Reviews.Author: cjfwrt
Reviews.Content: We spent 4 nights at floridays and would definitely stay again! It was a beautiful setting and the rooms were spacious and well appointed. We stayed in 2 BR suite in Bld C overlooking the lagoon and pool in the distance. This would be my choice. The bar and grill at the pool were great for arrival cocktails and lunch at our day of rest from the parks.We were left plenty of towels, etc. all done up nicely and they provided toiletries and hairdryers. We thought the price was a steal for the room we had.

Reviews.Title: “Love the resort....just make sure you request a room away from the construction zone.”
Reviews.Author: lindseyski
Reviews.Content: We love this resort.....this is our 2nd year staying here for our anniversary. The first time we had only good things to say....this time the room we were placed in must have been near a construction site because we awoke to the beeping from a truck backing up that went on for hours. Also, our master bedroom was facing a street light so everytime I woke up I thought it had to have been 6:30 AM.....but it was only 1 AM. All that being said I would STILL recommend this resort and we will most likely come back again! The service you get here is outstanding! Next time I'll just be sure to get a room that's quiet and dark:)

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place”
Reviews.Author: amy52787
Reviews.Content: Loved this place! Great swimming area for the kids and the rooms were great. Would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “OK Hotel - Great Packages Available”
Reviews.Author: smugica
Reviews.Content: Although it wasn't the best room size wise...The deal we got was incredible. We were 6 people in a 2 bedroom (too tight) but we got hotel, transfers to Park, Breakfast at theme park and 2 day theme park tickets for around $240. Best deal ever...Check out their packages.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: lpmPei
Reviews.Content: There were 4 of us in total and we had a 2 bedroom. There was ample room with everything you need during your vacation. Hotel staff, from front desk to housekeeping, were very friendly and accommodating. Pool area is very clean. Pool bar and Cafe are great. We all would definitely stay at the Floridays Resort again. It was more than we even dreamed it would be.

Reviews.Title: “very comfortable,clean,'QUIET' and nice amenities.”
Reviews.Author: rlang71
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean and up to date. the beds sleepable, above average. The in room spa also worked very well. The pool was cyrstal clear with plenty of towels.What else could a guy ask for, when hes got ice cold AC, plenty of hot water, compy bed, three TV's and his wife of 42 years. You all come now, You here!!!

Reviews.Title: “clean and impressive with splash pad and pool at a great rate”
Reviews.Author: enjoysvacations64
Reviews.Content: Floridays resort exceeded my expectations. Located in upscale community on International Drive. The staff was very friendly and made me feel welcome. We rented a 3 bedroom condo. In the master bedroom was a whirpool bath and king size bed. The other 2 bedrooms featured two full beds in each room with a huge bathroom and shower. The hotel featured a splash pad with pool. Everyone in my family loved the condo and received everything they needed. I would recommend the condo to everyone who wants great service. This was all at an affordable rate.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect week-end getaway at Floridays resort”
Reviews.Author: Marianne012
Reviews.Content: Excellent accommodation at Floridays Resort. We had a 3 bed suite for my husband, three children and myself. Very spacious accommodation with full kitchen. Children loved the large pool area. Very clean and surroundings beautifully kept. Restaurants, stores very short distance. Great family resort! This was our fourth visit!

Reviews.Title: “fantastic”
Reviews.Author: simba64
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in numerous hotels across the country and I must say I enjoyed our stay at Floridays the best. Very clean, good location, excellent service. What more could you want.....

Reviews.Title: “The best overall experience our young family has had on vacation”
Reviews.Author: Goodguy21
Reviews.Content: This place was a no brainer. We were able to have a resort stay along with the convenience of a home. Saving $$$ by eating in and also the frustration of two young ones acting up in public. There is nothing worse then paying 12 bucks for a burger my child doesn't want to eat. We brought the grandmother to watch the children at night while we had some needed alone time. Just because one kid needs to go to sleep the whole family doesn't have to be quite since we had the 3 bedroom, unlike a traditional hotel room. We never get maid service so I can't comment on that. They were around when we asked for extra towels and stuff.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: MomOFone2009
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed in a two-bedroom condo-style room with our one-year-old son. We got an excellent deal booking at the last minute and truly found a home away from home in orlando. The pool is equipped with a splash park area for young children, which our son couldn't get enough of! It's nice to have a bar right next to the pool for mom and dad too! The room was beautifully decorated and clean. The hotel is centrally located and close to all the major theme parks. Couldn't have asked for a better trip!

Reviews.Title: “Spotless, well-run, but bit far from restaurants, night life etc”
Reviews.Author: elizabethDublin
Reviews.Content: Just back from two weeks in Orlando. Stayed at Floridays resort, Int. Drive. Can't fault this resort, spotless, well organised and well run. The service is second to none, the concierge was always helpful,even gave us money off coupons for various nights out etc. There's a bell boy to help with the luggage, 24 hr reception and concierge on hand. There's also a great grill (with bar) and the food is fab, cooked fresh (so be prepared to wait for it). The pool stays open till 10pm, and while it's fabulous with some play things for kids, it could do with some music or perhaps bbq nights?We had a 3 bedroom suite, which had everything a family could need, including a washing machine and dryer, and the cleaners leave detergent when needed. Fully air-conditioned and with a balcony, plasma tv, these suites are gorgeous. The I-trolley stops right outside hotel, which will take you all the way down int drive (and back) but stops at 10pm, which can be inconvenient. This hotel is at the far end of international drive, the last stop on trolley, which means a ride to restaurants etc every evening, but there's a huge supermarket only 5 minutes walk from hotel.Over all loved this place, but if I could pick it up and place it further up int drive it would be superb!! Also beware of charges when checking out,$10 PER DAY plus tax, cost us $160!! Expensive cleaning! and hotel requires credit card when checking in, for $50 PER DAY security. This could be a whopping $700.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: pk9192
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to the Orlando area and I am very very skeptical about the reviews I read and have pretty high expectiations about the places I stay. The Floridays Resort exceded my expectations. We had a three bedroom, which was on the end of building B on the 5th floor overlooking the pool and lake. I did not notice any outside noise (big deal for me) and the bath and bedrooms were bigger than expected. The Publix and McDonalds are right next door and there is easy access to Disney and the Freeway. The washer and dryer was tucked out of the way. The layout of the pool was really nice, a zero entry for the kids and a deep side for adults. It was nice having a fresh towel bin by the pool so you don't have to bring one of your own. There was transportation to the major parks and I didn't realize that you needed to reserve your seat 24 hour in advance, but I called down the morning of our trip and they didn't have any problem getting us a seat. I think it's a pain to check out so early, so I called to see if they had late check out and they said it was based on availability and I could stay until 1:00pm without any fee. All in all this was a very nice place to stay for the $

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location & hotel. Certainly recommend and will certainly stay again.”
Reviews.Author: PamDawn22
Reviews.Content: Excellent location & hotel. Certainly recommend and will certainly stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: stevang
Reviews.Content: This hotel was everything I thought and more. The only down side was not having wireless internet connection. Staff was friendly and the location was great.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Floridays”
Reviews.Author: sue2004
Reviews.Content: Fantastic place to stay. We stayed in a 3 bed unit (6 adults) and our friends in a 2 bed unit (4 adults).Very spacious apartments with a full kitchen.TVs in all 3 bedrooms as well as the front room, plus a dvd player. Loved the fact there is a washer and tumble dryer in the apartment so we never came home with suitcases full of dirty clothes. Beautiful pool area, with shallow end for children and many spouting water pipes for kiddies to play under. The whole site is well looked after , clean and attractive. Walgreens and Publix only a 5/10 min walk away, so could stock up on food to cook (if we wanted to) amongst other things.

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST HOTEL EVER! SPACIOUS,CLEAN,MODERN,COMFY BEDS”
Reviews.Author: vanessaDee
Reviews.Content: We went on a family vacation and stayed at this resort it is very clean, comfortable, the staff is great as well! I tryed out the sheraton safari since we got a very low rate, what a mistake that was! as I LOVE THIS HOTEL! its wonderful 5 stars all the way! clean, modern,beautiful and very nice staff...

Reviews.Title: “Great Weekend Getaway”
Reviews.Author: tsmith5651
Reviews.Content: Usually stay at the Hilton Grande Vacation Club. Ummm no more. Not after a last minute change due to the 'Special Discount" I noticed while looking at the reviews. Despite the fact we drove by the place twice (was looking for the Big Entrance sign the website shows) was a temporary entrance with an unlit sign. This place was everything and more that people write here. The Lobby is fabulous. Check in was prompt and efficient. Was greeted by a friendly front desk clerk. We had a late check in due to travel. I am usually great with names...not this time, but he was great. Took my credit card information and DL. I was only responsible for the daily resort fee being I booked online @ Hotels.com. We were in Building F 3rd floor towards the back of the resort. Always decent parking. Balcony was facing the lake and fountain and smaller pool. Nice patio furniture. Not the parsons table and chairs you usually get at a hotel or resort. The room was immaculate and nicely furnished. The only thing was that the whirlpool did not work. I made a call to the front desk and the clerk nicely walked me thru to remedy the situation. She advised that the circuit breaker probably tripped. Totally forgot there was one in the livingroom. That did the trick. Housekeeping came the next day to see if we needed anything. Just new towels and coffee refills. They have Starbucks!! What a change from the normal boring coffees you get at resorts. There was only two of us. But enough cooking and eating utensils were provided. Like some previous reviews I saw (make sure you bring some Potholders or oven mitts) did not see any. There is a Publix in a shopping center nearby as well as a TGIFridays, CVS, Multiple Pizza Shops with some Great deals. This Resort is down the quiet end of International Dr. If you leave out of Resort , turn left and stay on there for about 15 minutes, you will be able to pick and choose among restaurants and entertainment. We wanted to relax, so opted for this resort. Was so peaceful and quiet. Did not have time to use all the amenities. Was short on time and took a 45 minute drive to Cocoa Beach for the day. But there is a nice gameroom, gym, pool patio bar and grille and a small grocery store onsite. The main pool looked fabulous and for a beautiful weekend, was never busy at all. Plenty of chairs. Only had two disappointments the whole weekend and because we only used the small pool, with a bad back was looking forward to using the hot tub to relax. When looking from our balcony , wondered why people were staying in for so long when you shouldnt. Well thats because the heater was broken and it was just luke warm. But still felt great on the back. Wish we would have been informed it did not work, so we could've gone right to the hot tub located in the main pool. The second was that unless we had a USB, we could not use the free wireless internet in our room that was included in the resort fee. They did have main hotspots to use by the main pool area and welcome center. but would have been nice to surf the net in the privacy of our room. Other than that. If I could afford to buy one as a timeshare, I surely would. Oh by the way...Was not approached once about it. Maybe I didnt meet the "Time share buying" person "Look". But will surely be back again with the kids and stay longer to enjoy it all. .

Reviews.Title: “Love our "Staycations" at Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: eevents
Reviews.Content: This was our second year in a row where my girlfriend, her children, me and my children reunited for our annual weekend "staycation." I live in Orlando and she lives in Sarasota which makes this a desirable "in-between." This weekend in particular, the children and us thoroughly enjoyed our lazy Saturday by the pool. There was a female DJ who had the children completely engaged, laughing and playing games--it was terrific and allowed us moms to watch from the lounge chairs. Bliss! The pool activities and fun music made us feel as if we left Orlando and were on a remote island resort. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely brilliant - great location for non drivers, spacious accomodation”
Reviews.Author: bookera
Reviews.Content: We didn't want the hassle of driving during our holiday in Orlando, so that ruled out villa accomodation. But we didn't want to be confined to a soul less motel room on I Drive in case it rained a lot (September being the rainy season!). Floridays was the perfect solution - you get an air conditioned apartment with a fully fitted kitchen, washer/ dryer, cooker, microwave, fridge freezer, a separate dining area, a large lounge, plus a twin (two double beds) bedroom, bathroom, then a master bedroom (massive double bed) with an en suite bathroom ( with shower and giant whirlpool bath!). Theres also a balcony. There's also an iron, ironing board, hairdryer in each bathroom, vacuum cleaner. Also three televisions! (One in living room, one in each bedroom). Oh and a little balcony with a table and two chairs. Our teenagers loved it. It was really great to have some room to spread out and chill out in the evenings, much more a home from home than a hotel room. If you do stay there, ask for a room in Block A or Block B - it's a big resort but those two buildings are nearest to reception and also just 5 minutes walk to the i Trolley stop which is immediately outside the hotel. There's a lovely swimming pool, a gym (really well equipped ) and a little on site cafe/ shop (it's not really well stocked for groceries but has some useful 'emergency' bits and pieces like medicines and milk and water) - the cafe does very tasty snack meals like burger and fries but its quite expensive (about $10-$15 per head for a snack meal and a drink). There's also a bar on site but we didn't really use it. Floridays is located on International Drive but is at the quieter end of the International drive. It's not really within walking distance of many restaurants etc. as with some of the motels and hotels on I Drive - however we didn't find this a problem at all - there is an I Trolley stop (stop number 40) right outside Floridays and you can buy a weekly ticket for $10 per person unlimited use or it's $1.25 per trip. Trolleys are every 15 or 20 minutes and dead easy to use (there are maps for the route everywhere and also available from the concierge). If you are not familiar with the I Trolley, look it up on Google, it's an excellent service. We used it to get to loads of restaurants, two shopping malls and Seaworld. Also taxis from Floridays to either Disney or Universal are around $22 (one way) but if you can work to set times the hotel runs a daily and completely free bus service to both Disney and Universal (you just book seats the day before with the concierge) - these buses are clean, air conditioned and reliable so I recommend that you use them! They depart around 08.00 a.m. and 10.45 a.m. each morning and return around 6 p.m. or 8 p.m. each evening (these times probably vary depending on the season and the theme park hours so check when you get there). The concierges at Floridays are really really knowledgeable and helpful so ask them anything, we did and they were great. Floridays is about 10 minutes slow walk (or if you are less lazy than me maybe 5 minutes brisk walk!) to a massive 'Publix' (big big supermarket) which has a wonderful fresh food section as well as all the other stuff you would expect in a supermarket - a real pleasure to shop there - so if you want to eat in the apartment rather than dining out it's quite easy to do a grocery shop. There's also (in the same location) a Walgreens (chemist and other stuff), a Chinese takeaway ( we didn't use it but noticed that it did deliveries), a 'liquor store', and a 'Subway' sandwich shop. There isn't a room cleaning service at Floridays (you can pay extra for this but it wasn't included with our booking which was through Expedia). the maid will come in each day and make your beds and replace your towels but that's all. Personally I was fine with this - there's a dishwasher (you are provided with a couple of tiny packs of dishwasher powder so you may need to buy some more) and a vacuum cleaner and brush if you need to have a quick tidy up for yourself. A word of advice - we arrived after a very long journey from the UK, in a rainstorm (!!!) and there wasn't anything in the apartment in the way of tea, coffee, milk or drinking water. So if like us the first thing you do is put the kettle on (!) pack a small carton of dried milk, and some coffee and tea or you will have to make a visit to Publix immediately! It's not far but when you have just arrived it's not what you feel like doing! The apartment we stayed in had cups, plates and cutlery for 4 - 6 people, and there were also some cooking pans and frying pans. There weren't massive amounts of cooking utensils in the kitchen but enough to get by with, and truly everything you need unless you are wanting to do cordon bleu cookery !!! Also there's a tiny bottle of washing up liquid and a tiny box of washing powder provided but you will need to buy any other cleaning products yourself (Publix again). Pretty much what you would expect with any self catering arrangement. Overall we had a great time, the staff are lovely and very helpful, and the place was clean, comfortable and well located. Can't ask for much more!

Reviews.Title: “everything you need and want an more..Love this place”
Reviews.Author: wearthebeach
Reviews.Content: We wont stay anywhere else after staying here. The rooms are big, clean and comforatable. You dont have to leave to eat , the food is amazing. The bar is a nice touch right next to a beautiful pool, which supplies floats if you want. All the staff in every department from front desk to bell service, what a pleasure. If I could live here i would.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding experience in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Floridagirl113
Reviews.Content: This hotel exceeded my expectations in everyway. The rooms were excellent and the service by the staff was over and above what I expected. I will stay here everytime I come to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent location right next to all the attractions/restaurants and shops.”
Reviews.Author: GlendaMurrell
Reviews.Content: This is definitely the best complex we have ever stayed in. Nice and close to everything you want to do whether you are driving or taking the bus. The rooms were spacious and we were automatically upgraded to a three bedroom as it wasn't a busy time. The whole complex was beautifully clean and the towels were changed almost too often! The staff were polite and helpful and nothing was too much trouble for them. The washer/dryer was useful and efficient and saves carrying a load of dirty washing home with you! The supermarket is within walking distance although it's so cheap to eat out you don't need much food/ there is a small cafe and bar where you can buy snacks and drinks and lovely coffee! The huge pool area is fantastic and very safe for children - they even give you towels to use at the pool. Excellent value and first class accommodation. We'll be back!!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, affordable price for 2 bedroom suite”
Reviews.Author: duckhead520
Reviews.Content: Just back from 4 nights at Floridays. We thought the place was great. Clean and spacious and a great price. The master bathroom has a stall shower and an oversize jetted tub. King size bed in one room, other bedroom has 2 double beds. Kitchen had everything for eating, except a pot holder. Couldn't find one anywhere. Washer and dryer right in the suite. The place seemed empty when we were there and it was so very quiet! Lovely not to be awakened by screaming children running up and down the corridors. We were in one of the farthest buildings and used the small pool by building E. Would definately stay again. Location is a little far from Universal. Took us about 15 minutes or so to get to Universal each morning, however, we didn't mind traveling the distance as our rate was great!

Reviews.Title: “Felt like were in a resort in Mexico!”
Reviews.Author: svesely
Reviews.Content: We just returned and had a wonderful time! The pools are great for all ages and the outside bar/lounge by the pool area is a great atmosphere for cocktails and socializing. The two bedroom condo was spacious and very clean. We were pleasantly surprised! We checked out the quiet pool near our building and had the pool all to ourselves! All of the staff were super nice and made us feel welcome. The ambiance reminded us of being at a resort in Mexico (there's even a small "beach" area for kids to play near the pool). The only difficulty we had was transportation. We didn't get a rental car and relied on public transportation to get to where we needed to go. The I Trolley is a great way to get anywhere on International Drive and Sea World for only $1.25 each way. They make frequent stops, but allows you to sight see while on your way. We went to Universal City Walk one evening, outlet malls during the day and to a great Brazilian steakhouse (Texas de Brazil) that I highly recommend! Awesome food and superb service! Overall it was a great vacation and I would definitely go back.....but just stay longer next time!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays Has it all”
Reviews.Author: Julesnco
Reviews.Content: Where to start ,we travelled with children of varying ages from 3 to 16 ...Excellent Hotel in fab location on International Drive. On the I trolley stop 40 so for 1.25 Dollar you could travel the whole length of I drive. Reception/Concierge/bellboy staff always polite, ready and willing to help. Even if its for a suggestion of where to eat that night. Cafe/Bar staff always polite and helpful. Food cooked onsite was nice and plentyful.
