Shop stocked most little bits you might have forgotten or ran out of. Childrens play room kept the kids happy if there was a downpour. Fitness centre was enjoyed by our teenager and popular with other hotel users but never too busy. public areas clean at all times. Internet access available on site for a fee. Pool was Lovely and clean (towels available at pool side) with an area for the kiddies to enjoy. Jaccuzzi and spa pool was also enjoyed after a day of walking around theme parks. Rooms were clean and spacious with everything you need to feel relaxed and comfortable throughout your stay. Towels changed daily and beds made. Washer/dryer come in useful. Only 5 minutes from Sea world and Aquatica 20 minutes from Disneyworld. Free courtesy shuttle bus available.Taxi's services were always close at hand. I Wouldnt want to stay anywhere else if I returned.

Reviews.Title: “FAB”
Reviews.Author: janeandmikey
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for 2 weeks from the 26th Aug 10. What can I say apart from fab. The photos on the website do not do this place any justice it was so much bigger than we expected. Without a car i would say it would not have been so easy to get around but then again there is a bus stop right outside which we used a couple of times without a problem apart from how crowded the buses got! The boys loved the pool but kept saying they wished it was a bit more lively as The Fountains next door but for the adults this wasn't a problem. The bar staff were great apart from one who was more interested in showing his tatoos to a couple of American girls rather than serving us. The grounds were clean and well mantained and we always felt safe but wished it was maybe gated. All in all we had a great holiday and would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “fantastic floridays experience”
Reviews.Author: seggy10
Reviews.Content: This resort was fantastic, it was right on the i ride line so parks etc where easy to get to. The rooms were spacious and very smart absolutley 5 star. Staff and information was brilliant. would go again without a doubt

Reviews.Title: “great holiday”
Reviews.Author: Jente46
Reviews.Content: Rooms were spacious and very clean. Staff were friendly and helpful. Pools were great. In a excellence position for anyone who does not drive. Will be returning here again

Reviews.Title: “Lovely property but horrible service”
Reviews.Author: msliz1118
Reviews.Content: We booked a reservation on the property website and upon arrival there were no 3 bedroom suites and requested in our reservation. We were placed in a 2 bedroom suite and were told we could move to a three bedroom the next day (we only had a two day reservation). The next day we received no cleaning services and were not offered a move until late that evening. We had already purchased groceries and were tired from the day so, moving was pointless. Upon check-out, we were charged a rate for a 3 bedroom suite (both days). After conversations with the front desk staff, I was finally able to convince them that we had no such suite and also were promised a reduced rate by the manager who checked us in. While the property was lovely, the headache of the check-in/out and the lack of services took away from that.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Value a fantastic place to stay .... will stay again next visit”
Reviews.Author: Oscar116
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays for 14 nights in August with our three children (12yrs, 8yrs and 3yrs) and all agreed that it is a fantastic place to stay for a Florida holiday. Our accomodation was a 2 bedroom apartment in block B which is close to the pool and all of the facilities. The apartment was very well equipped with everything we could have needed during our stay (except a clothes airer!! as my wife moaned when trying to dry clothes that would not go in the dryer) and was clean and spacious. The kids loved the fact that there was a TV in every room and frequently we had 3 different programs going on at once. Floridays is at the southern end of International drive which is close to Sea World, Aquatica and all of the Disney parks. We had a hire car and there is adequate on site parking that is free for guests. We found that the resort facilities were fine, a nice pool for us and the kids, shop, bar and food available. We only ate at the resort once but found the food to be fine. Close to Floridays is a Publix supermarket where you can stock up on supplies and the local Outback Steakhouse and Carabas Italian Grill were great value and an easy journey by car or taxi. I think Floridays is excellent value and we will definitely be staying there again on our next trip to Florida. There was wired internet access in the room and I simply plugged my network cable into the socket each day and was instantly online to check e mails and research our next theme park visit etc. From a security perspective we felt safe and secure the whole time in the resort and locked our valuables etc. in the in room safe that was easy to use and free of charge. The only negatives I can comment upon was that the pillows were not as comfortable as they could have been (very personal observation however) and as mentioned in another review we found the rooms a little cold as the A/C is so good. This was fine once you adjusted to the room temp however upon first entry to the room you really felt cold. Mind you we would have moaned if there was no A/C so overall I think these negatives count for little. Well done Floridays, great value, we had a fantastic time and would highly recommend your resort to others.

Reviews.Title: “Recommended”
Reviews.Author: Freakent
Reviews.Content: Floridays is at the bottom of International Drive well away from the hustle and bustle at the other end. It meant the I-Ride trolley bus ride took a bit longer but the Floridays resort more than made up for it. Top tip, don't bother with the shopping Malls at the other end of International drive, the mall just next door is every bit as good, if not better.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great facilities, recommended”
Reviews.Author: Devolutionboy
Reviews.Content: I chose Floridays because it offered the extra space and facilities you don't get at a hotel and I wasn't disappointed. Having a fully-equipped kitchen was a real boon and saved a fortune as we always had breakfast there and most evening meals. The washer also saved work on our return home. The space on offer in the apartment is fantastic. I stayed in a two-bed, two bathroom flat which was lovely, even if the odd item showed limited signs of wear and tear. The complex was kept very clean and although daily cleaning is limited, I didn't have a problem with that. We were close to the main pool. I liked that as we used the pool a few times, but you might want to ask for an apartment further away if you have young children as it could still be quite noisy until 11pm. There was the odd limited problem, but I found staff responsive, friendly and helpful. The location is superb. 15 mins from Disney, 20 from Universal, 5 mins from Sea World. I didn't use the shuttles provided as I hired a car and I'd recommend that for ultimate flexibility as the cafe in the complex is limited for food and there are few restaurants nearby. There is though an excellent supermarket within walking distance. I sat in no traffic queues and the road links were very easy to navigate. There is a resort fee but I knew about it in advance through the reviews and I still think it offered good value for money compared to a hotel, and similar complexes. Overall, I'd thoroughly recommend Floridays and would certainly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Resort but no entertainment”
Reviews.Author: michelleeades
Reviews.Content: This resort was of a high standard, the cleanliness was second to none. The staff were always polite and helpful and the pool was lovely. The only thing that disapointed me was that there was no type of entertainment for families, and when you have been at the parks all day and would like to spend the evening at this resort this could be very boring

Reviews.Title: “I would definitely stay again - the kids loved it!”
Reviews.Author: MrandMrsCamp
Reviews.Content: This is our 2nd experience with Floridays. We LOVE the service, the drinks are excellent poolside and the whole family friendly atmosphere is worth the price. Definitely a HOT spot, whether with the whole family or just my husband and me. WE will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: OReilly39
Reviews.Content: Decent facilities in a prime location for the Disney and Sea World Facilities. Whilst its not a full hotel, the servicing of the room was adequate. The rooms were spacious and fairly well appointed. We particularly appreciated the washer and dryer. The only issue was the temperature control was limited, and the room felt very cold. Internet access i the room would also be nice. All in all decent value.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Location”
Reviews.Author: rwm531
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at Floridays. We arrived early and were able to check into our room right away. We stayed in Building B which was right by the pool and my children went to it every night. Sea World and Aquatica were located approximately 2 miles from the hotel. Publix Supermarket and Walgreens were right down the street. The housekeeping service made the beds and always picked that dirty towels every morning. I would most certainly stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again- They have a scam going on there”
Reviews.Author: MMK3011
Reviews.Content: This hotel looked actually very nice but was also priced very low for the accommodations. First of all the housekeepers were all pregnant and looked very sneaky. We had a nice 3 bedroom apartment on the first floor. Our first night there I locked the door with the security lock around midnight. During the night I thought I heard someone open the door but just went back to sleep because I thought it was just part of my dream. The next morning I noticed the latch on the door was pulled out and someone had tried to get into our room. I called the front desk and they offered to move us to a different room. We moved, only to have someone try to get in our room again the next night. This is a scam. Someone has a master key and trys to get in the rooms in the corner of the hotel (darker areas of the hotel) to steal anything that may be out in the kitchen area. We asked the front desk to scan our keys to see when they entered in that first night. They told us no one had entered according to the computer. They lied, we even set up a trap to go off the next night and it did go off proving someone did try to come in. Also, my husband laid in the sun and fell asleep, someone actually walked up and took my sunglasses (Burberry) off the table next to him. There is nothing more then a bunch of thieves at this hotel. Don't stay here it is actually dangerous. That is why they price the stay so low... they rob you blind if they can.

Reviews.Title: “You get a lot for your money”
Reviews.Author: dcsaiger
Reviews.Content: We were so pleasantly surprised how nice the rooms were. It was so nice to come back to after a long day at Disney World. Plenty of room it feels like you are in a condo not a hotel room. The staff was nice. They are remodeling the front and it was hard to find with the GPS.

Reviews.Title: “Great Resort - loved the condo”
Reviews.Author: Dublin_Family2010
Reviews.Content: This is a lovely place to stay. Its at the quieter end of International drive (Stop 40 on i-ride) near the Premium outlet. Car is needed. Pool lovely - lots of clean towels and sunbeds available. Safe for kids (except for the hot-tub) Poor bar served ok food. Staff very friendly and helpful. Would go again.

Reviews.Title: “We just got home from a 5 night stay...”
Reviews.Author: TravelingRNmom
Reviews.Content: We just got home from a 5 night stay. All of the reviews on here are correct...the place is great. Staff was friendly, rooms were clean, kitchen well stocked. Two points I will point out...thr Internet service in the room isn't great, and it is almost impossible to get cell service in the room (we have AT&T). Also, if u decide to book check out the "friends of facebook" rate. The "best available rate" they had listed on their website was $139 (we went off season) and then I checked the facebook rate and it was $111. Well worth $90 to add a hotel to my friends list ;). Stay here and you won't be dissapointed

Reviews.Title: “The best way to start a vacation is with a great place to vacation...”
Reviews.Author: phammonds43
Reviews.Content: Everything at this resort was great. The staff was very kind , hard working and honest. The condo/hotel rooms are beautiful. They have everything you could possibly need in the full kitchen. My husband cooked breakfast five out of the seven days we were there. Having a washer and dryer while there was very covenint. With four of us on vacation it was nice to be able to toss in a load when needed. We were there to visit Disney World and Floriday's was so close. And, checking in and our was so fast. We are planning a trip to Orlando next year, and we already know where we will be staying.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel for the price!”
Reviews.Author: DerekH34
Reviews.Content: This was my third time in Orlando and this was by far the best hotel yet. Good location on the quiet bit of international drive, near to premium outlets. 15 mins to disney and universal, 5 mins to seaworld. Rooms where a good size, 6 adults staying in a 3 bedroom apartment, and it still felt spacious. Plus our balcony looked out towards disney which meant we saw the fireworks almost every night. The pool area was well maintained but was sightly small for the size of the complex. Staff where friendly and always happy to help. Overall a great hotel and for the price very hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: “Picture Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Jeanbean1021
Reviews.Content: This resort was perfect for our family. The condo was very clean and fully equiped. Big beautiful bathrooms. Unit can sleep up to 12. A very pleasant suprise for the price! Would highly recommed.

Reviews.Title: “Wow! We found our jewel in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: Joemac44
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays, Orlando on a recent trip to see the Mouse and Sea World. We read most of the reviews on many resort spots in Orlando and decided on Floridays despite a few negative reviews. We were absolutely amazed with the accommodations and the suite was very clean and tidy upon arrival. We planned the trip through Travelocity so everything was set up when we arrived. Our room was not ready when we arrived, however we did get there early at 11 am. The other family we arrived with had their room ready so we hung out in their room until ours was all set. We requested rooms close to one another...so I guess that was the delay...and the resort gave us a 3 bedroom room to accommodate us at no extra charge! Some pointers: request a room with a view of one of the 2 pools as it makes a huge difference when having your breakfast or drinks on the patio looking at the great pool views rather than the parking lot of the adjacent resorts. Book through an agency that books you into the resort itself: we met a gentleman who booked through an agency that had a private owner of the unit...any cleaning services, towels and other service is not included. Yes there was a resort fee for about $12/day however they DO tell you on check in and it is clearly listed on your key package. Includes maid service to change the towels, make beds and clear the trash/recyclables. When we needed extra soap, a sauce pot (we couldn't find one in the unit), glassware, plates they brought it up to our room without question. The facilities are amazing and we enjoyed the pools until 11 pm on most nights after busy days at Disney/Sea World. It is right in the heart of the action, very close to Disney, Universal, Sea World and plenty of shopping outlets and grocery stores to buy supplies for meals to cook on your own. We stayed a week and are already planning 2 weeks at Floridays next year...1 week was not enough to thoroughly enjoy the area! For families looking for a great spot to stay in Orlando, this is it.

Reviews.Title: “In the middle of the magic is right!!! : )”
Reviews.Author: robnjessmom
Reviews.Content: Hi all, just returned home from our Orlando vacation and all was fantastic! The hotel was all I hoped it would be and more. The kitchen was well stocked ( even though I didn't use it, it was great having it - mom doesn't cook on vacation : ) The pool was great, wish it was deeper. It was very quiet and relaxing, we stayed in building B. We had our dog with us and we didn't have to crate him, thank goodness. He loved sleeping on the king sized bed, Lol. For the price, we got everything we could ever ask for and more at this resort, would stay there again in a heartbeat, even over a Disney resort. : ) Two downsides, the business center is quite expensive, went there to print out park tickets and it's $0.75 a page, yes, a page. Also, $0.20 a minute for internet service. And I thought NY was bad. Second, the beds, there were a little soft for me, my back still aches. Overall, it was a great experience and I look forward to staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay while in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: maxima1966
Reviews.Content: Just got back from our trip to Orlando. Spent 8 great nights at Floridays Resort! It was what most everyone had said before. Great rooms (suites), service and amenities. Had asked for a 2BR/2BA and they had upgraded us to a 3BR/2BA. With 3 boys, being able to give our oldest son ( 14) his own BR was great! The pictures on their website do not do it justice until you are there. We stayed in Bldg F, which is in back of the complex. This is a short walk to the main pool and building. But very quiet! At night we saw the cows in adjoining property grazing in the field from our balcony....very serene. Main Pool is large with a nearby gameroom, bar and place to eat. Publix supermarket within walking distance and we stocked up for the week since the Kitchen was so large(snacks, drinks etc.). We rented a car so we didn't use the shuttle service. Only 10 minutes from Disney entrance, a mile or so from Seaworld. If i were to nitpick one thing, it would be the size of the fitness room(small) vs. the size of the resort, but that is it. Good Story: Had went online in my room to buy Seaworld Tickets and needed to print out prior to leaving. There was an issue with the printer in the business center but they immediately printed out the documents in their back office at no charge without hesitation. It's the little things that make you very happy with a resort when you have sooo many choices in Orlando. I would definitely recommend!!

Reviews.Title: “We are already planning our next trip to Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: Pattiwag
Reviews.Content: We all had such a great time at this resort! It was close to all the theme parks, close to restaurants and groceries, and MCO. After a long day at a Park, it was so nice to come home and soak in the jacuzzi. Our boys, ages 11&13, loved the pool and the game room. Our room was clean and our requests were speedily granted. It was so nice to be able to spread out. If we needed more towels, more coffee, more shampoo, it was there within five minutes. I loved the outlet store across the street and scored some great deals on a couple of Coach purses and clothes. There is only one Internet plug in the suite, but the pool and lobby has wireless. Don't bother packing shampoo and soap, the ones supplied were great. Even the laundry and dish soap was replenished daily. The coffee they supplied was also good. We also liked being able to put our kids to bed down the hall. Wink, wink.

Reviews.Title: “Nothing was too much for them to do. It was done with a smile.”
Reviews.Author: LONDONw358
Reviews.Content: Best expereince I have had staying at a resort. Clean, Friendly, good attitude of the staff, professional. So many options open to a family - restaurants, entertainment, attractions and at the end of the day a peaceful night sleep. Keep up the great standard you have earned.

Reviews.Title: “A lovely Hotel to stay at...”
Reviews.Author: WolvesWizard
Reviews.Content: A top hotel, the rooms were spacious, the were a bit dated but were fine for our needs. The room had a washer, dryer and iron, which was a god send for our cloths hungry wearing children. They changed our towels, refreshed the soap, dishwasher and washing powder daily, remade the beds at the first weeks end. The bar area was a bit dissapointing, quiet boring actually, the bar staff were a bit miserable and the drinks a bit extortionate. We went to the local Publix and got our own for round the pool. Take a cooler bag!! The pool area was lovely, be careful no diving, my son found a couple of broken teeth in there!! All our needs were catered for and the concierge was very helpfull. Not many eateries in walking distance for a good sit down meal though. Dead near to Disney and Sea world. Overall a great place to stay though.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely resort, you will not be disapppointed!”
Reviews.Author: Blackbird075
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly, courteous and readily available for all our needs. The pool area was awesome for both children and adults. The location is ideal, you are 10-15min. from Disney, seaworld, downtown Disney and outlet shopping. All amenities are nearby as well, so you need not worry if you've forgotten something. The rooms are clean, well kept and well equipped with everything you need. Having a washer/dryer is very handy when you have 3 children. We would definitely recommend this resort to anybody with or without children. Fabulous place for fantastic value!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best place for parents and teen/college age sons!”
Reviews.Author: 2guysmom
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay if you like being able to have some space. With 2 sons, 6ft and over, staying here was so much more comfortable than a hotel room. They were able to stay up late and didn't bother us at all. We could get up early, have coffee and not bother them. I loved the washer and dryer, because hot days around Orlando made for some stinky clothes. We just easily washed our clothes in the evening and when we returned home, we only had a small amount to wash. We made breakfast in our room, which saved money, and stocked our fridge with snacks. The pool area is very nice and large. We also liked being able to order drinks and lunch at the pool.

Reviews.Title: “spacious orlando near everything”
Reviews.Author: johnnyalicia
Reviews.Content: hotel centerally located with lots of living space that is affordable. Wish the beds more comfortable. Able to unwind after a long day at the park.

Reviews.Title: “Overall good value and experience”
Reviews.Author: PAtraveler999
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays from 8/15 - 8/21. The rooms were very spacious and overall a good value for the price we paid (granted it was off-season). My only complaint was that I found the pool to be not exceptionally clean, nor was it as big as I would have preferred. The pool wasn't dirty, but the walls felt somewhat slimy. Overall - good experience. I would recommened to friends with the caveat about the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Great end to our vacation”
Reviews.Author: Hammer28
Reviews.Content: We bookd at Floridays after reviewing several Orlando accommodations with suites for an extended family. The price was attractive and location convenient for our needs. This was the 3rd and final leg of our 11 day vacation which started in Clearwater and ended in Orlando - as we were having my brother and his family join us in Orlando, we booked a 2 bedroom room, which was more than enough room for our party of 5 adults and 2 small children. The room was well appointed and had the typical timeshare-unit amenities - kitchen utensils, coffee maker, fridge, stove, etc.. - pretty much everything you need if you choose to cook while on vac to save some money. Several pizza/sandwich places available to deliver as well - you will have menus slipped under the door daily - we ordered one day and worked out fine. The in-room washer and dryer are super convenient as well to wash and dry several sets of clothes after braving 90+ degree/100% humidity days... 3 TVs and living room has VHS/DVD player as well. Our room was in building E, balcony overlooking the pond and pool. Could use some maintenance on the balcony (like a coat of paint) but by no means unacceptable. Large master bath with jacuzzi tub and second bathroom as well, very convenient. Larger pool by lobby seemed very nice as well, many lounge chairs, though we were unable to use either pool due to sightseeing and storms in area when we DID plan to use them. Fitness center has 2 treadmills, 2 ellipticals (sp?), 1 recumbent bike and several (6) weight machines - no free weights, mats or exercise balls, but was ok and not ever at capacity during the 5 days we were there/used it. Location about 10/15 min from Disney, 10 to Seaworld. Close to restaurants and supermarkets as well. A Benihana at the entrance was our final dinner and very good. Located on International Drive, but on South end - away from mega crowds. Was a perfect place for you to spread out and use as your Orlando "base of operations". Only wish we had more "down" time to chill and use the facilities more - build in some time to recover from theme park days. Great ending to our trip.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: greg066
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a Florida vacation and spent five nights at Floridays in a two bedroom suite in building E. This is the way to go. We had plenty of room. All three kids all had their own bed (daughter on the pull-out). All amenities were provided for. We ate most of our meals in our room with a few treat nights out. The pool area was great. four our two 11 year olds, a few organized activities would have been nice when we relaxed on our resort days, but this is a place to come and relax, so no big dea. Building E was a bit of of walk to the pool, but this is the new part of the resort. The walk was actually a sneeky way to get some needed exercise. I did see some people driving to the pool and they could have used the walk more than me. The staff was very friendly, especially Chris at the front desk. All in all, an excellent experience and we will definitely choose this place if we return to Orlando

Reviews.Title: “Floridays average stay for a very high price”
Reviews.Author: srosey1215
Reviews.Content: Rude front staff person. Very high prices for room . No real dining. Also waited 2 hours to have clogged toilet checked.

Reviews.Title: “Yet again fantastic in every way!”
Reviews.Author: hattieNorthwest
Reviews.Content: This is now our second year at the resort and yet again they did not fail to impress. We have two teenagers, 16 & 13 and the rooms are so spacious they have their own areas to 'chill out' after the busy parks. Weather was fantastic this year and we all returned with great tans. Located south end of International drive, this resort is a great location. Yes it's the quieter end but we love this as still within easy reach of the parks and restaurants. The staff are so friendly and the bar staff even remembered us from the previous year. I reported a light out in the ladies toilet round the pool area and the maintenance quickly replaced the bulb. I love the facilities in the room so can wash and dry clothes easily and shopped at the local publix just 2 mins away which was so convenient. The jacuzzi both round the pool and in the rooms are a blessing after all the walking you do. If return to Florida next year would not stay anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff and great value”
Reviews.Author: jlmcim
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a hotel that was close to the attractions and was reasonably priced. Floriday's was a 3 to 4 star hotel for a discount hotel price. Staff was attentive and friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect family resort!”
Reviews.Author: Emme916
Reviews.Content: The location is perfect. 30 or less minutes away from all the Orlando attractions. The hotel is always clean and orderly. The set up is perfect for short or long stays. The rooms are very spacious and have everything you need. The master bed room is perfect for someone who really needs some relaxation! And the kitchen is the icing on the cake, everything you could possibly need is there. I recommend this resort to everyone who visits Orlando! Thanks for our 2nd Great Experience!

Reviews.Title: “Usually a great place to stay, however, they missed the mark this time!”
Reviews.Author: Shawna2580
Reviews.Content: Overall bad experience this trip to Floridays. We are FL residents and frequent Orlando often. Every time we visit, we stay at Floridays. This time, however, there were just too many things wrong with our suite. We did contact management and they tried to make it right. We are going back in September for a celebration and hope that things will be different. It's always been a fantastic place to stay on previous visits....

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, loads of room, great pool, excellent people, loved it.”
Reviews.Author: TrishC19
Reviews.Content: Just left Floridays after our fourth visit in as many years. All four family members feeling sorry to leave. The addition, this year, of DJ Christine - a fantastic poolside kids entertainer - inspired! Whether it's bar staff, housekeeping, bellmen or reception we were made to feel so very special. Can't wait for visit #5 next year! The above goes triple for the kids, thank you Floridays!

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS FLORIDAYS”
Reviews.Author: MichaelLunt
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for two weeks, myself my wife and four children aged 13,11,5 and 3. This is the best Hotel we have ever stayed in. Everything about this resort is first class and there is not one thing i could fault. A car is not necesary as shuttle buse to the theme parks run frequently and the i ride trolley stops outside the Hotel to get up and down International Drive. All the staff are excellent , Ray the Bell Man is so lovely he takes time to talk to all guests and offers help and advice on the holiday. Krystle on reception is so polite and friendly and nothing is to much trouble. TJ on the bar is so friendly and on serving me the first time remembered the drinks every time i returned. These are simple things but meant that you feel so welcomed here. The weather was so hot and humid but the rooms have great air conditioning which hepls a lot ! The rooms are very impressive and so spacious that ther was plenty of room for everybody and were always cleaned tremendously well. Again nothing was to much trouble for the housekeepers. The manager Rod O`Connor made us feel very welcomed and we felt like special guests. We did everything we wanted to in the two weeks and unfortunately it went to quick and we were sad to be coming home.I would thoroughly recommend this hotel to anyone and it is impossible to be unimpressed.Not sure when we will return to America but when we do we will certainly be staying at Floridays as it couldnt be any better.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Stay”
Reviews.Author: Columbia_21044
Reviews.Content: 5 star condo for the price of 2 star motel. Stayed in 3 bedroom unit. Very roomy and clean. 5-15 minutes drive to most of Orlando’s attractions. One block away from major grocery store, drug store, restaurants and Prime Outlets.

Reviews.Title: “Week Vacation with our kids”
Reviews.Author: TheBrowns23
Reviews.Content: All the comforts of home!!!!! 2 bedrooms,2 bathrooms, living room, full kitchen with everything we needed. The staff, from the older gentleman who took us to our room, to the cleaning people, were very nice and helpful ! Its located close to all of the parks they had shuttle service but because they were so close we drove our selves so we could come and go as we please. Would definitely recommend and would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Why this condo is different”
Reviews.Author: Paula590802
Reviews.Content: Housekeeping! They make beds, take out garbage and refresh towels and supplies with no additional charge :) Other condos charge extra for this service. Best location for SeaWorld, Aquatica, I-Drive (it's on I-Drive) and Downtown Disney and Disney parks. Been going to Florida since 1975 and this is the best place - we'll come here every year. Staff are great, kids loved the games room and the pools are so nice and relaxing - perfect place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent family resort”
Reviews.Author: Californiagal55
Reviews.Content: Our family of five ( my husband and I, plus our 3 children aged 23, 19 and 16) have just returned from a 6 night stay at Floridays. We were so impressed, especially as its an entirely non-smoking resort. The 3 bedroom apartment was perfect - the beds comfortable, with plenty of room for us to relax and and having a washing machine and dryer in the apartment was an added bonus. The pool was clean, just the right temperature and there were plenty of lounges. While the shuttle schedule to the theme parks could be better, it was workable. I would not hesitate to recommend the Floridays resort and would certainly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is a terrific value and I would stay here again and again.”
Reviews.Author: Cvggirl
Reviews.Content: Floridays made for a great vacation. Super convenient location. The suites were clean, spacious and equipped with everything you would need to live there comfortably. I stayed a week and saved alot of money by making breakfast, lunch and a couple of dinners in the kitchen. The decor and accomodations were very comfortable. The pool was nice, clean and not overcrowded. The people staying at the hotel were family oriented, no rough horseplay in the pool or foul language. It was also great to have a tv in every room so everyone could watch their favorite programs. If you want to be waited on hand and foot, I'd choose a luxury hotel, but for a great family vacation choose Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to relax”
Reviews.Author: Abri10
Reviews.Content: We had booked a different hotel in Orlando but after reading poor reviews changed at late notice to Floridays and are very glad we did. We wanted somewhere we could relax and enjoy some family time and Floridays certainly provided this. Our teenagers loved having three TVs, brilliant internet connection and the spa bath. We had some great times in the pool together, particularly in the evening. It was a good place to relax inbetween hectic days out. The beds were particularly comfortable and there was always hot water for showers/baths. We didn't want to eat out every evening so appreciated the kitchen area. Publix supermarket is less than 10 minutes walk away. We didn't have a car so it was great that the I-trolley bus stop was right outside the hotel. There is also a shuttle bus to all the theme parks. Floridays is not in a busy part of town so might not suit those who want a wide range of restaurants right outside their door but, for us, it provided a relaxing haven that met all our needs.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: IsraelSue1971
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 10 days and it was fantastic. Great location very close to Sea World and Aquatica, and only about five minutes drive from Downtown Disney. The rooms were spacious and the kitchen well equipped. It was so convenient to have a dishwasher and a washer/dryer. All in all - great - I would definately stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing”
Reviews.Author: strat16
Reviews.Content: Great location, large pool and clean comfortable rooms. Will definitely be returning in the future. Close to all attractions, and shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Magnificent!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Princess2035
Reviews.Content: Sit back Relax and Enjoy! The rooms are great, we had family stop by and there was plenty of room for everyone. The food from room service was very good. The location of the hotel is terrific, near shopping, restaurants, water parks and amusement parks. Property very clean and inviting. Large pool area. Will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Home from home!”
Reviews.Author: Cotty-27
Reviews.Content: Floridays lived up to all expectations. We had a very comforable 3 weeks there and felt the accomodation suited us perfectly. We had a 2 bed condo and it was extreemly spacious. We were in block E on the top floor and had a lovely view over the lake and smaller children's pool. The location was fab being at the much quieter and less developed end of i-drive and very close to Disney. The pool area was lovley and our 8 year old enjoyed his time in the pool. It was great being that liitle more independent - would recommend a car though to make the most of your holiday there. The publix supermarket is 2 min away which was great to stock up. We had 2 lovely meals in Benihanas next door to Floridays - lovely food and chefs cook at your table making the meal memorable.

Reviews.Title: “Spectacular”
Reviews.Author: Blessed99
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this resort to anyone. The only thing I had a problem with was not knowing about the security deposit in advance. Overall this is a wonderful resort close to shopping, restaurants and theme parks.

Reviews.Title: “Everything we needed and more!”
Reviews.Author: mickeylover1
Reviews.Content: This is our 3rd time staying here its right near SeaWorld and Aquatica. Perfect stay.. So much nicer than a regular hotel room. The full kitchen makes it nice to have breakfast before hitting the parks and for ur younger kids to take naps befor going out again. The beds are comfortable and the tub is great. We have no complaints and will be staying again for our christmas trip!

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded our expectations – will definitely stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: hlmagazine
Reviews.Content: Our family of four stayed in a two-bedroom unit and had plenty of room to feel comfortable and relaxed. The unit was very clean and had everything we needed. The Resort's location is very convenient to all Disney parks and SeaWorld. Beautiful pool area and pretty view of one of the property lakes from our balcony. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Take a step out of reality into beauty and luxury...”
Reviews.Author: amazon511
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time at this hotel. Check in and check out was fast and efficient. The rooms were beautifully decorated. I could write a book about the jacuzzi tub after a long day in Orlando! The view of the lake and pool was amazing. No one believes our room photos aren't professional postcards! I loved the location of the resort. Being on the south end of International drive put us in perfect position for easy access to Disney and I-Drive but yet not in the middle of all the traffic. The buildings, staff and rooms are exceptional. We are already preparing our next trip back!!! Thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect family oriented hotel”
Reviews.Author: OhioHersey
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean and comfortable. You couldn't hear anyone around you, it was as if you were the only people staying there. Our family loved it!

Reviews.Title: “Floridays was fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Shumaker
Reviews.Content: We arrived to find the accommodations exceeded our expectations. The lobby was beautiful and staff were courteous, professional and helpful. The suite (2 bedrooms in this unit) was spacious and quite comfortable. Everything was clean and orderly. The suite even smelled clean; not overly bleached like most hotels, but actually fresh. Everything seemed to be on good repair. The door-wall and large window in the master bedroom provided lots of natural light. The jetted, oversized whirlpool tub in the master bath with pass-through to the master bedroom was a nice touch. The room was stocked with coffee, tea and dishwashing and laundry detergents, all of which were re-stocked as needed by staff with daily cleaning. The kitchen included glasses, plates, pans and utensils. There was no spatula, but we had everything else we needed to prepare meals. The suite was in the building F, which is furthest from the large pool, lobby and other amenities. There was, however, a smaller pool nearby (overlooked from the suite balcony) which was just a short walk away and saw nowhere near the traffic of the larger pool. The resort provides a transport around the property as needed. Just flag one down or contact the front desk to request one. Both pools had plenty of pool-side seating; we had no trouble finding available beach chairs. Both pools have fresh towels on-site. They were well stocked every time we went poolside. We were struck by how quiet the room was. There were plenty of cars in the lot and we saw other guests around the building, but seldom heard other people (no doors, yelling, running…etc.) while in our suite. This is a huge plus. This was our first trip to Orlando. Prior to booking, I had been shopping several other resorts and found some had a lower rate. Having now seen the competition, I’m glad I chose Floridays. You may find the rate slightly higher, but the others just don’t compare.

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME RESORT WILL DEFINITELY STAY...”
Reviews.Author: LETTY3
Reviews.Content: AWESOME RESORT WILL DEFINITELY STAY EVERYTIME I AM IN ORLANDO WAS CONCERNED WITH CONCERNS READ ONLINE BUT I WAS GLAD I STAYED BECAUSE IT HAS BEEN THE BEST RESORT I HAVE STAYED IN ORLANDO!!! THANK GOD I DID I LOVED MY STAY!!!!! ALREADY RECOMMENDED IT TO FRIENDS AND FAMILY!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: behappi2005
Reviews.Content: We loved everything about your hotel. We got a great deal, free additional nights and park tickets included in the pricing, which made things so much easier. Our eyes popped the minute we opened the door to our room. A TV in each room was outstanding as we have 4 children all with different ages and tastes. The full kitchen was a plus as we are frugal people and we cooked all our meals. The rooms were spacious and each person had their own queen bed while my husband and slept on the king bed. The whirlpool tub was awesome. I would play soothing music and just sit in the tub for hours. The pool was just the right size and had something for every age bracket. I will most definitely recommend your hotel as I feel the staff were all friendly and courteous, the hotel immaculate and our stay was out of this world.

Reviews.Title: “Just what I wanted”
Reviews.Author: TayPGCounty_Maryland
Reviews.Content: Me and my daughter stayed at the Floridays Resort as a back to school trip. We stayed in a building at the back of the complex and it was very quiet. It was so accomodating that we didn't mind staying in when the weather turned stormy. I loved that we didn't have to share a bathroom and her bedroom was on the other side of the condo. It was central to all of the attractions, outlet shopping, and the supermarket was right around the corner. And no timeshare pitch!!!

Reviews.Title: “The Resort does a great job to provide a family friendly atmosphere.”
Reviews.Author: mwallin
Reviews.Content: Check in was a breeze, and everyone was very friendly. The location was great for Disney and Seaworld.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good”
Reviews.Author: nelly808
Reviews.Content: This resort was nice and good for large groups. Staff was pretty good and the pool side bartender was very nice as well. The location was a little far from entertainment and Disney. The resort is at the end of International Drive so there isn't much site seeing or dining options. The buses from Disney leave before the park closes (9:40 pm) so you will have to take a cab back the the resort ($40) if you want to see the 10:00 firework show.

Reviews.Title: “Very good value for your money”
Reviews.Author: Meanmachine666
Reviews.Content: Spacious and luxurious rooms. And not expensive at all. Resort looks well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, roomy, nicely decorated hotel close to Orlando theme parks.”
Reviews.Author: missy_0008
Reviews.Content: My family of 7 have stayed at Floridays at least 10 times and have never had a bad experience. The staff have always been friendly and treated us with excellent service. At check-in and check-out, we have never waited more than 5 minutes to be helped. The rooms are very spacious and nicely decorated. The full kitchen is very nice with granite countertops and fully stocked with clean dishes. Very convienent when you stay for a week or more. The beds are comfortable. The linens are clean. We always get a good night sleep at Floridays. The bathrooms are nice and clean. I especially love the separate shower in the master bathroom. I also like that the bathrooms are really big and roomy. My children love the pool by the main lobby with the fountains. They can play in the pool all day and love all the different fountains. The pool is clean and the water is warm. The bar by the pool is nice for the adults. Fast and friendly service is what you will find at the bar. There is a little cafe by the bar that offers Starbucks coffee, fresh food for breakfast, lunch, and dinner such as chicken strips, pizza, and hamburgers. The cafe also sells chips, ice cream, drinks, and essentials (toothpaste, toothbrushes, pain medicine, etc.). My husband likes the fitness center. He found the center clean and well equipped. Floridays is located in the perfect spot. Ten minutes to Disney. Publix, Walgreens, McDonalds, Orlando Premium Outlet mall, and Outback within 1 mile. Many other attractions and restaurants are within 5 - 15 minutes of Floridays. Floridays is an excellent hotel. We have recommended all our family and friends to stay at Floridays. The location is excellent; the rooms are clean; the staff is friendly. We haven't found a hotel in Orlando that can beat Floridays.

Reviews.Title: “Vacation”
Reviews.Author: Lucy33210
Reviews.Content: Great 2 bedroom suite, was comfortable for 5 people, 3 of them teens, great location. No wireless internet in the room, only one person at a time could plug in, so they had to go to the lobby to use laptops, which was fine. Overall the staff was very friendly, the pool was clean. Our only complaint was that the shuttle service to Universal and Magic Kingdom was limited. Buses filled up quickly, so you have to be at the desk by 7:30am to book the shuttle for the following morning. We would stay at the Floriday's again

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic, affordable family friendly....Floridays Resort”
Reviews.Author: llwoods
Reviews.Content: You would be a fool to stay somewhere other than the Floridays. Our three bedroom was wonderful, modern and very clean and felt like home away from home. Great location, and the staff is customer centric!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: CoventrySue
Reviews.Content: A lovely resort to say in, very clean and very pleasant staff

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in Orlando and great price.”
Reviews.Author: WeLearnAsWeGo
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent a week here in January with our four kids. I was attending some classes and they played in the parks during the day. Floridays worked well for us. There were six in a 2 bedroom unit and everyone had plenty of room. The free shuttle to Universal Parks also made thing easy for us since I was attending classes during the day and needed the car. There is only one internet connection in each room and no WiFi. That was a strain since we have more wireless devices than people in our family. I have posted a few pictures here and there are a few more on our blog (www.welearnaswego.com/2010/01/09/heading-to-orlando-morning-of-saturday-1-9-10/). I hope this helps and feel free to ask questions on the blog.

Reviews.Title: “Great location away from the tacky end of international drive.”
Reviews.Author: avbinthere
Reviews.Content: We think this hotel is a great place to stay as it is 10 minutes drive to Disney, 5 minutes to seaworld, 10 minutes to the busy end of International Drive and the I ride bus stops right outside the hotel. Rooms are huge with 3 double bedrooms and the master with ensuite. Its quiet in the evening but there is a bar at the side of the pool. Pool is great for the kids and plenty of sunloungers. A really clean and friendly place to stay. If you want to be near the nightlife then you may want to choose to be further up International Drive. As a family of 2 adults, one 7 year old and one 3 year old we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: cynfranelle
Reviews.Content: we stayed here in late may (husband 4yr old daughter and myself) great 2 bedroom apt, clean, large and comfy, masterroom with awesome ensuite and then smaller bathroom for daughter and 2nd bedroom with 2 more queen size beds, great for night time privacy (not everyone stuck in same room like hotels). housekeeper did try there luck the first day with forgetting to make beds but 1 phone call to reception that was soon put right and didnt happen again. as we never made any meals in the apt i cant really say how kitchen equipment was (who wants to go on holiday to cook and wash dishes not me!!!) but the large fridge was great (well who wants to have warm drinks in the evening and water too) i ride trolley was outside main entrance so we didnt need to drive anywhere and floridays layed on free transport to Disney and Universal so we got everywhere we wanted to go (disney, universal, seaworld, aquatica and busch gardens) so didnt miss out on any parks by being in slightly quietier location. the pool was lovely and also another pool in the complex. cafe offered a small menu and a smaller choice of breakfast cereal but did us fine when we were there. we went by i ride to many resturants love love love the olive garden and tony romas you cant go wrong with these places, the only negative i found was on the last night we were there whoever moved into the room beside us must have loved the sound of banging the drawers in the bathroom shut as this went on for about an hour but as we were there for 2 weeks this was the only time we heard any noise from outside our room so yes i would defo come here again. ( we are already booked to come back to florida in late november this is our 3rd time in a year ) we just love love love florida

Reviews.Title: “Great location & home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: twn030577
Reviews.Content: I just returned from my Disney trip and stayed at Floridays from 26 Jul-1 Aug. I was debating between 4 other resorts and was trying to narrow my choice. Initially , I was estactic about selecting Floridays after checking the reviews and location. As my trip date got closer, I began comparing again and re-reading reviews and they got worse. I was questioning my choice of Floridays because I was starting to see a pattern of bad reviews. Having stayed there now myself, I will say some complaints are valid but can be overlooked. Here are some of the complaints I witnessed but dismissed. 1. Inconsistent Housekeeping- this did become annoying as we never received the same service daily. Some days we received clean towels and washcloths but no hand towels. I dont usually care about hand towels but they were CRUCIAL to have when touring the parks as we perspired profusely!!!! Other days they removed the dirty towels and washcloths but didnt provide new washcloths. Some days they did one bathroom but not the other. The housekeeper was nice and we didnt complain; we just asked her to leave extras. 2. Bed linen never changed- After being there a week, it would've been nice to have the sheets changed at least once. However, Floridays charges an additional housekeeping charge for this service which I think it should be part of the regular resort fee. 3. Bad water odor- I saw this complaint on a another review and thought the reviewer was being just petty. I soon discovered it wasnt. The water had a gassy-oil type smell and it became unbearable for me. It permeatted the shower and laundry. By the last day I was ready to leave just because of the smell. I had to re-wash all the laundry after returning home. 4. Mold in shower grout- I did notice the shower grout could use a good scrubbing as it was more noticeable in some areas than others. Quick trip to walmart fixed this. 5. Daily resort fee for debit card users- now this was a budget buster. If you used a debit card (with credit card logo), you were required to pay an upfront fee of $50.00 per day. Our stay was for 6 nights which totaled $300 in addition to resort fee and room rates. This debit card policy is not on there website nor is it stated on the confirmation email. If its on the website somewhere during the reservation process I must have missed it but doubt it. I think the only way I found out was via another booking site. I contacted the resort and told them my issue and they were able to work out a compromise. 6. Daily pizza flyers- you will get this daily under your door; just throw them away. No big deal. 7. No security- Another reviewer complained about the lack of security. The one thing no reviewer mentioned was that this resort has a motel set up. Meaning, the entrance door to your room is outside versus being inside like a hotel room and hallway. If I had known this upfront, I dont think I would have ever stayed here. I do not like the motel door feature where any passerby out side can gain access to your door. Thankfully, Floridays is located in a very quiet and slow area and this door issue didnt bother me much. Overall, Floridays was very nice and I would recommend it for value and location. It was very comfy and felt like home. Kitchen was extremely nice and had everything you needed from dishware to pots and pans. We saved money by eating in and cooking meals. Location was great. We could leave the parks and come back to eat and rest and go back out. Traffic was never an issue. Walmart , Publix, CVS, Walgreens and shopping outlets are all withing 5 miles. If you go another 5 miles or so, you will hit up al the restuarants and stores. I-ride trolley stops right in front of the resort; we didnt use it, we had a rental car. If your looking for valude and comforts of home, this is your spot. If your looking for upscale and world class you might want to look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation”
Reviews.Author: cedrickaren
Reviews.Content: Krystal, Ray, Nicole and Nilda were very helpful. Nicole and Hilda are at the Concierge desk and were very knowledgable about the parks and what was needed for a fun time. Krystal worked the front desk was very nice and willing to do anything to make your experience more pleasant. Ray is the bell man. He is a pleasure to talk to and loves to help.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays - great location, super apartments!”
Reviews.Author: Auntiefudge
Reviews.Content: This was our return trip to the resort - we got engaged there two years ago and decided to return for our honeymoon. The apartments are lovely and spacious - we loved having our own en suite in the master room. We could come and go as we pleased and were delighted to have our balcony overlooking the smaller pool. The management do not seem to interact much with their guests - much of the PR is left to desk staff and the bar staff, which creates a very false image. Premium outlet is near by and a supermarket too, which is handy for taking in items for breakfast and other meals, should you wish to stay in. Almost every day we returned home to find lots of leaflets posted through the door by random takeaway establishments - you are recommended by the resort NOT to order from them as they can be dodgy. The leaftlets did get extremely annoying! Their is an I-Ride stop just outside the resort entrance. One thing we didn't like - was the walk to the nearby shops. The paving does not continue all the way along the busy main road (International Drive) so your choice is to either walk along a sandy dirt track or walk on the road with the vehicles going the same way - not always the safest option late at night when its dark!

Reviews.Title: “Just Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Johnny2009
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 weeks at Floridays Resort Orlando. We have travelled for years through the USA and we did alot of hotels, motels and appartments. For us, Floridays is the best we ever had. Nothing is to much for the staff and they work 100% to make your stay perfect. Ofcourse we can give several reasons why this resort is one of the best but we think you allready readed that before on other reviews here. Lisa, Ray, Matthew and all the other staff from Floridays... "Thank You" so much for making our stay the best we ever had. I am sure we will be back for more stays. The Hadders Family

Reviews.Title: “A very nice resort with everything you need to be happy in Florida”
Reviews.Author: Varin000
Reviews.Content: This is a resort that gives you the feeling of american hospitality,- and you get a lot for the money you spend there. Big, nice appartment with all that a family needs (jaccuzine, televitions in every room, a well-equiped kitchen and a washing machine and a tumbledryer ) are all modern and well-kept. The rooms are all beautiful decorated and clean. A friendly and service- minded staff and a good shuttle- service to Disneyworld made the stay perfect! And to chill out in the swimmingpool with a coctail in the evening after long days in Disneyworld, was fantastic!

Reviews.Title: “The Best Resort I've EVER stayed at”
Reviews.Author: magcampos
Reviews.Content: The room was always clean & well kept. The rooms were spacy & quiet. I shared a room with my sister-in-law, her husband & her three kids & never once did we experience any type of conflict for the space or bathrooms. We had enough space to fit 9 people & we even had my other sister-in-law, her husband & their 2 year old daughter spend the night once and we still felt like we had enough room. We saved a lot of money by grocery shopping & eating breakfast there with the refrigerator & stove handy. Overall it was a great experience if you have kids & are going on a vacation to Orlando to the theme parks.

Reviews.Title: “I'll stay there again if I return to Orlando”
Reviews.Author: lirosedatt
Reviews.Content: The Floridays Resort was very nice. My family of four was super comfortable in our 2 bedroom suite. My opposite gender kids each had a full size bed, and they loved having a TV in their room! The location was great, a short drive to Sea World and Universal, and it was not a bad drive to Cocoa Beach either. The pool and bar area were very nice for both adults and kids. Great family getaway!

Reviews.Title: “Very Roomy...Felt like home”
Reviews.Author: CalgaryVacationer3
Reviews.Content: The accommodations at Floridays were really good. We stayed in a 3 bedroom unit. Lots of room and reasonably priced for the size. Full kitchens, washer and dryer were nice to have. There are two pools on the site. One is really small, but not many people go to it. The other could get a bit crowded at times. Good location if your are going to Disney World, Sea World or to an outlet mall. All within minutes. Universal is a little further away, but only about a 15-20 minute drive. No complaints at all and we would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “This was our second time, not sure there will be a third time.....”
Reviews.Author: veroluc2000
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at the Floridays. In 2008, Floridays had totally meet our expectations. This year, i just can't say the same,....(We were in building D, room 104)Smelly shower with just about no water pressure, We had blinds but no curtains in the 3 bedrooms; they had been removed ! (after looking around, we could see that most rooms had curtains, i guess we were just unlucky). The king bed was just bad, worn out. It really needs to be replaced. Room service, pretty much every day around 4pm !!! Great timing ! ;-) Bottom line: Floridays is a good value for the price but its my opinion that the rooms are aging faster than they are being maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, accomodations for a good price”
Reviews.Author: MarilynM
Reviews.Content: My family loved this resort. The 3 bedroom suite was perfect for 4 adults and 2 children. It was clean and well decorated. The pool area was suitable for small children. My only complaint would be having another area for the older kids who like to play a little rougher. The poolside bar and food was well prepared and fairly priced. Location to all activities within reason, i.e. malls, Disney, Sea World. Would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: juny00605
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 days with our children and we can not be happier. Rooms were great and clean, Front desk was friendly and acomodating. next time we go to Orlando we definitely stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful place, close to attractions, poor service”
Reviews.Author: TravelingSchall
Reviews.Content: The hotel was beautiful, inside and out and was very close to many attractions in Orlando. We were pleasantly surprised when we saw how attractively decorated it was. The kitchen had everything we needed to cook a few meals during our stay. However, the service left much to be desired. There were six in our family and only two of our five days there did we receive enough wash cloths for everyone. We even called the service desk to remind them how many of us there were. They did send more that day, but then the following day we had NO wash cloths. Also, the detergent for the laundry/ dishes was only provided sporadically. We also were in the elevator with a staff member who made negative comments about other guests to us, which discouraged us from asking yet again for more wash cloths. The cleaning staff also moved our items and tucked them into places where they were not visible and almost left behind.

Reviews.Title: “Great family hotel with spacious appartments”
Reviews.Author: Fa-Vrydaghs-Moorkens
Reviews.Content: We selected this hotel to be close to Universal Studio's and Sea World and to have an accommodation where we would have the space and quietness to rest after a full day in the parks. The possibility to have your breakfast in your own kitchen, a dip in the pool on your return and space for every member of the family to do what you want was fantastic. We also liked the large choice of nearby shopping malls and outlet stores. Spacious and clean apartments and a large not to busy pool. The frequency and hours for the shuttle service to the parks can be better.

Reviews.Title: “floridays lived up to all its great reviews”
Reviews.Author: jbpaterson
Reviews.Content: great location,great rooms,great staff,great pool, Floridays has everything you need for a wonderful holiday

Reviews.Title: “The nicest place we have ever stayed.”
Reviews.Author: kimhirchert1
Reviews.Content: It is in a great location to many attractions. The I ride is very handy to transport back and forth. It was nice to have 2 pools and the view from our window was awesome. We would highly recommend it to anyone thinking about going to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “Roomy and Cost-Effective”
Reviews.Author: BedfordFalls
Reviews.Content: Our family of 6 (ages 70 to 6) stayed in a 2-BR suite for 7 days. The stackable washer and dryer was a real plus, and the beds were more comfortable than most hotel-type beds (I like mine a little on the soft side). We were very close to Sea World, Aquatica, and Discovery Cove ( that's a really amazing place). Housekeeping came daily to empty trash, change towels, make beds. I did not feel unsafe, even though our room door opened onto the parking lot (there was landscaping between us and the lot). We had plenty of room, and using the kitchen saved us a lot of money. Our kitchen was missing a couple of items, but housekeeping will bring them to you. Our only complaint - we were in Bldg F, which was nearly in a another zip code from the main pool. Try to get a room in Bldgs. A-C. If I could do that, I would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing in comfort.”
Reviews.Author: Gatorman11
Reviews.Content: The thing I always hated about hotels/resorts is they loose the home feeling. The rooms here have a very comforable feel to them, and nice layout. Makes you feel at home, away from home. The details they put into the rooms is phenomenal, from the granite counter tops to the flat screen tvs. House service was there in and out while I was at breakfast and kept things super tidy. We got to our rooms late and night and didnt see everything the resort had to offer. When I woke up the next morning and walked around I was amazed at the pool/lounge area. They had "shuttles" or personal taxis driving up and down the premsis it seemed at all hours of the day. This place is 1st class all the way.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: emilyrocker
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this resort several times and it's like none other that I've ever been to. The last 2 times I've stayed was with my friend and her 5 kids, what a great place to stay with your family! The pool area is amazing, there is even a section for kids, activities for the kids, a bar area for the adults, a game room for everyone, and plenty of room for all the guests. When we stay here, it's to utilize the property and all of it's amenities, we never venture off to the theme parks or anywhere else, I love the fact that this resort offers so many things, who would want to leave? The rooms, I've stayed in a 2 bedroom and 3 bedroom, both offer anything you could possibly need. You can tell the staff puts in thought and effort between each guest, everything is always so clean and refreshing. There are so many upgrades with the kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms, and fixtures...it's just an amazing place to stay and it allows you to feel completely relaxed and comfortable. Everyone on the property is so friendly, the housekeeping staff is amazing, they're always so friendly, they acknowledge all the guests and say hello or ask if we need anything - I don't remember the last place I stayed that even the housekeeping staff looked like they enjoyed their job and were actually interested in their guests. It was an overall fantastic stay and I look forward to my next visit in September.

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS”
Reviews.Author: Viviana7974
Reviews.Content: I Would recommend this resort to everyone. The resort was very clean and the staff was outstanding and on top of everything.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Resort!!”
Reviews.Author: Wifeydifey
Reviews.Content: Once again, Floridays did not disappoint! This "resort" (more like an apartment complex) is such a great find. It was our first time staying in a 2 bedroom and it's just as good as a 3 bedroom. The staff is excellent. Krystal at the front desk was so helpful and allowed us to check in just after 1pm when check in is actually 4pm. The place was fully booked and we still got in early. Gentry, the booking agent was extremely helpful and kind. Another fantastic experience with Floridays! We won't stay anywhere else!!

Reviews.Title: “It was a very nice resort and will stay there again.”
Reviews.Author: lptrujillo
Reviews.Content: Very clean and it fely like home away from home. I would recommed this hotel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: fraale18
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed this resort, on my next visit I will stay there again. The only thing that was not happy with, no wifi in the rooms only in certain areas.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Resort”
Reviews.Author: Marina1107
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Floriday Resort in Orlando the weekend of Father's Day. The staff at the Resort were very friendly and very accomodating. The three bedroom suites were very nice, and spacious my family and I could sat out on the balcony and had breakfast, it was very nice to sit back and relax, our balcony had a view of the pool, so it was very nice. I have recommended the Floriday Resort to many of my friends. The resort is centrally located to many attractions and restaurants and there is even a grocery store nearby so that you can stock the refrigerator if you are looking to eat in more than going out to restaurants. I highly recommend this resort. There is also a little water park for the kids. My nieces and nephews had a wonderful time at the pool and water park. Also my suite was impeccably clean. Kudos to the housekeeping staff.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding value for money with superb facilities”
Reviews.Author: Troy88
Reviews.Content: In a perfect location Floridays had everything you could want.

Reviews.Title: “WOW!!!”
Reviews.Author: Joey O
Reviews.Content: We arrived on July 18th and were immediately impressed with the facility. We had looked at one so called resort that had what appeared to be a great childres play area and pool. When we called they advised the room had two queen beds but NO refrigerator or microwave and was $20 dollars more a night than Floridays. We could not believe we got a two bedroom apartment with full kitchen with utensils/dishes/cookware. This place is very clean with a wonderful staff. My kids loved the pool which was very large and shaded perfectly. The mixologist there was wonderful and made sure everyone was satisfied with ther cocktails. My youngest wanted a coctail of course so the bartender made him a great mango smoothie (no alchol) of course. We were scheduled to leave on July 23rd but was able to stay and extra night. I needed that after chasing the kid thru Seaworld, Busch Gardens and Disney during the week. We will of course be returning and highly recommend Floridays Resort to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: Yorkshireman323
Reviews.Content: The hotel is situated on the quieter end of South International Drive and is ideally located for the parks which can be reached in about 15minutes depending on traffic. Due to the location we found having a car a great assest albeit not essential as the I Trolley stops right outside the main enterance and there is also a hotel bus which will transport you to the parks (you need to book via reception). The hotel rooms were first class and contained every thing we needed. There are two small swimming pools which the kids found great fun but will not be any use to a serious swimmer. The lay out of the main pool,bar area and shop come cafe meant you could watch the kids whilst enjoying a drink or something to eat. Like any hotel, prices were not cheap compared to local restaurants and the food menue was limited. During our two week stay we always felt safe and had no fear of letting the kids go to the pool on their own.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful! Clean! Luxurious! Family Friendly! GREAT VALUE!”
Reviews.Author: SugarmillMama
Reviews.Content: This place is just a few miles off the popular strip and is well worth it. For same money as a regular hotel room, we had our own sparkling clean condo with two bedrooms and two baths. King bed in one, two doubles in the other...so our two kids each had thier own bed. Full sized kitchen with granite counters, all dishes and cooking pans, utensils provided. Washer/dryer in the room & detergent provided! Need I say more? VERY family friendly and the pools are wonderful! 10 min drive to Universal and Disney....shuttles also provided but we did not need them. We noticed the rates are higher in the summer and holidays, like most hotels. We have stayed here multiple times and when the grandparents joined us, we had a 3-bedroom..same great experience. Did NOT have any noise at night. Comfortable and new.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accommodation.”
Reviews.Author: Howletts
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel twice in July, before and after a cruise. The unit was excellent, we were able to spread out, having two bathrooms is a huge bonus, as well as having clothes washing facilities in your room. Shuttle service to major theme parks is a bonus, although pick up times from Disneyworld Parks, wasn't that great, but we coped. Not anywhere convienent to eat at, but I-ride trolley goes past which takes you to suitable eating areas. We did eat at the marketplace in the hotel, but the menu is a bit limited, so unless you are happy to have the same thing over and over again, not a good option for a long stay. My son enjoyed going to the gym, it was well equipped for what he wanted to do. We didn't use the pools, being summer, there were too many people there, and we aren't big public pool goers.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays met our every expectation and more!!!”
Reviews.Author: love3boys
Reviews.Content: Loved the roomy 2 bedrooms, the jetted tub, the ample storage space, the washer & dryer, the 3 T.V.'s, and extras I wasn't expecting (detergent, dishwashing soap, etc.) We rented a car and were able to come at go at our leisure (car rental I say is a must!) The pool had extra entertainment on Sat/Sun for the kids. We stayed in building A (super close to the lobby, pool, exercise room, etc) Great pool bar! The grocery store (Publix) is less than 1/2 mile away. We were able to stock up the first night for the entire week (not super pricey but we didn't overbuy either; they have great Disney stuff there too) GREAT place to stay...we would definitely stay here again!!:) Small downsides....cooking pans were a bit old.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is a great family facility, close to all attractions”
Reviews.Author: haimish
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at Floridays and for our family of five we find it to be a great way to vacation. Close to all attractions with the comforts of home.

Reviews.Title: “Great resort, great service, great location”
Reviews.Author: Brwalton
Reviews.Content: Large, comfortable accommodations for a "home-away-from home" experience, with complete kitchen. Handy to SeaWorld and Universal, and quick hop to Disney parks.

Reviews.Title: “Family oriented resort”
Reviews.Author: DISNEYJUNKIES5
Reviews.Content: Great location! We were very comfortable at the resort. The amenities were good. We enjoyed the pool. The rooms were spacious and the beds were comfortable. We enjoyed going to the poolside bar. The staff were all very pleasant.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for families.”
Reviews.Author: PatNewton
Reviews.Content: Great place, very clean and centrally located. You will need a car because the shuttles run infrequently. My only complaint is housekeeping during the week we stayed only replaced towels and threw bed together. The beds were made with things still in them and they do not vacuum. We found out we were supposed to have a vacuum in the condo. Only one garbage bag was provided for seven people. I would go back but at least I would know what to expect.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay Here!”
Reviews.Author: ClintTheHint
Reviews.Content: The hotel was a disaaster from the start! We had booked a large suite and confirmed and reconfirmed a late check-in. Upon arrival, the manager had given our room away even though we arrived before our scheduled time. The only room available was small (my kids had to sleep on the floor), dirty, and missing all the light bulbs. They transfered us to our correct room type the next day but refused to refund us for their mistake the first night (not even for the difference and after many attempts). The manager was never on-site! At night the hotel was over-run by bus groups of teenagers each trying to be louder than the others. So don't hope to get much sleep here. Although not that old, it must have been cheaply made or abused because it already looks run down and not like the web site pictures.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT VALUE-GREAT STAFF-GREAT GET AWAY-GREAT PLACE-ALMOST LIKE HOME.”
Reviews.Author: Doug1963_10
Reviews.Content: This was almost like being at home, but on a vacation at the same time. The entire experence was well worth the ten [10] hour drive from North Carolina. I only wish that my family had more time to spend on our vacation to Orlando and the "Floridays Resort".

Reviews.Title: “2 Bedroom Suite - apartment looking hotel room - nice !”
Reviews.Author: jurena
Reviews.Content: The 2 bedroom suites w/ kitchen were very spacious, clean & very apt friendly (w/ a balcony facing the lake). Nice !!! Loved the fact that it had a jacuzzi in the master suite and a stand up shower - very spacious bathroom. I would definitely stay here again! The price was not bad either.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Property with a few changes could be Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Melissaob74
Reviews.Content: Just back from a 17 night stay in the Floridays, we had 19 people in our party made up of 4 families with ranging ages from 4 to 18 we had a great time could not really complain but having said that if they added a few amenities this place could be the Number 1 place to stay in Orlando. First off the accommodation is huge with loads of room and very clean. Pools are fantastic but i would agree with the last reviewer about the Sun Beds been a bit uncomfortable they are also made of steel so the arms get very hot in the heat so be careful when you hop on them out of the pool as you could get burned. The kids loved the Games room but it could have done with a Pool Table & maybe a Ping Pong Table to use during the day to get out of the heat in the afternoon for the adults and Teenagers among our group. There is Kids entertainment on weekends our kids took part in some of the Pool Games but been in the middle of Orlando there is plenty of entertainment on your doorstep so it is not a big loss during the week. There is also some music on Fridays & Sat nights in the Bar area. The Staff on site are excellent from the reception staff, bar staff to the Security especially mike who looked after us on our late nights/early mornings, they even brought us some Hot Dogs on the 4th of July well after the Bar had closed. The marketplace is good for a snack during the day and great for a early morning starbucks, we also had dinner there a couple of times and had no complaints. The property is located on the Doorstep to Seaworld and the Disney Parks both within 10 mins drive, Universal Parks are about 20 mins away. As per previous post the maid service is not that great we had asked for a full service of the condo half way through our visit but we had to ask for ours to be done twice as it was not done at all the 1st time, also the resort fee is a rip off as there is no clear explanation for what it is for we were told it was for taking out trash and clean towels but this is hit & miss as well as it is not always done. I think if the Floridays want to be Number 1 in Orlando they need to get rid of this fee or give the visitor something for their money. Having said all of the above we will definitely be going back as the Pros far out way the cons, and hopefully some of the comments above will be acted upon for our next visit. :)

Reviews.Title: “Great stays at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: Iain00
Reviews.Content: My wife and I travelled to Floridays on 3rd June from the UK with our 5 year old son. While we are frequent visitors to the US and Florida this was my son's first trip to the theme parks and we could not have picked a better location. A 15minute drive in one direction was all the disney parks and 20 minutes the other way was Universal and with Seaworld/Aquatica/Discovery Cove less than 2 miles away. My son doesn't do heat so after a dy in the parks he loved spending a couple of hours cooling off at the child friendly pool.
