Whilst the hotel is mainly geared to families there is a smaller quieter pool where those without kids who want some peace without the usual screaming that accompanies small children will find ideal!! The main feature (and heaven with a fussy eating 5 year old in tow) are the rooms. Equipped with a fridge, freezer, cooker, microwave, dishwasher and washer/dryer it was a home from home. We found eating out a problem with a tired child so we often got take out and re-heated or cooked something which is not normally what we would do on holiday but with the facilities available it was an easy choice. There was a Publix just arounf the block. Across from Publix was Prime Outlet Mall, Outback Steakhouse and McDonalds. (a word on McD's - the service was awful - so much for fast food. Not!!!!) All the staff at Floridays were helpful and the room was serviced daily with towels changed daily (Bedding was only changed weekly although I believe this can be done more regularly at an additional cost). The daily 'resort fee' was a bit steep when you consider that the cost of staying here isnt that cheap but that was just a small quibble. But for a 2 bedroom apartment with facilities it was still good value. While there is no restaurant there is a small cafe where food can be served at the pool and they stock some essentials like milk etc as well as serving Starbucks coffee. The hotel is comprised of 6 blocks but a word of warning, there are plans to build 2 more blocks so check if the building work has started and what disruption this may cause (hopefully not too much because it will be away from the pool area so perhaps best to aim for blockas A or B if poss (on an upper floor) which should be furthest away from the planned work. All in all a good trip and a resort destination i would thoroughly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “This pool is perfect for all ages”
Reviews.Author: reg34
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Floridays for two years in a row. The value of this hotel is fantastic. The pool is great for all aged kids. It's very close to Sea World, Aquatica, and Discovery Cove. It's only 2 minutes from Premium Outlets and about 10 from Prime Outlets. We love this hotel!!

Reviews.Title: “nice resort,shame about the rooms !”
Reviews.Author: Bplus4
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this resort for 3 weeks in june and july.I had researched it on a couple of sites prior to booking it. On arrival ,reception area looked the part, then I got to the room ! Very dissapointed with the old kitchen units.worn furniture in lounge and dining area,carpet looked like it could do with a good scrub. The bedrooms and bathrooms were a bit better,had the added bonus of some half eaten,food left in a cuprd,a sweaty t-shirt behind the sofa and a pair of socks in the bedroom drawer.made me think that the rooms MAY have been given the quick once over ! Another thing that concerned me as I had young children in my party,was the lack of security in the complex.you can drive or walk in completley unchallanged to any part of the complex. You will probably find that you have pizza flyers rammed under your door at all times of the evening by different companies who have full access to any block they wish. We also had someone trying to get the door open to our flat at 1.30 am which was concerning to my kids,as it woke us up. I had read a few good reviews about the rooms,on this site,but I can only presume that the good reviews have come from people who have had rooms in one of the newer blocks,either that or their previous accommodation was of a lower standard and Floridays seemed good compared to where they stayed before. I spoke to a few people at the pool area whom stayed in blocks A and B,we were in D,and they said that their rooms were the same,tired with worn furniture. Any way after the first week the maids gave the place a decent clean and changed all the bedding so it felt a bit cleaner at least. The pool and bar area was good ,cafe was fine,games room for the children was ok. I agree with previous comments that there are not enough beds for the busy periods an the broken ones should be replaced,good to see the berrys from the palm trees being removed as they just got trodden into the area around the pool an made it look tatty. VERY impressed with the pool entertainment,'DJ Chris', kept the kids busy for a couple of hours ,gave us parents some time to relax. I think that it may be an idea to let guests know whats on during the stay.We only found out about DJ Chris as we happened to be at the pool that day. Seemingly there were other things on like massages , scuba diving lessons,entertainment at the bar,happy hour but it seemed to be 'top secret' ! We found staff to be mostly friendly,we couldn't get a late check out, but they stored our luggage for us for a few hours. I would probably return to Floridays due to its location to the parks,plus the pools good for the kids and it is handy having a cafe an bar onsite. However I would be calling to make sure that I could get a newer or refurbished room before I booked. The receptionist was saying that they are planning to build phase two of this complex,I think the money would be better spent on upgrading phase 1.This resort has great potential providing they stop it falling into disrepair.

Reviews.Title: “exceeded my expectations, very happy”
Reviews.Author: pool63
Reviews.Content: his was well above what I expected in many aspects. The room was perfect for my family size, the service was excellent and the pool and anemities were very good for the kids. We all had a wonderful time!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Room Size”
Reviews.Author: Kimmo1229
Reviews.Content: we stayed at this hotel for 5 days, the 3bdrm suite was perfect for us, both of my teenagers had their own room and bath which was a plus, everyone had their space even though we weren't in our room that much. My only issue was that we were housed in the last building on the premises with view of the next hotel's parking lot and laundry building, we had to drive to go to the main pool too far to walk, staff was very pleasant and everyone went out of their way to help you with any issues you had. I would definitely stay there again but not in July (way too hot)

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: mother060
Reviews.Content: We took our first trip to Florida and chose Floridays because of the great reviews. We were not disapointed and the hotel lived up to everthing promised. It is located close to Seaworld and Disney world. We could actually see the fireworks from both at night from our hotel balcony. When we got to the hotel, 2 of our TVs did not work. I called the front desk and they sent security up immediately to check out the problem. They ended up having to replace both TVs but did so promptly! The space is wonderful. We had a 2 bedroom suite and traveled with our 12 and 19 year old daughters. Each child had a separate double bed in the second bedroom which was great. The master was wonderful with a great master bathroom. Beds very comfortable! There is a washer and dryer located in the suite which is wonderful so you don't have to go home with loads of dirty clothes. We purchased groceries at a close by market and made breakfast each morning which saved on eating out. The kitchen had everything needed to do the cooking. Pools are nice and stay open late so kids could swim after a busy day on the town. If we decide to go back for Florida, we would be sure to stay in this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Another return visit,still very good but standards slipping in some areas”
Reviews.Author: DavidEagle
Reviews.Content: Still a good choice,spacious well located accomodation.Efficient and pleasant front desk staff.Lovely swimming pool, quite clean but not as pristine as previous visits,also a few broken sunbeds and not enough of them during busy periods and a shortage of parasols.Beds not as comfortable as previous visits but did notice some new ones being delivered on day of departure,hope they are good ones and part of an ongoing renewal programme.A few kitchen utensils missing but dealt with promptly and courteously.Palm cafe and Marketplace definitely not as good in variety and service as previous.Would still recommend but do feel management need to get to grips with above mentioned to keep this resort as a popular desired return destination as it has so many pluses for familys and some very good staff.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay”
Reviews.Author: Luzh6344
Reviews.Content: Very Comfy snd clean hotel.Would definately go back and recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for visiting Orlando”
Reviews.Author: cruiseman62
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Floridays for 3 weeks and enjoyed every minute. However, the resort fee is a con, and when pressed, even the receptionist found it difficult to justify. Daily housekeeping is hit and miss, appears you have to book with resort directly to guarantee it. But if you stand your ground you can persuade them to throw daily maid service in, other wise can cost $30/day, ouch!

Reviews.Title: “fantastic living arrangements ever.....”
Reviews.Author: tmadison45
Reviews.Content: The most impressive stay away from home I've ever had. Everything was provided and clean. The customer service was great. They showed real concern for my comfortability. I would recommend all my friends to this resort. I will come back again for the great service!!!

Reviews.Title: “Bad customer service....Place needs attention...Front desk staff friendy”
Reviews.Author: noexcuses1
Reviews.Content: Won't stay in future unless they start maintaining the place

Reviews.Title: “"Not Bad At All"”
Reviews.Author: Yoda49673
Reviews.Content: We had a 5 night stay at Floriday's Resort. After checking in and going up to the room we noticed two deficiencies in the room. The door handle was falling apart on the bathroom door and the chain lock for the entrance door was separating from the door. I contacted the front desk and they sent the engineer up to the room within ten (10) minutes. Two consecutive nights we had to wait for wash cloths with the first occurrence taking four (4) hours for housekeeping to bring them. The furniture is old and needs to be replaced. Other than the above, the stay, food, pool, staff, etc was great. There were very attentive to our request and needs.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: beirish
Reviews.Content: We had a 3 bedroom condo in Building B with Balcony overlooking the pool. Very close to shopping, Disney, SeaWorld and Aquatica. Great pool and snack shop. Very clean and lots of room for large family.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous location for excitement and fun at the theme parks!”
Reviews.Author: familyman614
Reviews.Content: Centrally located for restaurants, theme parks, shopping and just about anything else for family fun! Hotel accomodates early check-ins and staff is friendly and knowledgeable for all your needs. Rooms are clean and are a wonderful value for the price! Pool is big, inviting,and well maintained. Overall experience was great and we hope to return annually!

Reviews.Title: “EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED!!”
Reviews.Author: rowens08
Reviews.Content: The furniture was to large for the rooms and broken down. It was not comfortable to just hang out in this room. The noises from the parking lot and areas can be heard at night. There was several people in the pool loud at 1 am. Pool to small for the number of guests in the main area!!! The staff was friendly but if you have girls traveling take hair conditioner none in rooms. They leave you exactly 1 towel per person per room. There isn't anything in the small showers to sit your razor, wash rag on (hang it over the door) or your shampoos/conditioners. Keep shopping there are way too many resorts in Orlando. The main road you exit to get to main theme parks in Orlando always backed up take a back way if you do stary there good luck.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Floridays!”
Reviews.Author: alexandria93
Reviews.Content: Accommodations were wonderful, clean and has everything you would need. Home away from home. Pool area was awesome stay there all day! loved the availabilty of the pool bar, starbucks and food.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed my stay in 2007, however not satisfied in 2010.”
Reviews.Author: carrie0923
Reviews.Content: I was not at all satisfied with my stay this April 26-30, 2010. The pool water in 2007 was warm, this year very cold. Housekeeping was poor, the lights outside in our courtyard did not work our entire stay, even after we complained to the front desk every day and they told us they were sending an "engineer "over to look at it. In 2007 we took some really nice pictures in the courtyard and the lights made them so much better, this year, with no lights we were unable to take any pictures. My family and I were very happy to return to Floridays when we planned our trip in 2010 seeing as we were very satisfied with our stay in 2007. I have to say that I would not return to Floridays on our next visit. The price we paid for our stay and how our concerns were ignored was very upsetting to all of us.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful resort with spacious suites!”
Reviews.Author: Kjethom
Reviews.Content: Love everything about this resort, except shuttle service to Disney parks. 3 departures times to parks, but only one pick up time---with pick up only at one location (epcot). Shuttle service is not complimentary---fees charged per person per day. We used cab service.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel met all of my expectations”
Reviews.Author: MGibbons09
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this resort for 5 days and 4 nights and I was absolutely blown away. I was not expecting it to be this nice for the price. Disney world, sea world, outlets and resturants was within a short distance of the resort. The pool stayed open until 11 i believe. That gave us enough time at night to visit the pool after touring Orlando. I was able to cook for my family and eat at the dining room table as well. We all spent family time in the living room before we went to our rooms. It was very convinent to hace 2 bathrooms because it didnt take as much time to get ready in the morning. If I ever travel back to Orlando I wouldnt even have to search for a place to stay because I would most definetly make my reservations at Floriday Orlando Resort. Great Staff by the way :)

Reviews.Title: “Perfect, SPACIOUS, resort! Home away from home (only nicer!)”
Reviews.Author: 2teachers2kids1dog
Reviews.Content: Fabulous resort! Kids LOVED the pool, Hubby and I enjoyed relaxing and watching them! Bathroom whirlpool was AMAZING! Family style breakfast was amazing--too much food to possibly eat. (lasted our 2 day stay) Game room was very reasonably priced, my 11 year old loved it! I loved every aspect of our stay and would NOT hesitate to recommend this resort to others. We are planning to come back next summer for a longer stay. The full sized kitcheen and washer and dryer in the room made it so convenient. After a night at the nick hotel, this was SUCH a relief!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Resort, comfort, value”
Reviews.Author: jolacklin
Reviews.Content: Floridays is an excellent resort. After checking out of another hotel in a rush, we were able to find a two bedroom suit at Floridays. I believe this is a deluxe suite. Full modern kitchen equipped with every single item you need for your cooking needs. From a full stove with oven to a cake mixer, everything was there. Dining area was great and perfect for my family of 5. Bedrooms were excellent, we had a King size bed and our own bathroom with shower and jacuzzi, all neat and very well kept. The kids stayed in a two queen or full beds. Had an extra bathroom with bathtub and shower. Washer and dryer all working well. TVs in all rooms and plasma with great visual quality in the living room. Housekeeping will come and touch up and refresh our rooms and bathrooms everyday. Excellent in all aspects. My only complaint is that the main pool is a bit small, also the water is always cold. We did not spend much time there though. We stayed a whole week and only tried it one day. The rest of the time we spent at our friends pool who stayed across from us. Recommend it specially if you have kids and want to save some $ in meals cooking breakfast and lunch and probably eating out for dinner. Because the comfort is like being home but better!! :-)

Reviews.Title: “hotel great, #236 dollar bill at end 4 services not used, disgracefull”
Reviews.Author: gary2490
Reviews.Content: 1 and only tip ask travel agent before u go about service charge at the end of your stay, it can be quite staggering. pp, tell them u paid cash, dont give them your card details, now c if they can get it out of u

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice”
Reviews.Author: righteye
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Floridays the second and third week in June and loved every minute. We were located in block C over looking a lake with a fountain it was a lovely view. The suites were spacious and clean and the beds were comfortable. The kitchen and washing facilities were great. It was good to have your own space to come back to after a day in the parks we often had a glass of wine and some snacks and watched one of the three t.v.'s in the suite! We drove to many of the local restaurants which only took around 5 - 10 minutes and can recommend the Out Back Steak House! There is a huge outlet mall near by with loads of big name shops, we especially loved the prices in Gap! We used the Publix supermarket quite a lot, we bought loads of groceries to go in the huge fridge/freezer in the suite. The front desk staff were exceptionally helpful and knowledgeable, this can not be said of the concierge staff, who we found to be seriously lacking in local knowledge, we found if you wanted to know where something is i.e a local Pizza Hut you are better off asking other holiday makers, they know so much more. They only moan we would have and this is not Floridays fault at all but Thompsons, our suite was not cleaned at all during our stay. We had clean towels every day and the bins were emptied but when i questioned what we should expect from housekeeping i was told that Thompsons only pay for the basic, we were not told this at any point during booking or was it on any paper work so be aware that you may have to clean your toilet yourself! That said there is a vacuum cleaner in the suite if you want to have a tidy up yourself. We also found that we had no forks in our cutlery set or a frying pan ( for the lovely turkey bacon) no sooner had I asked at the front desk than they arived at the suite. We only used the pool a couple of times, the water was heated and the free use of towels was handy. Also we had free internet in the suite which was real bonus as my husband was more or less able to keep in touch with what was happening at work, so there was no nasty suprises when we got home! most days we were left a coulpe of Starbucks coffee packs by houskeeping as well as little boxes of Tide for your washing and soap for the dishwasher. This was our first trip to Florida, we were so glad we chose Floridays it was just perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Recommend to First Time Travellers to Florida!”
Reviews.Author: traveljunkie403
Reviews.Content: Our family had a wonderful stay at Floridays! Our first choice was because of price and the rating from TripAdvisor! We travelled to Orlando (May 24 - June 2) and it was a wonderful experience. I am Canadian - where ever I stay when I travel, I am pretty much pleased so it doesnt take a lot to impress me! Floridays is the best place to stay for families. Our 3 kids loved the fact that we can stay in the pool until 11pm to cool down at night. Access to grocery store is a short stroll away and will save you tons of $$ if you use the kitchen in your suite! Eat breakfast at home and then head out to the parks. Do reserve your shuttles the night before to guarantee a seat. But do make sure you are at least 10 mins early prior to the shuttle's departure. They usually arrive early and will NOT wait even if you are on the reservation list. If you rent a car for a couple of days (like we did) Cocoa Beach is only about 45 mins away...dont forget change for the toll booths! Do note that there is a ATM machine in the lobby but it only dispenses $200 at a time, plus ATM charges apply. If you need to withdraw $$ try going to a bank where you will get various dominations other that -- we found ourselves looking for bank where we wouldn't be charged an arm and a leg in bank fees + conversion on currency. For those Canadians...there is a RBC Bank in Orlando and in Cocoa Beach...that was nice...I didnt get charged too much for banking fees just the conversion on the currency rate. The only down side was room service was sooo pricey! So I do recommend just eating in and making your meals in your room. If you use the Lynx buses and IRide Trolly that is more beneficial if you like to just stay along International Drive. Do not recommend using this to go to SeaWorld or the Disney Parks...the buses take forever! Just use the shuttle at Floridays for the parks! We absolutely loved our stay at Floridays! Our vacation was a memorable one and will be back soon! :)

Reviews.Title: “Second Stay just as memorable as 1st!”
Reviews.Author: woffer73
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at Floridays Orlando resort, and it was just faultless, from the moment we checked in, we were greeted with the warmest of welcomes, and felt instantly at Home. Our initial room request unfortunately could not be met, but we were assured that the very next day, we would be allocated the Room of our choice, and it was so. The very next morning, i received a call from front desk stating that our new room was ready, and that a Bellman was on his way to help with our luggage and to transport us to our new building. What we didn't know, until entering our Suite in Building C, was that we had been upgrade to a 3-bedroomed Suite, which was just fantastic! The Suites, were just as we'd remembered- spotlessly clean, spacious, and replete with every conceivable device for that "Home from Home" experience. The main Pool, which lies between Blocks A and B was wonderful- just the right water temperature, and our 5-year-old Son loved the water features by the zero entry. Everyone we dealt with was extremely courteous and helpful, making us feel like treasured Guests- really quite humbling. This is far and away the best accommodation in Orlando that we have ever stayed at, and i'm already in the process of booking our 3rd Stay for next year. Special thanks must go to Crystal ( sorry if spelling is incorrect) for helping us on numerous occasions- you really stood out from an already outstanding crowd, and your level of customer service was incredible. We Can't wait for our 3rd visit!

Reviews.Title: “Great, and a lovely place for families.”
Reviews.Author: ctesh
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at Floridays Resort. The Staff was very generious and great Customer Service. I loved the 2 bedroom, 2 bath suite. The prices was also great. We are deff. coming back to Floridays again.

Reviews.Title: “Real Deal”
Reviews.Author: LGlinzman
Reviews.Content: We had a two bedroom 2 bath apartment with EVERYTHING included. We just broguht clothes and food. Pool was nice and it was 3 minutes from Seaworld and 5 to 10 minutes from the other parks. Good service, nice cafe for snacks and hospitable staff all around.

Reviews.Title: “Family time”
Reviews.Author: AbbyWoburn
Reviews.Content: We went to this place last November with my nephews and sister. We had a wonderful time. The place is roomy with kitchen, 2 bedroom and a beautiful pool. It was truely family time together. We loved this place.

Reviews.Title: “hotel and personnel were friendly and clean”
Reviews.Author: sobbell
Reviews.Content: Everything about the hotel was great, from the minute we walked in to the time we left everyone was friendly and smiling. the rooms and the grounds were all kept very clean. I would definately recommend this resort to anyone wanting to stay in the Orlando area. one nice thing about this resort it is not on top of all the others and it is not in a busy area, it is quiet in this part of international drive.

Reviews.Title: “Home from Home”
Reviews.Author: Travenuff
Reviews.Content: I spent a two week holiday at floridays, a very ejoyable two weks the apartment had lots of space even with 5 teenagers in. the location was great as we did not hire a car we used the Iride and we were able to get arond really well. the kids loved it cause it meant they could go off and do their thing on their own. the hotel had free transportation to all the major parks, the only draw back there is that we were unable to stay at parks to late in the evening to enjoy the firework displays. The head concierge Jim Hassen was just the best he was so helpful and very imformative abot the attractions and the area. He along with the other staff member made my holiday so relaxing and stress free. I would recommend this resort to anyone who is looking for a home from home vacation in orlando specially if you want to get away from the driving. Once again thanks Jim.

Reviews.Title: “Over rated overall- Good Service”
Reviews.Author: Newfoundland_10
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research to find a good hotel/condo and this one seemed to be very popular. After staying @ Vista Cay & Windsor Hills I have to say I was not overly impressed. PROS- Service was super. We had a few issues i.e patio door would not lock, trouble with in room safe and staff responded within minutes. The room was alos very clean.CONS: The rooms are not well lit and the furniture is worn. It shows it age. There is not much sound proofing in the walls. Pizza brochures were constantly being placed under our door. I would definitely go back to Vista Cay (gated community)the next time as we really don't care about maid service. I prefer to have a more modern facility without a bar on site. There was a lot of alcohol present at both pools and many smokers.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel is nice, but service was GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: KimA310
Reviews.Content: After a busy business trip in the Orlando area, I was looking for some R&R at the Floridays for a mini-vacation with the family. We've stayed at the Floridays several times before and keep coming back. The decor, pool, location, value, and service has always been nice. This trip in particular stood out over all the other time, specifically due to one front desk employee. Elizabeth, or Liz, was super helpful and extremely pleasant. She assisted me with a credit card issue I had at check-in, politiely answered all of our calls for guest services, and when I asked if we could get a late check-out she politely said yes and offered an even later check-out for no additional charge. With employees like Liz, the Floridays has my continued patronage. Thanks Liz.

Reviews.Title: “good experience”
Reviews.Author: grandof4
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very nice...plenty of room...could have more shuttles to sites...only two in morning and two in evening....recommend reserving a day ahead to get on bus

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and enjoyable”
Reviews.Author: nellaro
Reviews.Content: We just returned from 5 nights at Floridays. Our family of four (2 adults, 2 children ages 17 and 22) were very impressed with this resort. Upon arrival we found our condo had been upgraded to 3 bedrooms instead of 2 which was a treat for our two daughters. The accomodations were extremely clean and up-to-date with granite counters, ceramic tiled bathrooms and attractive furnishings. We all thought the beds were very comfortable. We ate twice at the onsite cafe. The burgers and Ceasar chicken wraps were great! The hotel has a complimentary shuttle to Universal and Seaworld however there are limited departure and pick-up times available each day so you have to plan around that. Reservations are required in advance. The computer was down one day and by the time we got a chance to reserve spots, there were none left so we had to get a cab. Cab fare to Seaworld was $12 and $22 to Universal. We stayed in Bldg. F which was the farthest away from the guest service bulilding (shuttle pick-up) and the large pool. They did however offer us a cart ride anytime we requested it. You may want to request a closer buliding. We thoroughly enjoyed Seaworld and Discovery Cove. Universal Studios was like a ghost town because everyone was over at IOA for Harry Potter. We eventually braved the crowds and got into WWoHP a couple of days later and waited for 2 1/2 hours to get into Hogwarts but the ride made it worth it!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Quiet Place”
Reviews.Author: gerrigirl
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed staying at Floridays in June and were happy with our stay. The rooms were nice and comfortable. We had a two-bedroom, two-bath condo. The oversized jacuzzi was especially nice after a day in the parks. Everything was well maintained and beautiful. The only negative thing I could say was that after four days, we had to ask for fresh towels as housekeeping never provided them. Other than that, everything was great.

Reviews.Title: “This is simply the best hotel stay I have ever had!”
Reviews.Author: byronjett
Reviews.Content: This is a top knotch, state of the art, hotel with quailty service that exceeds a guests' expectations. My family and I enjoyed the hospatility from all departments including (housekeeping). We will definately be back before the year is over.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays Home from Home”
Reviews.Author: KazandtheGang
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from our stay in Floridays Resort Orlando, where we had a 3 bedroom suite, As a family with different ageed chidren, 14,9,8 and 1 it was perfect! We had so much space and all creature comforts we could need, a fully equipped kitchen, in room washing facilties which are much needed with the children, The master bedroom has a lovely jacuzzi in the ensuite,The children also had a bathroom to themselmes. We have been to Orlando every year and have tried out countless resorts and hotels but this has become a firm favourite for the last 4 years. This time we brought along with us some other family members who were so delighted and impressed with Floridays they are already planning their next vacation, and have said they wouldn't stay anywhere else. The children love the pool which unlike some resorts is never over crowded, there is a sand area for the little ones. The hotel has a pool bar with weekend evening entertaiment. The Flordays experience is truly a lovely holiday with the option of filling your fridge and cooking breakfast or eating in occaisionally for those who may not want to spend a fortune every night at restaurants. The kids love it so do we so its happy families all around and Floridays really awesome.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: mominflorida
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, great prices, nice pool. Kids loved it. Very clean, good service.

Reviews.Title: “Great place! Great people!”
Reviews.Author: miayoung
Reviews.Content: First i loved the view from the 5th floor. The entire hotel area is so tranquil and scenic. The staff was accommodating and very polite. Especially the security man who gave us his parking space! :-) All in all it was a relaxing weekend. I will bring my family the next time.

Reviews.Title: “An excellent base to explore everything Orlando has to offer”
Reviews.Author: EdnFamily
Reviews.Content: Its more or less already been said. This is a great place to base your holiday whether you are doing Disney or Universal or both. If you've already booked the hotel then you should be pleased as you are going to be happy. Beware of service charge but if you've studied tripadvisor you'll be ready for this as I was. You are probably going to need a car, there is shuttle services to Disney (Epcot, then use Disney bus or monorail) and I-ride will get you to Seaworld, Universal etc. but you dont have the same flexibility as you do with a car If I had a criticism then it would be that the bar closes before the pool frequently. So you come back from a full day out, the kids want to get in the pool (open officially until 10 pm but often much later) which is fine but you can't get a drink for yourself. Another issue is that a cull of Cuban Frogs which are actually pests is desperately needed. As I said all the superlatives have already been used. I will certainly return.

Reviews.Title: “Great resort but.”
Reviews.Author: gettingthere-7
Reviews.Content: We are in floridays at moment,it is a great resort,we checked in ten days ago,staying for 21,we booked with alpharooms,we are paying a resort fee on top of what we paid,on our kitchen island it states that beds are made every day,however that has not happened,i asked last night and recieved an apology and was told it would be sorted,we left at 8am this morning ,got back at 10pm,again beds were no made,went to lobby,and was told because we booked with alpharooms our beds would not be made,if that is the case why were we not told that on day one?

Reviews.Title: “WORTH the BUCK!!!”
Reviews.Author: mommameadows
Reviews.Content: Traveled to Florida by plane. Had 5 kids in tow with the hubby. We rented a mini van and headed to the resort. NO problem finding it. It was very nice to look at and then I found that we had been placed in the back. I asked for a closer building to pool and was obliged. I then settled the family in to building B. I found the grocery store less than a block away. I drove there got the groceries, came back and started dinner. Needed a baking sheet and all I had to do was call the front desk and the cookie sheets arrived FAST. I then just fell in love with the place. We spent the next day lounging by the pool and the kids had a blast! The teens enjoyed the hot tub and the workout room. I liked the fact that everything was so clean and neat. I loved the concierge, Nilda. She helped us plan a great trip to all the theme parks and the shuttle came to take us and return us to the resort. WE had to use the van VERY little. All thanks to the Fabulous Floridays Resort!! The kids enjoyed the stay, we adult enjoyed our stay and we are telling all our friends and family about this awesome Resort. Staff, resort grounds, pools, and suites are beyond great. WORTH the BUCK and WORTH another VACATION STAY!!!! Highly RECOMMEND this Resort for a great vacation spot.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous! Friendly! Clean! Convienent!”
Reviews.Author: Pedeypie
Reviews.Content: This was a great resort! We stayed for 5 nights for our 3 kids (ages 10, 8 and 8). We had plenty of space for everyone and everything. The pool area was great and the kids swam every night. The kitchen was wonderful with plenty of dishes for a family of 5 or more. The location was great with a super grocery store a couple miles away (Publix) where we bought a lot of souvenoirs (rather than paying Disney prices). There is an extra $12.95 charge per day that we weren't aware of but it was worth it! And i wish the kitchen had a pizza cutter since we made most of our own meals.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice and spacious for families”
Reviews.Author: cdmallar
Reviews.Content: I am flight attendant and spend alot of time in alot of hotels. Pros----This one is great for families. If you have children...perfect. It is clean, nicely furnished and spacious. Wonderful kitchen that allows you to save money on eating out. Overall nice accomations. This was my second time staying there. Cons- Keep in mind when you get your "rate" , that there will be a Resort Fee added that is about $11.30 a day...Resort Tax added...and then Sales tax. Your rate might end up seeming alittle bit different than expected. Second, my kids..esp. my 8 year old said the pool was dirty..water cloudy and she couldnt see underwater very good with her googles. I just told her it was all the sunscreen probably...who knows. I didnt want to go in though.. Also, I was alittle disappointed with the customer service aspect. Our first night there, we put our children to bed..then went into master bedroom and shut the door. The door would not open when we wanted to leave. The handle didnt work. The door would not budge...we tried and tried. We could have busted down the door...but we called front desk and asked for assistance. It took almost 2 hours and 4 phone calls to get help. If our children had needed something...had there been a fire it was have been a disaster!!!....At first it was very funny, but after 2 hours waiting for help, it wasnt anymore. Everytime we called the front desk and different person answered and said they would send someone right away..right away.... 2 hours!!! Well, after that...I thought...maybe, just maybe a manager or somone would have said "sorry the inconvience" or.."sorry for the trouble"..nothing. Nothing. We should have broken down the door I guess. The maintenance man that "freed" us said they had been fixing door handles in various rooms and must not have done this one properly. I just wanted a sorry....Nothing. Would I stay here again...for the right rate....

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointed with our return visit...”
Reviews.Author: hellsbells42
Reviews.Content: Had an enjoyable visit last year but I was Very disappointed with our return visit: -Lost booking when checking in - Therefore lost building request (ok I knew this couldnt be guaranteed) ended up in block E the furthest away,was advised they couldnt move us closer to the facilities as the hotel was full. -Had some great nights at the bar last April 2009, this time (May) even though the hotel was full it closed by 10pm - The one night we caught it open at 9.45pm, about 10 other people joined us once they saw it was actually open past 10pm - Why close a bar early when the hotel is full ? -If only they had spent more on furnishings - Another year older, another year of wear & tear - cheap uncomfy beds -No sign of the waterpark -If only they cleaned the apartments daily maybe the maid would have found the chewing gum stuck to the drawers in my sisters bedroom - felt grubby -I left a small bag of brand new face products in the bathroom under the sink, I called the hotel - the maid had not handed it in to Lost & Found which sums it up really -Emailed the hotel regarding my disappointment of my products not being handed in, to be advised that expensive items should be stored in the safe? Erm who keeps face cream in the safe plus dont people empty the safe when leaving ...either way I didnt get my stuff back. This place could be great but its like nobody is willing to spend the money on the upkeep, cleaning, security, furnishings etc so it doesnt surprise me it has dropped from 3rd to 8th on Tripadvisor. The one plus point - the staff were lovely! I gave this place a great review last year - I shall not be returning for a 3rd visit!

Reviews.Title: “fantastic hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: lovelyjubbly88
Reviews.Content: had our family holiday here july 2009, fantastic hotel close to all the parks and its in the nicer area of I Drive,they provide transport from hotel and will pick you back up so no need to drive if you dont want to. staff all very friendly and couldnt do enough for you, rooms were cleaned every other day, fresh towels every day if you need them,just ask the maids ( leave a tip,) rooms were extremly spacious and very comfy,great bathrooms very clean and rooms fully air contioned. very quiet in the evening, we were top floor i wouldnt recommend a ground floor room as the pool is open gone ten pm in the evening and can be noisy if you want an early night. pool area lovely and never crowded towels provided and never short of sun beds no matter what time of day you go, pool warm, nice area for the kids. pool bar serves food all day, pizza chicken burgers etc little pricey but lovely. little mimi market which provide brekie and bottled water,milk etc wouldnt recommend spending an evening by the pool bar as drinks are really expensive,and they dont provide entertainment much cheaper to buy your own from the supermarket and order a takeout to your door! shops and mall close by, within walking distance,pharmacey close by and very helpful. if you like japanese foood try the resturant right next to the hotel,its a great night very entertaining where the chef cooks infront of your table! theres also a steak house by the supermarket which was lovely. would definatly visit here again had a fantastic holiday! only complaint i had is i wouldnt go again in july very very hot and humid and heavy rain and thunder storms nearly every day in the afternoon.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location for all The Parks, great accomodation,good pool”
Reviews.Author: SBow012
Reviews.Content: Got back early Monday from two weeks at Floridays with kids aged 8 & 10 & friends with 4,9 & 11. You wont get better location in my opinion if its your first time in Orlando & you plan to visit as many as parks etc as possible. In a nice quiet part of I drive but with a super market,Premium Mall & other shops 5 mins walk(yes walk). Disney Parks 10 minutes in Car - straighforward drive, SeaWorld 5 minutes , Universal 15. And a bit of action -shops,Bars,Restaurants on I Drive 10 mins in car. Hotel is just what you need - clean,tidy, Great Pool, small shop (Milk /OJ/Water/Coffee etc) -small bar serving pizzas etc nice ,but a bit pricey. We had a two bed apartment whcih was very roomy -(BEAR IN MIND ITS NOT REALLY A HOTEL,BUT A GROUPING OF CONDOS/TIME SHARE APARTMENTS -HENCE THE SIZE/QUALITY OF THE ROOMS)two bathrooms 3 TV's!, good kitchen area . Very impressed. Staff at the Hotel were superb - Concierge & front desk staff very helpful,knowlegwable & obliging. From booking taxis to arranging bookings etc. Nothing too much trouble. As a high quality,comfortable base for you & the kids to unwind after a day at the parks its superb. A good measure as well in our opinion - when we went we appeared to be only one of four/five UK families staying - rest American families. Wonderful place & great quality .

Reviews.Title: “Best place I ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: RJL40
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed from May 12 thru the 22, 2010. We found the people at the front desk to be very accommodating. Louis placed us in building C 4th floor. It was perfect. The room suited the four of us and all were in agreement that we would be back in 2111. (Hopefully to our same unit) The rooms were very well decorated and the kitchen very well equipped. This facility is in a great location and the pools were just wonderful. The hotel provided plenty of pool towels and there are many lonuge chairs, getting one was never a problem. Anything you called and asked for was provided usually within 10 minutes. Great service. We liked everything about the resort, it exceeded our expectations. The one little suggestion I would ask the hotel to consider is to provide some of the pool noodles. They are great to float with, do not take up much room and are very inexpensive. jlamb@spstech.com 215-572-3043 work

Reviews.Title: “More than I expected”
Reviews.Author: jn_mccormick
Reviews.Content: We booked independantly for our trip to Florida and found it quite difficult to get a two bedroom suite on International drive that wasn't a fortune. Most hotels offered family rooms but with two children under 9 years old we wanted aa apartment with two bedrooms. The room we got was great, decor maybe sligtly dated but it had everything we needed and more. It boasted 2 bedrooms, kitchen, 2 bathrooms, living area and a balcony. It also had free internet access!!! (with your own computer). There were 3 curtousy buses every morning and evening taking you to and from Epcot. These had to be booked the day before but worked out the best way for us to travel. It took about 15 minutes to get you to Epcot and from there you could take the Disney transportation for free to any of the other parks. Parking can be expensive at the parks approx $10-$15 a day which fairly ads up as an extra cost on your holiday. The market place shop at the hotel was pretty useless and very expensive but about 10 minutes walk away is a Publix super market (stop 41 on the i-ride trolley) and it was great. Food at the pool was very nice and not too dear, my family's lunch price including drinks averaged $36. The hotel is at stop 40 on the i-ride trolley and so is pretty far South. It took us a good 20 to 25 minutes on the bus to get up to stops 24 - 20 where alot of restaurants are. Having said that I would definately book Floridays again. Most of our time was spent at the parks and it was nice to come away to a quieter hotel in the evenings. We found alot of the other guests were Americans and Canadians who choose to holiday there because the pool area was so nice and the parking was right outside the apartment blocks. The reception staff and the concierge couldn't do enough for us and were very helpful. Nothing was too much trouble.

Reviews.Title: “awesome”
Reviews.Author: lovelyjose4
Reviews.Content: the staff was great,check in and check out was quick.its beautiful my husband and kids enjoyed this place.one great thing they had a starbucks on site,lol i was in heaven then.i will definately going back there next year and doing my family reunion there.loved it.........

Reviews.Title: “Another terrific stay, wouldn't stay anywhere else”
Reviews.Author: Fdufresne
Reviews.Content: Just finished another awesome trip to Floridays. The staff is always so kind and courteous and ready to help. Special thanks to TJ for making it even more special. Steve thank you for the great time also.

Reviews.Title: “what a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: R0bR1957
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the floridays for 2 weeks we had a 2 bedroom condo in block B overlooking the pool it was as the hotel said. No complaints at all. The staff cannot do enough for you anything you ask them and it is done if possible. The condo has everything you need and a bit more for a great holiday. Very close to publix and walgreens.if you want a great place to stay you can’t go wrong with the floridays resort. there was my wife and are 13 year old son and mewho stopped there.

Reviews.Title: “Impressed but check your car you are responsible”
Reviews.Author: justgivemeaname
Reviews.Content: I took Floridays over your standard Hotel Room and I am really glad I did, the room was quiet, spacious, very relaxing after a day at the parks. The room was as close to perfect as I could ask for they did all the little things right. One thing I did notice though sitting on the balcony at night a car accross the parking lot had its alarm system go off (no sound) its lights were flashing, it must have gone on all night because while eating breakfast on the balcony I also noticed the guy couldnt start his car, he ran down his battery I guess? What Im getting at here is they have people patrolling the parking lot, and maintanence driving by in golf carts and everyone has a permit with a # that the resort asks you to put in your windshield. I would have hoped if that was my car someone from the resort would have called me. I also noticed a car in the parking lot had its window left open all night long and it rained that night. If you stay here just check your car before you go to sleep. Resort 10 out of 10 Security not so great, so just be responsible for your own stuff.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: NewYorker003
Reviews.Content: This was our second time staying here. The rooms are fantastic...kitchen area, dining table, living room, balcony, 2 bedrooms, washer and dryer. They make the beds, change your towels and tidy up every day. My only complaint was the bed was hard, but everyone has different opinions on mattresses. My grandson loved the pool, it has various pipes spilling water onto the kids, and was large enough for many kids. The pool hours were long...8 a.m. to 10 p.m. and towels provided. I can't say enough good things about this hotel, and then when you look at their rates, you expect it to be expensive, but it wasn't. A very good value for your money, close to everything...shopping mall, Walmart, grocery store...Disney is about 5 minutes away. Internet service is in all rooms, but you need a cable, which the hotel provides.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: tmfields
Reviews.Content: I have to say that the Floridays resort did WONDERS for my vacation. Let me startf off by saying that the pictures do nothing for the experience,when you first arrive the hotel looks amazing but thats just the beginning the rooms where clean, spacious and absolutely gorgeous. I couldnt have asked for a better location. Its a short drive (10 mins) from Disney, and the hotel provides transportation. Its also walking distance from SEAWORD. There is also a small shopping center that is also in walking distance that includes a huge grocery store and also places to eat. I was amazed at the professionalism of the front desk Kira was my favorite) and the concierge service. I will definately visit again as a matter of fact this will be my new vacation spot.

Reviews.Title: “loved it”
Reviews.Author: TEDBoro_england
Reviews.Content: defo go back family all enjoyed the resort, staff are so helpful .resort immaculate and 5 minutes away from all attractions.there is a publix supermarket 5mins around the corner within walking distance with everything you could need in it..there is also a bus stop outside that you can get anywhere to even the parks.would recommend this resort to anyone .

Reviews.Title: “A perfect holiday at a perfect resort complex !!!,Mr and Mrs W from UK.”
Reviews.Author: rondo51
Reviews.Content: We had the two bedroom condo,clean and very well furnished,home from home. Towels etc:changed every day,unless you leave the "do not disturb" label on the door. Publix supermarket and Walgreens Pharmacy plus others and Outback Steakhouse just off Vineland Avenue,also Orlando Premium Outlets in the same Avenue a bit further round on the left. Best if you have a car to get out for attractions and restaurants,but if not use the I-drive trolley buses which commute up and down I-drive,think they are about every 20 mins, although we did not use them.Also the I-drive trolley map is really useful for dining locations up and down I-drive. To summarise a great resort in a nice quiet area of I-drive,hard to beat,staff were very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Floridays is great”
Reviews.Author: jcmirror
Reviews.Content: My wife, some friends and I have just returned from a short holiday at Floridays. The whole experience was excellent. We shared a three-bedroom apartment (Block F, Room 409). It was perfect, overlooking a man-made lake and the quiet swimming pool at the back of the property. The apartment was large with a nice kitchen, good-sized bedrooms and a nice living area with balcony. We couldn't fault any staff. The desk staff, in particular, were very helpful. Also, the location of Floridays is fantastic. A Publix supermarket and Walgreens drug store are literally a few seconds up International Drive. The Disney parks are just a few minutes away while all tourist areas are easily accessible. We cannot fault Floridays and would recommend the property to anyone. Block F is perfect is you want a quiet time away from the main pool area.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice place.”
Reviews.Author: CGSquared
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a 7 night's stay at Floridays and were very happy with our accommodations. We had a three-bedroom suite that suited our family of 5 well. The suite is not huge but there is enough room to spread out and enjoy your vacation. The rooms were clean, the beds were comfortable, the furnishings were nice, and the room was quiet (F-512). The staff was helpful. We didn't care for the design of the showers or the water pressure but, other than that, no complaints. The pool was nice and fun for the kids but the hot tub bubbles were not working. That was disappointing. I would have also preferred if there were more restaurants right around the hotel but... you can't have it all! Overall, an enjoyable stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best Family Trip at Floridays”
Reviews.Author: juliansmom45
Reviews.Content: Our family of 6 (parents of 2 preschoolers, 3 and 5 year old kids and our parents) had a fabulous time at the resort. We were there for the Ironman Triathalon that my hubby participated in on Sun May 16th. We arrived on Wed May 12th, check-in was very smooth, went to our room and changed into our swim gear and headed straight for the pool. The pictures of the pool don't do it justice. The kids an absolute ball w/all the poo sprays...the zero entry is the best, we sat back relaxed w/no worries while the kids played at the pool. the Cafe is right next to the pool very convenient and good grill type food. Towel bin, so that was great, never a shortage. We stayed Build A which is right next to the pool, i would recommend staying next to the pool so you don' have to hike across the hotel property. We stayed in a 3 bedrm suite, full kitchen, it had all the niceties of home. We went to Walmart and stocked up on bottled ,waterbreakfast and dry snacks and ate out lunch and dinner. Rooms were great, TV in all rooms. What we likes most was the homey feel and hanging out at the pool. i really didn't have any complaints, all the staff we interfaced with were very helpful and frendly from the check-in, concierge to the cafe workers. The location of Floridays is great. Right next to Publics, Walgreens the Outlets and very easy to drive to the disney parks. we drove down from Atl and used our car to drive around and to the theme park 1 day and used the hotel free shuttle another day to go to disney...make sure you reserved the night before for the shuttlle. BTW, parking at the hotel was also free and conveient and close to the building. We've decided to stay at Floridays for our 2011 Orlando visit too. ohh free internet in the room if you bring your own ethernet cord. you won't be disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: “Will stay for vacations to come”
Reviews.Author: Brian7027
Reviews.Content: For your money you will never beat the stay you will have at Floriday's. This was are second time staying at Floriday's Resort and it was perfect. Last year we stayed for a hole week and this year it was only for three days but it was great. I also got a great rate for being a return customer. We stayed at my parents timeshare for the fist seves days then we came over to Floridays on short notice but they let us check in right away. I just had the front office print me out are boarding passes and the girl at the front desk was very nice. Thanks Krystle for being good with the kids and making are vacation a great one at Floridays Resort. We will stay here next year for sure. Also Floridays is a great kids friendly place, with the nice pool and activities they put on for the kids.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Julz410
Reviews.Content: Very nice resort, stayed with teen and 2 toddlers. Its basically a home away from home. We stood in building A (good location short walk across to pool/arcade and cafe) About a 8 min walk to Publix supermarket. Disney shuttle bus pretty decent (about 15-20 min ride) 3 pickup times in the morning from resort and 3 pickup times from Epcot in the evening. I would definitely recommend this resort and would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT!”
Reviews.Author: fernandofaco
Reviews.Content: Very nice resort with excellent accommodation. I paid US$ 125/day the double room. Very good location with easy access to the parks. I truly recommend for anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Resort for Family trip”
Reviews.Author: Gaffster
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Flordays resort March 13th for 7 night.It was a first family holiday for us,5 adults.Floridays was reccommended by a friend who had previoulsy stayed there.We booked online a 3 bedroomed appartment.From the min we arrived I had a good feeling about the place,very clean and very friendly staff.(One thing to say this resort isnt like a hotel but it is a home away from home-Perfect for families)Our appartment was block C which was a little walk form the pool,if i was returning I would book block B,just handier access to pool/lobby etc!! Our appartment was fantastic,everything that you could want.My fav thing was the wash machine and tumble dryer(i will know for next year to travel lighter going over). It would be ideal for families wth young children or familes on a budget as you could go to the Publix supermarket(3min away) and buy in your meals for the week.We ate out in the eves.The master room was huge with a huge bed,bathroom,air conditioning,and tv.The other 2 bedrooms were big ,2 beds in each of those rooms,ideal for sharing with friends.Beds were comfy.Kitchen and living area big also.Huge t.vs in each room.Floridays felt like a very safe resort.The staff were extremely friendly,polite and very efficient.Each morn our appartment was given a general tidy,bins towels,and beds made-bed clothes changed daily at a fee.The pool was big and looked really nice but the weather was slightly dull for our stay!!Now location,Floridays is on stop 40 on international drive(quiet end),which is about 7min drive from main busy international strip.we used the i ride most days for method a transport,an in expensive form of travelling.We use taxis some nights also.10/12 dollars!! Floridays is a 3 min walk to one of the outlets so is great for a spot of retail therapy after a day at the parks,brilliant offers at this outlet. Universal,Island of Adventure,Seaworld are about a 10 min taxi ride away or if u take i ride about 30min depending on the stops the driver takes.Disney is 5 min taxi ride away.Location is great for parks, but for the main restaurants i found it to be a little bit out of the way.Not a problem for us,as we were in an adult group but if you had children and planned to dine out each eve i would imagine it would be a down side.We plan to return to Orlando next March with another couple and we are seriously considering staying in Floridays again.Overall as you can see from previous reviews,this resort is fantastic,I would highly reccommend it for any age,group,family holiday.We stayed at another resort 2 years ago on international drive,and this one was by far the best.Great value also for the appartments.I can safely say you wont be disappointed with your stay at floridays resort!!

Reviews.Title: “Diamond In The Rough”
Reviews.Author: TampaTravler
Reviews.Content: My family has stayed at this resort a total of three times now and I feel totally compelled to write this review. If you a travelling to Disney, this is the place to stay. 1. You cannot beat the price for the size of the room. 2. It is literally only an 8 minute drive to Disney. 3. The rooms are very clean and they seem to be somewhat new. 4. The office staff treats you nice and cares about your stay. 5. The pool area is aweome. 6. My wife is VERY picky and she loves this place!!

Reviews.Title: “AWESOME STAY!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Eddie_Fla
Reviews.Content: Listen to the reviews...outside of the Disney deluxe resorts, this hotel is well worth the stay! Excellent customer service.....easy check in with no wait (checked in early with no problems), large clean rooms (very large bathrooms!!) and free Starbucks coffee to get you going before hitting the parks. My 5 year old never wanted to leave the pool!! Will definitely be back!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “outstanding customer service”
Reviews.Author: ringchaser
Reviews.Content: I was so impressed with Floridays!!! The rooms, the grounds the pool, EVERYTHING!!! That would have been enough for me, but when i ran into a big problem, their customer service blew me away!!! My flight was booked for the wrong day and i had to stay an extra day, which i wasn't planning. Dominick, one of the managers, helped me so much, and helped me solve my problem. I would highly recommend Floridays and will definitely be staying there again. I have already recommended to our cheerleading organization!!!! Frances Crowley

Reviews.Title: “Great value, one of the best deals in...”
Reviews.Author: bct2323
Reviews.Content: Great value, one of the best deals in Orlando, huge rooms, up to date decor, great pool, location is good for all parks and dining, very helpful staff. Would definately return for next trip to Florida

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is beast!”
Reviews.Author: jmdv12
Reviews.Content: I went with the school band to a preformance at gainesville. The next day we went to islands of adventure, but during the night before we stayed at Floridays. although we were a 45 people group, the treatment they gave us was exceptional. The rooms were much more comfortable to share with classmates than they would be in a regular hotel. We were 7 in a three bedroom suite, but it had so much space that only two people had to share beds, and the separate rooms (we were distribuited 2 per room) made privacy much more easy to keep. It was a very big help to have 2 bathrooms as well. My cousin might be coming over in summer and if he does, I'm definitely gonna try to convince my mo to go to that hotel. It's an unforgettable experience. The rooms were sooo cozy that I slept just like I would at home. I also liked the pool setup, it was soo cool, and the balcony too. We also played pocker on the big table.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent stay, excellent price”
Reviews.Author: capt_silver
Reviews.Content: We rented a 3BR suite in Building E for four days at the end of Orlando. Check-in was smooth, with not the slightest mention of time-share sales. The suite was very clean - especially bathrooms (spacious!) and kitchen. Some of the curtains and bed ruffles were a little worn, but no big deal. Kitchen could have been better equipped (not enough plates / flatware for the number of people the suite could accommodate), but good enough. No problems with HVAC - I like to keep rooms very cool, and this was no problem. Housekeeping staff were good about making beds, changing towels (lots!), and emptying trash - if you want more cleaning there is an extra charge. We paid the resort fee without blinking - some on tripadvisor have complained about this, but if you know in advance, it's no big deal. We tried both of the pools - the smaller one closer to our building was unheated (still cold in April). The larger one was heated, but because it was more popular, also not as clean. It's a saltwater pool, so from the start it doesn't look as clean as a freshwater pool, plus the date palm trees surrounding the pool dropped little seeds into the pool constantly, and kids would track sand into the pool from the adjacent "beach." The pool was the only part of the experience I would rate as even somewhat negative. Nice to have the bar (and snacks) next to the pool. The staff was always polite and accommodating - top knotch customer service. Resort is reasonably close to Disney (less than 15 minutes with no traffic) and even closer to Sea World (only 3 miles). Directions given by the concierge desk are not good - especially the return from Disney. Overall this was an excellent trip, and the price (through Travelocity, package deal) could not be beat. If we ever go back to Orlando again (theme parks are not my thing - this was purely for the kids) we would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “A trip to remember”
Reviews.Author: pouchie1
Reviews.Content: Myself and family stayed at floridays for nearly 4 weeks (due to volcanic disruption) What can i say the service was 100% courtesy, politeness was but one of the characteristics. Jim Naseem Head of concierge was helpful, friendly and would go out of his way to ensure we were happy which we were. Housekeeping was abit lapse at the start but Tara and Julie Q went out of their way to ensure that all our needs were met. Dominic head of operations was so helpful when we had to return to the hotel from the airport and made us all feel welcomed. I am very impressed with the resort and our stay there and will definately come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for the Price”
Reviews.Author: MGO222
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two nights just after easter with a plan to hit disney for a day. We arrived early the first day and asked the concierge about tickets to Universal Studios since we had enough time to get one more park in. He was able to get us very cheap tickets with the option to hit both universal parks the same day. The rooms were HUGE and with 3 kids it was a must. They had there own room with a TV, there was also a huge Kitchen / Dining room and another Large master bedroom and bathroom. The room service was good and fast delivered by a security guard. about a 5 minute drive to all parks Would recomend this for a family with kids.

Reviews.Title: “Condo-style resort, quiet area close to everything”
Reviews.Author: abevVermont
Reviews.Content: Stayed in a 3BR condo unit, very clean and comfortable. The resort has a lovely lobby and grounds. The pool is fun, has kiddie area with water features that the kids loved. Overall this was a great value, very modern and comfortable. The only negative was that there was no real restaurant on site. There's a cafe by the pool but no room service, unless you order family-style portions on a limited menu.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Convenience”
Reviews.Author: vawinelvr
Reviews.Content: This is the third time we've stayed at the Floridays all times a combination of business and pleasure. For a family, you can't fault the value and convenience. As others have commented, the approximation to Publix, outlets, walgreens and I-Ride buses is hard to beat. When we first stayed at Floridays it was brand new. Since then, things are showing wear as you would expect and although we obviously like to resort having been there three times, there are some improvements that could be made. Here are my pro's and con's. PRO - location, location - great out of the fray of Disney yet easy to get everywhere. A car is a must though unless you are going to rely on shuttles and buses. - pool(s) and facilities are very nice. Great for kids (our 4 year old LOVES their pool) a sandy area for play with buckets and shovels, hot tub, stocked towels, etc. - rooms allow for either 2 or 3 bedroom, perfect for families - allows everyone to have their own space - grounds are well kept and clean - marketplace on site for quick items like coffee, cereal or sunscreen - friendly and helpful guest services, everyone tries to be as accommodating as possible - full kitchen is awesome for those that want to save a little money or just eat more healthfully. We got foods for breakfast and lunch right around the corner at the Publix and then ate dinners out. Carry out dinners are also nice shared on the room balcony. - laundry is a very nice extra that is so helpful. You can pack less and come home without a lot of work to do. I did notice however, this trip that the machine in our room was not spinning well and the clothes were very wet after a full cycle. An equipment refresh is probably needed after so many years of hard use. CONS - housekeeping! It's not just a fluke, we've had poor housecleaning services every trip. You wouldn't think this would be that big of a deal, but when you come back from a day at the parks at 3:30 and the room has not been touched it is annoying. At these condo's you can expect towels to be refreshed, trash to be removed and beds to be made only. We expected that part, but hoped for more timely service - noise - again, not a lot they can do about this, but I was awakened at 3am by the snoring coming from the room adjacent to ours! I almost couldn't believe it! Walls are thin and outside hallway noises are amplified by the breezeway design. Unfortunately, I've experienced this at many a hotel, not just Floridays. All told, a great value, wonderful for families and a pleasant and convenient stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Resort”
Reviews.Author: rv10
Reviews.Content: Great location... Next to Sea World, International Trolley, Publix, close to Disney and most important comfortable rooms and the main pool was amazing. My family and I really loved the place as well the Palm Restaurant the food was great... And special thank you to a young lady at the front desk reception named Yanita, she was very helpful with our question she gave us nice suggestions for our trip (great services) as well she help us with all our resort questions when we arrived, and little bit after we check in to our room she also call our room to make sure that all was great.Thanks to Yanita we had our vacation well planned.. We absolutely had a nice vacation in Orlando. Next time we definitely go back! Thank you Floridays!

Reviews.Title: “spacious condo style accommodations plus fabulous pool area”
Reviews.Author: tracywin
Reviews.Content: We were absolutely delighted with our stay at this resort. The 2 bedroom unit was extremely spacious and included all the amenities you might require in a condo-type accommodation. The pool area is expansive with many different sections making it appropriate for many different types of travellers. The hotel staff at the front desk, especially Dominic and Luis, were incredibly responsive and helpful. The service definitely exceeded our expectations and we would highly recommend this resort to anyone travelling to the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Roomy, comfortable, good value and good location”
Reviews.Author: libhinds
Reviews.Content: We loved the space and having a kitchen saved on meals. On the day we split up, one group took the Trolley (in front of the hotel) and the other the car. The location was great and we could walk to Walgreens and a Publix grocery store. Sea World was very close and the Disney Parks were easy to get to. We were all very pleased with the hotel and would definitely return. The hotel grounds were lovely and the pool and hot tub a lot of fun.

Reviews.Title: “LOVED IT!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: DCGirl08
Reviews.Content: So my husband and the in laws and I traveled to Orlando for Spring vacation. This was our first time staying at Floridays Orlando Resort and I must say that I will be back! We booked a 2 bedroom condo and was exquisite. We had to wait a little while for the room becuase we got there before check and thankfully we did. We were able to avoid being placed in teh same building as a very large school group staying at the hotel at the same time. We were put on the 2nd floor in Building A. If you are looking for a family friendly, clean an deconomical place to stay for a few days on vacation, floridays is theplace to go. the condo had a full kitchen with granite countertops, washer and dryer, 2 full baths with a spa tub in the master bathroom and a dinning room table. the romms were fully equipped and we didn't have not one probelem during our entire stay. Also, Floridays is centrally located to Universal studios and MGM/Hollywood Studios. It is right around the corner from teh Outlet Mall and Sea World.

Reviews.Title: “In a Word! Great!”
Reviews.Author: SRF25
Reviews.Content: We are lucky to have a place like this for the price! You can not beat the Staff the cafe is outstanding and the front desk is very quick to help out! This is service not common in Orlando as I have been to several Resorts and Hotels in the area! If you look at the amount of reviews Floridays has over all the others on trip advisor, you will start to see that not so many were moved by the Resort or Hotel stay. As very little made a comment.

Reviews.Title: “We thought it was average...and the water smells of sulphur.”
Reviews.Author: foxylynne
Reviews.Content: We had read so many great reviews about Floridays here on TA that we were happy to book our 14 night stay at the resort. Our party was 2 adults and 2 boys aged 8 and 10. We had a 2 bedroom ground floor unit in Block C. The location was fine and the unit was private and quiet. We found the interior to be quite dark even with the curtains fully opened at the back. (Opening the second bedroom curtains exposes you to the walk by traffic and this seems to be common to most units). The furnishings in our unit were a little tired as were the kitchen fixtures and utensils. A bed in the boys room was broken when we arrived and on closer inspection it was easy to tell that this was a well used piece of furniture. I reported the broken bed to reception and it was repaired before we returned that night. We found that our bed linens were generally old and poorly fitted so that even though the beds were made daily, they were always 'sloppy'. At day 10 we had to ask the housecleaning staff to change our bed linen. We used the resort shuttle which is shared with the nearby Fountains resort. The shuttle picks up first at Fountains. On several occasions we found that the shuttle was fully booked and we were required to make other arrangements. So be advised, book your shuttle very early on the preceding day, particularly on weekends. As many have reported here recently, the heated pool was cold. Enough said. We have travelled extensively and rarely find the need to use bottled water however we all reached for the bottled water as the water in the rooms smeeled and tasted very strongly of sulphur. If we were to go again I would think very seriously about Fountains Resort. BTW, here's a tip for those without a car. If at Disney and you wish to get back to the resort by taxi, take a Disney shuttle to a resort adjacent to Downtown Disney. Take a leisurely stroll over to Downtown Disney and get your taxi there. You will save $15-$20 in Taxi fares.

Reviews.Title: “Very good experience”
Reviews.Author: jgn-7
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at Floridays. There were 6 of us - my husband, myself, 2 boys, and my in laws. We had a 3 bedroom unit in building C and the space was perfect. The kitchen was very well stocked with dishes and cooking items. Only thing missing was salt and pepper. There is a grocery store within walking distance that closes at 10. The Walmart is about a 10 minute drive and is open 24 hours. We really liked our location in the hotel. Building C is close to the pool, but not directly overlooking it. At check in, we were given a choice of room locations and picked a room overlooking a pond with the pool in the distance. There are rooms with only parking lot views, which wouldn't be great if you plan to sit on the deck at all. We had such a great time in the mornings watching the pond. There was a family of ducks, a turtle, lots of fish, visiting loons etc. The front desk staff were great. The room was very clean upon check in. We knew ahead of time that full housekeeping was an additional charge. Everyday, they would replenish towels and make the beds. A couple of times we had to call the desk as not enough towels were left, but other than that, the service was reliable. Once, we did order a full cleaning which was only $35. They did a great job on the bathrooms and kitchen, but the vaccuming wasn't great. The only negative thing we experienced was the restaurant service at the pool. We only used it once, so maybe we just hit it on a bad night. We were told that our orders would be 20 minutes and they took over 40. Then, my husband ordered a pizza and sat there for almost an hour waiting. The place was closing and it turned out they hadn't put the order through. They offered to make it, but it would have been another 20 minutes so he passed. But, again, that was the only time we tried it so I don't know if that was a common thing. The bar service was great though, and the drinks were yummy. We had originally booked through expedia, but we ended up cancelling that reservation and booked directly through the hotel as they had a much better AAA rate come up. All in all, it was a great experience and I would stay here again - especially when the rate was so reasonable. Another added benefit - 3 minute drive to the Premium Outlet Mall which is next door!

Reviews.Title: “A Great Resort, for a Great Price with friendly and courteous staff members.”
Reviews.Author: mopaige82
Reviews.Content: The Floridays Resort Orlando is a great place to stay. I recently stayed in a 3 bedroom 2 bathroom suite and I have no complaints. It is very spacious and would be ideal for 9 - 12 people. The master bedroon has a king size bed with a stand alone shower and a large whirlpool bathtub. The other 2 bedrooms have 2 full size beds in each room and the living room has a sleeper sofa. A fully equipped kitchen and a stackable washer and dryer are also more features of the resort. It is located near Universal Studios. If you do not want to drive to the theme parks, the resort offers a shuttle that will drop off and pick up from the theme park. This is definitely a great option for large parties with multiple cars and you don't have to pay for parking. The Floridays Resort is a timeshare, however we were never pressured into going on any tours or forced into purchasing a timeshare. This resort was only ranked as a 3 star hotel but I would give them the top rating because this place is awesome.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value-Clean,Courteous and close to everything”
Reviews.Author: pjk126
Reviews.Content: I stayed in room e312 3 bedrooms.2 baths. the master bedroom had jacuzzi type tub. The room was clean, large and had a well equiped kitchen. There was a great pool for the kids(and adults) and a small pool by our building. The hotel is close to all attractions and 1 hour from ocean and 1.7 hours from the gulf. At check out time the girl at the front desk printed my boarding passes at no charge. The staff if very friendly . They have internet access for a charge. The only negative thing was the lighting in the bathrooms was not bright enough.

Reviews.Title: “This has it all!!”
Reviews.Author: travelin_moma
Reviews.Content: Floridays is the best... hands down! I recently book our family trip based on reviews, and it completely surpassed our high expectations! The full kitchen was very handy, we saved a ton by making some of our meals ourselves. Plus we have a picky toddler, so eating out can be a challenge. In room waser & dryer was a life saver!! We not only were able to pack lighter, but came home with clean clothes as well! The golf cart transportation around the resort was very handy. Both pools were warm and clean, plus they are salt water which is so nice for babies skin! The staff was wonderful ( especially Charlotte who not only booked our room at a great rate, but was very helpful in posting a letter!!) When we phoned front desk to ask about maybe having another towel, it was at our door in 10 mins and there were always extra everyday ! All the staff were friendly and helpful, we felt welcome! This was our first time at Floridays, and we will be back again.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay in orland”
Reviews.Author: drvance
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at these condos twice on trips to orlando for both golf and family vacation to Disney. It is extremely well located and is easy to get to most all golf courses as well as very easy to get to all of the disney parks. Will never stay anywhere but here. Ask to have Ray drive you around the property on the luxury golf cart, he is great!

Reviews.Title: “a home away from home”
Reviews.Author: LolaYork
Reviews.Content: very comfortable & it really gives you that home feeling while away. However the beds suck , the linens feel like paper towels, just not something you look forward to after a long day at the parks.
